Reddit seems to know more, basically saying they got rid of a bunch of developers without a backup plan. I'm going to try reaching out again before having my credit card company go after my money.

App keeps crashing for almost three weeks in a row now. Support just gives the same exact answer"we are working to fix it". In the meanwhile everybody continues to pay for the app. It'a not heard of a business of these proportions to have these kind of difficulties and more importantly handle these situations so so poorly.

As others have said, the app is completely broken and can't sign in. It's a shame, the content is great, but being completely unavailable for days considering the premium price is inexcusable. What is the tech team doing? This authentication issue should be a high priority, but it's been going for days.

Updated: over 1 year later. Still love it, renewed my subscription. Lost 10lbs in 4 months and keeping it off over a year later. Love Luke and Alexi, they are my fav. Love centr. I have really only completed 1 week because I got covid on week 2. But so far I really love it. The workouts are awesome and the recipes are fantastic. I probably won't look as ripped as female Instructors,but that is the goal.
Love this app. Huge range of programs, excersises, information, recipes etc. Covers everything I need.

It's great! The workouts are awesome, and the meals are delicious! I find I have to substitute a lot of the ingredients,mostly because of where I live and don't have all the ingredients. But I manage, there's so much to choose from. Biggest complaint, where's Thor?!! Thought he'd do a workout or something lol!

Content good, utility not so much. When using the app the workouts constantly freeze which makes getting into it really difficult, you just get your heartrate up and it pauses and leaves you hanging. There is no issue with my Internet and other apps I use don't do this so it is definitely a Centr problem and is really disappointing.

Love this app so much! I've been using this app for a couple of years already, and I don't have anything negative to say about it. Of course, it takes dedication to work towards your goals, but this app makes it easier (for me). I love the assortment of workout programs plus meals. They are so diverse, so you can take your pick... Literally. I don't have much home-equipment, so I love that they have programs that don't require any equipment as well. Highly highly highly recommend this app!

I tried a free trial for this app because of Chris Hemsworth and how he looked in Thor. This app is so much more than I imagined and I feel inspired every day to keep going. I have had quite a few setbacks since I joined, but I can't imagine life without this app. There are various programs, planner workouts, meals, meditations, information blogs. It really has it all. I sampled other apps, but Centr for me is the one I'll keep going back to, it's just superb.

I do love this app. The flexibility to swap workouts and meals is awesome. I love that it plans everything out for you including a shopping list. The only thing I wish it has was the ability to put in food allergies to avoid recipes that's contain them.

The first app that I have come across that has so much workout variety, easy to use menus (food that whole family loves), with the extra bonus of meditation and sleep visualisation. It really is the whole package.

I use this exclusively for the workout programs. I love the variety and they keep adding new ones. They are easy to follow + I've shaved a few pounds and noticeably toned up after my first 6 weeks. If you're struggling to get back into a routine and don't really want to go to a gym, I highly recommend this! Definitely worth the $.

I have been a user over the last 18 months. The workouts, recipes, and meditations are great. Many options are available. Unfortunately, over the last three weeks, many users have had no access to the app or through the website. Little to no solutions have been offered. I recently received an email saying I will get a credit for a month. What's the use of it if I can't access the app or website.

I've enjoyed the app for almost a year now without issue. However the latest update keeps signing me out and the app is essentially bricked at this point. I can no longer access and workout or meal without being logged out prior to reaching it.

As of 8/29/23, the app has been fixed. Streamlined workouts, easy to follow, and a great way to push you to your limits! Plus lots of extras beyond what I was looking for that I'll be sure to take advantage of.

Okay, this is the deal. The app has a potential to be a great resource but lack the technical ablity to work properly. I can not login in without it timeing out, no matter what I do i can't use it without a time out within 5 mins. I am just so fed up, and disappoint at this point.

It was great. I really enjoyed the format and the workouts. Unfortunately, the app is completely broken. Constantly kicks me out and major sections of the app just not accessible. Someone tell Chris Hemsworth to fix his app...
Amazing holistic approach to fitness and wellness. Works well with a tight schedule and addresses both physical as well as nutritional and emotional health. Totally recommend the app!

Update: This was a 5 star app for the past 3 years. However, both this app and their website have been having signifcant technical issues for all their worldwide subscribers going on now for 3 weeks, preventing most subscribers from logging into the app and using it. I have not been satisfied with Centr's response and explanation.

Scam, I cancelled the auto renew but they still charged me. I did contacted customer support and they didn't do anything expect repeating that their t&e is very clear. I am well aware of the t&e and that's why I cancelled as soon as I registered for the 3 month to make sure I won't get charged.
Love the app overall but have been having a lot of login issues lately. Every time I try to click on the programs it kicks me out to login again. Keeps happening on the app and the website.

I just keep getting a session expired. After I sign in it goes to load everything and then session expired. I need a reliable application, not to be sitting at the gym with my limited time signing into the application over and over hoping for the servers to allow me to sign in. Please make some aspects available offline.

Now back to 5 stars after the app has been fixed. However, very frustrating experience while it was not working due to the complete lack of communication or explanation from the company as to why it was offline for a week.

It's definitely the best online exercise programs iv tried. Very easy to stay motivated and it makes you not want to miss a day. Only feed back would be to be able to record(write down) your own workout and diet. If I miss a day doing centaur because I went gym hiking or biking it would be nice to look at the calender and not look like a lazy day.

Please fix the app. Worked great until this week. Now it constantly logs me about for "session expired" even in the middle of a workout. It's unusable right now. UPDATE ... actually now I can't even view anything. I get the error "sorry we dropped a dumbbell, please try again shortly" Please fix
Overall great. Been using the app for years. However recently screen casting stopped working and not sure how else to file a bug report. Happy to change this review once someone fixes this.
great workout app! best for beginners who have no idea where to start, could be better if there's an offline option, because I work in a cruise ship and i dont have acces on the internet all the time
The app is back to functional state. Nice app, awesome workouts. My everyday go to!
The workouts feel so tailored to what I want. Used to spend $50 a week at a small group gym, now I pay $10 and do workouts that feel better for me!

Love the app. it worked while on the free trial. Now that I have paid, it keeps telling me my session has expired and to log in. But when I do it, it either immediately says the same thing or will say it once I try to use it.

Got it a week ago and paid for it. Now the app, doesn't let me use it at all. Constantly saying my session has expired every time I log in. Contacted support and got some copy and pasted response thanking me for my patience. What patience? I have no patience for something I paid and expect to work.
The app has been far from reliable. Constant issues trying to load, error message saying the session has ended. Would be nice to start a session first...

Worked good when it worked. For the past 2 weeks the app has been crashing, not letting me access anything other than the login screen. After just paying over 100$ for access this is kinda pushing it a bit I hope someone contacts me asap or ill be contacting the CS team myself soon.

I've had the app for years now and there is currently a death loop login bug where, after logging in, you will be logged out after seconds and have to log back in. I thought this was restricted to Android but also occurs on iOS. This is a five star program that has to be one star if you can't use it....

I dont know what's going on with this app. Ive used it for 3 years and love the program. However, since this past weekend it will not allow me to login. If I do get in then I'm logged out. It's so frustrating and nothing is being done about it. I'm on the verge of canceling my membership and deleting this headache
Great programs. Lots of options. Meals. Meditation and workouts. 10000% recomend.
Are you kidding me. This is by far my favorite app. Especially being a stay at home dad, I get the quality workout was getting at the gym
I like the workouts and meals but the app itself is very glitchy and often unusable. For what they charge for this it needs to be at least somewhat reliable.
I paid for a year's subscription, and the app and website keep crashing on me. It's disappointing because I really enjoy the workouts, but the app and the website keep kicking me out.
The app keeps crashing and signing me out. Unusable. When it works it's great. Tech support just says wait while they fix it. Can we get refunded for the downtime? I pay for 3 months!

I had a good experience with this app earlier in the year. However, trying to get back into it, the app is just broken. Seems like it's been an ongoing issue for weeks now. The app intermittently works, depending on time of day.

Latest update has broken the app. Constantly telling me to login because session expired. This service is not cheap and I expect these issues to be fixed in days, not weeks. I love this service, please fix it!

As workout apps go, this is by far my favourite. Very approachable with plenty of modifications to up the intensity of the workouts depending on your goals. Tasty food, and bonus yoga that tests your core. Worth the price, but I'd recommend the annual payment.

Great, motivating, varied. I love that I can do a program, try something that they recommend daily, or seek out my favourite trainer. As a complete weightlifting novice, it's been great to learn to lift, and combine that with my usual yoga routine (the yoga in the app is great).

Becareful if you wish to cancel subscription. If not done exactly as they expect they blame you. Cancelled via Google play months in advance and they said it didn't count as it wasn't through the website. No subscription reminders or receipts. Be vigilant with fraud.
I'm pretty fit, but the Centr Unleashed Advanced workout is challenging, in a good way. The lesson and program progressions are great and you need hardly any space to do the workouts.

Absolutely love this app. Has helped my wife and I get into fitness with beginners training regimes that go up to moderate and advanced. Lots of meal recommendations, guest work outs like Da Rulk's and a planner. Recommended to anyone looking to get fit. The trainers are motivational and fun and they offer ways to do most work outs in low impact methods and high intensity.
Won't cast to my Roku or TV. I'm thinking about a purchase, but this needs to work
Been away a while but back at it. App looks much more polished and advanced. Self-guided workout logbooks to go with the programs is awesome!
Love the workouts and the variety. The app keeps logging me out on my phone. Currently, the site is unusable on my laptop and on the mobile browser. It's been like this for almost a week.

Good but not perfect (yet). I lost a week of my first month due to the app going down,was slow to resolve and no offer of a refund for the week. But as trainer and dietitian in your pocket, it's good!
So used to be 4 stars for me but now it's 1 due to the app constantly logging you out due to session issues. Clearing cache, deleting the data, and reinstalling doesn't fix the issue.
I love this app. Especially, the nutrition and working out plan is targeted on the goal you want to achieve, either losing weight, getting toned or bulked up.
Great variety of coaches and coaches work outs. The self guided are nice too. Overall well put together series and intuitive app with overall fitness in mind, food and other habits
Great coaches and interesting workout that are motivating.

Very useful app that has got me going to the gym. Takes away the unknowns and I feel confident using equipment. Would be great if there was a widget that you could add to phone home screen displaying the daily planner
Great when you can login. It worked all summer, but trying to open the app now I just get an error that my session expired no matter how many times I login.
The app won't load, and every time I open the programs page, it logs me out. I can't work out with the app crashing on me all the time

Is there any chance I could stop getting logged out/session expired every time I open the app? I can't open one single workout. Reinstalled, log in 15 times, what else do I have to do, please tell me because the subscription wasn't cheap..
Love the program but I recently cannot even login. I've uninstalled and reinstalled, cleared cache, and other troubleshooting. App just will not open anymore. Any help would be great

Although the programs are pretty good, there is zero customization options. When you reach out to customer service you get rude responses. You would think for so much money that it would have one of these things.

First the bad: sometimes the app/website just doesn't work at all. For a paid subscription service, this is very disappointing. Based on this fact alone, I would give the app 1 star - except that when it is working (which is most of the time) it is a really good service. The app design could be better, but the workouts, recipes, and meditations are all top tier and more than make up for any flaws. I have noticed more progress in my fitness by following this app than anything else I have tried.

Love that you can set your meal preference so I only get vegetarian recipes sent to me. Love the complete system with the meal plans, exercise and meditation portions. Some workouts seem to repeat too frequently while others offer a variety of new moves. Lastly, if the subscription cost could be reduced, that would be amazing. Overall, I am very happy with the app.

The app is fantastic. Workouts are easy to follow, as challenging as you need them to be and keep you coming back for more! The meal plans are great, delicious recipes and simple to cook. However, the app (and the website) keep having problems with crashing/not logging in at random - this seems to happen every other day and can last for over an hour before being fixed! This is extremely frustrating if you're in the middle of a workout or cooking!

Could easily be brilliant with a few tweaks. The videos don't always load properly during workouts, and the search function could do with some improvements. If you specify arms and back in your search, for example, it gives every workout that has either of those muscle groups, rather than those with both. As well, rather than searching for arms, it would be nice if you could search bicep or tricep specifically. Overall very good and helpful, but could be improved upon with a few simple changes

Loved the app. Eventhough it's slightly expensive as compared to other apps. It's still worth it. Exercises are very challenging and pushes you hard. The only drawback I would like to state here is that there are very less modifications for some advanced moves. And very less range of stretching exercises. They are very repetitive. Rest is good. Have been doing it for 3 weeks now. Never felt so good.

I've wanted to use this app since it was first launched but hadn't had the funds before now. When I took advantage of the six week trial in March 2020 I was not surprised to find it superb and well thought out. The ability to focus on weight loss, strength, or fitness and the way it shapes your daily planned workouts and meals is intuitive, and the intensity can be changed at any time. I just took on my first programme Unleashed, and I'm looking forward to seeing the impact. Highly recommended.

There is a big range of workouts to do plus stretching and even food plans and relaxation tasks. It's a great app. The only thing that can be improved is in their programs. The pre and post stretches are the same each day in the challenge so far . I'm in week 2. Not a major issue, I do whatever stretches I think I need and more targeted to what the work out was. I would definitely recommend this app. Especially you if you travel you can always pick some work outs without weights

This is an awesome fitness programme, adapted to all fitness levels and with a whole range of options in the goals you wish to attain. The programme is adapted to your fitness level, goal and diet (vegan, vegetarian, lactose intolerant,...). There are also a lot of different instructor, which is really nice. You have wonderful meditations included as well, and if you don't want to follow the fixed programme you're free to choose your workout. The apps works perfectly as well. Thumbs up.

Freaking amazing!, The workouts are great, the planner is really good! The food choices are amazing. The only few downsides is: 1. No off-line download, that would be great 2. No way to make favorite workouts But that is minor compared to what you get, you get an amazing list of options to workout and eat! This is one of the best fitness apps I have tried that has everything for an affordable price!

I'll go straight to the problems (but give 5 stars because I'm a developer too and I understand that it is not possible to release a perfect app, and despite the problems - I enjoyed it): 1) Explanation videos don't block the screen. I was watching Da Rulk's basic explanations and my screen turned off in the middle of the video. I must point out that workout videos were working fine the whole session. 2) Metric and Imperial systems are often mixed. For example here: Panzanella Salad with Bocconcini - 2 thick (2 1/2 oz) slices sourdough bread (or gluten free) cut into 1 inch cubes - 2 1⁄3 cups (70g) mixed lettuce leaves I have metric system selected and I have no idea what are 1 inch cubes. In the same recipe: Preheat oven to 390°F and line a baking sheet with baking paper. Again, I have no idea what is that temperature. In one of the videos someone mentioned that the weight should be 1-2 kgs (I think it was "how can I replace everything with dumbbells" video). Now I imagine that USA population would be confused with that phrase. 3) Video turns off and screen scrolls up if I decide to change phone positioning from vertical to horizontal. Overall video is not very comfortable to watch if I want to review the videos before starting a workout, because I can't just open them fixed fullscreen and there is a big yellow button on the way. 4) There is no intuitive way to review the basics of an exercise. Yesterday I did a workout, but I couldn't find a way to see the details of how each exercise should be done. I had to kinda just observe and repeat what was on the video. I think there must be a helpful link somewhere in the recommended articles in the beginning, but I think it would be way more comfortable to have it inside of workout, so I would be able to just click and see how to do the exercise properly anytime. 5) More local adjusted recipes. I don't have maple syrup. Maples don't grow in Brazil (maybe they do, but I haven't see one). In another hand I have access to a variety of amazing tropical fruits and vegetables - and I want to take advantage of that. Related to the same problem - there is no turkey here! I wish I would be able to buy it (and there are so many recipes with it), but there is none. I'm glad there is that switching option, but I imagine it won't solve all the problems.

I really like the app and love the recipes. I like that Centr 6 program has 3 difficulties in 1 video. But it still needs improvement! If you're training every day, the music gets super repetitive! No favorites and you don't have an overview of when you trained or cooked something. It is important for me to track my progress and would be great to make my own planner (choose the trainings and meals you wanna do each day). Other free apps have more to offer for the moment. Personalize!!!!

Beautifully presented app, easy to navigate and a wide selection of exercises. The plans generated on the planner mix up the type of exercises each day, resulting in varied routines. If you want to mix up what is suggested there is a vast library for all abilities. Lots of awesome recipes, after switching to a vegetarian diet I was pleasantly surprised with the huge choice of meals. One improvement would be a favourites list to make it easier to find the users preferred dishes.

Would not recommend this for beginners. Unless you have some prior knowledge of fitness and nutrition, it is quite difficult to follow. There are a lot of different programs to chose, which is confusing. I found the workouts difficult to follow on a tablet / phone and end up getting frustrated and not even bothering. Recipies look great, if you can find ingredients. Not exactly regular supermarket stuff for a lot of it, perhaps the programs are more designed around inner city folks.

Love it (mostly). I love the workout, I love the meals and I love the supportive community. It definitely lacks some features though. The main thing is a means to track your lifts in the Build Muscle program. As progressive overload is integral to building muscle, you need to know exactly what you have lifted previously. And while I could use another app, or a pen and paper, something in the app would be better. I would also like a way to track progress - weight loss, progress pics etc.

Imho a real cool app, but I still won't continue to use it. Especially the meditations are great. Its missing customization options, for example "show only workouts without equipment" or filter out recipes by ingredients. The recipes are great, but shopping the ingredients for a whole week takes an insane amount of time and you will have a lot of ingredients left over. Too expensive for me, but I still think it's a cool app. I would pay for an app that is just the meditation stuff.

Overall Centr is brilliant! meals can be a little pricey & time consuming, however you do get the option to swap the meal. I think an option to copy a day's meal to the whole week would be beneficial, as regards to changing the meals day by day, meal by meal. The only downside for me is selecting workouts on the filter feature, not a problem just slightly annoying. For example you can select no equipment and it may give you a workout with dumbbells. App is better with equipment! Worth the money.

This is my first review of any app. But for anyone looking to find app to keep you focused on your goals, accountable and easy to use. It really is great. You don't get overwhelmed by the number of coaches or the "build your own workout" and once you find a coach you like and chose to follow them, it becomes even easier. also, the workout is predetermined for each day, no time wasted filtering through (if you don't want to). The the helpful meals, mindset and articles are an absolute bonus.

Totally worth it. The recipes are great, sometimes the portions seem a bit large though. The coaches are amazing and they each have different personalities that allows you to choose the perfect workout for your mood/energy. The sleep visualisations are great, at least, the first half - couldn't tell you how any of them finish haha but the best part is the community, what a great collection of people.

One of the best fitness App on the market. Overall it's very complete. However, it would be great to have diversified pre-designed programs (over many weeks) that are not only focused on HIIT or similar programs. For example, including yoga or pilates, or mindfulness programs to add to the existing list offered on the App. Other than that, this is a good app.

Easy to follow workouts, plans and recipes that are all wrapped up in a great user experience. I've tried many other fitness apps in the past but this is by far the easiest to use and the one I have no problem coming back to every day. I used it free for 6 weeks but knew pretty quickly that I would become a paying customer. I'd like to see some more kettlebell focused routines but other than that ita difficult to fault the content.

Fantastic app I'm easily bored and this is one of the few exercise apps that I've stuck with. It's the complete package. Variety of exercises, food plan and meditation. The app is geared to you, your fitness level, what you want to get out of it whether it be weight loss/gain, tone, etc. and you can change your preferences at any time. It also has a Facebook group that gives you the extras, a sounding board, help and a place to post your progress. It's a group of positivity.

I love most of the things about this app, the workouts are great and varied and I like how the centr six program allows you to challenge yourself by leveling up in the one workout. I would like to be able to turn off the music in the workout so I can play my own music without it clashing and still be able to hear the instructions from the trainers.

Love this app. Very versatile and not much equipment is needed. Instructions are clear and easy to follow so working out with the video clips is easy. Offers programs as well as individual work outs. Also offers dietary tips and recipes if you want to go all in. Only thing I would like to change is a variation to the cool down stretches in the programs as they are the same every day. However, there are stretch workouts available to but for speed and ease a variation would be good.

I love this app! It is well laid out and easy to use. I also love the program. There are so many options to choose from, and so far I have really enjoyed all the trainers/teachers. My favorites are the yoga and MMA, and I've really enjoyed trying different kinds of moves, like kicking and punching. The meal plans look amazing, although I've only tried a few recipes; I can imagine how following it to a "t" would make meals easier and likely save money on groceries too! I've fully subscribed!

Great app with a lot of good content. A few things that could be improved - recommendations on weight (as % of 1 rep max). Also, some of the exercise program's progressions are too steep. The current program I'm doing for example does 3 weeks of 7x3 chin-ups, then immediately jumps to 10x4.. and then in other parts of the same program the exercises are too easy. It would also be better if the rest timers ran while the screen is locked. But all in all a very good app.

The app itself is quite good actually, even excellent I'd say and I encourage its use. However, the one star goes to their hardline billing conditions, as though as it is set in stone. If you make an accidental purchase, or if you forgot to cancel your subscription before the trial ends, then there's no refund whatsover. This is not how you win customers, this is how you push them away. Now that I'm stuck with a subscription I no longer need, I'm definitely not renewing at the end of it.

This APP is hands down THE best health/fitness app I've used. It has everything I could possibly want to ensure a holistic approach to fitness, health and well-being. The workouts are easy to follow and tailored for home or gym settings. I LOVE it! I love the added save feature to find my favourite work outs. The only suggestion I would make is the addition of a function which allows me to see which workouts I have completed (a simple tick box or similar) so I can see which ones I have done.

Excellent app. Well encompassing all round. Training regime is well put together and meals + grocery list are very useful. Only issue is that when I switch apps to go change my music or lock my phone screen W/ centr in the background, the app resets the workout to the beginning that I am doing on the android. This did not happen on my iPhone which is something to look into. Keep up the great work!

From beginner to pro, I definitely recommend trying Centr ! I've surprised myself with how much I enjoy it. I love the pilates and meditation especially. Everyone is bound to find something they want to try. Visually, it is shot beautifully. It is not intimating like other apps I have tried, it encourages movement and health, not the 'dream' body, and that's what drew me to the app. I prefer to utilise trainer in workouts and constantly impressed by how clearly they explain each exercise.

Firstly, the content on Centr is clearly 5/5 stars. The workouts are great, well constructed, and diverse for whatever your goals are. However, there are a few simple quality of life problems that I just can't believe exist in what is otherwise an exemplary app. I don't know if this is only on the Android version, but the fact that I need to start from 0 and manually scroll to the weight I am using without an option to simply type in a number is just silly. Additionally, the logbook shows your last three Weight/reps, but they are logged upside down which is unnecessarily confusing. I also wish that the self-guided workouts could continue running when the app is not the active screen. If I have a 90 second rest phase, I can often send out a quick email in that time, but then the rest timer freezes when I navigate away from the app. Other fitness apps overlay a timer so that this is not an issue. Despite these small quibbles, I really do think the app is entirely worth the subscription. I will gladly up my rating to 5 stars if there is intention to at least consider fixing some of these issues.

Was really looking forward to using this app, it seemed to tick all the right boxes. Unfortunately it didn't live up to expectations. I personally wanted the app to do all the planning work for me and it does to a point but was constantly swapping out workouts and recipes due to lack of equipment for the workout or ingredients that I don't like. You can't set a permanent filter for your preferences!? The workouts I did do were good but the recipes are complex and cost £££!

The content is very high quality and a life changer, nothing less. It's great that you can browse through all of it at any time. The recipes are great, although favorites would be nice. The app is quite well done and easy to use. Very engaging and beautiful. Screen rotation during workout video playback is not as stable as it could be, though. And yeah, some sort of offline cache would be cool.

Absolutely brilliant takes all the thinking out of it. I was very unmotivated before this app and could never commit or get it right, but now am totally focused and addicted. You put your goal in and it does the rest for you for every day of the week -meal plans, exercise, meditation, the works. Well worth the subscription for the life transformation and well being. I should also mention there is something for everyone, so many different trainers you can use a different person every day. I LOVE

Great app overall but could use a few adjustments. I'd much rather have an actual calender in app that you can look at with a checkmark on every day you completed a workout. Also, when doing a workout, I'd love to see an option to do a tutorial on each workout to make sure you're doing it correctly as your going; Because it's rather annoying to have to quit out of your workout midway through , to go look at a how to tutorial. Other than that, great app. I've been getting in much better shape!

Great app with lots of exercises. Would be great to have a search feature where you can filter by the latest exercises. There should be a section for "what's new". Please also create more programs with some more variety! I find myself starting to get bored after week 4. Overall, great app with lots of potential to be amazing!

A great app! Easy to use and extremely intuitive. Equipped with plenty of workouts that range in intensity. A plethora of dietary and nutritional meal plans to compliment your goals. I'd love to see some sort of goal tracking system though; a way to see how much weight you've gained or lost depending on your goals. I believe this would coincide with Centr nicely as it'd be a form of positive encouragement. Overall, a well polished - well oiled app.

Very good app with a massive variety of workouts for different preferences and equipment. The coached workouts are really good, and I seldom workout without following one. There is a meal plan feature, which I find myself using to find new healthy and simple recipes, however I don't follow the plan regularly. There is also a grocery list function which doesn't work amazingly, as you cannot easily export this to a list to paste elsewhere. I don't want my groceries in this app only.

Great app. Some minor improvements needed. App is very sensitive since last major update to switching between landscape and portrait mode on videos, I have to lock my screen mode to prevent it. Also, doesn't have a feature to download the workout so it consumes a lot of data, like Gigs of data a month, even if you avoid the guided workouts or disable the video in favour of just an image. Otherwise love the app, used it solid for nearly 6 months

Just signed up to the app today and completed my first session.. It was short but very intense and I enjoyed the coach session.. I also completed to bonus round self guided session.. While I very much enjoyed the interface and options available I think a few more things could be adjusted for a better experience. 1. Have the ability as a user to turn off the music in the app in order to play your own music I have more recommendations but not enough space. Can I contact the developers?

This is one of the best and most value for money all-round physical well-being apps I've found, depending on your subscription option. The trainers and chefs are varied, motivating and challenging, and they engage with you on social media if you have any questions. I would like more vegetarian recipe options, because although there are loads of them, some of them are quite similar. I love that there are different goal settings, and the shopping list is a great feature.

6 months in and I'm very impressed with the co tent and the app. My main phone is an iPhone the iPhone version doesn't allow casting to Chromecast(annoyingly). Having used both iOS and Android versions I can honestly say there's only one way iOS is better than the Android version is that when swapping a workout the iOS UI is much nicer and easier to navigate with the filter on the top rather than the sliding side menu. Otherwise excellent app 👍
The only thing app that actually changed my life. And the only review I have ever written or will write again!!!!
Incredible variety of workouts that makes you want to keep coming back for more. Perfect app for a home gym and incredible meal plans. Highly recommend!

Tons of workouts! They have a ton of options for workouts with varying equipment and difficulty so there's enough to cover everyone's experience and needs! Plus, tons of diet tips and recipes! 10/10 recommend! Any day now and I will look like Vin Diseal!

I am a total beginner, and some beginner excercises are too advanced for me (not many though), and i just modify. Not a gym person, but I love the variations in the app. Montlhy rates are high, so i opted for the year subscription after a 7 day free trail, which is a good deal. All in all, good to get started.

Currently utilising the 6 weeks free that were generously offered in view of the global lockdown. I have to say I am very impressed with the app and it's comprehensive approach to wellness, workouts and diet. The content is broad and easily navigated and there are a variety of excellent workouts to choose from which are high intensity and require minimal equipment. The only drawback is the high monthly subscription cost, perhaps a reduced cost option to access only workouts would be viable?

Life changing, but needs profiles. I use every aspect of the centr app and have found it is consistent and definitely has helped me improve my health. An improvement I'd like to see is profiles like Netflix. At the moment it is set up for me, which means the meal plans and workouts are catered to my needs. But often my wife would like to make use of it. She can do my workouts or we can select manually but it doesn't have the same feel as ticking them off.

This is truly a remarkable app. It has everything I need to maintain my well being when it comes to exercise, nutrition and overall tips for a healthy lifestyle. No matter the circumstances or equipment (lack thereof) you can find a session that fits them. Especially now, with the present situation we're facing globally, this app has come in handy to keep offer options to keep going with my fitness goals. Totally recommended. Have to mention that the team behind it and coaches are good fun! :)

I tried the app after hearing about the free trial like a lot of people. It's an amazingly detailed program that takes a holistic approach to body and mind. It requires commitment, but once you're familiar with it all this will become a little less time consuming. I chose to delete it due to not having time to commit to this approach yet, and it couldn't have been easier. No surprise charges, no complications. When circumstances change I'll be picking this up again. Would recommend easily.

Love it!! Love the programs, the planner, the info, the Facebook community group. Love it all. Highly recommend. Recipes could be improved to make it practicle for real people and real life...no one eats 1/8 avocado and then what?! Too much wastage and too expensive to follow. The videos crash quite a lot and it's frustrating eniugh when you want to do a work and just plain disappointing and irritating when it happens during the workout.
All-around excellence. Food options alone are worth more than the annual fee. Bonus after bonus with the ever growing training programs.

Used the app for the past 3 months and the quality and variety of the training sessions is generally very good. I haven't used the meal planning parts of the app as I don't need it. The yoga sessions are great but more variety here would be good - sessions with more chill music for example. A 'Favourites' feature would be a great addition.

Almost perfect. The workouts and programs are great. Although once I embarrassed myself in the gym when I couldn't stop laughing because during a serious, coached workout, it suddenly screamed in my ear:"DONUTS!!! RUN FOR THOSE DONUTS!!" and i lost it. The only thing I would love to add is to be able to record runs (just distance and time) so they come up when I look at my workout history.
Best fitness health and well being app on the market.

Very comprehensive, with an excellent range of challenging workouts for those ranging from beginner to intermediate. The meal plans are straightforward, nutritious (and delicious) and Centr's other supplementary materials such as meditations means that you have a balanced range of activities to choose from. Especially good for people like me who need more structure and variety to stay interested.

Great app with a great assortment of programming by awesome trainers, regardless of the workout I always feel leaving with a sense of accomplishment. The only thing i would improve is the logbook function, it is a little cumbersome to use and so really haven't taken advantage of the function which means I don't know what improvement could be made to it either. But overall I'm really enjoying it

Loads of workouts and recipes to suit almost every need! The content focusing on mindfulness and meditation are really useful too and have had a very positive impact on me. Only changes could be being able to customise individual workouts to swap in/out certain exercises (e.g. low impact to work around a specific issue, or an alternative if you don't have access to specific equipment) and to add snacks into the planner like other meals, but even then that's all easy enough to work around.

Fantastic way to stay motivated! ... The app is pretty comprehensive, helping with both coached & self managed workouts, as well as healthy diet, and mental health using affirmations and meditation. ... For me personally, every single recipe I've tried so far has been delicious! I've had so much fun prepping my meal (which is usually the worst part of getting your health back on track) ... Would totally recommend if you've struggled to stay motivated, or stick to your new year's/resolution.

Been signed up for about 3 months now, apps really good, plenty of workouts and I'm definitely seeing benefits. I know there's a lot of talk about it taking over your life but I've found it easy to balance between following it in full and making my own decisions. It would be nice if it was a bit more customisable, maybe for specific sports and training plus also I don't remember putting in any body metrics (height, weight, size, etc.) So does fill a bit one size fits all.

Been using this app for quite awhile and love it! Might just be Samsung, but there are a couple things that are slightly annoying. If I do a self-guided workout, I have the option to adjust my logbook, but can't do anything if it is coached. Also with the logbook, weights have to be scrolled to. Not a big deal for most exercises, but if I'm squatting or doing leg press, etc, it takes awhile to scroll to the 400+ range, and a typing option would be optimal. Otherwise, love everything else!

This app had been a fitness game changer for me The ability to choose different workout types, then pick beginner to advanced depending on your ability keeps me interested and enthused. Workouts are structured so they can be done at home with little to no equipment required. The meals are all easy to make, with ingredients that people actually shop for, and can buy at the supermarket.

Good coached exercises, recipes are really nice for what I have tried so far and I never used to use meditation or sound scapes for sleeping but I have found they are really good. Excellent value for money as well when paid for the whole year!

I have multiple issues with the app mainly around customer service & app features and controls. The content of the app is vast which initially seemed like a good thing. However the app is really clunky. If you enroll on a programme, it doesn't auto add to your daily planner in-app meaning you have to search for it every time. The app says that stretching sessions are linked to each workout - they aren't and it's unclear where to find them. There's so many issues by I only have 500 characters.

Training and meals are great, but the app has lots of room for improvement. The app can be overwhelming. Doesn't feel personalized. The meals are very good, however the way it works on the planner is madness if you are really are doing a weekly shop to buy all groceries. Changing a training session on the planner or even changing the training day shouldn't be a hassle. It is perfect if you have the life of a superstar, not so suitable for the common Joe.
Usually a great app. Can't access the "Programs" menu today. it just says "Your session expired" and then I have to login again.

The workouts and programs are very good and I enjoyed doing them. The meals seemed repetitive unless you swap out each one on the day. The breakfasts alternate between 2 or 3 per week and there is a 'leftovers' for lunch in the meal plan. Some of the breakfasts require you to prep for 4hrs or so, and there is no choice to filter out allergies, if you cannot eat Soya then you are out of luck because there is a lot of Tofu. I wasn't too impressed with the food but everything else is very good.

Can't even log in. Created account, chose the free trial. Went to log in and said I can only have one subscription per Google account and I needed to link it. Clicked that option and timed out. Tried to login about five other times and gave up.
App was working great and I was really enjoying it. But the last month it's been logging out constantly and randomly shutting down. I wish I could get a refund
App has been fine until the weekend when I can no longer able to log back in. It seems that in trying to fix it for some people it has made it worse for more people.
I enjoy the variety and workouts tailored towards my goals. I have been using the app for 3 years now and have seen more progress then when I was going to the the gym.

Bug with logging in, just registered today for free trial, login takes me to a "you have an existing profile page" which prompts me to log in, takes me back to log in page where i enter new details, ehich takes me back to existing profile page - causing an endless loop. Have tried reinstalling

terrible it just stopped working on all platforms windows, android and apple ios i paid for a years service when will i be able to log in and stop getting we dropped the dumbbell message. The workouts are awesome everything else is great

Keeps logging out Signed up with the free trial and I liked the workouts and meal suggestions (really appreciate that there's a vegan option)... However the last few days the app keeps logging out and immediately says "Your session expired"
It was a good app until about a month ago when it started crashing constantly and signing me out. I've tried uninstalling, nothing seems to fix it.
There were a few issues with the app but I think it's been resolved now, I'm quite attached to the program since the trainers and workouts are brilliant!

App has been down for over 2 weeks now. Constantly getting timed out and having to log in only to immediately get kicked out again. Will be cancelling membership if this isn't fixed before my next payment.

Not able to login to the app or website for 4 days in a row, which by itself is not a huge issue (assuming it will be fixed soon), but how about a courtesy email or at least a social media post notifying that the service is down?
The app in general is great, but currently I can't login. Always saying my session is expired. Someone please go fix that. I can't access anything.
This is ridiculous, for 2 WEEKS straight i haven't been able to use the app. Every time I login it immediately logs me out. For the price you pay you would expect an app that actually works
I've used this app for years and really enjoyed it but for the past two weeks the app has been unusable because of bugs. I have reached out to their support and not gotten a response.
Use to be a fantastic app...but ever since ownership changed many users (myself included) can't log in...ongoing issues for almost a month...sad to see it plummet so fast. Buyer beware.
App is still down. Not an acceptable service considering its by far the most expensive app ive ever paid for. Ive been forced to stop my workout regime because of it. Very frustrating.
Just recently the app is crashing, (logging me out), when programs are selected. Why? Very frustaiting. Looked for an update and uninstalled/reinstalled, still not working.
Keep crashing, never works while at the gym when I need It to. Keeps making me log in and out and never loads. Not worth the annual subscription.

This is getting ridiculous. How are you not able to solve this problem with your program not able to sign in!? It's been weeks! Yet you continue to take our money for a program that we can't log into! You know about the problem and can't fix it or do anything to help!

Love the app, love the workouts, love the meals..... hate the login issues.... constantly saying I need to login.... get half way through a workout....login.... finish and go for a selfie.... login..... Uninstall, then reinstall ..works for a couple workouts.... then login login login 🫤🫤🫤 please fix this.
Overall a really good app for a begginer, it's full of information that can help with better form and healthier eating options.

The absolute worst customer service, app is down for days at a time. The app has been down going on a week for most of their customers, with no end in sight. There has been no communication from Centr and no offer for a refund or any other action. They are censoring comments that are asking for updates, from paid members. I like the app otherwise, but when you are paying this much, I expect better. The app experience went way downhill when Bezos bought it out and did mass layoffs.
Really loved it for a long time, but the app has been crashing for several weeks now. Unusable. Paid for nothing.
App is glitching for days. You can not stay logged in for more than a few seconds. Multiple users are having this issue since lastly week and yet not fixed.
Everything you could want in a fitness app. I love the food planning, the workouts are stellar and FB community is very motivating. I've lost 15 pounds in 2 months using Centr.

App logs me out within seconds of logging in and says "your session is expired please login" Unable to access support because I can't login to access help page. Will modify my review if support reaches out with a fix.

0 Rating...Not able to login since 3 weeks... I would fire entire IT Team that developed this...they can't fix an issue since a month? What kind of IT Contractor/Company is that?...Never seen any app like this.... Please FIX ASAP...
Update: the app and site have had login issues for a while now. Great when it's working, but its been extremely frustrating lately.
Worked great, all of a sudden it won't let me access the app, says that my session expired, I still have half a year left on my subscription 🤦‍♂️
In the past week it just stopped working. Says my session expired and doesn't let me sign in again. I have to admit I'm a little frustrated seeing as how I've paid for the year.
App keeps on kicking me out... Fix it please... Thanks for fixing it. Also, you should communicate when the app is down, Twitter is a great way to reach out to people...
Cannot login to the app. Keep logging me out with an error. Reinstalled a few times, reset the password, still not working
Worked for a few weeks now can't log in. Keeps saying session timed out. If you finally get logged in, it only works for a few minutes then logs you out again.

Started with the six week free trial during the initial COVID stay at home order and haven't left. It's great for keeping you motivated to live an all around healthier lifestyle, with diet and meditation along with the workouts. Speaking of which, they can be tailored to fit your goals, and if you're feeling stuck in one type of workout (weights, etc) you can switch up and go for yoga, cardio, boxing, and more
App kicks you out. I'm not sure what changed, but the app used to be amazing. Now I have to cancel my subscription and find another solution
The app was great until about a week ago when it started constantly logging me out, to the point I cant navigate the app to get to the workouts.
app worked fine until a couple of days ago. Now it keeps telling me my session has expired and every time I log I'm it says the same thing.
No service for weeks, can't log in, can't use, no end to problems . Cancelled subscription and looking for aother option. This app is dead
Normally a really great app but it has been signing me out consistently for the past 2 weeks and I have to login twenty times to even get it to work.
Wonderful and holistic. The exercises are hard but balanced! The meal recipes are fantastic 😋 👌
App doesn't work any longer! Can't log in. Development team is trash. Months ongoing and can't fix, offer nothing to members to comp them. Trash.
I have loved this app for a a few years now but without any change on my end and all updates done the app is not working at all for over a week now.

Honestly best fitness app I have ever tried. The exercises accommodate all fitness levels. If you aren't able to do an exercise just do the modified version. It is easy to track your progress and access the program at any point. I have never been able to stick to a certain diet but the food plan Centr has on a weekly basis is fantastic and don't get me started on their snacks!!

Predatory billing. I cancelled my membership 6 months ago, and have since gotten a new credit card. I just got charged for a new 3 month cycle. After immediately contacting the customer service and informing them I had canceled, they sent back a canned response saying pretty much they don't offer refunds for any reason. They claim these billing terms are clearly visible, but they certainly weren't when I last used the service 6 months ago. It looks like there have been many similar complaints.

Just finished the 6 week program Centr 6. Following a free trial I've paid for the app, because I really feel its worth it! I've seen a huge difference in my appearance. I feel healthier and more motivated than ever. From beginner to advanced, there's workout for everyone. The recipes are beneficial and easy to follow. The sleep visualisations and meditations have really helped me and my family. I honestly cannot rate this app highly enough!

Incredibly user friendly and aesthetically appealing. It's motivating without trying too hard. Its range of flexibility as you interchange meal options fits your individual needs. Ingredients can be easily searched with a grocery shopping bag that makes preparing for your meal easy and fun. It's not just a fitness app, it stands out from the rest by promoting long term healthy lifestyle choices for physical, mental, and nutritional growth.

All in all an excellent app, covers all my needs (exercises, delicious recipes, meditation). Digital grocery shopping list based off of recipes I have selected has made my life much easier! Small improvement would be to be able to view/tick off groceries while offline. Only issue I have found is that the exercise equipment filter needs some more work, it still includes exercises using equipment I have filtered out. But still, amazing app guys, your team should be proud!

Absolutely incredible, this app has everything to get you in shape. The planner helps me to organise my day making it so much easier and the shopping list makes it so much quicker to get what I need. Variety of different meals even some treats at the end of the week and the workouts are so well taught. Love this app and I am feeling better than ever thanks.

Not good enough for being the most expensive app for training. I've been using the app for about a month now and I have to say it didn't meet my expectations. I was looking for an advanced, all-around training assistant and given the hefty price tag, the trainers and some of the reviews, I thought this might be the one. Some technical complaints: - If you switch to another app in the middle of a session (even during rest) the timer stops working, the same happens when you turn off the screen and the app may even close after a while - The interface for logging the weights is clunky, you have to traverse a few 'touches' before getting to it About the programs: - I chose a Centr advanced program and I've been following it, however it doesn't seem to integrate to my daily routine because the app keeps showing other workout for 'daily routine'. - The recipes and great, however there's no weekly planner and only a meager shopping list - The customization is not nearly as half as other similar apps Despite this I think it is a good app, the programs are great and the trainers are first class; it just feel like an incomplete product for being the most expensive traing app on the market.

I've tried lots of other fitness apps but lost interest. This one's different. The best thing is the variety of workouts on offer. Your plan says weights but you feel like boxing? No problem, just swap it out. But it doesn't stop at the workouts. There's a great meal plan tailored to your goals as well as things like meditation and sleep visualisation (I do these with my 9yr old). On top of that there's the FB community - those legends are the icing on the cake 😁

2nd time around after a failed 1st go. 7 days in and still motivated. 30 min workouts and a nice challenge. Heart rate is up and I'm feeling good. App is great, easy to use. I screencast to my tv and it's fine. Just a shame it doesn't support landscape for this and tablets. Bar that slight niggle it's perfect.

I love this app. It has given me a new lease of life. Thank you. I really like the versatility, the videos and the great nutritional and training advice. I love the fact that I can access different workout styles and indeed have help with meditation and mindfulness. The only reason I have give 4 stars is that I'd like to see which muscles each exercise is targeting perhaps by having the relevant body part light up on Torre? It would also be great if there was a forum for ask questions.
Keeps signing me out and when I log back in it immediately signs me back out saying my session expired. It's a running subscription. Why is it not letting me use it?

Very easy to use, you can follow a strict day today planner or use it to fit your needs. Lots of verity of exercise, food recipes and information. The meditation is great, lots of different styles for differant people. The food recipies are fun creative and deliciousies, very easy to do as well. I am on the beginner program and enjoying it. I can't do everything but that will come with time. I highly recommend it

I will not be renewing my subscription. I was stuck with it in the first place, customer service is dreadful. You could find similar workouts for free on social media or youtube. A lot of programs on Centr require weights, so I find myself repeating a lot of sessions. They can be challenging which is good, but repetitive. The food side of it looks ok, but again, buy a healthy cookbook and the majority of it is in that. Concept is good, but overly priced and hyped.

Overall very good, app layout is easy and looks good, very good range of content, the coached sessions are led well and really get you working. Only gripe is in some of the hiit training videos the transition between exercises seems to be cut, so even though I keep time and finish the last rep with the trainer, I have to rush to get into the next exercise

This app is incredible for people just beginning a fitness journey. The trainers are enthusiastic and fun, making the workouts enjoyable and of course effective. There is a great variety of workouts to choose from also. The recipes and meditation are equally as useful as the workouts. They are simple to follow, and the layout is amazing. Everything is so easy to find. Would absolutely recommend this app to anyone looking into fitness and wellbeing.

Love Tiffany's workout! I have done them all and we need more! Some of the other instructors are as too hard or too easy for the level you select. Otherwise, the meal plan and meditation are amazing! I would love to have a space to count my calories though, add something else I ate and see my progress pictures. It cast perfectly with Chromecast. I would also add a star/favorite or like button to my favorites workouts, or something that says if I have done or not that workout recently/previously

I love this app and would recommend it to everyone. I love the modified low impact workouts! It would be good to see more offered in the coached workout sessions outside of the programs. Especially Box HIIT, which I love in Fusion. I would also like to be able to track what sessions I have done. And a clear progression in coached sessions would be awesome. I like that the programs take you on a journey, you know where to start and then work up to harder workouts. The programs are amazing!

Love the app. The meals are incredibly simple yet great! The daily affirmation podcasts / meditations are great but could be slightly longer and less guided They feel rushed. The workouts are an amazing mix of styles. Love the mma & boxing classes as this is something I've always wanted to try out and now I can along side all the other styles. Only gripe. I wish the workouts said the exercise right before they started saves me having to look at my phone all the time.

I like the app there is a lot of variety with workouts, to the point that I struggle to find what I am looking for sometimes. I know that there are filters for search options but they don't always work that well. Apart from this I do love using this app and the trainers are great the messages are fun to see as well. I have signed up for the year hoping to see some good results now that I am back in the swing.
The app has started to, probably from an update, log me out automatically several times in a row while attempting to access my workouts.

This is great, and the suggestions are wonderful, but I really wish I could set it to only recommend me dairy-free meals. I don't really want to have to swap every recommended meal out for a dairy free meal, but that's what I've been doing. I'd also like to see a variant for intermittent fasting that only includes 2 meals with slightly larger portions
Flexible, easy, lots of.choices.

So far so good. I've started with some intermediate level after upgrading from beginner and I'm seeing significant gains. With personal research and cardio training I've also lost some fat. Additionally the meal plans have significantly influenced my diet regiment and options. I highly recommend the app. PS don't forget to check all the tutorials for the workouts. Though I would like to see some more details and some easy to understand language for some complex movements.
Paid for a full year license, Now app won't even log me in for 2 weeks straight... saying session expired... contacting support Only gets me email to YouTube videos and pdf.... 🤦🤦🤦

So good! If you are experienced with the price of other fitness apps and gym memberships you'll understand what good value this is. The workouts are beautifully filmed and there's a huge variety. I only wish the filters included intensity level but most of the workouts are for "all" anyway. It's sophisticated in it's navigation around programs and food and shopping list etc and definitely has a better design than other fitness apps. What I like the most is the preview of exercises in the videos.

For the cost, this app is very worthwhile. The workouts vary, I never feel like I'm plateauing, and the shorter workout times are easy to fit into a busy. The meal planning part is also very helpful, especially the grocery list. I do a lot of out of town work so it's nice to have workout options I can do in my hotel/camp room in my pocket. I recommend this app to anyone who is looking for fitness ideas!

It's a great app, and I really enjoyed using it over a year. However I recently discovered I had another email address that was charged the annual amount and I contacted the customer service about it. I believe I used that account to change to a 4 weeks trial but ended up using the one on my phone instead. I understand that the amount for the last year cannot be returned, but for the second charge for 2023 that happened on 21st Feb, they refused to return it due to their terms and services.

In my opinion, it's the absolute best a fitness app can be. It provides you with a very comprehensive, challenging, versatile, productive and fun program, a great and healthy meal plan, loads of useful information and most importantly - real motivation!!! I've never had a better experience or seen more results from any other fitness endeavor in my life! (Bonus: whenever you even think of skipping a sesh, you get to work out with Chris Hemsworth and who's gonna let Thor down? Not me!)

Well worth the money. You get a meal plan, and a huge variety of workouts. Equipment and no equipment options. Multi diet options (best for vegan I've found so far) only thing I've found is sometimes the female portion sizes seem very small to the male (bf is on this too) and occasionally I'm left hungry. But there's tons of snack options too. So much cheaper than a gym and you get so much more. I love it. The food is gorgeous.

I can't recommend this app any more - it's truly excellent! The range of workouts is the key - you can select whatever equipment you have handy (or none) and then select the workout / coach that looks good to you and off you go! If you like your workouts brutal check out Tiffiny Hall - you just need a set of dumbbells and a high threshold for pain!!

A money grab that makes it deceptively tricky for you to unsubscribe. There are no details on how to contact them, just an FAQ. They will charge after your trial period without notification every month, no invoice, no receipt, no email. They'll just happily grab your money even if you never used the app. When you want unsubscribe, the first page makes you believe you did... but no, there's a second one after a long lag! Easy to miss and common issue described on many of the negative comments.

A great variety of exercise styles with a considerable amount of exercises and if you choose there are programs for any level at a very reasonable price. The food looks great, although I have not tried it. From a personal perspective I would love to a tracking area so I can track my food/weight goals.

Has been a great experience so far. Easy to follow training plans and instructions during the workouts. The recipes are pretty good as well. Only bad point I have with it which is the reason it didn't get 5 stars is that during the coached cool downs the stretches are very generic and don't isolate the muscle groups that was just used. Not a huge problem as I then conduct my own cool down/stretch session afterwards.

Updated after more usage - Good app and programs. Am disappointed that some of the coached programs are just dubbed clips of the trainer's completing an exercise. Would be more motivational if the trainer's were completing the workout as they instructed. Would feel more involved and the encouragement would feel more genuine. Would also be better if the planner could be customized based on available workout equipment. Still recommend trying it out, overall it's a pretty good!

I think its great, it offers a variety of exercises for everyday alongside a 6 week program so you are never at a loss for what to do. It has healthy recipes, articles and meditation sounds to help relax your mind. The only thing I would suggest, to make this app 5 stars, is to maybe be able to project the workout videos onto a smart tv, so its on a wider screen. I find for some workouts, the yoga and pilates especially, I have to constantly move the video so I can see it as I do the poses.

Really enjoying this app. I struggle with motivation to workout, but the weekly programmes allow me to have workouts for the following week without spending time to pre-plan. The recipes are superb, they are tasty and add more variety to your meals. A suggestion I would make is to be able to 'favourite' your favourite workouts and meals etc. If achievable, in future it would also be good to get smartwatch link as well.

It's better to be functional, mobile and agile than it is to look built and be stiff (this was told to me by MANY bodybuilders) THIS app gives everything you need to make you function and move better and feel better about everything, especially yourself. Give a 6 week program a try, stick with it and in the end you'll be amazed at who you've become! P.s. It's not supposed to be easy, but then again if it was easy, everyone would do it.

Live the variety of workouts and ability to select skill levels at which you wish to start or advance. The log book is easy to use and welcome directly from the exercise page and the engrained tiners are a time saver for sure. There is a great variety of meals and love the option to switch out any given recipe. Have only been using the app for a couple of weeks but live what I am seeing so far.

I have absolutely loved using this app! It has lots of different workouts to choose from. You can use it at home, gym, park or wherever you love to work out. The only thing I'd change is maybe being able to make a list of favourite workouts to go back to or do again... Apart from that have really enjoyed using it! :)

It would be an understatement to say this app has changed my life. As a vegan with a million food intolerances (not to mention ceoliac disease) trying to find a fitness app that has a tasty meal plan and exercises that I enjoy has been years of struggle. My partner and myself have been following a centr workout and meal plan now for over a month and we don't plan on stopping anytime soon. Plus getting a free 3 months during a pandemic is a huge plus in my book 😊 couldn't recommend more!

I have had terrible problems with this app. It is constantly stopping during the workout videos and I get a error message saying this video cannot be played due to technical error. I contacted the help team about the issues and got an email back telling me how I can cancel my subscription which is not what I wanted to do, but looks like I am going to have no choice now. I advise to look into other apps as 5his one seems extremely buggy. I do hope they get this figured out in the future.
Appalling customer service, won't help you with anything. Only interested in taking your money not actually making a good app that people want.
Great app but currently broken. Haven't been able to do a workout with the app this morning as it isn't working. Please fix!

I use this app for yoga, but there are only so many workouts, so once you have done them, that's it. No new workouts for yoga in the last year. Also, it would be helpful if the workouts you've done were marked as done. Each time I look for a workout, I need to check which ones I've done. Search memory would be good also. Won't be extending my membership.
Recent update made the app impossible to use. I'm constantly being told my session has expired and am logged out even if I just logged back in

I'm really surprised how motivating this app is. There are a lot of workouts to choose from and if you don't want to choose there's a suggestion every day. Meal planning is good too. The vegetarian options are bit tough for really getting the calories in and some of the options assume easy access to ingredients that are not always available. Overall really pleased with it though.
Programs are spot on and engaging. Great way to trek through a workout, especially for new older people like me Thank you.
After the latest update the app keeps signing me out. I have tried all possible ways to fix and no luck yet. It's been almost a week now.

Been on centr for over a year now and now that the Android app is here they are really doing well. The content is great, the presentation is nice and clean and the added Chromecast support is a relief for me. They have finally reached feature parity with the website which means I can use the app exclusively. My only criticisms are that they tend to recycle alot of footage rather than the trainers following the workouts right the way through, trainers could break a sweat every now and again.

Loving the coached sessions. App could be a little more user friendly in terms of searching for types of exercises, and the option of turning off in video music to allow external music to be played while working out. It would also be great if workouts completed were tracked by the weekly calender bar on top of the daily planner.

Results are showing. I like the exercises, and the trainers. I use this app almost every day. Some things that I would like are: the equipment filter to only show workouts just with the one selected, and for the trainers to show more less impact variations on the exercises, because I have some knee injury. Other than that, all great. Also, please upload more new workouts!

Love it! Very user friendly app with tons of information and lots of variety. Not like the usual apps where they want you to smash it and eat a lettuce leaf. It has real exercises for real people and real food. The only change I would make is to be able to save your favourite recipes, or even print them off.

This is ideal it has so many different options so you can be a beginner or a well trained athlete. This app has you covered. With loads of recipes choices too. You can do it anywhere too, in your living room take it to the gym or even outside when the weather is nice. It has programs you can follow too. Its a really good all rounder.

The app in itself is good, but if u like me miss the last day of your trial before making decision get charged with one year worth of subscription and no way to refund it. Update: the team was extremely helpful and kind, my issue was resolved within a day even though their terms state no refund policy. That definitely proves to me that this app is worth trying, great coached workouts, meals, yoga and much more for anyone who is willing to do the work whether that's at home or in a gym.

In general I like the app, great for beginners. Also it is a great idea to launch workouts without equipment because if you don't have access to a gym you may not have the equipment, however I cannot seem to be able to edit my stats in Android (height, weight, %bf) so I am not sure how it can recommend a diet, but the recipes look all delicious and the shopping list feature is brilliant!

Your credit card info is not safe with Centr! They keep charging it even after the subscription is canceled. There is no customer service number, only email, and they will deny any request for a refund.

Legal theft. Great if you love making some guy in Hollywood richer by overpaying for a mediocre app. This app is a pure joke. Where to begin? $120 for next to zero customization. Really poor self-lead workouts with no plans. Tried to give me full meal recommendations without any knowledge of my size and weight. Newsflash: caloric needs vary largely based on size/weight/sex. Customer service is really awful too.

App is better now but not a fan of the ugly logo and the dirty lime green colour palette. Please change it. The older logo and colour schemes were classy. This logo makes it look more related to communications/network/Xbox etc. Not fitness.
Loving it, I was skeptical but I'm really really enjoying the app. Tons of great options for workouts and nutrition, worth the price imo
It's a great app but it does specify the weight to carry or progress. Do I go from 40lb to 80lb on chest day or stay with a weight for the duration. It is not specified.
Good workout app but renews automatically for an year without even sending a reminder abt upcoming renewal. Shows how confident they r abt ppl using this app
Great so far. Still loving it. This is my standard go to now. Wouldn't be without it. Love the new trainers and new options, great variety.

Been using for 5 months and I really love this app. Set to 'advanced - build muscle' the workouts are enjoyable and engaging. But, the planner needs to work better, it seems like your planner and the programs are completely separate: need to be able to easily set your selected program on your planner. You also can't very easily swap around days within your week. But mostly importantly, really needs the option for the timer to run constantly.

The app is great and the workouts push you out of your comfort zone. I am impressed so far. However, please sort out the exercise logging during a workout. It's really difficult to keep stopping and scrolling for the correct rep and weight whilst keeping up with the workout. Please redo the logging so it's quicker to log and doesn't take too much time. I've used other apps where it is much more user friendly

I bought the yearly subscription during the Cyber Week deals so it was a lot cheaper than what it is usually, but I can 100% say that it was well worth the money, the workouts and meals are perfect for my fitness level (an absolute beginner). I've loved the variety in both workouts and meals, the meditation is also a wonderful asset for the app, if you're considering getting the app I highly recommend it, but you may want to wait for a deal to come around so it is not as expensive.

Amazing app. Great guided workouts, the were a few gaps around programmes etc but Centr seem to be addressing. Always room for improvement so personally I'd like to see more very basic yoga for people like me with the flexibility of an iron bar and some alternatives for some of the ingredients in some of the meals (that last one is a bit picky to be honest).
The app has been down for over a week. Near impossible to do a workout or follow a diet if you can't even log in!
Constantly kicks me and makes me log in over and over again. Now it's not letting me log in at all. Why pay for no access to content?? I want my money back. This is a rip-off.
Not able to log in at all in the last few days, terrible especially since I've paid for a year subscription.

This app was not what I was looking for, I can imagine it could be great for others. I thought I had cancelled my free trial, not realising that the first place you click to cancel takes you to another page where you have to confirm you want to cancel (after a significant lag period). I contacted Centr Help immediately and was not refunded despite being only a day or two into the billed period. Disappointed with the customer service.

Superb!Since the Android app has been created this app has changed the way I exercise. It's hard to fit everything in during the days but this app has different variations of exercises, meditation, recipes for meals and some very interesting articles. The trainers, although on first glance appear super human, (No pun intended for Thor) are very engaging, encouraging you to push yourself within your limits and dial a back a notch when pushing too hard. Next best thing from a PT

Finally the app has come to Android! Good at first glance, and easy to use and get around. Love that you can add snacks to your shopping list... I enjoy the food. It's only as expensive as you choose to make it. Yes they suggest meals but you can swap them depending on your budget weekly. The workouts are fantastic and quick compared to others.

When I came across a free trial of this program I didn't expect to be blown away by how awesome it is! The thing that has stood out to me the most is the meal plan. I love that I don't have to think about what to cook. I just increase the amount of servings to feed the whole family, add it to the shopping list in the app and off I go. I have learnt lots of little time saving hacks to be able to reduce prep time and everyone loves the food. Best app!

Absolutely the best workout program I have ever used. diverse workouts-doesn't get boring.
