I'm amazed at the progress from each workout, they get you into it smoothly and without realizing you get done a lot. The progress on the body is insane. Meal plan is super easy to use and easy to prep. love the shopping list. The biggest surprise were the inspirational and meditation audios. With 30kg on top from pregnancies mental breakdowns ,thats the 1st program to lift me up physically and emotionally

Absolutely fantastic program! I love the workouts. Also love that the daily program includes meditation, podcasts and meals. App functionality is also great. If anyone from Centr reads this, one extra feature I would find love to have is the capacity to save favourite workouts. Would love to be able to sub those workouts in exchange for a workout that I'm not keen on doing.

The most annoying thing is that it doesnt load, error mesages. The workout is fine but there is a bug within the server. It happens on the app and the website. I cleared cookies, cache, uninstalled app. Everything and it doesnt work.

Constantly crashes. Was great when it worked. Now it's pretty useless. Need to login atleast 45 times every morning before I can get a workout in. Support team keeps saying they are fixing the issue but it's been over 2 weeks now and no end date of this problem in sight

Great instructors and workout programs, I love the variety of different workouts and instructors available, also programs to suit all skill levels and equipment you have. This really helps to keep me motivated. I just wish it had the functionality to track a history/display all of all the workouts I have previously completed (perhaps in a calendar view aswell). Also an option to save workouts I want to try into a 'wishlist' so I don't have to keep going through the list and searching again.
Was a great app, can't log in at all now, just immediately says session expired, unfortunately I'll be trying to get a refund as it is unusable now.

Pros: The guided workouts are great, and there are a huge variety of programs to choose from, no matter what your level of fitness or the equipment you have (or don't have). I also like the free recipes. Cons: The profile seems really gimmicky and pointless to me since it doesn't ask crucial questions such as your height and weight, or your goal weight. I'm not even sure that the information it does ask for changes much since you can select any program you want regardless of the planner.

Totally worth it. I've seen improvements in just a couple of weeks. The diet suggestions are great as well, tons of options and always delicious and simple to prep. Even if I don't follow the recipe, at least I got the ingredients and can play with them on my own knowing that I have the right nutrients. Just doing one of the programs (centr ignite) and it has a wide range of exercises that are simple enough for me but still hitting my body in the right way (thanks Luke and Alexz!) Cheers, mates!

Overall a really great app! PROS: - I love that you have a daily view on everything including your meals, your exercises, meditation and reads. - The meals have also been absolutely delicious and love how they change each day. - The shopping list functionality CONS - Exercises are more for beginners - I would however have assumed a higher protein content in the meals (I am a pescetarian).

This used to be the best app of its type. Then Chris sold out to a corporation, they laid off a bunch of staff, and it has gone way downhill. App hasn't been working for two weeks now. Greed has once again ruined something good.

Did the week trial, loved what I saw. Only improvements I could see in my brief use would be to make the next workout available offline, where I workout has a poor internet connection so would be nice to download one the night before. Also I initially selected one month trial and decided to upgrade to the full year for the cheaper price, but couldn't figure out how to simply upgrade my plan.

Best. App. Ever. I suck at sticking to fitness and nutrition - this app makes it easy and the fb community that comes with it is amazingly motivational. The workouts are tailored to what you want (lose weight, tone up, gain muscle) and your level of fitness. The meals have been amazing, I feel like a professional chef at home, and the meals are filling as well. The meditation and sleep visualization are also very relaxing and help with unwinding after a long or stressful day!

User friendly app,with alot of variety. Definitely can help alot of people reach their fitness goals in a broad sense. Lacks the ability to tailor to each user's needs or wants. e.g. I am wanting bigger inner pecs, and would love to get into calesthetics. But coached or self styled workouts I feel don't match what I want. There is a 30min program called simply the chest but focuses more on the core. The app offers short convenient exercises. Defs an app that works and you can trust. Try it out.

I just love it! I use the programs which I find best to keep exercises daily. From time to time I also do what scheduling gives me. I like how it welcomes all levels in the goal to healthy body, not to some fitness ideals. I also like meditations, but wish the sleep visualisations were a bit longer. The meals I aften use as an inspiration for my cooking. One feature I lack is the ability to cast just any workout or video in the chrome cast, not only guided workouts.

For the 1st time in 3 years of using Centr 3 to 6 days a week with zero glitches, I had technical issues logging in (update: they fixed it quickly, and I'm back at it!). I realized how much I depend on Centr. I tried some alternatives and wasn't impressed. I'm the fittest I've ever been, happy and confident. Love mixing up HIIT, weights, yoga, plyo, functional, depending on my mood and goals. Tasty recipes. The meditations are so helpful. The trainers make me laugh and it keeps me going :).

Great app and very effective program. I'm enjoying the variety and freedom to change things up if I feel like a different workout that day. I've done a few of the meals and snacks and they've all been delicious so far. I started out on the 6 week free trial with 3 months membership at the end and I've just upgraded to the full year. I'm sold!

Love the app, has a wide variety of workouts, meal plans, and other various features for many types of people. Its organized well and helpful. The only thing i feel that would make it better is if it had a section for people to message someone (so it isn't just ticking boxes and getting a one plans suits many workout)about what workouts, meal planning and such suits them best. So it would talk about how active they are, and what they can do, a personal experience rather then a automated one

I think Centr is absolutely amazing! I love all the options and having exercises, meditations, and meals all in one convenient place. The app does seem a little more simple than some of the other apps I've used in the past but I think that it is in a good state currently. Again I love it and will continue to use it. I just wish that it stood out a little more. I have already recommended Centr to multiple people and will continue to do so! The team has done and fantastic job!
I love the variety of workouts and how you can select time-frames when you only have 30 min to workout that day.
The app logged me out and now I can't log back in. It'll load for a second then say session expired log in again which I have but nothing works

Awesome app!!! I'm a beginner and it is helping me so much. It has meditation, podcasts, work outs, meal plans and more! The only problem I have is most of the meals are not at an affordable price. Like expensive nuts and meat cuts and stuff I don't even know where I would get it from 🤔 I just use substitutes though. Love it love it love it ❤️

I've been using this app from 3 years and absolutely love it. Trainers are fantastic, all the programs and workouts are fantastic and the nutritional info, meals and snacks are fantastic too. Also great to be able to cast the workouts to your TV if you have a Chromecast or the like. I can't fault this app at all.
Really like this app for days I can't hang with budz at the club.

Works ok on Android, on iOS not so much (full screen doesn't stay on from time to time etc.). Some instructors are annoying as hell ("to get to the next level, use your body to the maximum..."), and some of the exercises are very one dimensional (e.g. no back muscles in "full body workouts"). Anyhow, all in all, a decent way to train during lockout.

Phenomenal app, well worth the subscription price. Great recipes, great coaches and workouts, and I also like that they pay attention to mental health and offer you plenty of options and alternatives for your own busy lifestyle. With that being said, I'm just giving it a 4 star rating to factor in some quality of life options that I think should be added. Like for example looking for workouts that ONLY use the equipment you have, and not ones that use your equipment and then some.

Good overall . Self guided workout needs improvments and could be more intuitive tho. Videos are often glitching/ stopping . When the video stops and you will see a black screen instead , you will have to exit the workout and come back again .. bit of a headach when you r in the middle of your training.

Founding member and still loving it. Programs vary beginner to advanced, lose weight, tone or build muscle. Different dietary options also available. App is easy to use and navigate through. Any tech issues have been resolved very quickly. Highly recommend!
It's pretty good though I think there should be more variety. Most of the workouts (weights/) are very similar every week

Just getting back in to a consistent workout regime. Really appreciate the option of Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced for each program, which makes me feel that I can come as I am instead of feeling inadequate. Looking forward to exploring all that the app has to offer!

Was great ... The app worked great the first year. But since last month, it crashes all the time. Constant log in issues with you kicked out and unable to access multiple programs. Centr knows this yet doesn't communicate to it's members. I found out this was a system wife issue via Centr Facebook page. I have reached out to customer service multiple times and got back only generic responses saying working on the issue. 50/50 usage now. This is like fat Thor now except not funny.
Great workouts and reciepes, app is really easy to use and navigate.

At this point I see it as best fitness app on market. You have a plan based on your goal. You goal plan includes exercises, meditation (I am new in mediation but I tried and love it), and meal plan. You have different programs of exercises and food that can be replaced if you don't feel like eating certain dish that's recommended you can always switch. Big plus for their shopping list based on what food you decide to cook for that week/day etc. They did a good job I am impressed.
This app is very versatile!! There are so many options and variations for people with different skill levels and abilities.

Workouts are great and include videos so you can get your form right. One massive opportunity for improvement is that it goes through INSANE amounts of data. In two weeks of self guided workouts I used 16GB. You can manually turn off video in each workout but would be great if the data usage could be reduced without having to do that Would be great if there was a way to input an injury or exercises that need to be avoided and have workouts filtered by that or have more exercises substituted

A brilliant app that has only gotten better and better since I joined when it first launched. Now has a weight tracker for workouts as well as lots of amazing delicious and easy to prepare recipes. Options for vegans and vegetarians too which is fantastic. Highly recommended for anyone caring about their health and fitness.

Good video workout and has the full package for health. Would be great if you could rate the video for your level of fitness or something. Would also be good to be able to see the menu plan for the following week, haven't been able to use that feature because I can't order the food in advance but all the meal look delicious.

I messed up and downloaded the free trial but failed to use it or cancel in time to avoid the charge. Quite within their rights not to refund me but disappointing that they wouldn't. Edit: Updated to 3 stars, because having paid and not being refunded despite not using the app during the trial I decided to start using it. It's quite good. Two major issues with the workouts are that the times only progress while the screen is on and there is no way to record weights used.

Doesn't work well personalization is mediocre; I'm supposed to be enrolled in a Centr program but a totally unrelated 'daily workout' creeps up every day. Sometimes the workout logger crashes, besides, the timer stops if you switch to another app. Recipes are very specialized and meal planner is almost nonexistent. Shopping list has no integration and is very plain. Despite this, the programs are great as are the instructors. It is unfortunate that the platform is like a beta version
Service has been unusable for the past week due to it constantly logging you out, regardless of what device you use.
App is unusable. It constantly crashes and it logs me out all the time. Not worth it

I have seen nothing else close to the quality of this app and the amount of top notch information. It is well designed, you get a lot, nothing is held back from you. Workouts are awesome. With the range of phenomenal trainers throughout the week this app really gives you feeling of having a full team backing you to hit your goals. Great daily recipes for meals, snacks and smoothies but you have full access to the whole ‘cook book’ if you want to chop and change plus a stella shopping list feature that could be its own app. There are enough articles and podcasts during the week for this app to feel almost like a workout magazine (at least to me). If you were to purchase a workout plan, a cookbook, a smoothie book and few workout/health magazines I believe you would be spending more and possibly getting lower quality products. This app also has the flexibility to change what your goals and diet are at any time (i.e. from build muscle at the gym to doing no equipment workouts at home). You can also peruse the workouts for any that you feel like doing at any time. If you are doing a coached or non-coached workout the video will not interfere with your music. You can also scale the quality of the video to save on data usage.

Really easy to use and modify workouts and/or meals. The meal plan is very varied, easy to cook and most of all, super tasty! And you have the peace of mind that it's nutritiously balanced. Haven't encountered any glitches and I've been using it daily for the last 5 weeks. Highly recommend it! Well worth the money!

Exceptional! Workouts are designed for evey experience level and every day life schedules. The meal planning is easy-to-use and fits every level of budget. It took a little bit to get into the grove with it but it was me, not the meal.program. Only possible improvement is matching picture portion with real portion - my meals look similar but double in size. I use the meditation and sleep visualization every day. This truly is a balanced approach to mentall and physical well being! Thank u!

Really enjoying the workouts and the meal planner. Especially the functional workouts and the smoothies. Replaces my other workout, recipe, calorie counting and meditation apps. Definitely second the suggestion of being able to save or favourite recipes and workouts. Maybe a hydration / water intake counter too? Cannot see how to upgrade my subscription on Google Play though. ❤

Update - seriously needs a feedback button. I recently made some cookies and they were awful, like so oily I couldn't tell if it was baked and I love to bake. The UI is easy to navigate and recipes available are easy to follow, but they are a little out of touch with the commoners. Not everyone has a Chris hemsworth sized budget to buy 80% of the ingredients required and the food wastage I've forecasted is phenomenal. Plenty of work out and mindfulness options. Overall a decent app.
Excellent app, loads of features and a great way to plan a more active and healthy lifestyle.

Terrible customer service. Canceled my trial subscription on the last day of the trial and come to find out they had already charged me for a year subscription. Contacted customer service and they said I didn't cancel before the new subscription period and would not refund my account. Yet I was still in the trial period when they sent that email. So stupid! Update After a few more emails they finally issued a refund.

Brilliant app, best workout app I've tried in terms of delivering the whole package. One thing I would say is that in the centr6 program the warm up and cool down are always the same no matter what workout you've done but I just chuck on a few extra stretches without any real hassle. The results I'm seeing are fantastic and I'm feeling good about my body again

I absolutely love this app. I find myself more motivated to keep moving with all this app provides and the trainers are amazing. Only one suggestion I have, however: I added a lot of food to my grocery list and ended up short a few items. Realized all the meals that were planned needed those very few things. Is there a way to integrate a system that plans meals around ingredients you currently have. That might also help those who can't find some of the more exotic ingredients?
App is unusable for better part of a month. Little to no communication from customer support.
Extremely frustrating that you pay so much to use an app only for it not to work 90% of the time.
Great app with a wide variation of workouts. Actually enjoying getting back into shape!
Great options for exercise, food, diet, meditation. Great programs and fun, talented trainers

Every workout, every meal, every meditation, every article, have been exactly what I needed. The food is delicious and actually pretty easy to prepare. I look forward to what's going on each day. There is a shopping list to make grocery shopping easier. Would love it if they had non-food categories so I could add TP and laundry detergent and whatever else to the list. Seriously, this kind of programming can't be beaten at this price. I have been working out for 20+ years. Love it.

Meh, the workouts are ok but I wish there was a voiceover explaining the form I'm looking for. Also wish I could cast to a TV rather than squinting at my phone trying to figure out what each move is supposed to look like. As for the recipes, just ridiculous. You should have different levels of menu, from basic ingredients to expensive/hard to find. During the covid19 lockdown most people don't have salmon and bok choy just laying around.

I don't usually bother with reviews, however this deserves one. Love it. Very well structured and has exactly what you need to get fitter, stronger and healthier. The vegan recipes are so good too. Plenty of variety and new stuff always being added. Some of the recipes are rather long winded, however you can easily swap out the ones which you don't want to do. My advise would be stick to 3 meals a week per meal category. This is the fittest and healthiest I've ever been!

App works wonderfully. No bugs. Positives: I like that I can play my music over the workout. I love that I can swap workouts and meals. I love that this app incorporates meditation and other aspects of health beyond the physical. I've tried most of the other popular apps, and this one is my favorite for ease of use and also the variety it offers- MMA, yoga, HIIT, weights etc so you're never bored. A person could replace a recipe app, a workout app and meditation app with this one app. Well done.

I have had the app for 2 weeks and really enjoy it so far! Most everything is easy to follow and there are some great workouts. Being able to start at a lower level and gradually build up the strength, endurance, and coordination required to really exercise is an awesome feature. However, I do wish the yoga would go at a slower pace. The instructor is a lot faster than the other yoga courses I have done before so hopefully you have some prior experience with yoga or you will be left in the dust.

Centr is the perfect balance between user friendly and communicative. The trainers are knowledgeable and friendly and the programs will certainly challenge, or cater to, any fitness level. I just completed my first six week program and highly recommend giving it a shot. I feel more mobile and healthier than I have in years.

Great workouts! downloaded this as a 6 week free trial but am now paying and it's well worth the money! The annual subscription works out at less than a quarter of what k would pay for the gym, and as they are closed this has been a perfect replacement. The centr 6 workout is great to follow along with and I'm already seeing improvements and there a brilliant meal planner that has the best most diverse range of meals to pick from. Best workout app I've tried!

I like the app. I mis however a link towards a break down instruction on individual techniques. I do find them sometimes by accident so they do exist. Also with weight training modifications I'm not sure if I have to do the dubbele amount of reps. I do it because I think I need to. Also having an option to lock out Gym equipment would be nice to only see the modification clip. But overall I'm very happy with the app.

I love this app. Workouts are spot on and instructors are great. Food caters perfectly to my vegetarian diet and is easily swapped if I choose. Meditations and Sleep visuals also seem to work - haven't finished one yet though as I always fall asleep during them! Seeing great change in my shape and getting stronger for sure. Wish I'd found this sooner as wasted money on various other apps in the past. This is money well spent.

I thought it was only fair to update my review as I came across the Centr app again after 1 and a half years since my previous review. My main issue was the lack of options for people with no equipment, which is not an issue whatsover anymore. There are plenty of non equipment workout options. Recipes are delicious, which is a nice plus. My suggestion would be to ask the equipment availability during profile creation and only recommend workouts that match that option in the planner. Great app!

Absolutely LOVE this app. The team, classes, meals, variety of workouts are all fantastic! I can't wait to see what they do and how they further this app to be even more remarkable! I would be so thankful to see an update of being able to have a personalized tab where you can save recipes and workouts, or be able to save workouts/meals to your own personal weekly schedule! I give it four stars only because there is always room for improvement in all thing, but I truly love it like a five star!

I like guided workout using our TV instead of using the small screen of my phone. This is the only fitness app that I know which has an ability to stream in my TV using Chromecast. Monthly subscription is more pricey compared to other apps but Centr makes home-based training more interesting and easy to follow. Ability to plan meals and create grocery list is great but recipe needs to be simpler. Wishlist: Direct integration with wearables and smartwatch to make daily fitness tracking easier.

Hmmm.... just did my first strength workout and there was a bonus workout as well. I have got the 31 day free trial atm, but coming from a very active person, personal trainer and someone who is always wanting to try new things, i was disappointed in the workout due to the fact that there was not a lot of variety and when it came down to the cool down nothing was focused on the legs even though it was predominately legs. It would be good if you could rate each workout after you have completed it

Great overall health and fitness app. The recipes are excellent, you get the choice of having a coached workout or do it yourself. The videos show you how to do each exercise. I would like if you could sort the individual workouts better, like if I wanted to do chest and triceps and pick and choose from different sets you've made up.

I had the same experience as the other reviewers, it seems as though it's a scam. They charged me with no warning for a year's subscription and the day they charged I reached out to let them know that I can't even use the app because it doesn't give me the option to mirror to my TV so I have to do the workouts from my phone (as other reviews say). Got the same cold financial email saying they're not giving me a refund. So now I'm stuck w a year's worth of subscription to workouts i can't use
Great video's and enjoyable to follow. Makes my workouts easier and quicker, as I don't need to think of what I need to do next.

The best lifestyle app I could imagine. Great recipes, snacks, meditations, a huge variety of workouts in lots of different disciplines. Easy to follow and create new habits. The shopping list feature is a game changer. So easy. Sign up - you won't regret it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE this app and the program. It has kept me motivated and on track with the daily exercises. The variety helps immensely and really makes it easy to actually WANT to do them. The instructors are amazing and each exercise is broken down into pieces that make you feel like you can literally do anything. Thank you so much - Rose

LOVE IT! I was missing Orangetheory because I would rather workout hard following directions rather than think of my own workouts. This is also kinder to my wallet which is why I quit Orangetheory. I'm seeing great results with the variety of workouts and I love the recipes, articles, and extra stuff you get with the app. Completely recommend for anyone of any shape because I am dangerously overweight for my height and have lost inches in just 3 weeks of the workouts. They are so much fun too!

I'm liking the app so far but I think there's a few things that they can do to improve the experience 1. allow you to favorite some of your exercises so you don't have to search for them every morning 2 allow you to take individual sections and create your own exercise plans 3. be able to download some of them offline for when you don't have internet handy. 4. have a Roku, Amazon fire stick or Apple TV app

I signed up for this app for the 6 free week trial thinking I'll cancel before I get billed. I regret not looking at the workouts earlier. The app and the website are super easy to navigate. I'm currently doing the Centr 6 program which got me to subscribe for a year. It's unfortunate that a lot of the negative reviews are from people who didn't read the billing terms. I had an issue with the original card I signed up for so canceled two days before my trial ended no prob and resubscribed after.
Tech issues have NOT been resolved in a timely manner. It's been weeks since ive been able to use this app.
Please update the app. Will not stay logged in at all all of a sudden - Google Pixel 7. Just began happening the past few days

This app is awesome! It has workouts for every type of fitness across the board, not to mention the fantastic recipies and snacks! It has a planner option and builds out your week for you and they are constantly putting out new programs based on user feedback. Couldn't ask for a better fitness app and I definately don't plan on switching anytime soon or ever

I've signed up for a year subscription and really like the content and UI so far. I think what is missing for me is videos on mastering form outside of the workout sessions and also spoken cues within the workout. A personal trainer would correct poor form but with an app, how do you ensure that people are mastering the correct form? That would be the ultimate improvement.

Have been loving this app. I get thru my works and completely follow through don't wonder around my phone as much and keeps me more focus. I really enjoy the combination of the workout samael's and the medication part which I think is very important to the body. Love the results but I've been seeing and how consistent I am with it. Highly recommended!

Great workouts and vegan meals. Unfortunately, I'm having the same problem as others, I can't cast any more. Happening from my Android and my wife's iPhone, across 2 different Google Chromecasts (one is only 4 months old).

Love this app! Nice layout. Great workouts that mix it up from my normal routine, and you can follow on a Chromecast. I like that the range of exercises means I get a combination of HIIT, strength and mobility training throughout the week without even thinking. And honestly, really good and really easy vegan recipes that make it easy to track calories and macros.
This is a holistic app: exercise+food integrated so you don't need to think about it, just do it.

This app is a great accessory and guide for people who want to be fit of any experience level. Each week the exercise groups you do each day (depended on level of intensity) vary keeping your body on its toes and keeping the workouts fresh and challenging. This app also has different workouts based on your fitness goals and different meal plans for those goals. I started working out using this app almost a couple months ago and I'm loving it.

Fantastic app and quality product within. Easy to use and navigate. Now the function of saving "your own favourite" exercise/food/mediation/blog story, etc, available it's so easy to return to what you like. The daily planner gives great inspiration based on your preferences at set up too, for food and possible exercise plans. Both myself and my 6 year old adore the meditation options. My LO uses the kids meditation & kids sleep mediation every night. I swear by it to aid relaxation and sleep

I have tried many fitness apps and programs in the past but I haven't been able to stick to anything for more than a week. This is the first time I have been using an app and sticking to a routine for more than two months now. I love both the coached and self guided routines in the app, the ease of use, breakfast/lunch/dinner recommendations and meditation. Kudos to the team.

Love this whole app. I mainly use the workouts and meditations and podcasts. The food planner is my next thing to tackle. The coached workouts are my fav, and I'm feeling like every time I do a new workout I feel that bit stronger. I haven't done any fitness in 10years, and I was so excited when it was announced to come to android, I jumped on straight away and have been working out often using the app. Love it, super easy to use too! 5🌟 for sure ! Thanks heaps ! Rebecca 🙏

This app is incredible! After paying more for less from other apps and Instagram, I was skeptical but it's the best investment I've made. All workouts show you how to adapt to home workouts with minimal equipment, and the meal plans are genuinely delicious. Never looking back, life changing program!

I'm impressed. Could do with sorting the timer out though. If you leave the app during a rest to read a message or change a song, the countdown stops. Other than that it's great. Update: Boxing by Michael Olajide is very poor. No countdown timers and poor instructions. I did not know what I was doing with my hands most of time. Please update this! Also the cool down is not a cool down. That's a warm up man..

The workouts are great and the other stuff is pretty good. If I had to complain about one thing it would be that you aren't able to record your lifts in the app. There are plenty of weight lifting apps that let you record your lifts and even tell you when you hit PRs, but it's clunky switching back and fourth between apps. This is really my only complaint.

I like the Centr6 program for beginners. The instructors explained and showed the moves first time around, then the next reps the had voiceovers that explained it again and were encouraging. All the other components of the app I haven't really explored but there seems to be a lot of value there. I like the meditation component.

So far i am very pleased, the planner gives surprise variety, but i can still look up specifics to my mood. The understanding to have 3 skill levels at once is encouraging and feels more personal. Lastly the completion tracking, meals all day, and articles about things other than ads, put me right in the warrior persona i thought i had lost. Keep up the good work, great team!

The program so far is great!! I tried 8fit before but got bored with the repetitive workouts... Not here! I'm currently doing the Centr6 program, which does have repeated workouts, but it doesn't get boring because the videos are pretty interactive - with coaches trading silly comments and random encouragements throughout your reps and rounds. Just wish the app would send stats to Google Fit (#firstworldproblems).

I love this app! Never had any glitches, I've been using it for about 5 months now and I love that I've been able to find variety both in workouts and in meals. My only critique is that I wish that there would be a few more targeted coached workouts (focusing on lower body or upper body) as opposed to most being full body. It would also be nice to have workouts for people who do have more equipment like a barbell, bench, squat rack etc. However, all of the coaches are fun and encouraging!

Best workout app I tried so far! The overall offering is just amazing - from the huge variety of workouts, the meal planner and the meditation sections, everything is awesome and feels perfectly curated. It gives you the best pre-made workout plan while still giving you the opportunity to adapt everything to your needs. Definitely staying on this one.
Crash crash crash. Uninstall, reinstall, works for 2 min, crash again and again. Garbage
Okay when it works, but lately it keeps logging me out and not letting me even do the exercises. Major pain when you pay as much as you do for the app

Love everything about this app 💕 Highly recommend it! Well rounded approach to not just fitness but overall well-being. It has helped me incorporate and maintain a healthier lifestyle and I couldn't be more grateful! The app is easy to navigate and nice to look at. Workouts are varied and interesting. Trainers are engaging and relatable. Recipes are simple and tasty. Sleep meditations are relaxing and do their job 💤 Lastly the articles are relavent and helpful. Again, I highly recommend. Thx

Many facets of "health" in one app - meal prep and nutrition, mediations and workouts. There are a LOT of options in each of those areas, which I love. The meal prep includes snacks and meals and it is easy to find recipes to fit specific needs, like vegetarian, and the ingredients you have. The workouts include no equipment works all the way to gym workout and levels from beginner to super fit. I love the mediations most bc there a lot of them and I do better w a guided meditation. Well done!

Brilliant work outs. Toned to loosing weight and building core strengths. All workouts on building muscle are self guided, although they do walk you through some basics. But the trainer's are incredibly knowledgeable, got good personalities, and have great chemistry with each other. Which actually makes a big difference when it comes to helping you get motivated. The majority of the meals are too elaborate and include one or two uncommon ingredients, plus no cookery videos. But overall it Works!

This program has been, by far and away, the best at-home workout app that I have tried. The exercises are unique, wonderfully challenging, and highly motivating. Not to mention the expansiveness of the content. Thank you for kicking my butt, Centr team! Keep up the stellar work and I will do the same. 🤘🏼

Has been working great for me for the last 2 months. Recipes are tasty and easy to follow, the work outs are varied and challenging. Living in a place with poor phone reception and having my home gym a fair distance from my wifi modem I would like to see an option to download a workout (or a week at a times worth) to access when off-line, similar to a premium Spotify account, to prevent drop outs and interruptions to the work out. Otherwise the app is fantastic.

Great app, probably going to cancel my gym membership and just start using this (after my free trial finishes)! The coached workouts are great if you need motivation and like a "fitness class" style workout. Found plenty of no-equipment workouts I can easily do in my small living room at home. Seems like having some dumbbells/kettle bells would enable you to take better advantage of what the app has to offer though.

The training and meal plans are fun and easy to follow, with substitutions in the trainings for if you cannot get to the gym. The UX is well considered, so the app is easy to use. I would request the Centr product team to give the option to add workouts to the planner. I'd be interested to track progress on this and perhaps to see if that impacts the meal plan.

This app helps you to be consistent with your daily workouts. In planner I like that there is always great rotation between exercises so you can't get bored with them. Also the Programs are a huge help for me, make me to always get momentum and once I start it, for me there is always only one way to end it, right at the end after the finish line :) Thanks Centr for being here with and for us. All the best, Adrian!

This is a workout app equivalent to a Cheesecake Factory menu. Not at all simple. I thought I was going to input my weight, height, goal and it was going to give me a personalized workout and diet plan, instead I gotta go and pick if I want to do polatis or some other stuff from a trainer I've never heard of. Too complicated, canceled and uninstalled immediately... sucks though, I was going to pay for the full year.
Loving the app. Easy to use and well structured and motivational to crack on and get through it. Very good.

Great variety of routines. I was pretty fit but this has really up the intensity to a whole new level. Only reason not 4 star is because the coaching could be a bit clearer on some of the routines especially the boxing. Not great when you gave to keep looking at the screen so much. Overall though, well worth it so far.

Had off and on routine with it. Then few days ago I discovered 6 week programs. It's awesome. I'm going through beginner one and feeling great. The exercises are of right intensity. I do get benefit but I'm not too toured to ratiinalise skipping a day. A good addition for daily workouts and other formats will be to have it tracked on a calendar so that irregular folks like myself can see how many weeks since thy moved their lazy...

Great fitness and overall health app. For me definitely worth the yearly price. In two months I feel stronger than I have ever felt and am seeing noticeable results in my body (and I'm not a fitness junky). Good variety of recipes to swap from and the meditations are soothing after a long day or just to relax after the workout. The sleep visualizations are also particularly pleasant. I have been recommending this pretty consistently to friends and family, and I don't plan to stop.

Yes it isn't free to use, but not only do professional trainers run through exercises with you, the app makes a weekly calendar for you based on the length of your subscription, which includes daily workouts, daily (delicious) recipes for breakfast, lunch and dinner, meditations, amazing articles, reading and tips, snacks for when you crave something sweet, and a wrap-it-up workout at the end of the week. However, for clarity with the recipes, Centr should add videos going through each recipe :)

I've tried multiple fitness apps and this one by far exceeds them all. The workout are varier and challenging but at the same time being accessable to all even those without equipment. The recipes are so delicious and you can tailor them to your dietary requirements - the app includes yoga, meditation, fitness advice , nutritional advise. In terms of value for money , there really is no better app. I love the app and the Team of trainers. Although a little cheesy @ times, they get the job done

Meal plans are on point, absolutely fantastic. The meditation is great. The works for building mass are so close to being good. They NEED a way to track weight lifted IN APP. Without in app strength tracking and personal weight gain/loss I'll probably cancel my subscription next billing cycle as right now it's only the meal plans and meditation that's keeping my on board. Edit: with the changes adding weight tracking and Centr Power the app is perfect.

This app is EXCEPTIONAL and worth every penny. The coached workouts are done so well and are so motivating. I started with the 7 day trial but signed up for the year. I like working out from home so I love the ability to search and filter by equipment I have available to me. There are loads of options. I feel stronger after just a week. The meal plans are great. You can set those to your diet preferences. (Android user & have no problems w/ the app. I also use my laptop for a bigger screen)

Enjoying the app. more options for weights would be good (eg cable machine option of 27.7... closest can put .75. Would be cool if I could edit what I logged, I've accidentally entered stuff and just had to leave it. It would b cool if I could link other music and create Ur own play lists... can have it run in the background but can't always hear the beeps for the next exercises. And the rest timer stops if I exit app). & Doesnt let u log alt exercise. Otherwise really enjoying it. Worth price.

I've made tasty recipes, enjoyed varied workouts, and like the meditations -esp the sleep ones. I wish scaling the recipe portions was a bit more fluid. Sometimes when you go to make larger potions the spices seem way off. But love that with meal planner, I only need one shopping trip and have much less food waste. Wish you could print recipes Yoga flow feels a bit fast for beginners. Foundation train is a killer but I feel better for it Overall, this covers the bases for me and glad to have it

BEST EXERCISE APP EVER. The workout plan actually seems to be programmed for your preferences and what you're trying to work on. I love all the trainers and appreciate the variety of classes offered. The recipes are fire. And I so enjoy reading the blog posts. Worth every penny.
Unusable since a few days. Can't login anymore. Expired session. Will update comment once fixed

The fees for this app is REDIC only the rich can afford to be fit As to your response the app store doesn't show pricing on my app. I had to download and sign in to see pricing and as to the $10 a month is if you sign up for a whole year. Shorter terms cost way more. I was excited that you had gluten free menu options cause I am still trying to learn how to live gluten free. However; I can't swing another monthly bill. Very disappointing

I have tried a number of fitness apps. This one has been the most intuitive, and included the largest variation of workouts. The inclusion of meditations and advice has also helped me stay on track and the recipes are realistic to prepare taste like real food (not diet food)!

Good sessions but could use more refined filters I enjoyed the sessions but there's no way to track which sessions you've already done and if you liked or disliked them. Also a filter by time feature would be useful and bit more variety of length work outs. All in all good but with few tweaks could be great!

A truly holistic approach to your health that's achievable. Each day there's a plan with 25 mins of exercise, 3 super healthy meals, a motivational article, a meditation and a sleep visualisation. I've done a week and love not having to think for myself all day and waste time with multiple apps or lists. So so good.

I would love it if there was an option for a gift card or something, because I've loved the app so much and want to be able to share it with my family. Honestly though, it has excellent workouts, amazing recipes, and great tips to get your day headed in the right direction. I started with the trial membership and ended up getting the full year subscription because it's been so great! I had gotten up to 285lbs, and within about two months I had dropped down to 240lbs. So I think it works!

Used this app for a long time now (2 + years) and it is a great fitness and wellness app. So much variety in the meals I rarely eat anything not on the menu and they have a healthy version of most of my favourite meals. There is such a huge variety in workouts that I've never been bored and always have something to work towards!

This is the best exercise program I have found. It has guided meditations and a variety of exercise programs with different intensity levels for each. The coaches help keep you motivated and help you push through. The background music they have isn't extremely intense and you can still hear the coaches. So glad I got this.

I really LOVE this app!! Only on my first week of getting back to using it after a few months, but I'm glad that I'm back at it. The workouts are killer, the meals are amazing, I even tried meditation for the first time with this app. Overall, I feel great after starting each day and ending each day with this app. Looking forward to reaching my fitness goals!!

This app has been amazing for me. I am very time poor and previously exercise has gone on the back burner. With Centr i am able to fit in workouts where ever i have a free moment as well as the option to do something less intense like yoga or up the intensity with a HIIT. The consistency in my workouts has seen results not only in my mental health and fitness, but also no longer having issues with a previous injury. My O steo is amazed and happy.

Love the workouts in the app. But, like many gyms, the gym I frequent is a dank underground space with no reception or WiFi. We need to be able to download workouts for off-line access, because the app becomes next to useless if the recommended exercise is something you're unfamiliar with and you need to rely on the video demonstration.

I love this app. The beginner workouts are actually beginner friendly, the meal section has been so helpful for giving me tasty ideas and portion sizes and have been easily modified for my budget, the meditations are voiced by people who sound like butter. Edit: took a star off because they don't refund accidental purchases so make sure you cancel your subscription ahead of time!

4/26/23 update: app is now broken and will not open no matter how many times I uninstall and reinstall. This seems to be an android issue as other users I have spoken to on apple devices, have no issue. Worth the money. Artlices and easy meal plans offer something I've never seen before in a fitness app.

I was a founding member, and it has been the easiest workout and meal planner to stick to. It helps you set realistic goals, keeps you on your toes with variety in both recipes and workouts, and the app is extremely intuitive and easy to use. The price is right as well. Overall, no complaints.
Have been locked out of the app for days now and only explanation from centr is that they're making upgrades. Not good enough for a $120 app!

Honestly the best workout app I've ever seen. There are so many meals and workouts just set out for you to follow. So much effort has been put into this app and it is worth paying for the membership within the app. 10/10 would recommend. I've never been more committed to follow a workout or meal plan before using this. All the hard/annoying things have been done for you.

The selection of routines allows you to learn the techniques and choose favorite routines for each day of the week. The intensity levels allows you to back down in routines which you are overwhelmed and increase the challenge of a routine you already like. Along with the guided routines with clear count downs and the menu for eating right, this app has proven itself with the money.
Unfortunately the app is not usuable at the moment. Login and timeout issues for weeks now.

I wish each exercise had a demo moment in the guided videos so you can get used to the motion. Ashley's training is especially demanding and I need time to get my body used to the motions but by the time I do I'm 1/3 done and I feel I wasted time. Also this app is really for people that have already done training. Saying this app is beginner friendly is not true. Even as someone that's played soccer for over 10 years this was hard to get into.
App does not work.. bought subscription but throws error after logging in saying link subscription and then erroring out after linking.

Great Fitness app for beginners to advanced. Easy to follow programs that offer varied exercises with accompanying videos. Wellbeing and lifestyle and recipes are also good although it's tailored more towards a vegetarian diet ( might not be a bad thing ) Would be good if you could run two programs side by side for example strength gain and centr 6 and have them both in your daily planner. Otherwise a great investment if you're serious.

I love this App!! It has kept me motivated with great exercises, with a variety of exercises to choose from. And great meal plans as well. There is so much in the app to work with. Take a try. What are you waiting for.

This is an absolutely great app and it beats out other fitness apps if you're willing to cough up the dough. It's cheaper than the gym and the team makes it worth your while. Although...I'm starting to hate Da Rulk (my legs are gone)...just kidding it's all great. One tip to the dev team though, would be to allow for budgets on the recipes. Ofc you can't account for the ingredients globally, but a "budget", "normal" "fancy" option would go a long way. But all in all, recipes are tasty. Kudos!

I was a personal trainer for a few years and this app is by far the best training app I've used. The recipes are great, the tracking is great, and the programs are thoughtful. This isn't just thrown together exercises or some extra cash grab. This is genuinely a great experience to train with.

Love it. I joined on a free trial fully expecting to cancel and instead signed up for a year. Great variety on workouts and some killer recipes. I thought it'd just be a quarantine fix but I genuinely look forward to my workouts on here on top of my time at the Iron Temple. I've done one 6 week challenge and on the second. Coming off knee surgery and can see leg muscles for the first time in awhile! Thanks for a great (and continually improving) product, Centr Team!

I absolutely love it! At first some of the workouts were hard for me because I was out of shape, but I started to feel stronger as I continued. Workouts are short with the longest being maybe 30 minutes. Super easy to fit into my day. Even love the meditation. I just havent tried the meal plans yet because grocery stores are crazy right now. I decided to continue the app after the free trial period because it has brought great value to my life and health. It is worth it.

As others have mentioned, this is a complete scam. I should've read these reviews before installing the app. Here is what happened to me: - I installed the app less than 2 hours ago - Through the entire setup process, it said I get started on a 7-day trial period. - It forced a subscription plan selection and still mentioned that I'll only be charged 7 days later. - I selected one and It charged me immediately. I can also see the charge deducted on my credit card. - I have been trying to connect with customer support but they finally sent me a flat "cannot refund" notice, stating that I might've done an accidental purchase. Also, they don't really read any of your grievances, they just write the standard response. They're refusing to understand that the app has a problem. DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP.
Good plans and programs changed my workouts for the better. Nice to have a guide.

App overall is decent. The recipes are nice and fresh, the meditation i found was very good and the workouts will definitely tire you. However if you do not have home equipment or a gym it is really hard to do most of the workouts. There are barely any substitution exercises for everyone without equipment. It will get you in a decent shape but you do not learn a lot form it except to do what you are told. It's decent but you can learn a lot more from youtube for free. A bit of a letdown tbf.

Great for providing daily structure and motivation when WFH. Ad-free (as expected for a paid sub!). Customer support quick to engage when needed and very friendly/helpful. App does have some technical issues and could use a few enhancements, but as above, support team assist quicky and take feedback on board. An absolute wealth of information and programmes, so looks like I'll be busy for a while... Let's hope to see results!

Great app. Only thing that stops it being perfect is lack of range choices of style of training, and it can be hard to find a workout of specific things (e.g if you want to do a back muscle building day, a large list of workouts come up, but when u look at them they are all the same!)

I like the wide range of workouts, meditations and fitness articles available. I've found plenty of challenging and engaging workouts in the year that I have been subscribed. They do a good job of providing lower impact variations if you need those adjustments. As with many app based programs moving from lower intensity workouts to higher ones can be challenging as the difficulty can spike a bit but modifying and adding rest to the higher level workouts until you adapt can get you through.

Definitely like a personal trainer, you log on and the app tells you exactly what workout you'll be doing that day. Many times it's something unusual and that makes it fun. I like that I don't have to scroll through pages of pre-recorded workouts and choose and guess what's best. It's very customizable, though, if something doesn't work for you. Haven't tried many of the recipes but they look great, it's just nice to have my healthy day laid out for me as a checklist.

Super user friendly and amazing workouts, amazing recipes and a worthwhile investment. The programs are a great way to have an organized and routine workout system. You can tell so much thought and love went into this app. I also love how I can adjust the settings based on my goals.
It happens way too often that it is not possible to log in. Not acceptable for an app with a relatively high subscription cost...

Love the mix of workouts. The part where you can bump up or down the difficulty of each workout on the fly is amazing. I don't really follow the diet they provide because I really just don't have the time. But I can at least base my meals on something similar. Overall I have been in it for two months and I love the program!

A great app for all fitness levels. I chose intermediate strength training as I last did weight training 2 years ago. Found some exercises too hard for my fitness level. I should of started on beginner and worked back to my previous strength. Love the app as it has a small video at the top of each exercise to show the correct movement. I will continue to use it past the the 10 week program.

Short guided workouts of 30 to 40 minutes, fun rotating exercises to keep you interested and not get bored. You get to pick the programs that suit your abilities along with meals and mindful practices. The best thing is I don't have to leave my home or have tons of exercise equipment. I can follow on my phone or cast to my TV.

Really well done app that is very functional. The grocery list function is invaluable for meal prep. Workouts are great and presented well. It's rare that I come across apps that I absolutely love from a user perspective but this is one for sure. The Centr program is also incredible. Best out there of the holistic fitness programs in my opinion. Keep up the good work

The workout is very scattered. There is no balance at all. Many of the workouts have unequal reps and there is one that only did the left side but no right side. It's hard to focus or follow through. The recipe look easy enough, but I have not yet tried. I won't renew after a free trial though.

The app is nice with a lot of different workouts. But the cancellation is very convoluted. I was sure that I cancelled my subscription (clicked cancel 2 or 3 times) but suddenly I was charged for the next 3 months. Apparently I didn't finish my cancellation and now I just lost 50 euros. Update: I've reached out by email twice before writing the review. The answer was the same: I haven't cancel on time so Centr will not return 50 euros. Support is mostly bots there.

Been using Centr since its beginning! I love the fact that there are all kinds of workouts with different types of trainers. The recipes are really good and I appreciate that most of them are quick to make. I love when they introduce special programs to mix things up and I enjoy reading the different articles they publish concerning overall health. Wonderful app!

I wasnt able use it based off of not having time because of isolation....I know ironic. I cancelled days ago and was still charged even though my trial is until June 10th. Im confused. On top of that I can not find an option to cancel so i wont continue to get charged. I can even find a help option. Not sure if my issues are due to using a mobile browser but either way YIKES. Im sure this promotion was issued with the best of intentions. Make sure youre ready before you accept a "Free" trial

The content of the app is great but the app(developer) itself is horrible, the app keeps on crashing. I had to wait for 2 hours from the app not to drop the dumbbells. I couldn't workout when I wanted to workout. App developer is horrible. It has been 2 days and it keeps on crashing. Don't use the app, because it keeps on dropping the dumbells everytime you open it.

If you buy the yearly, that's basically $10/month, which is cheaper than my gym. The coaches are encouraging and so nice in the videos so I don't feel embarrassed or discouraged and the recipes are actually delicious (I expected kale smoothies for every meal, but there's a bunch of meals I'd regularly eat). It also has meditation sounds and a grocery shopping list so honestly, if they just added a period tracker and dentist reminders, this app could basically be a guide to adulting 😂

I actually love this app but its not working correctly right now. On my tablet the app freezes whenever I start a workout. The vidoes won't play and the whole app freezes up. Also it won't switch from vertical mode to horizontal mode. It should do this so the videos fill up the screen. Please fix this.

Tried the trial. Was not all that useful of an app. Be careful if you are waiting on a notification for the trial to be over. As they just run your card without warning for $100. My fault but most all the successful subscription based apps email you to warn you your subscription is up and they are about to run your card. I emailed them the same day they ran the card asking for a refund and cancelation. They said I was out of luck and refered me to the billing terms that I agreed to.

I do not have enough good words to properly express how much I love this app! The food options are delicious and easy to cook and filling, the workouts are varied and led by incredible instructors, and the meditations have really helped me decrease my stress levels. I recommend this to everyone I know!

I'd like more programmes for advanced. You can only really do Centr Unleashed. Otherwise you have to sort of chop and change in the explore section. But the sheer range of content available by far makes it the most superior fitness app available. I was using freeletics before this and it just became too monotonous.

I love the broad functionality. Whatever you feel like doing or eating there are heaps of options. You can wing it on your own or join a program. They really understand how variable some people are when it comes to exercise. I also like that they don't pester me or make me feel bad / pressure me. It's like a smorgasbord laid out - you choose how and when you use it.

Great content but currently having issues casting to my TV. Some workouts cast and others don't. I hope this is resolved soon, it's very convenient to cast to my TV. It was working fine before on Da Rulks workouts now halfway through intermediate it's not casting.

This app is well put together. Better than I thought. I originally joined for guided meditations and decided to try workouts. Workouts for every level,recipes, articles. The app has some glitches here and there but seem to get fixed quick. I highly recommend if you are looking for something for home or on the go!
Loved the app but lately I can't even login without the app signing me out!!! So now I can't work out at all...

Whilst the app and content is pretty good, the customer service is shocking. Absolutely no prior notice of renewal (you're supposed to remember the date for 12 months) and no time period post auto renewal where you are allowed to cancel. I haven't used for 6 months but they renewed without letting me know beforehand and now refusing to refund me. Taking £100 for a service that I don't want and happy to do so because it says in the Ts&Cs. Very poor customer care!

Good quality of workouts are here. I like the coach sessions, it makes the difference. Weekly plan sounds good, hard one. If you find the weekly plan is hard, check out the 6 weeks programs. You can see beginner, intermediate, advanced in the same time in the 6weeks program. Keep up the good work, don't disappoint me, please:)

Good combination of exercise, stretching, meditation and nutrition. Definitely worth trying the free trial, I bought a subscription for one year and so far it's helping me stay interested and engaged. Don't buy into the Chris Hemsworth sales pitch too much though. He is present for some workouts but it's the PTs that give this app value.

Lots of different types of workouts to suit all abilities and styles. Excellent meal selection too, it's usually difficult to find really good vegan meal plans. The only thing that I'd like to see is to be able to log your own work out if you've done one outside the use of the app.

UPDATE - docked my review by a star. I originally loved the app but then the app changed their lifting regimine for the worse. The lifting routine is very repetitive - I don't think it's changer the work out in 2 months... Fantastic app! My boyfriend and I are huge fans of the strength building program. It includes a lot of supersetting and full body moves so you really get your heart pumping while lifting. burnout superset that you do 3x.

Room for improvement- I have used several different fitness streaming apps. While I would rate the variety workouts and features of Centr a 5 out of 5, there are definitely areas the program can approve upon. 1. A built in cast feature like YouTube would be nice 2. Workouts could be more fluid. (I.e. not separate videos for warm up, workout and cool down) 3. Several workouts assume you know how to do each move, more instructional workouts would be nice.

really positive experience so far. coached courses are varied and fit into my schedule. meditation and mindfulness resources is a really nice touch. food recommendations look good, but I haven't tried them. the recommended shopping list (based on the recommended meals) is an excellent choice

App works well, but could go for some improvements. I'd like to be able to build custom playlists for workouts that would auto play one after the other for example, or some kind of offline mode. All in all it works well, and I use it almost every day.

This app is fantastic. The variety of the workouts, the simplicity and deliciousness of the food and the incredibly supportive community - I really can't recommend this enough. The app works a lot better than the web version did for me and I've had no bugs or glitches at all. If you want to achieve your goals then you've come to the right place. Don't think about it, take the step and never look back!

Really good app only had it a few days but already found it really useful, only improvement would be to have a way of ticking off what you've done that day for workouts, meals ect. As then I could see the total of cabs and protein that I've eaten in a day and how many calories burnt. Basically a calorie tracker

I've had the app for over 3 months now and love it! The planner is tailored to your goals so all you have to do is follow it, no need to count calories or plan your own workouts! The workouts and meals are all very easy to swap out, and you really can't go wrong with any of the meals because they are all adjusted based on your goals. There is a huge variety of workout options, from no-equipment to full gym access, and tons of well written articles regarding wellness. Definitely worth the price!

Great app. The shopping list is phenomenal especially when determining food for however many days of the week. The only downfalls I'd say are that there's no link to Samsung health which would be great, it needs an option to put in the food you have in your Fridge and potential meal options from there and I believe each time you do eat a meal it should track your overall intake for the day along with your workout output. Hence why attaching to Samsung health would be a huge add on.

So many different programs for so many different types of people no matter your stage. Gives good idea for meal preps and meals in general. I highly recommend to anyone. The food can be a pain to shop for, but i focused on what meals I needed help with. For me it was breakfasts. Getting away from cereal and eating healthier. So many god things to say about this app. Also has good music during workouts!

Great way to stay on top of my health. Love the recipes. The exercises are great and I love the variation provided by the numerous trainers and training type. Having the workout plan taking care of and sent to me makes each new workout unique and fun. Takes some time to get used to some moves as there could be more to coach you into it... But it's been a great lifestyle app for me.

Lost a lot of money to this app, did the 7 day free trial and thought I had unsubscribed. I was instead charged monthly subscriptions with no email notification of this. Customer service pretty poor. From reading the reviews seems like a lot of people have experienced the same. Great business set up to get their money but very poor when it comes to being a customer.

This program is amazing. I am feeling the burn immediately and it covered all levels of fitness (beginner to advanced). It's engaging and easy to follow. Keeps my focus on the prize. As a diabetic, the nutritional information in the planner section helps me manage my diabetes accurately to keep me on track with eating properly for optimal muscle building/fat reductions.

This app is fantastic. Pretty cost effective, given it provides a huge range of receipes, workouts & meditation, a high level program based on your aims & knowledge to help you with your goals. It keeps me accountable without being overbearing. The receipes are easy, use simple & repeative ingredients & are actually delicious. I'm on the vegetarian diet & it makes it easier to find healthy food & be balanced. Only suggestion would be to save receipes externally to the app or save meat options.

I'm really enjoying this app, it's the best one for me to stick to and feel healthy, not obsessed, over. But I have some suggestions : - option to add a snack to your daily planner, the snack / treat recipes are great but i forget them. - swap daily mediation. - option to have 'jog outside' or 'other workout' swap (similar to how you have 'leftovers' as a meal swap) - More yoga - cheaper (i can't afford it right now) - stop suggesting same 'reads' It would be perfect then!

I would love to try this app, unfortunately I cannot get past the initial payment screen. It says there is a server issue when I try to change the form of payment, and also freezes when I try to move forward without changing other payment. I've also uninstalled then reinstalled the app but had the same experience. Using a Google pixel 5.

Workouts are great and the app is very easy to use but my only complaint is that sometimes the videos do not load. I thought it was my internet connection but when I log into centr over the web it all of a sudden runs smoothly with no problems. Hopefully I am not the only person having trouble with the videos loading on the app and hopefully it will be fixed in an upcoming update. If my problem is fixed or someone informs me on what I may be doing wrong then I will change my review to a 5 star.

Update, some of the servings are massive! The quinoa, chickpea and sweet potato Buddha bowl for example after having moved the toggle to single serving, it' suggests the following; 400g of sweet potato Half a tin of chickpeas 90g of quinoa ect, That particular meal was an absolute effort to get through, but it wasn't the only one, these portions are huge and I'm always full! Cant even get to the snacks, also it was super dry and starchy too even with more than the recommended amount of dressing

Recommended for any level, and absolutely giving results. All you need is a little discipline (to actually follow the routines and stick to your chosen program) At the moment I'm on second week, Unleashed workout, advanced level, shown results already. The combination of workouts for beginners, intermediate and advanced, with or whitout equipment, perfectly timed for each level. The bonuses: meals & mental health, stretching aso, makes it a complete workout& wellness App, worth every penny.

Really like the app but I'm having trouble with video playback for the workouts. They initially work fine when I start my daily workout but as I progress to different exercises they simply stop loading and continually spin a loading circle. I'm on fibe internet over wifi with no issues loading anything in other apps. Tried cellular and got the same result, even low data modes don't allow it to load. Not sure if it's specifically my device but I have a OnePlus 7 pro, Android 12.

I remembered that I cancelled earlier but seems like it wasn't because apparently I was charged later on. When I wrote in to seek for help they just told me t&c says no refund available. This is the first subscription I ever heard that refuse to refund when I clearly refuse to use the services anymore. Very disappointed.

Lots of options. The app has definitely developed quite a bit over this first year. The meals are pretty yummy and balanced. I wish it was on apple tv so I could see the picture bigger than just on my phone, but seeing that they have really expanded the app this past year, I hope this will come soon. I reordered it for next year too.

The workouts are amazing and the app tailors to your needs so easily. But the meals the meals is where it's at. Again tailored to your needs whether you're vegan, veggie, eat meat or only fish etc etc.. The meals uper tasty, so much variation, nothing too complicated but nothing tastes simple. Outstanding work making an incredible app.
The best workout sessions I ever haved in my fitness journey.

Expensive for what you get. They say their costs are cheap as an alternative to having a PT but there is plenty of information online that is free and more extensive. App does seem to be well built and looks nice. My self and many others according to reviews have had issues with being charged without notification of renewal of subscription or have had issues cancelling our subscription

I've had the app for a couple of days (currently on 7 day trial period) and have been enjoying the workouts that are available. Initial plan was to get a yearly subscription, but after reading the comments on here about their auto renewal and lack of support or refund for their customers, I have cancelled and taken screenshots to be on the safe side. Its a shame as I said I was enjoying the workouts but I can't subscribe with a company that treats it's customers that way.

Bad customer service. They made the mistake of taking my funds out early for an annual subscription. After asking them politely if I could change to a monthly, they did nothing to make me feel as if they cared. After realising they made a mistake by taking the funds early, they refunded me. I would have kept my subscription but after experiencing their customer service team i've happily cancelled for good. Hopefully Amazon's acquisition fixes their customer service team.

A great variety of workouts for people with different levels of fitness and equipment available to them. I saw great improvements in my fitness using the 6 week program. App is easy to navigate and casts to my TV without problems. Definitely worth it!

The food recipes are really good an easy to make, sometimes finding all the ingredients can be hard but I make it work. They cook in like 30 minutes usually and clean up is a breeze. The work outs are great, there is a huge variety that keeps things interesting!
App does not allow me to log in, keeps reverting to session timed out screen and back to login page
Worth every penny 4/6/20 ... Still worth every penny 9/4/23
working again and back to normal

If you ever want the perfect workout app, Centr is the app for you! The trainers show you the exercises before the workout and explains how to do them correctly. I love that there are meals and snacks recipes plus meditation. The best part now, you can save workouts and recipes. Best app for health and fitness. Recommended highly.
Right now the app logs you out every time you try to start a workout. Before that it was great.

I have a Google Pixel and for some reason the user interface just isn't as intuitive, and I'm missing the "explore" tab that is accessible on the webpage. As someone who won't realistically work out every single day, the daily planner is not a useful format to me. I would be interested to stay on if we could fix this so pixel users can access the "explore tab" :) Also would LOVE to be able to star favourite workouts

Was a great app and service, until I tried to cancel and would constantly send me in circles to the sign up page (even though I was already signed up) and would then say to cancel my subscription through Google play (was not coming up on my subscription list) so I have now been charged for the subscription that I cannot afford and still no closer to unsubscribing and claiming a refund. Massive let down.

Great app. Worth it. The coached sessions are really helpful. The meals plans also give great ideas. Although I did think it was a little sneaky how they advertised it as $* per month, then after I signed up I was charged for the whole year.

Awful. Tutorials can only be streamed. Other fitness apps allow you to download routines so when you don't have WiFi/data (i.e. in my gym), you can still play them. Centr doesn't have this feature but prices itself as a premium app. The lunch meal plans are "leftovers" even though I turned that option off. Customer service are arrogantly uninterested. Had to repeat myself as they don't read emails properly. Frustrating and unpleasant experience. Charged for a year, but refuse any part refund.

Great! Workouts are great and can be customized. Same goes for food, best meals I've ever cooked and they seem to have gotten smarter about using grocery items on several meals in one week. Great for when I'm on the move too, jist look for no equipment needed exercises.

Missing the cast feature. I tried to cast the workout using Google Chromecast, but the option never appeared. At the same time, I could cast with YouTube without any issues. Otherwise, the app is quite good. Update: cast feature works well now.

Great for beginners. Always encouraging as you go. More than just work outs too. Meal plans, guided work outs, self paced work outs. Super awesome to help keep me on track. What I love the most is the new 6 week program. The exercises are split up into 2 sets and it has a rest between each exercise and each set. It helps me stay with it and get through the whole workout. Plus they offer modifications to the exercises. Been going strong for 2 weeks straight everyday and am seeing results.

Really love the recipes and the list building that's possible. Plus, swapping out depending on ingredients works great. The exercises are also solid though we keep swapping out because we have no bag or bench as some call for. Bodyweight and dumbbell are keeping us going with pilates moves as well. Can't wait for both of us to look like Chris!!

This app makes working out easy and enjoyable. There are so many different programs and ways to work out that it never gets dull. There are delicious healthy recipes and you can save those along with your favorite workouts. I am seeing results and feeling a lot better thanks to centr. Also, it's worth it just for the Chris hemsworth affirmations alone. Go get Rulked!

I've been loving this app for a month now! There is a big variety of work outs and recipes to choose from and the Centr 6 program is great! I've always struggled to stick with a work out plan for more than a couple weeks but I am hooked on Centr! I would absolutely recommend this app to anyone and everyone, it doesn't matter if you're a beginner or advanced, you'll want to go back for more.

Excellent workouts with loads of variety. Go to try out new exercises and found some I really enjoy. Haven't got past intermediate yet but really enjoying it. Have also found great recipes which enjoy. Find it hard to do it all in a day but mainly focus on the workouts. Would very much recommend

Amazing app! Within a month theres was a big difference in my physique, the workouts are always good and mixed combing different methods of gym activities for muscles. The workout is important to follow, but you must also take in enough food and water to make the biggest difference aswell, which is described in the app.
Loving it! So easy to use and so many different workouts for at home and at the gym.

Has everything from nutrition to fitness. My only complaint is the inability to cast the videos to my TV which seems standard in most other visual exercise applications. I can cast my entire screen to the Chromecast, but the videos themselves don't offer the casting icon.

I really love this app. It has everything I need: workouts (and a huge variety of them, ranging from HIIT, MMA, weight lifting, yoga, pilates, and more), meal plan (I honestly stopped doing other recipes, the one they have are amazing and most of them fast to prepare with balanced macros and you can choose your regime: everything, pescatarian, vegetarian, vegan), meditation (really nice practices), and great reading. Plus they have tutorials 4 exercises and explanation of all the plans. Amazing!

Amazing and getting results I've been waiting for. This app has great workouts and recipes to help anyone from beginner to advanced! I feel so pumped with the coaches giving tips on how to actually do them properly as well as positive reinforcement. A must try if you want an app that knows what its talking about.
