Hands down the best fitness program I've ever used, the community is amazing the workouts have great variety the meal plan is delicious, nutritious and just looks amazing. And the customer support is so quick to give feedback and help, I cannot recommend it enough.

Great workouts with great instructors. They talk to you during which helps keep you focused but also takes your mind off "the hurt." Everyone is encouraging and it helps to watch the instructor do the workout with you AND breathe heavy! The meal plans are actually great tasting! I can't say enough about this app honestly

I lost track of how many fitness apps I tried over lockdown. This one finally is fun, motivating and easy to follow. Programs, recipes and meditations - you get a lot for your money! All with a very friendly, chilled yet professional approach. Joined the FB group at first, but too many posts, so left again. Still, hooked:-)

Love this app. So much in it! There are such a vast range of trainers and also you can change the difficulty level which means I could start easy and work my way up. I haven't even used it to it's full potential and it's still the first time I've ever done exercise 6 days a week and enjoyed it. Highly recommend.

Great app! I love all the options on the different workouts, and have finally started do yoga after years of telling myself I would. The only reason I didn't give five stars is because i found the weight training workouts wanting. Even the Centr Power program didn't really meet my needs as an athlete. I had to make a few modifications to actually make it a "power" workout. With a few tweaks it was a killer program. I think this is a great app for the vast majority of people using it.

What a wonderful app to use for at home workouts! Definitely gave me options of more bodyweight moves to keep in shape and cross train with. The yoga and meditation options are a HUGE plus. Coming from a Wellness background this is not just a fitness app, but an entire wellness program touching on physical activity, nutrition, sleep aids and mental health. A sincere thanks to Chris and your team for being so generous with your program during COVID19.

Best thing I've done during iso, I'm quickly getting back in shape, stamina is good & my recovery time is great! I just got one remark though, if only our capable coaches recorded the whole workout rather than individual exercises, that would be more motivating and more engaging as we see them suffer and sweat with us instead of keep pushing us from the comfort of the studio, I found myself repeating their commentary as it comes with each exercise. Bring said that, I will always give it 5 stars.

By far the best training app I've found, that might be biased considering this is the only app I've ever downloaded like this but it gets me up every morning into a routine for success. For anyone that is wanting to work out that doesn't know how, this will get you started from begginer to advanced & get you into the routine of consistency, & that's what really matters to make change in your life.

This app has been amazing! I love following the quality workouts that are doable and motivating. I love the versatility of the workouts too, from yoga to slow it down, to high intensity interval training. The recipes are high quality as well. They offer programs and I've used everything on this app. Well worth the money.

Amazing! So easy to follow, lots of options for fitness level to help you achieve your goals. Meals are pretty yummy. Make sure you utilize the snack options. I am 44 years old and have never been in better shape or felt healthier/stronger.

Amazing health and fitness plan. Within 4 weeks I have lost almost a stone, and been given a load of new recipes that now family favourites. The exercise plan is really easy to follow, with either a daily options or a six week programme to complete. And the mindful meditation/sleep meditations are amazing for my wellbeing. Well worth the subscription cost.

Great app. Very user friendly and easy to navigate. The recipes are delicious and have helped me to enjoy other flavors i would have never tried. They are great with workouts including modifications and turorials. Literally anyone can use this program whether its at a gym, in a home, or in an apartment. Love this app.

This app is amazing. Unfortunately due to everything going in the world I can't afford the sub after the free trial is up. But definitely hoping to come back. The six week trial was amazing and a great thing to do for those stuck at home. Well done centr!

I mostly just use the app for their workouts and I quite enjoy them. The newest 6-week program is off to a particularly good start. They also seem to be very responsive to feedback and consistently make improvements to the app.

Got this as a substitute for the Gym when everything was closed and a year costs 1/2 of what the monthly memborship was for us before. The fitness training I appreciate, but the meal plan is what sold me on the app. Granted it requires a LOT of ingredients, many of which aren't available here in Asia, but even without following it daily the resource for healthy menus, shopping list, and caloric information are extremely helpful. I would hust appreciate a "favorites" tab to save our favorites.

Fantastic app with great workouts. Only thing I'd like to see is an option to switch between body weight workouts and some with more equipment that I can do at the gym (when they open). Regardless, all round great app.

Tried a few fitness apps, this is by far my favourite. Really customisable to my fitness level and the fitness goals im targeting. Loads of led sessions which i respond to well. I can have lower back issues from years of heavy lifting and twisting and Centr really helps support and strengthen my back and core. Brilliant variety, lots of fun while working hard. Loads of food plans too. Love it!

I joined centr when it was first launched with just the website access. I was so excited to have the ability to have a workout plan designed for my specific needs. I have been loving the meal plans associated with the app. So many delicious recipes. Being able to filter the workouts by equipment availability is incredibly helpful. I wish you could filter the meal plan by major ingredients as well (maybe one day!) So thankful for this app.

Love the app.Great workouts for all levels of expertise, only trouble is the need to have at least some basic workout equipments at home.Hope that the gyms open up soon so that i can do this with more weights.What i love most is the meal guide and sleep meditations.So many options to choose from and everything is ready to make, healthy and tasty.i thought the sleep meditations would be silly but they were super effective. I fall asleep by the time the meditation is over. Definitely worth buying.

Wow! What a great app! I haven't done anything fitness before, I didn't even cook, wasn't into nutrition and then I decided to make a change. Thank goodness for Centr! It has everything in one place, the workouts, meal plans and meditation, it's also personalised to my goals. After just 4 weeks I can already see progress in my muscle - I can see it 😆 Love the vibe of the trainers and the variety of both the workouts (it doesn't get boring) and the recipes (I'm a veggie and I'm really impressed)

The Best App on the planet ..have tried many other apps and even have had many pts over the years but have never had a transformation as good as I've had while using the app ..everything is so well organized and explained the forms the exercises programs functional circuits and even the meals..Great trainers as well and almost all forms of exercises are available..Great Work Centr team keep it up ..

Workouts are great so far. The app is well designed in it's layout, but it doesn't work well. I've had to reinstall it a couple times now and now it won't let me log in. Really inconvenient when I'm trying to workout.

Work outs are great, but the video must be running the whole time. Not convenient for use at a busy gym. It would be better if there were audio only circuit timers available to say when to switch without having the video run the whole time.

I found this to be a very good app with regards to the explanations and videos. There are however a few things I would like to see added. downloading the videos would be useful to stop buffering in low speed areas,. Adding weight and height would also be helpful when it comes to the daily food intake. I am currently 130kg looking to loose body fat, the food plan given for the day would put me in such a huge defeceit that it would not sustainable. Please add these features and I can give 5 stars

This program is AWESOME. I've been doing Centr6 for a week, and following the meal plan as close as I can - and it's been great! The exercises are demonstrated well, and in various stages of difficulty for those not so inclined to working out. On top of the app, the Facebook community is great and supportive. Very excited for the coming addition of Unleashed, and for what the future holds. Thanks!

This app is super user friendly. I've had it downloaded for a while just never used it until the Rona happened and traditional gyms were closed. I am so happy with the no equipment workouts that I cancelled my membership when I can get an actual coached workout filter for what I'd like to do at home. Plus the coaches seem super down to earth so that's rad. Have not messed with the nutrition part yet, though v

BEWARE. My annual subscription autorenewed with no warning or notification. I made contact on the day it was due to renew to say I didn't want it to and was basically told "tough". NOT GOOD ENOUGH. In general I found the whole programme quite boring and over reliant on repackaging / randomly generated workouts and hadn't used it at all for 6 months...

Fabolous app. Love the food, so tasty, nutritious and accessible. The fitness programmes are engaging, superb trainers. Also the programme variety, both with and without equipment, stretching, good instructions from beginners through to advance. Calming meditation, good advice and also the app is updating with new programme. Yes, am liking the app, glad I found it.

Workouts are solid; I'm meeting my goals. The app itself needs some work. The videos go black midway through a workout which requires me to fiddle with the app. I've reported it to them but it's been months without a fix.

incredible app, chris and his team have done an excellent job creating this. The workouts are amazing and are very easy to follow and pick up, dont have to be a brain box to figure them out, its instructed amazing and deep the motivation and push from the team to keep pushing. Feels like I'm in the room with you guys, would love a in person workout with the team. THANK YOU CENTR

Ive got 2 boys and I find It hard to get motivated and to designate some time for myself. Then this app came across Facebook and I though I'll give it a try! I've just started my 3rd wk of the 10wk intermediate muscle building program and It's great! Ive really noticed changes and I'm already getting some definition. I love having each session laid out and timed with the movement video so its easy to smash out quick. And the recipes are awesome. 10/10 recommend!

I'm going to keep trying it through these next 6 weeks, but I think it would be a good app for those attempting to lose weight or stay tone. If you are trying to build muscle, I'm not sure if just the standard selection of daily workouts will get you there. You'll likely need to focus on one trainer's workouts. Some of the muscle building workouts don't talk during the workout to give tips on the intensity to shoot for. It'd be great to get a Hemsworth intro on some workouts he tried.

I enjoy the layouts of the programs and appreciate that I can do most at home with dumbells. I am definitely seeing gains even with the 30 minute sessions. I like that the new release is a home weight training program with active recovery days. My one, very large complaint is that the workouts are not real time. I would love for the trainers to do the whole workout with you, instead of performing the move twice and then looping it with a cheesy commentary overlay. PS more Tahl! ❤️

I have not taken advantage of the full program yet, but the exercise portion is great. I did centr unleashes for six weeks and am now doing a more strength oriented program. The coaches are great, the modifications are explained well. I love it.

I've been using this app for a while now and I love it! The app is outstanding and very easy to use. You can have access to wide range of workouts, meal plans, ans super hero world class coaching for a very reasonable price. It great to have the option of coached or Self-Guided workouts. Strongly recommend! 👌 Go for it! Love Chris a million , but I will just keep calling him Thor anyway 😍

The workouts are repetitive, that's why I've stopped using the app shortly. Also I've renewed by mistake for another year and 2 mins later I've contacted the team and ask for a refund which was denied for some bs reason. When you login from mobile the only option you have is to renew and I accidentally press the button, it seems like it was placed on purpose and I find ridiculous that won't refund money after making a mistake and not using the product. Too greedy for money. What a scam

Excellent fitness/personal development app! It has numerous valuable information on diets, lifetsyle, recipes and many more! The app is simple to use. I do have a few feedback: * Servings - Does one serving equate to one portion per meal? *Dark Mode - Is there any chance that the app could be optimised with the phone's dark mode? Otherwise this is an ex app!

This app makes working out incredibly easy and accessible. It is also extremely affordable, especially if you get the annual membership. The workouts are great and the meal plans are also fantastic. Sometimes I substitute recipes if I don't have the right ingredients or not in the mood for that particular meal. There is also a wide variety of snacks to choose from which really helps! Overall, the whole things feels very prefoessional and luxurious without costings a fortune! 10/10.

Crashes every time I click "log in". The content itself (in the browser version) is nice, but seriously, if you're charging for subscribtion at least develop a working app, so people will have a proper experience. I guess they just developed this for iOS and tried to just port it for Android, instead of actually developing an app.

App is fine. However, I'm frustrated that this app is categorized as "free" when it requires a subscription just to open. A free trial shouldn't put this as a "top free" app. Whether or not it's worth it isn't the point; I just regret that I wasted my time believing that some features wouldn't require a subscription.

I'm so excited for the app since I joined Centr as a founding member! It's sleek and convenient, and I don't keep getting signed out for no reason. Just one thing I wish I still have from the web version however is the shopping list page to be able to select a saved recipe to see individual ingredients and adjust quantity. Other than that, I'm thrilled to continue my fitness journey with you. It has changed my life for sure.

I love this app. You can have a guided tour or forge your own path. All while having complete workouts and amazing recipes. Not to mention it's affordable. Extremely affordable, however you still have to put the effort in. Gotta have a little skin in the game.👏

EDIT: In response to the developer's response, I know how a free trial works. My point was - I believe you may have missed it - is that you were not transparent with that fact that this is a subscription service. Additionally, having to remember to cancel for a subscription can be tedious, and if I forget to cancel, I'm left with a bill and an app I paid for that I may not use. And this whole time they advertise it as if it is free...the only thing you'll get free of charge is a 7 day trial.

A Founding Member of Centr. It keeps growing in workout options ie beginner to advanced, coached or uncoached. Keeps getting better with improvements, it has an enormous range of fitness avenues / coaches and eating choices, meditations and all in all, keeps guiding and supporting you further and further towards the healthy you. Also, has its own community which members also offer support and progress reports that people share to others of own achievements and that helps to motivate all. Vern.

I've had this for a couple of months now, and have found both the meal plans and exercise options to be fantastic. There is a lot of variety in the meal plane of that's what you want, but the meals are also very easy to scale up using their servings tool so if you prefer to prep bulk meals in advance you can. There's also a fab community of users on Facebook that members can join for tips and advice and generally for keeping each other motivated!

I bought this as a founder (before it was released) and have kept my membership for a reason. The different kinds of workouts, combined with the quality in each kind is amazing, and the recipes with it AND guided meditation is priceless. I would pay three times the amount I do because it would still be worth it.

Great workouts! Plus honestly, giving free 6 week access due to the pandemic was an amazing (and smart!) gesture! I quickly fell in love with the workouts (and trainers!!) and didn't hesitate to subscribe when the time came. Also a great value for what you get!!

I have been using this app for two weeks. I like it; it is easy to use and to follow the instruction. Many information and different types of guidance provided. ( nutrition, meditation, work out and more..) I didn't explore everything yet, but 6-week bodyweight program it's fantastic, Luke and Ashley are the best.

The best workout app I have ever used and I have used a few! Have subscribed to the 3 monthly payment and it still just seems so cheap for the content you are getting! In about 5 minutes (and that's me trying to decide what to eat as there is so much on offer) I can plan out my entire weeks with workouts, meals and meditations! Delete every other workout app you have just get this. You won't regret it when you see the results after a month or 2!!

I'm in my second week of having the app and I already notice a marked improvement in physical health and fitness. The recipes make eating vegan enjoyable and easy. Every meal is to prepare and delicious. The workout programs are intense, but I feel like the results will be incredible.

So far so good. The workouts target a variety of muscle groups, the trainers are all very experienced. The meals take quite a bit of time to make and buying the ingredients is time consuming so I just use this for the workouts. The meals look delicious though.

Great app started back in mid December, I have currently lost around 30 pounds. They are always listening to the community (especially on their facebook, join if you havent). This app has not only helped me become healthy but I've also lost a few medical conditions I've had for a while do to the meals and workouts. Great community great instructors, and many new friends.

Love the app. It is apprehensive with meditations, recipes, and many different kinds of workouts and programs. I've had it for 4 months before really utilizing it and I don't know what I was thinking! Highly recommend it.

I would advise caution with this app. If you go over your free trail period (even by a few hours) you will be stung by a full annual fee. Customer Service is not great either, they are nameless and BOT like responses; forget ever trying to enter any talks about refunds. In the end their customer service becomes unresponsive which I feel is rude and unprofessional. I wish I had avoided this app altogether, their payment strategy and customer service needs a great deal of improvement.

Great program overall. I really like having so many options for workouts when I want to change up the activities in the planner. Would be nice if I could look back at what workouts I have completed though. With so many options it's hard finding a specific workout after it disappears from the planner.

I'm not big on the recipes because the food is nothing I normally keep in my fridge or pantry. Searching for recipes I may like seems like a chore to add to a shopping cart/list. I like the guided functional fitness workouts and the guided mma/boxing workouts. My only gripe is that the combinations at times don't flow well with my fight style but it keeps me moving, works my coordination, and gets a good sweat going while I am stuck in lockdown and away from my fight team.

App is easy to use! Great Strength training workout! I'm sure the rest is good, too. I wish there was a way to add notes. The strength training workouts are set up for a gym (it tells you that). I'm working out at home, so use alternative moves in places. It would be nice if there was a way to note that. (If there is a way, I haven't figured it out). Also, a way to record extra exercises (if I want to add something additional to what's in the daily workout).

Amazing! Choose your goal, your level, your eating habits and you get a tailored fitness plan which also pays attention to mental health through podcasts and meditations. The variation is immense. You wont get bored. HIIT, HIRT, weighted, plyometric, pilates, functional training...something for every occasion. Im also vegan so to have meals suggested which werent just steak, chicken, egg and designed for me was great. Feel so much fitter, lost kilos, abs appearing. Constant new material as well

This is far and away the best and most user friendly app for health and fitness i have come across!! The planner and layout is straightforward and the workouts are motivating with heaps of variety! The meals are like we have a restaurant in our house they are so full of flavour! The shopping list makes it really easy to be totally prepared!! Heaps of great tips and the meditations have become a ritual! Also the online community is so supportive and full of inspiration!! As are the Centr team!!!

Great app! I only follow the workouts and enjoy the articles and podcasts. The vegan recipes are good! I don't follow them daily but they give great suggestions. The workouts are really tough (advanced mode) but showing great results and are perfectly timed. None of these 1 hour+ home workouts, these are more like 20-45 mins ☺

Ever since the update the app keeps crashing, not loading, generally being annyoing. Do please fix it fast, as I very much enjoy the content and UI, but its difficult not to be frustrated when you re in the work out mindset and the app takes 10 minutes to work, only so it can crash shortly after

Only if the app was as good as the trainers, would be much better - 1) better way to integrate programs into the planner 2) I complete a 45 min session, but don't keep the screen on continually, so the length of the workout in Google Fit is incorrect 3) ability to extend the rest timer 4) ability to enter body stats 5) ability to sort list of searched workouts by time 6) one click access to currently enrolled programs from main screen 7) too many clicks to log weights

It is good apps , good content, but tracking and monitoring is not available. For example, you can not tell how many excerices you did last month , how many you skipped, was it better then the month before ... the apps just do excerices and I end up buying another apps and manually record my Centro excerices in it. They claim that it sync with Google fit, but it does not work very well.

Well balanced workout app! Lots of different exercises and moves. Da Rulk is why we are all here (let's be honest) but the meal plan is a great bonus! Sometimes the food is hit or miss on the delicious scale so I'm excited whenever they add new stuff but I think this app will keep evolving so I really enjoy it! 60 day trial was pretty spectacular too! More apps should do this if they want customers. Edit: still here a couple years later. The Centr Power programs are phenomenal!

Great app, perfect for working out at home, or if I actually make it to the gym. I like the UI and has a decent variety of exercises. Id say the subscription fee is more than reasonable give the quality and content 🤙🏻

Centr is the complete package - from excellent workouts targeted to my goals, to improving sleep, diet and well-being. I'm a single father of two and I feel like I have more energy now than I have in a long time. The app is easy to use and everything is planned out on the daily planner. The shopping list feature for meal recipes is a great addition too.

Nothing short of AMAZING This app is like a personal trainer and nutritionist in your pocket. The meals are super tasty and the perfect nutritional value depending on what plan you're going for. The workout are challenging and there are so many to choose from, even yoga and pilates! The planner keeps you on track but if you're not a fan of a day you can always swap it for something you prefer. I haven't made a better investment in myself than this app 😍

The best work out and general health app that I've used. The work outs are easy to follow so I've been able to keep at it. The sleep meditations have helped me fall asleep on more than one occasion. Overall, just a brilliant app, and not because it has Chris Hemsworth on it. That's just an added bonus!

Great app from what I can tell from a few weeks using it. A ton of features and it's clearly a lifestyle change of you follow it 100%. Only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of five is due to the nutrition side. It would be nice to know that the app is doing calculated calories and macros for my specific age, weight, and activity level. A person's TDEE and adding/subtracting from that is a huge part of achieving goals. There just isn't any mention of it in this app or product.

Horrible Customer Service. I could not get my money back! Signed up for their free trial and then cancelled on the application. Thinking it was done, I was charged full year subscription. And their response was no read the terms and conditions. How many times do I have to cancel you crooks? Customer service should have empathy for people. Great job.

It is not a diet program but lifestyle change. The meal plan alone is worth it. The meditation has me sleeping better and my stress levels have never been better. At only around $10 a month with the annual subscription it isn't a high cost either. I've been in the program for 6 weeks and have already lost 10 lbs and that is not being able to do all the workouts yet. The community that has developed from Centr is also so supportive and helpful. No matter what your fitness level this is for you.

It could be pricier than other apps..that are..well free, but the workouts are exceptional. Every one will end with you feeling like you made decent progress, making it that much more likely you will stick with it. This program doesn't post gimmicks and involves guided hard work!

This is my second year using the Centr app, it's worth every cent! I love all the options for types of exercise even though pilates is my everyday workout of choice, Sylvia is a wonderful instructor, I always use her coached workouts to be sure of correct form. To have such a comprehensive app that covers all aspects of health is fantastic! I have tried some of the recipes and enjoyed them, the sleep visualisation is well done, I appreciate that the app is always being added to. Excellent!

This app gives everything that I could ever ask for. I love the workout programs and that they will offer low impact alternatives for their exercises. I feel like I have gotten more out of this than going to just a gym. Sleep meditations are great as well. You can follow them on social media if you're curious to what they have to offer.

The app is great, lots of workouts, meal ideas, calming tools, only con so far is the same warm up and cool down videos and the exercises are just a repeat of the first video for every set, I would have preferred the trainers to go through each rep. Otherwise, cool app.

I don't recommend. Food meal plan is difficult to find ingredients often and expensive to follow. There's no option to switch out ingredients for meals and you can't set your preferences if you don't want certain ingredients to show up. Workouts are ok but you can get Workouts anywhere. There's nothing in the Workouts that makes this awesome.

I'm currently on week three of one of the many programmes. It has three area's that you choose from I.e tone, build muscle, get lean. The programmes vary from beginner, intermediate to advanced. The recipes are fantastic & new recipes are added weekly. I completed the Body Coach 90 days last year, however there's so much more to this app regarding physical & mental wellbeing. Well worth the money.

really weird app. Doesn't work with a vpn which feels sketch. Have opted out of the mailing list three times now and they just keep coming. I personally don't think I'm the target market for a lot of the activities either-no idea why id need to visualise myself on a luxury yacht during a meditation in order to relax but I guess some people are into that.

Easy to use, navigate, follow and great Trainers! 12/09/21 - Volume does not work on self guided workouts, despite checking that volume for timers and everything else is switched on. Have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, but still doesn't work. This doesn't help when I'm not facing the screen as I have to stop my exercise to check! Sort it out Centr! 20/09/2021 - I have emailed Centr at the email address you have provided and await response! Can you adapt the app for Smart TVs?

Completely unethical company. I signed up for a year subscription, never used it. At some point the subscription was changed to an auto subscription. With no advanced warning that a charge was upcoming they charged over $100 for an app I never use. When notified that I do not want the app or the subscription, all I got was an email stating that it basically "sucks to be you". Terrible customer service. Stay far away from this app and this company.

The best workout app I've used. Been working out for 15 years and I've never been this destroyed during workouts. The videos are awesome, movements are precise, no extra fluff, straight to the point, warm ups and cool downs. Fun healthy meal options. Good job with this! This is literally for everyone.

Well-rounded with great expertise. I love how each trainer specialises in a certain fitness type, mental health or food prep! Seems to be endless workouts to choose from. Great energy from the trainers and options to adjust to your fitness level or equipment you have available. I havent found any bugs yet. Great job!

The best fitness app hands down! Has everything you could ever need between the multiple trainers, workout styles, and difficulty levels, to tasty recipes and mindfulness practices. I have had it since day 1 and can't imagine my life without it. 5 out of 5 stars.

The workouts are unbalanced and all over the place. I chose muscle building as my goal and I don't get a real balanced plan inluding all muscle groups. The recipes are great or at least most of them, but I think they could be a little more simple. Some of the ingredients you can't even find in normal supermarkets which is really annoying. And please stay away from the salted caramel oatmeal. It uses so much coconut milk that it gets disgustingly greasy. I couldn't even swallow 1/4 of it.

Absolutely could not live without this app! Between the fun, energetic, supportive work outs (from yoga to boxing) and the amazing food recipes, it has covered everything I've needed to make my life healthier, this is not a diet but a life style change. There's also meditation and daily articles to keep you on track too. Id never try another workout app again

Amazing!!! I may still look like Fat Thor right now but everyday I'm improving with this awesome app! I've tried so many different fit app and have never stuck with them..this one however is just perfect. Workouts are fun and engaging without ever feeling too cringy! Lots to choose from and easy to use. Gotta have at least 1 criticism and thats I would like to see more keto options for meal ideas. Keep up the great work dudes! Dave xx

It's all about money to them. I got charged even before concluding my 7day trial period and they do not consider even consider to investigate and offer refunds. It's by default not available in billing terms leaving users helpless. Although they say you can stop automatic renewals in the app it's no where to be found!! Absolutely horrible customer service and you should never trust a company running with one sided T&C for their benefit. Do not fall into their trap. DISGUSTING!!!

BEST WELLNESS APP EVER I heard about the program from a friend and got 6 weeks free. Honestly changed my life. Changed my perception of fitness and wellness. I saw results I wasn't expecting. I began to see results in ways I didn't think were possible. It's got personal trainers, its got food (amazing btw. I have yet to find a recipe I dont like after using it for several months.) It even has meditation! So worth it. If you're hesitating, bite the bullet and do it. You'll thank yourself.

Really great app, definitely helping me get in better shape! The awesome team really help keep you motivated and coming back for more. Big fan of Alexz and Luke as I've already finished beginner and am in intermediate unlimited now. Looking forward to challenging Da Rulk's masterclass in a couple months. Also don't let the diet plan phase you if you live on a budget like me, you could pick a few recipes and switch em out when you want. I've still had great results doing so. Thanks centr team!

Workouts, recipes, blog posts and the planner are all awesome. The app and service itself doesn't quite live up to their quality, it should have more "programs", a history log and weight and goal tracking to make it worth the price. Feels nearly there though.

I'm someone who has always been physically active, but not a serious gym goer. This app has not only made it extremely easy to follow your specific goals but makes it rewarding, fun and easy is very unique. Highly recommended over just about any other workout app. While year for $100? Almost to good to be true! P.S. No way you ca better smoothie recipes then this app! P.P.S logging weight/Rep is a little weird to get used to but in one session I've got it down to a science 👌

Centr has gotten me back in my excercise groove. I love the experience, the coaches, and how they have created a full service program. 6 week programs (I am in the beginner) and I am already feeling a difference. I love how they take you through both sets of the series instead of just telling you to do a 2nd set. And the coaches commentary is funny, inspiring and different each time. Love it.

Good content. Would be great to have the option of turning off the music in the workout videos so that I could listen to my own. The music is fine, but it gets a bit grindy listening to the same songs that play at the same intervals on each workout.

The workouts are great. The meditation is a nice change of pace to my day. The meals are great. The only reason its not 5 stars is because I wish I could design my meal plan around a budget. Its very expensive to buy everything. And some ingredients are very hard to find.

Not for beginners. Plan isn't taylored at all which I thought was the point of the app. You literally put in beginner, intermediate or advanced and diet, vegan, veggie or normal and magically you have a "plan". I'm nowhere near the level of "beginner". There's only 3 programs which is ridiculous for the $$. Better workouts on YouTube for free. I have a year sub through AMEX and still cancelling so I don't fall into the (barely legal) trap others have.

Overall... Love the app Just a suggestion/request. Would be nice if some TRX workouts were among the workout library. There might be some, but I can't seem to find them and 'TRX' isn't available as a filter when finding/swapping workouts.

App is Amazing! Only thing is that it's hard to follow up if you are a student or having a full time job. Overall concept is great and you can learn alot from it, definitely will follow up morning workouts and afternoon gym session after my trial runs out. I'll see if I will purchase it in the near future.

I thought Chris Hemsworth is cool and he has a workout app so it must be cool and sure enough...it's cool!! The trainers are fun and serious at the same time. The app plans the day out for you which is convenient or you can choose whatever you want. I even went away and tried other apps but didn't like them so I came back. I love the setup too much and it's aesthetically pleasing to me. Just do it!! Now doesn't wait for tomorrow

Really enjoy the app, love the recipes and the workouts. However, would be great to be able to record my weights for each exercise as I do the workout. Also, the timer pauses if you lock your phone, so can drain the battery really fast of you need the timer.

This app and it's total wellness content has been a great one stop shop for keeping me on track and engaged. I love the structure and organization of the app, the content and it's execution. It's very customizable to one's preferences and needs. Got it for a promotion price and I'm getting over and above my money's worth.

I absolutely love this app. It keeps me focused and dedicated. I know can actually meditate. I have always had a tough time and with the help of your app I have learned how to. I also enjoy the wide variety of workouts both guided and non guided. I have yet to try the meals but will slowly be choosing something each week to try (I am super picky). Thanks for creating a wonderful app, a great team and a fantastic Facebook community of people to turn too.

This ap is amazing, so easy to use and workouts are set up so you can follow along easily. You get so much to choose from. I've only used it for 4 weeks and have my strength has improved so much and seeing results with my body tone and muscle gain. Even using the meditations has helped my with getting a better start to my days!

Logging weight and sets SUCKS. Way over priced. Not user friendly Hard to search for what you want because program names tell you nothing. Support was rude to deal with. During workout is nice interface though but that's about it. You can find better app for cheaper and more intuitive to use. Lots of good info inside it though.

Awesome app! Have been using it since the very beginning and got absolutely addicted to its variety of workouts, recipes, podcasts! This app seem to be a forever work in progress and it's brilliant to see it evolve with its users following the "Train. Eat. Live" mantra.

I'm updating my review after the Centr team refunded me after auto charging a full year after the trial. I had to push a little, but thankfully they relented. The app itself is pretty good, though I didn't get too deep into it. The workouts definitely made me sweat. Whether it's worth $100 a year depends on the person, I suppose. Certainly cheaper than a gym if you use it

Amazing app - no faults whatsoever. Awesome workouts (especially during lockdown where you need no equipment - the Centr Unleashed Program is the way to go!). Delicious recipes - and so many of them to choose from!! This really is by far the best workout/health/fitness app I have come across. I'm considering even sticking with this instead of going back to my conventional gym - that's how good it is. Well worth the money. You won't regret.
Love this. I want more Luke and Alexi. More banter, more making fun of each other. When you guys make me crack up it makes the workout fly by.

Great program to strengthen and get for.meal plans are good, wish there were more still but very good. Great instructors and a wide variety of programs to tailor to your fitness level (sedentary to very active). I'm admittedly starting with sedentary, Covid era has not been helpful there. I think it's worth it. Give it a real try, stay where you can and keep trying as you can. It's taken me 2 months to get a regular schedule on it because i was in such bad shape, but i am making progress. Try it

Centr is a great app with great content. From the workouts to meditation to recipes there is a lot to consume here. I would like to have given it a 5 star rating but there are a few functionality things that are missing. Being able to favorite recipes, having a native function to cast the audio/video within the app, and having a native smart speaker integration as well. It would be great to just say "hey Google, play todays workout from Centr" Thanks for an awesome service!

Provides incredible workouts with a fun group of absolute machines. Massive list of recipes that are pretty easy and tasty. Easy to use app and they are very switched on when it comes to social media response and updates, new content etc. Will definitely be renewing my subscription.

It's a great app! I've used it for about a year now. It makes it easy to follow the program each day and has a ton of great health/fitness/wellness resources. My only complaint is that workouts sometime reset when the screen turns off or after switching between apps

This app isn't that great, the monthly subscription price is ridiculous at $30 if you want to only want to opt for one month. You can get a much better experience from an app that you can pay for one time there are plenty on the Play Store such as progression, home workout, and many other body full body workouts that you can do at home do not pay $30 a month I'm a PT this app is developed by either banking on a celebrity to push it or is designed by a developer using a celebrity to endorse it

The best fitness app and program out on the market. 2016 I started my fitness and health journey, having done several programs. Some good, some bad and at times difficult to follow along. Especially meal plans since they were more of guidelines. Centr has it all, exercise routines easy to follow but challenging. Meal plans, with recipes and tasty plus easy to make. Another step beyond other programs, programs to calm the mind. This again is the best fitness program on the market.

Best planner I've used so far. Meals are actually good, and the ones you don't like or don't work for you (allergies/intolerance/by choice) can be swapped out easily. Lots of options! Workouts are fantastic as well. And I love the meditations.

I really like the app, it's not perfect. But fits my lifestyle well :) upgraded to 1y plan . There are few flaws that I would fix to make it bit more CX and UX centric, would also increase the conversions probably. 7 days free trial is bit short with helping the user to engage more with the app to experience the value of it.

Just got done with my first session of the Centr 6 program. I love how the easy the exercises were to learn and that they had three trainers doing different difficulty levels so everyone can do these workouts! The app is well organized and I found that you don't need equipment to do MANY of the exercises, and they give you tips on things you can improvise with (I used laundry detergent bottles instead of dumbells!) Can't wait to try the meditations and recipes!

The best fitness app around, the training always feels personal and if lacking motivation it pushes you to stick to times and a regimen that suits. As well as all the recipes, classes and mediation it's everything you could need. Has been my salvation during the lockdown.

Amazing app, well thought through, clear exercise programs with easy to follow guides for the odd exercise you've never previously heard of. Haven't tried the meal planning part of the app yet, but I'm sure that will have the same level of polish at the rest of the app. Train like this, need I say anything else 💪!

I really want to like this app, but the full screen video doesn't work properly. You can only see two-thirds of the screen as the timer and page header take up a bit of space, hampering the usability. This is on a Google Pixel 3a.

The Centr program is excellent for exercise, nutrition, and meditation/mindfulness, and the app makes easier to access all the great features. I like the look and organization of the app. I love that the workouts flow seamlessly through warmup to cooldown.

I have exercised on & off for 20 years. The amount of information out there now is mind boggling and often contradictory. This app simplifies everything and takes away the guess work from diet, exercise & recovery. It truly is a must for anyone who wants to improve their health and fitness whatever their goals. The trainers are fantastic & the community is a great place to find support and keep motivated.

I'm really enjoying this app and the overall experience from being a member. The food is delicious, the workout are exactly what I'm looking for as a novice that wants to acieve some real results and the mental health aspects are useful and not at all intrusive. Very happy with Centr!

If you've ever thought that you could get in shape if you had a personal trainer to tell you how to exercise and a nutritionist to pick your food, but you can't afford it: Centr Fit is your answer. The workouts are varied enough to keep them interesting and the menu options are awesome. Also, once you've picked your meals, hit the "Add to List" button and your shopping list for the week is done. I love that each day includes a meditation as well because they know it's not just about your body.

I love it. The workouts are amazing, engaging and challenging. The app itself is very well put together incorporating diet, workouts, meditation and even a grocery list. I highly recommend trying the app. I am in week three and already seeing progress.

I'm in the best shape of my adult life and alot of that is thanks to this app. The workouts are as challenging or easy as you'd like them to be and really get to the point not alot of wasted time. The meals look and taste awesome and they make it really easy to get the stuff in the grocery store. The meditations, the instructors, the meal plan, the programs and the workouts are all awesome and the variety is never ending. I really appreciate having this app.

Best fitness and wellness app !!! The workout programs are awesome, the recipes are delicious and its a program I use daily or a couple of times a week and keep coming back to. It's been over a year now and I still love it ! What I love most is the variety, I never get bored !!

Loving the app. I chrome cast the workouts to the tv so it's easy to view and follow. After a few weeks am already feeling fitter and healthier and already loosing weight. Only negative I've experienced so far is when you unlock the phone the workout restarts so you need to find where you were at.

Variety of programs, almost unlimited nimber of recipes (although the portions are quite large so be aware of that), emphasis on the correct form of exercises.. you can't go wrong with this purchase if you're serious about the exercise.. And I don't write reviews, so..

Best workout app ever! It has great, deliouces, and healthy meals and snacks. Great workouts for any level fitness and not too long. Wonderful, amazing, and helpful meditations for just about everything and given for kids! This app has been the best and most useful app ive ever downloaded, plus it all truely works and is great for your body and mind. Thank you Centr!

It's hard work but the schedual is helping me feel motivated again and I love it. I swear tons during the work out and I feel like Im doing more then I ever have at a gym. The meditation is great as well, has taught me tons about breathing and relaxing and techniques about getting to sleep better. Overall this app is unbelievable for the price you pay, would recommend to anyone looking to try something new

Had it for 9 days. Love the programs and all the small workout options i have. Dan's recipes are excellent and coaches are very clear when describing exercises (i learned english and i understand everything). Workouts are very dynamic and easy to follow. It's a keeper!!!

It's a very good app and the variety means there is something for everyday. I particularly liked the meal ideas. It's excellent for HIIT and functional training. My only issue is the cost. I feel in this market it either has to be low cost or you may as well consider invested in a gym membership, particularly as there are alot of competitors out there.

Best healthy lifestyle app I've ever downloaded and purchased! Only wished that I did it sooner - workouts are challenging and home based friendly. Meals and recipes are easy to follow, minimal fuss, nutritional and delicious - there's always new ones to look forward to each week. My little one loves the sleep visualisation meditations and I find myself using these hidden gems to clear my mind and relax after a long day. Thank you Centr Team!
It's awesome. Definitely get it. The technical stuff is a little annoying sometimes. It automatically pauses the workout if you leave the app and it doesn't number the sets. Besides that it's great.

Fantastic, at home gym or away. I use centr at the gym or when travelling and now at home as well! Varied programs, meal plans and more for a complete health picture. Great comms with the Dev team on feature releases and future updates. Updates to plans, meals, meditation frequently so the app is never stale. My only ask is for some spin classes or running to supplement the already great programs. Update - Jan2021. I have been using Centr now for almost a year, and still loving it!!!

The workouts are making me sore but I can feel some progress (10 days in). The meals have been tasty and have pushed me into new styles and given me something to riff on on my own. A little strange that each instructor has their own way of managing the intervals but once you realize each one has their own style it isn't too distracting.

Love it. I know it's not for everyone but I love the wholefullness of it. I mainly use the meditation/calm sections and the Pilates/yoga workouts. I'll do the occasional rulk or zoc workout and recipe which works for me perfectly. No app glitches on my end with a pixel or nokia. There's a lot of hype because it's Chris Hemsworth but I took it for what it was which for me was a wholesome approach, it's perfect.

I love this app. The time and thought they put into creating it really shows. I love that it's not just about fitness. The recipes they include are easy, great for people with time limits, AND delicious which is hard to come by. My 1 year old loves the food. I always make an extra portion for him.

Great workouts The only draw back is that some programs had the same warm-up and cool down routines which make it boring after 2 weeks. The rest is perfect. Recipes are fantastic and the cool variety of healthy snacks helps to keep your goals.

Pretty good app. A bit too expensive at its full price. Love the holistic approach to fitness and healthy life style. Just an annoying thing, the self guided work outs tend to reset themselves if you swap to another app during the workout. Overall, very good stuff

Thank you, Centr! I've been struggling with my mental health and Centr has stabilised me and kept severe depression/anxiety away. The meals are easy to make, tasty and healthy - amazing for the days when I don't want to eat. The workouts are challenging with options to take it at your own pace - I feel so much better after and they can be done in 30mins. Using the meditations and sleep section, I've had my first full nights sleep in months! I'm comforted and reassured by the friendly Community.

I love the experience so much. The team are great trainers with great techniques. I love the meditation feature, helping me to keep calm and in control in these odd times. Love the recipes and just all round so inspirational and motivational. Everything you could ask for.

The information is there but it's like someone took a workout guide and threw all the pages on the floor. You make your account and then there's no instruction, no guide to how to use the app, no intro video, no explanation to how the program is organized. It's less of a training app and more of a mobile, Hemsworth-backed wiki. It's no more useful than a mindful Google search. Definitely nothing I would pay for.

This app is very effective, it really helps to keep me motivated. Only issue is I can't view the videos without internet. Would be way cooler if I can load the videos whilst online and then play them even when offline. But overall, an awesome app!

It's my third time using an app like this and I have to say it's just a boring way to work out. So much repetition and the meals are like expensive snacks that are tough to find in my climate for an affordable price if at all. Wishing I didn't purchase this cause similar things are free on YouTube. I'm one week into a 6 week program and the fact that it's the same work out schedule for 6 days on repeat for 6 weeks - it's Second week in I'm lacking motivation hard.

Best fitness programme I have ever signed up to. The app is brilliant with all the workouts, recipes and meditations to explore, and a weekly planner. Started in January and 3 months in I am already seeing a noticeable difference in the way my clothes fit. Downloading this app and joining Centr is the best decision I have ever made!

Great App for Getting Into Shape! This App offers a complete Mind, Body and Spirit overhaul. It has great facts to help obtain an overall transformation. The Workouts are diverse, challenging & effective. The meal planner is delicious. The Meditations help to calm my soul. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND it to anyone getting back into a workout routine 😁

I definitely feel more fit and I came into this as someone who regularly exercises. I appreciate the variety of exercises and how I'm being pushed more. My lifestyle and eating habits were in pretty close alignment when I purchased the app and so it hasn't been a stretch for me re: the meals and exercises. I have had 3 knee surgeries so the abundance of HIIT classes has forced me to modify but I've found that to be relative easy. Like the change up as we approach a year of pandemic lockdown.

Phenomenal! I've been a founding member and started this app because of the early discount hoping that it would help with a body transformation but didn't have much faith. Managed to lose 30kgs in 6 months and have completely transformed my lifestyle. Can't do without checking this app throughout the day. Love it! Thank you Centr team and keep up with the amazing work! 💪

I'm 4 months into Centr and loving it !! All the coaches have great energy and a positive presence. Hope to see continuous updates as time goes on and maybe add Chris as a personal coach for one of the workouts at some point ! Edit: They added a workout with Chris in it and it was very intense and fun! Keep the challenging workouts coming ! 💪

Best App I've downloaded. Been in to fitness and tried many different ways to keep fit. A rock climbing injury saw me put for 4 months. But I've been on this app since I was cleared by physio and I'm getting stronger, fitter and healthier. The community is motivating and food delicious. Meditations are relaxing. If you want to improve your fitness, health and general wellbeing I'd recommend this App.

Great app both for exercise and meal planning. The total package. I love there are multiple trainers teaching different workouts - from weight lifting to plyo to yoga. And, watch out for Da Rulk's functional training. That is one hell of a hard workout. For the meal planning, my wife and I have tried multiple meal planning services over the past 10 years. This app is as good as any of them. Lots of variety of meals to choose from, can easily change the number of servings and shopping list.

Really good app for those that need to be pointed in the right direction for exercise and nutrition. Everything is planned out and although I don't always stick with the meals I am more thoughtful about what I eat. The workouts are killer and I'm only doing intermediate. Great app!

I haven't been able to consistently stick with an exercise program until this one. I started out with the 6 week beginners course and its simple to just grab my tablet and yoga pad and hit play. 32 minutes later I'm done. I don't dread the workouts as the coaches are light hearted and the workouts are challenging but not impossible because its all bodyweight. Unfortunately Chris Hemsworth is absent from all workouts, but his trainers do a fantastic job. Its worth the subscription after the trial

The workouts are good, but for an app that seems to be for at home workouts there are a lot of workouts that include things that aren't in the average home: weight bars, benches, full cable machines. It would be nice to have better alternatives to those workouts.

Incredible variety of work outs by top trainers, including different weeks long programs or daily suggestions for training, nutrition, meditation. I am enjoying Centr more and more. Keeps my motivation, my interest, improving my fitness levels, and it is fun! The app itself is a great user experience.
Everytime I have tried to log in the past week it logs me out and will not let me log back in.

Great app. Good workouts. Only 4 stars because it is infuriating that you can't download programmes in advance. Not all of us live and work in high and low-cost Internet areas! And great that we have a shopping list, but would be so nice if you could share to whatsapp so you can share when it's your partners turn to shop!

Very decent app, however there were a few issues i found Firstly. The meals in the food section with the shopping list is way too much work There are ingredients you can rarely find with the recipes and you will spend hours at the shop looking for everything Secondly. In the workouts section during the workouts a few of the excercise alternatives are the same as the previous excercise so you end up over working that one excercise Other than that, a decent app but needs some work

The app doesn't take into account neither your experience, nor your abilities, height, weight. I haven't trained in years, indicated or in the app. The very first workout it suggest, with Hemsworth, that killed me after 3rd exercise I nearly fainted. Sure, he is Thor and he can do that stuff so as many other more athletic guys. But you don't ask 20 bucks per month for completely unpersonalised experience. You can find exercises for free for that matter. App looks nice though 🤷‍♂️

This app has completely changed how I think about health and wellness, and I love it! The workouts are challenging yet exciting; and the recipes are delicious and easy to follow. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great way to switch up their routine or just swap to a healthier, more balanced lifestyle.

I've really enjoyed Centr's tailored fitness schedule. The trainers are great, the workouts are dynamic, interesting and ever changing. The meal plans are great inspiration for me! I just find the app a bit hard to navigate.

Amazing app. Breaks down everything to do with diet, exercise and more which makes working out less of a chore and more of a fun challenge. I'm in the best shape of my life and aim to get better with the use of this app. Also busts the mentality that you have to lift heavy, lift to failure and always push out one last rep to achieve your goals. Work smart, not hard. Can't recommend this app enough.

This app has meditation, different workouts (cardio, boxing, yoga, etc and different professionals to fit your needs), sleep visualizations, and healthy meal plans. This app is great as long you put the work in. Even if you're just in for the meditation for instance, you still get your money worth. I highly recommend it.

Really enjoying the workouts and the structure. Only slight critique is that I personally love variation. Once you've done a week the next week is the same pretty much. It would be so good to have a switch up. But I know that's being picky. Otherwise it's 👌

It is a good app, but the cost doesn't make much sense. Most of the work outs require gym membership / major gym equipment which is impossible in this environment. Then add in the food / meal plan which makes matters worse. 15 minute cook time that requires shopping for ingredients and magically getting it all together while juggling work & kids. Honestly the app actually causes stress more than it does taking it away. I'll give it a month, but it doesnt look promising.

It's a great experience just needs more content some of the workouts are repetitive but I'm a customer. 2nd review i love the app just a few I think I'm gonna like the new program thats coming out as the older I've got the more I need yoga . Listen if I have 1 complaint the music on the other programs suck ! And just one other thing I know you can set your planner up but on self guided days I need to switch that maybe to yoga and I can't and I'm so OCD your great though Love the app!

Amazing fitness app. Excellent meal plans, workouts and well-being section. This app has really helped me improve my diet and I am training harder then ever! The various difficulty levels will be handy for more experienced exercisers and those just starting out. Highly recommend.

Great fitness support, like having a personal trainer! I've done lots of different exercise styles in my life, but I'm particularly enjoying this app! Something about following along and checking off exercises on the phone I find encouraging and I'm motivated to train all the time. I highly recommend this app!

I love it!!! It's giving me so much more strength, flexibility, and agility than i could have ever imagined!! I have so much energy to go about each day with a positive attitude!! My endorphins are at another level because I feel so proud of every challenging circuit I complete!! My body is changing in ways I never thought imaginable and I am beyond happy with this app!! The trainers are so enthusiastic and funny (donuts)! It's well worth the money and the recipes are easy and delicious.

Too advanced. I felt like I already needed to be in good shape. Im over 55 and disabled and there was no way I could handle the exercies. I did like some of the meals but found them out of my budget. And the meditation was a grest idea. Another drawback was the price. It would have been fine if I could pay monthly, but a whole year at a time was out of my limited budget. I do wish you best of luck Chris and your splendid team!

Great app with easy to follow programs that include video descriptions of each exercise. Would be a 5 star app if the timer worked in the background and if the app worked without an internet signal. For the subscription price I would expect these features by default.

Great app, just following the recipes and the workouts I have already lost 5kg in 4 weeks and I have been able to gain muscles, also I'm feeling more energetic during the day. Little feedback advice: If you can introduce a "list of favourite workout" it would be fantastic. I always need to go through the workouts to find the one I wanted. Thanks a lot

One of the most well-rounded fitness apps out there! The workouts are varied, and you can increase/decrease the level of difficulty based on your goals. The food is nutritious, and the cooking instructions are clearly stated. The meditations bring a much appreciated moment of peace, and the community you gain access to is encouraging and supportive. The only reason this is not a 5 star review is due to the absence of a chromecast feature (which I'm sure will come). Otherwise, it's perfect!

Very good app, great workouts, some great recipes, and great meditations. It is rather pricy but definitely worth it. Works best if you have a schedule to give yourself enough time to prepare meals and complete the workouts. Overall a great app and great lifestyle.

Been using this app for about 2 and a half weeks and I love it. It is such a well rounded fitness app and totally worth it. The recipes are great and so easy, love that it has a shopping list I can use. I haven't lost weight but I lost 1 inch in my waist and 1 inch in my thighs after just the first week. Loving this app.

I've been using this app for 3 months now and have lost a total of 26 pounds so far. I'm not quite to my goal yet (another 22 lbs) but I have put on a lot of muscle and look and feel much healthier than I have ever felt before. I've never been confident in how I've looked before, but this app has turned that right around. The workouts are definitely not easy, but you can feel yourself being able to do just a little bit more each week.

Worth every penny! I work full time in healthcare and take care of an active toddler with another kid on the way any day now. Needless to say carving out the time for a full fitness routine is a struggle. Thankfully Centr takes care of all the planning and tells you EXACTLY what to do and how to do it with an incredibly easy to use interface. They even get your kids involved with some of the activities. I've been at it 30 days now and def notice an improvement in muscle gain and overall health.

I can't really rate this app as I didn't get to actually do any of the workouts. Not many options for the payment plans, either pay £23/monthly and end up paying £276/year or choose the £94 12months plan which has to be paid all at once. Ill agree it still works out cheaper monthly than most gym memberships but still gutted the payment plans are so rigid. I'd heard so many good things about centr workouts and I was really looking forward to working out with this app.

Could use the function to download workouts and programs. My undergound gym has no mobile phone signal whatsoever so the self guided option doesn't help. Hope this will be implemented in the future. Otherwise very happy to continue my subscription for this excellent fitness app which includes meal plans. Has a big library of workouts from weightlifting to boxing to yoga so there's a lot of variety on offer. Excited for the new workout program starting soon.

This is a Great app for a workout at home or the gym. I love all the different options you have for workouts and i can keep my workouts interesting and not get burned out. The meditation is a huge bonus! My girls love the ones for kids and i do a meditation daily ♡ And all the food is delicious! This app is amazing and very well thought out.

Incredible fitness tool. The daily plan is nice and varied and offers up some great recepies and workouts. I do wish they included some suspension training / trx workouts as these are great for at home or on the road. Also wish that when following a programme that it would add that into your daily planner. Well worth the subscription though.

This is the best app i have tried so far and ive tried alot. The app auto loads your workouts and meals every day based on goal and experience. Dont like a meal theres a button to swap it out. You just check off everything in your planner and your done for the day. The meals rely on real food not supplements. It will also create a shopping list based on your week of meals. Big family np, just increase the servings and the recipe and shopping list increase.

This app is perfect! It has helped me eat healthier while still always feeling full and my old cravings have vanished. The shopping list they put together is the cheapest list I've ever had. I am stronger, happier, healthier. This is by far and away more than I ever expected and I have never been happier to be a part of this team of legends!

Amazing food, brilliant workouts (for all abilities),Great articles/podcasts/meditations. Easy to use with great save/swap feature. A brilliant online support community and an App team who really engages with and listens to users. I love love love this, wouldn't be without it x

It may just be the center 6 program but it looks like the trainers only do 2 rounds, the set up round and the second round and then that is repeated for the other 4. It would be nice to see them do the full workout. 👍

Thumbs up for finally developing the Android version. The app is fluid and easy to navigate. It could be better if the app had an offline mode where you could download videos to your device. Isn't the idea of this app to work out anywhere possible?

Great app. I, personally never realised how effective it was to have a personal trainer/coached workout. Made a big difference to my motivation and I'm now feeling fitter. So many coaches and options to choose, meaning this app suits all! Personal favourites were Michael the boxer(tuesday) and Luke's hitt strength (Monday)! Also really enjoyed the video with Luke and Chris Hemsworth doing a bonus workout! Recommend highly!only issue is how complex some meal's are therefore hard to obtain.

Great lifestyle app. I open it 3 - 5 times a day and have certainly noticed a difference in my level of fitness (I generally keep a pretty healthy diet and also worked out regularly prior to signing up for centr). I have a few wishlist items for the app, but its core purpose is certainly achieved.

I'm very impressed by the content this app has to offer. It has various training programs that target every part of the body. Programs are included that require weight and there's also several workout programs that are all bodyweight exercises. This app is ideal whether you prefer to work out at home with limited equipment or at the gym where equipment is provided. Several meal plans are included as well, and there's even a section for meditation. Clearly the developer cares about the customer.

Really love this app, super user friendly, has a HUGE variety of workouts from trainers, to type of class, duration of class, and level of difficulty. The meals are delicious and as a mom I appreciate how they are so family friendly. I honestly recommend this app to as many people as I can.

Pretty comprehensive app with meal plan, workout routines for both physical and mental wellness. Great for anyone beginner, experienced or advanced when it comes to personal fitness. Seeing results already in two weeks on the muscle growth program. Listen to the trainers, they are great at coaching form to prevent injury and maximize the routine! Would definitely recommend if your goals are to lose weight or gain muscle!

I'm loving this app... the work outs really get you going, I added cardio to get my heart rate in and then jump into the workout. If you don't have the equipment use alternatives... ( gallons, towels, jugs) for me I used my bowling ball 10lbs, 12lbs and a 14lbs for advancement... not there yet I'm in between beginner and intermediate. Keeping this app after the trial!

Only one advanced programme. The voice overs for each exercise are very repetitive and outputting after the 3rd or more times. The concept is good, instruction clear and it's definitely a sweaty workout but not enough in the red zone for me

Centr is a great workout program and space. It focuses on a holistic approach with not only solid work outs, but also mediations, recipes, smoothies and snack suggestions. Child meditations have just been added which is ideal for any parents seeing a chaotic amount of there loved ones. The program is what I looked forward to in my 2 weeks of isolation and it kept me motivated. Having 3 main instructors (a couple more pop up none but are Chris Hemsworth) makes if feel slightly more social.

I like the variety of routines and trainers available to me. I really enjoy the different 6 week programs they have launched. The meditation and wellness posts are helpful. The menus are always interesting and healthy but not boring.

The app design and interface are well-done! Simply easy to navigate around. The daily planner for exercise and meals is fantastic, it provides a discipline for to get me exercise everyday from the comfort of my home. For mummies, this app is the one!

So easy to use! I love the combination of workouts, food planner and meditation... Truly a whole health approach to fitness. Workouts are so varied, easy to swap, and I am able to fit in 30 min (or less) every day. I am currently loving the Centr 6 workouts!! The recipes are easy to change and are delicious. Loving the meditations...the mental component is often overlooked in most fitness programs. Overall, simple, well rounded and inspiring! What more could you want!

Love the App particular how you can mark off all your progress day by day while also adding all your food to the shopping list. Love the meditation and sleep parts also. Only issue I have found is the weight lifting. It seems like very little as it only had me doing two excercise across 5 sets. Would be worried that this isn't enough. The nutritional side as well although the meals are good, it took no input of my current weight and goal weight to calculate calories. Keen for feedback

Great all around fitness app. You get more than what you're paying for and dven if you only use one of the features is so worth it. This helped me get back to exercise because they're fast, easy workouts for all types of goals. Couldn't recommend it more

I thought that this app was a great way for me to try and bulk up my body. Definitely made me feel like I was striving for a new me. I only wish that this app would track your weight and do some before and after photos. Or it could definitely make some monthly or weekly progress notifications. Other than that. This app is definitely great. 👍

An option for multiple sessions in a day would be nice. I'm doing yoga in the morning and a workout at lunch but I can only record 1 session. Also a weekly view of the food menu would be nice for when planning the week. Loving the app!!

You've got to stick with it (no pain no gain!) but I don't regret getting this app. It's kept me motivated and I've tried workout styles I've never even thought about before and found real improvement! If you're serious about using the app and getting the most from it, I would recommend it. Hope you all reach your goals! Have fun!

Good so far, enjoy the meal plans and workouts. Have had a recurring issue where the meals portion sizes are poorly planned and end up with far less food than it would take to feed me and my partner for 4 serves as we have set the ingredients to. Also the shopping list has ommited certain items from recipes and instead told us to get things we don't need (i.e no mention of coconut cream for the Dahl we were having that night, yet it told us to buy 8 eggs which were not needed.)

99.9% love this app and every thing it offers. My .1% is only that I can't go out of the app to access other apps during my rest periods. When I do that in the middle of a guided workout it loses my progress in that workout and restarts the workout when I open the app again.

I love this app. The workouts have made bigger and faster improvements in my body than any other program I've done (and I've done several). I also love the huge variety of recipes that satisfy many styles of eating. AND the meditations put me right to sleep!!

App is easy to use. Never had a problem with it. Love the exercise programs and amount of daily info. Only frustration is sometimes there isn't a modification of a harder exercise, other then that very happy!

Constant new workouts and a great variety of levels. It has decent alternate exercises and a great meal plan. My only wish is to be able to add more than one workout to the daily planner. It lets you swap workouts, but sometimes I wanna add a workout to a certain day.

So easy to get started with the coached workouts, planner and programmes, then build in the nutrition over time. Fits in easily to my gym visits and it's great to see the steady results I've been getting over time. I like that there is a wide variety of disciplines so I can switch to be things as I progress.

I'm giving this app a 3 star rating because it does not have the ability to switch out or add in workout movements, you can't log anything no charts or graph to see previous week of lifting. There are good things about this tho, recipes are nice meditations, sleeping visualization are nice but the workout are just not there exactly if I renew my subscription I would like see some more thing added to the Centr app.

Loving the workouts! Would be great to have a "save for offline" option to use when no internet connection is available. I work out at sea a lot so can only use the app when close enough to land to get cell/mobile service.

The workouts are so varied and there are so many. I never get bored. The meal plans are AMAZING. Just that justifies the price of the subscription to me. I can focus on Yoga for weeks and then switch to Pilates or weight training. I can follow along with one of the programs or just follow the default plan. It's the best app I've ever used to make healthy eating and getting exercise part of my lifestyle. It would be nice to be able to search for meals with a specific ingredient as a query

confusing at the start if you've no experience. Takes a while to catch on. Lots of options for fitness, recipes, meditation and mental wellness. Absolute best thing is the access to a private Facebook community. Amazing! Motivation, encouragement, support in a non-judgmental atmosphere. Try on a free trial if offered.

Awesome App!!! I seriously love this, it makes working out from home a lot more fun and easy. Also the recipes are amazing. If you want to still eat your guilty pleasure foods then they have those recipes but with healthy versions!! I have been using this app for a week now and and already feel better and have more energy. I am also sleeping better with night time meditation. Get this app, seriously you will never regret it

Varied work outs with different instructors keep in interesting. Also, an appropriate pace and intensity for beginners or someone trying to get back in shape. Experienced video streaming issues for the first time today though...hope its not something that will persist.

Great workout and lifestyle platform. Plenty of workout choices so your workout never feels repetitive. Love how they adapted to gym closures by introducing low/no equipment workouts in the planer. Meditations and very helpful and meals look very tasty. Only wish they let you filter meals by excluding foods you don't or can't eat.

Everything you'd ever want in one app! Varied workouts depending on your fitness level. Meals for all types of diets with a handy shopping list. Meditation & tips and tricks, it has everything. And it's easy to use!

Great app it has help me be active during the lockdown a bit pricey imo but I paid it anyways. A criticism that I have is that my workout plan has a lot of workouts evolving shoulders and traps almost daily evolving those muscles. Don't get me wrong they look amazing but I would like more variety like more biceps and others. Fortunately you can swap workouts if it feels too repetitive.

Loving this app. Not only does it give a variety of exercises at differing levels and different aspirations, but it also give fantastic menus and meditations along with blogs on different health related topics. Its a fantastic holistic view on well being.
