Been doing the plan for just 2 weeks. Already lost 14lbs. Looking forward to continuing to get in shape and eat better. Great variety in exercises and meals. Foods delicious too. Wish there was suggested snacks on the plan to fill in any needed vitamins or to give you energy/muscle recovery.

This is nice and informative. I think overall it's a good app, but if you looking for a tailored program with more weights involved and structured meal plan and direction this app is not the one. I think this is a really helpful app for beginners who are just starting out.

Amazing, started losing the stubborn fat around my waist in no time. There are an insane amount of workouts that you can swap to, and each one is different and keeps things interesting. I love that most of the workouts require little equipment, so you can do them at home. Well worth the money!

Great for everything. It has the programs for every pathway and the options to explore or mix up your workouts. On top of the top tier workouts, you have awesome nutrition which taste awesome with meditation and great mental insightful articles. Best app and i feel awesome 👌

I love that the workouts are coached and you have the trainers cheering you on the whole time! I started Centr 6 and I'm on my last week. The program is amazing and I cannot wait to start the next one on May 18th. I also love that they have so many recipes on the app and they're all different but amazing. This has to be my favorite workout app and the trainers have a sense of humor during the workouts too which makes it much more fun to complete. I rarely rate any app but this was a must!

Fantastic fitness program, varied, achievable and see results pretty quickly. Love the additional things like meditation and recipes too. Removed half a star as would be great if you could Chromecast the self guided workouts from within the app the same as you can the coached ones.

Centr is comprehensive exercise program that makes it easy to start and maintain a healthy lifestyle. They have a variety of workouts and trainers suited for any fitness goal. Their nutritional program has a wide variety of recipes that are easy, delicious and original. I definitely recommend it!

Do not forget to cancel your free subscription. They will take as much as they can from you, if you forget and won't give you it back! Terrible customer service skills. Pre recorded videos, no personal interaction. Just the same people doing shortened down videos.

Great app, flexible, well structured (love da rulk sessions, keeps my lower back pain away) and cheap. Hubby uses it too. Snack recipes are yummy. I recommend paying A LOT of attention to correct posture and to keep core engaged at all times (ex-pilates fan here). Overall pretty good!

Just downloaded the app today and everything is going smoothly, seems amazing! I like how the entire monthly plan is laid out for you so I can prep meals in advanced. Following everything is simple and no hassle. One issue of mine is that I want to loose belly fat but to also gain muscle. I don't know what to choose as my workouts and my goal and its a little annoying as I'm stuck. I will write another review after my 1 month to see how things went.

This app has me excited to be in the gym again! I love the variety in workouts and trainers the the option to step it up or slow it down in each session. The recipes, meditations, and articles are a huge bonus and you can't beat the centr team and community!

There is a great variety of programs for all fitness levels. I have young children so I like the programs that take less time so I can achieve a full workout whenever I get the chance. I also really love all the snacks and meals within the app. I've made a few so far and they're a hit with the whole family. Well done to all involved.

Enjoying it heaps so far! Some constructive feedback that I'm sure more users will appreciate: it would be great to have the option to lower the volume; I personally enjoy listening to podcasts or music while I exercise.

The App that keeps giving and is so much more than just a workout app. It's straight forward to use and follow. The programmes are varied and all first class. The meal selection keeps growing with loads of tasty options that are customisable. Great blogs and articles to read.

I've used this app sporadically since its release and it's been very helpful. Most of the workouts have a duration of 30 min, perfect for a busy lifestyle. Meals are great, as are the meditation readings. Love the raport and banter between the trainers. Downside: when used daily, it can get a tad repetitive (inc banter) although they often release new content. I'd recommend Centr to have at least one trainer release a new workout every week (Luke!) Or mix up existing recordings like F45.

Warning - charged me for an extra year when wanted to cancel. When you cancel you do not get any confirmation. I noticed that they charged me for another year and contacted them the next day. I was told that they will do nothing because they did not have that I cancelled before an have a strict policy. Now I am stuck paying for another year when I thought I had cancelled and had uninstalled the app months before it renewed.

Unable even to create a trial account and get past setup screens - just a cutesy "sorry we dropped a dumbbell" error message. Support, if you're reading this, don't bother with a reply. This does not bode well for a paid app; I've already uninstalled.

It is a good start. A lot of room for improvement. I should be able to add notes to recipes that can be saved. Being able to relate recipes would be welcomed as well. Self-guides workouts should allow for substitutions and be able to track them.

Daily challenges that keep me moving and interested..I'm at the advanced level and still feel like I am and still can improve. Fantastic menu planning, meditations, and well being articles. The community is supportive and helpful.

Unbelievable app. I can't fault it at all. It has everything you need in one app. The workouts are varied and challenging and the food has so much flavour. I used to workout alot doing the same week in week out. Never done Pilates or yoga before but love incorporating them into weekly sessions. Keep up the good work.

Tasty meals ( some very strange ingredients in some) - download able meals would be useful Good workouts ( could do with some slightly more toned down for complete beginners) Easy to use app (good layout) Only thing that will hold you back is your own motivation... All in all great app

I love everything this app has to offer. So many choices of workouts, with and without equipment. The meditation choices are abundance too. Recipes are simple to follow, quick and easy plus creates a shopping list too. I've lost 3 kilos so far and I am enjoying Centr to the max.

I love everything about this easy to use app the programs are designed for all abilities and strengths the very yummy and realist food recipes options designed around Australian seasonal availability... 😋🤤 Great work team I talk this up to everyone and haven't had any bad experiences reported back!

This has been a great at home workout for me and my daughter. All of the exercises are doable at home and the programs keep us on track. We have both seen incredible results in terms of strength and energy level as well as weight loss. I highly recommend Centr to anyone of any fitness level.

Best fitness app so far. Well structured training sessions catering to different range of fitness. Coaches are the best always fun to exercise with! That aside, there is a big community who is always encouraging and loveing and backing each other! Can't ask for more right!

Been using this app since autumn 2020, initially using as a way to keep moving through the multiple lockdowns. Cannot compliment the content enough. Great trainers, great programs, good looking meals and most importantly, the most supportive community of fellow #legends from each corner of the globe.

In an inside world, this is really good to keep track of goals and always have that daily workout to look forward to. The vegan cooking options are tops. This app is more than it's advertised. Good vibes.

Riddled with bugs. App constantly crashes. Everything resets when turning phone around. Sounds stupid but you paying for an app by a hemsworth but no where to be seen in any training videos i watched or routines so if your after it for that purpose don't bother.

I used the 7 day free trial and it was a surreal experience with the app and i made some solid progress I never thought be possible my issue is if it would be possible to have a free version with some obvious limitations for those who cannot afford the monthly or yearly plan such as myself but other than that an amaizing app keep up the good work

Third week in and I'm enjoying the app alot. For someone who was always lost in the gym and wasn't sure where to begin with workouts and meal plans, this app is definitely helpful. My goal is to build muscle and gain weight and I am already seeing results. The only negative I have so far is you don't have the ability to pre-download the guided workouts in order to save data and this app eats alot of data. I had to take screenshots of the workouts and then log my results once I have wifi.

I've been struggling with getting myself to get in shape since highschool. I wasn't comfortable being lanky with no tone. I started using Centr in about July of last year. Couldn't have been a better decision. I love the programs and workouts and love the progress I've made mentally and physically. This app is the greatest.

Hard but also informative. I like the different levels and that if I'm not feeling like a hard workout, I can change to a different one and still feel happy I did something. The recipes tastes so good. The challenges are fun. I like all the trainers too

Be careful to check their billing and subscription terms and conditions. I was unknowingly locked into an ongoing annual subscription after paying 12 months up front. I was no longer using the service but got charged without warning. I realised within 24 hours, but they REFUSED to issue a refund

Great app, awesome workouts, fantastic meal plan, great interface, super cool program. I took 1 star because when I put im female I don't get as much weight training like I love, it's super expensive and I can't listen to my music while I workout. But definitely in top 3 Fitness Apps. I love it

It's everything the advertising suggests. If you're like me and been out of the gym for a while or wandered around the gym lost without a routine this is the app for you. It gives you direction, details of what you'll be doing and why as well as a nice meal guide (though I find myself straying from it quite often.) I did the 7 day trial and found it so helpful I decided to commit for the year and I haven't missed a workout yet. Try it, you won't regret it.

Really bad customer service. I went to cancel two days before expiry but their system was not working and every time I went to the subscription section, it took me back to the main page. I emailed their support team, and they got back to me on the day of renewal and charged me $119. When I queried thus they refused to refund me!

Nearly two years into using this app consistently. Has changed my life for sure. Never felt this energetic. Have enjoyed the different workout options available and they keep updating the workouts which keeps the workouts fresh. Highly recommended.

I recently downloaded this app for Victorias second wave of lock down. It's been awesome to have pre-planned workouts I can do with my housemates. I am currently doing the 6 week intermediate programme. My only criticism is the repetition of the warm up and warm downs. I would expect for the price that they would be mixed up a little. 6 weeks of the same warm up and cook down is kind of a drag.

I had to stop using this app due to health issues. I had paid for an annual subscription but hadn't used it for about 6 months when I noticed a new charge on my credit card for the subsequent year. I contacted Centr immediately to let them know I didn't want to renew for the year yet they said that were unable to refund the subscription, leaving me out of pocket $130 for a service I am unable to use. Legal but immoral and I'm super disappointed to say the least.

I enjoy the variety of workouts styles you can get in this app. Also the recipes are enjoyable. The only thing I wish was there was some way to check progress or set some goals like do at least three workouts for a week for the next month or so

Great workout+ app. Doing just the standard set up has given me great results in an easy to follow program. Changes every three weeks or so and the scaling is great. I've only scratched the surface and it's been worth the premium cost

Lots of helpful tools: healthy recipes that you can import directly to a grocery list, swappable (and modifiable) exercises & recipes, etc. Several trainers with different workout and coaching styles, different equipment levels, etc. Note: Some of the recipe ingredients are a little bougie, but can be substituted (ex: "tuna in spring water" is just 'tuna in water' for those of us who can't afford to shop at whole foods all the time).

I have been using this app for over a month now and I love it. We have tried other apps that are similar to this one but this one wins hands down. Plenty of variety to choose from, depending on what you want to target. And they just keep improving it with new workouts. Now they have included palates and yoga to choose from in addition to all the other options. I really don't like to pay for an app but this one is worth every penny plus it really is not that expensive for everything you get.

I've been using Centr for more than a year. I find the coached training programs are easy to follow and have challenged myself to do the beginner, intermediate and then advanced for each program. Still working through them and still engaged. It was very good during Covid-19 Lockdown.

Best fitness app on the planet! Don't pass it by thinking it's a celebrity vanity project - Centr is far and away the best fitness app I've ever used. 1. The workouts are challenging but work and adjust to all fitness levels. 2. Deliciou recipes galore! 3. Meditations! 4. Useful blog posts! 5. An ever expanding selection of programs for any fitness goals! 5. And saving the best for last: An amazing group of coaches who will challenge and motivate you every step of the way!

A week and a half into the beginner program, and 8 years back pain is suddenly more manageable, sometimes non-existent. It hasn't been easy, but following the program and meal plan have already yielded so many positive benefits, more than any exercise I've done in the past. The trainers are very positive and encourage you to push yourself, but never to the extent that some of the extremists out there take it. I wake up sore the next day, but I can feel my body getting stronger.

I've been using this app for going on a year and besides some small things I'd like to see such as substitutions in recipes and not being able to challenge friends like on other fitness apps. It has been great for trying new ideas for eating and working out. 10/10 recommend to try it

Generally one of the better fitness apps... But joining a program has no effect on the daily planner. The recommended workout isn't the day's workout from the program, and when you go into the program there's no way of knowing what day you're up to if you've skipped a day and lost track. They're disconnected. Having joined a program I'd expect that to be the main part of my plan.

Excellent and well thought out app! Have been using it for about 3 months and I have been losing 5kg ever since I started! The meditation and sleep visualization portion is very helpful to the mental health as well! Highly recommended!

I got the app for free trial. I canceled one day late and had 3 months charged. I wrote them at that to ask for reimbursement of all or at least 2 months. I lost my job 2 days later due to the pandemic. I wrote them again and asked for reimbursement of $65 because I needed it now to pay bills etc. Never heard back.

Loving this! Ive been using the free Nike work out and run apps for a year or so. Ive really enjoyed them but what i prefer about this one is there is a program of short 30min daily classes that gives me motivation to work out regularly. Its not just a chain of exercises either its like a proper guided class. The sleep visualisations and meditations are also great. My son loves the kids ones to wind down too. I havent tried the food yet.

First time using and it only went as far as trying to set a password, one that obviously met the criteria and the field was set to invalid like if it expected 8 characters long passwords with only 1 uppercase and 1 number with no proper explanation as to why it's invalid. This absolutely ridiculous.

Love the app! Currently attempting the centr 6 program just completed day 4! Killer workouts but worth it! Me and my family love the app for the workouts as well as the recipes and meditations and articles. I don't think theres an app similar that has all the features centr has and I've tried many before but never stuck until I found centr! Would recommend to anyone!

Love this app! I am really enjoying the coached workouts and finding them very motivating. Each time I do a workout/yoga flow I feel so accomplished. It's always something new and different which keeps it fresh. I can do so much without equipment just being at home, it's great. I think the meditations are an excellent idea and my kids love joining in. Especially with 4 small kids, not having a gym membership or lots of free time, the workouts are achievable. I'm loving Centr!

Easy to use and the 6 week programme has been perfect at motivating me to increase my exercise. Great instructions and low impact options available as required. Only downside is kick sits :-) I still can't get the hang of those things.

Did Google really just remove my previous review? Lol! Ok I'll write another. App doesn't work as it won't even let me sign up. I get to the password phase and enter one that meets the criteria and nothing. Keeps saying it failed to create an account. You'd think that would be a simple fix and no auto response by this developer, I will not email your help team to resolve this. I shouldn't have to email your support team for you to fix your app.

I'm in love with Centr! This app has everything you need to reach your fitness goals. They have beginner, intermediate and advanced levels for losing weight, getting fit and toned, and building muscle. They have an amazing food program, they also talk about the importance of stretching and proper sleep, very well rounded, the online community is incredibly supportive and positive. I've been doing Centr6 (a program within Centr) and I noticed improvements within the 2nd week. Highly recommended.
Everything is awesome... I like that the videos give an alternative if you have limited equipment. I wish there were an option to save your favorite workouts and exercises and meals.

A few weeks in and I feel that I'm getting stronger and my cardio is increasing. I wish this app was on roku so I could use this on my TV instead of my phone but that's not really a big deal. Just throw on the Bluetooth headphones and put in the work.

The missus and I like this app very much the centr 6 experience was easy to get motivation to complete the workouts with the simple layout and sence of progression that we got from ticking the day's workout off and unlocking the next day. We kept up the whole time and we've gotten so much fitter because of it! Chur mr hemsworth your trainers are the best.
Honestly brilliant. But need a way to save recipes and workouts!!!! Pleaseeee. Some people may also miss a way to log workouts. But this is by far the best all-in-one fitness app without a doubt.

Awesome!! A CLASS apart!! It's the best workout/fitness app I have experienced. The coaches are fantastic!! Diets so doable and delicious too! This one's got a chip on the shoulder! Also I looovvveeee their meditation/sleep visualisations..works for me!!

Nice features but sections get cut off too soon. Feels like the segment isn't done before it just cuts off so has an impersonal feeling sometimes. An irritation is that the segment goes into warm up as soon as you start not giving you time to put your phone down before having to start working. Also it should give you the option to cast before you start. You have to start, then cast, so you've already missed some time. Then you pause it to cast & it unpauses again. Should stay paused till ready

Great workouts, great meal plans, lots of variation, mental health elements are great also . Won't ever be a 5 star service until they provide an offline mode for at least your shopping list and your workouts of the day. Not everyone has access to good signal or WiFi all the time.

This is an amazing app,took a second to get into it but I love how each day is set up with a new work out and a meal plan for the day for the whole week depending on what your goal is. I have been dopey doing the centr6 program and can feel the difference. I will admit I would love to see more of these workout programs each based on a goal like a cardio program to make you faster or one to bulk up. It would be cool to see diet programs too like, transitioning to vegetarian or a body cleanse diet

Brilliant app. The self guided and video tutorials are so good and really help with keeping the motivation. Love that you can see the time bar and the sessions are broken down into activity and rest periods. Easy to use.

Best training app I've ever used! Food options are absolutely brilliant, delicious and really easy to prepare. Great Vegan plan with loads of variety. The most sustainable plan I've been on and I've got my mum onto it too! Loads of workouts - they're funny, quick, effective and keep you engaged. You won't be disappointed 😀

The app is amazing, great workouts, helpful planner, and fantastic options for everyone. The one downside is the nutrients part of it is made for quite expensive plates for a lower to moderate income household. Options for different budget price meals would be great.

Absolutely amazing app, it will give you meal ideas where you can choose how many portions do you want and it will create shopping list for you. You can follow one of six weeks programs or you can do coached or self-guided training. It offers mindfulness sessions as well so it will train your body from inside out.

Incredible and life changing, I've seen such amazing results from the varied and fun workouts. The recipes are delicious too and it's full of information and tips and motivation. I'm 6 months post baby number 2 and in great shape and have fitness and strength, all thanks to this amazing app. Worth every cent.

This offers so many options, everything from HIIT exercises to boxing to meditation and yoga to meal prep. I love that you can switch things out and add recipes to a shopping list. It's hard to swallow paying for a year up front but that choice definitely gives the beet value.

Awful. I am furious, there is no communication from the app when payments are going to be taken, it's difficult to unsubscribe from the app, and they refuse to cancel an unwanted subscription and provide a refund, even on exactly the 12 month mark. I now have just been charged $100 I don't have for this awful app for another 12 month period. Absolutely terrible customer service and manipulative app. Terrible parasitic business model. Do not join it, you're being robbed.

Very hard but each day is so rewarding and getting though it makes you feel so good for doing something so great for yourself. I am a mum of two and have not done any exercise in the last 6 years but the beginners program has been developed gradually and its only been 2 weeks but my body and my husbands are starting to take shape. Our clothes are fitting so much better. We are looking forward to completing our 6 weeks and moving onto the intermediate program.

Had it for three weeks now, enjoying the workouts the way they mix it up. The meal plans would have to be my favourite and the easy shopping list. Only think it's lacking is an ability to record your weights.

Great platform in general. Super fun and engaging community. I personally don't really use half of the content (sticking to some specific workout types, yoga and meditations) but even then there is so so much content on there you definitely get your money's worth! Would recommend.

This has been a very easy straight forward app to easy. Good motivation, great exercise and a heaps tasty recipie menu. Like all fitness and health based life choices you only get out of this what you put in. If you do the work, it will deliver.

Absolutely love Centr! The amount of exercises and guided recipes makes this one of the more easily navigated fitness programs around. Been with it a bit now and can't wait for more programs to come because Centr 6 has been stellar so far! I also love how everything is adjustable to your fitness level as well.

First time using it. I run, swim, weight lift and ruck run. I would consider myself fit. But I'm trying to lean down and wanted to give this app a go. Great first day. I broke a sweat like crazy and actually had to use my will power to work. I hope to see what else the workouts bring. Great challenge and love the option to self guide or get coached. And the styles of workouts make it convenient for this time in our world. Thank you.

Love the routines, they're 10/10. The workouts are diverse and frequently switch things up to keep things fresh. They are straightforward, and have really taught me how to properly work out. Some QOL changes I would like to see: -Allow me to veiw and browse other routines during my workout, I have to quit my workout right now to veiw others -Give examples of the required tempo for workouts in the preview video. I'm new to specific tempo during workouts, and this would be very beneficial Thx! 💪

Best workout app I've personally used. Ya it's not free but you get what you pay for. Picked it up and haven't put it down. Also has a ton of delicious meals for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and the bonus snacks to help keep you on track to achieve your goals.

Great experience but very limited device pairing. Please allow Fitbit to pair with this app. It's a pain to have to sync Google Fit to Fit to Fit.. then Fit to Fit to Fitbit (tonguetwister!) just to have my data show up on Fitbit. I dont carry my phone while using the app (since I'm watching the trainers) to track all of my steps while exercising, so it would definitely be helpful if you allowed it to pair to Fitbit or other devices.

This is the best fitness app! Been on it for a year and still love it. It has a good variety of different styles of workouts from yoga, pilates, weight lifting, HIIT and much more. There's meal planning, meditation and tools/advice with helpful, healthy information. And the fitness coaches are awesome! Really inspiring, fun and they push you to be your best.

First exercise app that gives you everything for a reasonable price. Meal plans generate into a shopping list and they leave past recipes to be used as well. Workouts are fun and easy to follow. The community is great as well.

Great fitness app. With an amazing range of workouts. Also love the guided meditatios. However it would be great to integrate with better AI tracking to measure progress. Also the vegan recipes aren't that varied or tasty.

Great exercises for users of all levels. Amazing recipes (which you can swap if you don't like the reccomendated one) from a selection of diet restrictions. Additional bonus features like fitness challenges and meditation. Everything from bodyweight circuits, weight lifting, yoga, functional strength movements. User friendly.

I decided that I needed to get back to my fitness. To feel better about myself, and to make every day activities feel less of a strain on my body. I've always had back troubles, and with the mixture of core, cardio and strength training offered! I feel amazing! Only on my second week of the beginners program. Paid for the year so I can carry on week in week out. A few times a week after my session I go for a run, and each time I feel better and manage a better distance/ time.

Got it free with Amex during lockdown and was sceptical but it's genuinely excellent. The programmes are brilliant, the coaches extremely likeable and entertaining and there's a good mix of different types of workouts. Signed up for another year!

I downloaded this app specifically to try the mediation section. I have been having sleep issues, so I tried the Starry Sleep audio. It was really good. I was relaxed and asleep quickly. Chris should definitely consider doing more of these. Now, due to the cost I probably won't keep the app. Hopefully in the future the app will be more ala cart.

Work outs are fantastic and the rage is brilliant. I love the meditations and extended library. The team are great at responding to questions too. The food is a bit alternate for the average working family with kids. I was also a little disappointed at one of the responses I received to a program question but it was understandable for the price and generic nature of the program.

This is the best workout program I have ever done! It has everything you need: workout planner, nutrition plan, meditations, sleep visualizations, informational articles, an amazing community on FB, the trainers are very interactive and a shopping list within the app. Its literally everything you need in a workout program!

Excellent starting point to get you back on form. The work outs are roughtly 30min long you can choose the intensity and if you want to do this with ot.r without equipment which makes it perfect for home or gym sessions. What I like best is the centr program which picks the exercises for you as if you have a personal trainer at home. Really got me back into liking exercise n feeling stronger

I absolutely love this app, it's so easy to use and the coaches are amazing. I really look forward to working out everyday, even after my night shifts, the meals are amazing too, I am trying new things everyday and love the way I feel. This app and those behind it, have really helped me change my mindset when it comes to working out and how I see food. 10/10 would recommend.

This app is great! I really like the 6 week workout programs and the meal planning! I wish there were more half hour muscle building workouts but the 50 min ones are great. Just a bit harder to fit into my day. Overall, this is easily the best workout app that I've tried!

For some reason I am unable to select one of the subscription options right at the start. It registers the input but nothing happens even after reinstalling or even restarting my phone. I really want to give this app a shot.

Love this app, the range of exercise styles and the programs means I never get bored. The recipes are awesome, and are now some of my favorite things to cook. And the meditations are a great little stress reliever in the middle of the work day.

Best Fitness and Health app ever! This is the longest and most consistent I have ever stuck to a fitness regime. Great range of exercise and programs. The recipes are incredible useful as well and have helped immensely with the weekly shopping list.

This program has helped me to stay motivated and concentrated! The different workouts have also helped me to become stronger and change the boring repetition of working out at home. Perfect app, I continuously speak so highly about this app to colleagues, family and friends. Well done

I've never been one for online workouts, but this program is fantastic. As a mum, I love the bite sized work outs are perfect for nap times and use minimal equipment. The planner is great, not only for delicious, quick meals but the shopping list really minimises our food waste. Knowing what meals are coming up also reduces my mental load and life admin so I can focus on what's important.

Great app with lots of go to features. Do wish all workouts included warm-ups and cool downs in each video instead of having to go back to explore for appropriate cool down. Also, please make app available on Roku.

Seemed really good, sad that you have to pay the subscription in one lump fee. Makes things difficult during these times. Had to uninstall. Great quality app from what i experienced, highly satisfied in the diversity of workouts.

Centr is motivational and exceptional! I just completed the 6 week program and I didnt think I could do it after the first week. I kicked my heels in and did it! Now I am using the meditations and daily workouts to end and start my day. I wish the meals were a little simpler for a college students budge though.

I love how this app is shaping up my life. Not only does it offers work outs but also meditation, food ideas, and more. I don't use the food recipes as much but the work outs and surprisingly the meditation helps me a lot. Love it! I have lost some weight adding this to my ab workout app.

I love the varied workouts geared to your desired fitness level and goals. The personal trainers are great, and make the workouts fun and challenging. The only reason I am going 4 stars, while I like the meal plans and grocery lists... they can be a bit much. I mean one weeks worth of food and you literally look like you're buying for a restaurant. Would like to see more simplified meals.

I love the app with good instructions but it's super hard to use because i don't have access to the internet while i gym so at end i don't use it to practice which is a shame. I wish you create a feature that can enable me to download the videos to watch offline. That's is simply a basic feature I guess

Solid workout app. I like the healthy meal suggestions (albeit I rarely use them 😅), I like the walkthrough workouts (helps with form) and I like the pace. One improvement could be adding a "back" control for a sideways view when doing a Self-guided workout.

Ideal app so many options for workouts etc and the set up for meals with the shopping list etc is something I've been looking for for a long time, it makes it a lot easier. They say diet is 70% of the battle to get into shape! The only downfall I've found is that you can't lock your phone while the timer is running.

Find this app great, I've just started to use again due to an injury. It is functional and delivers a great range of workouts for every level. It's a shame I can't utilise all the workouts due to my injury but I still use it as a fitness tool.

Totally recommend a subscription. There are SO many workouts to choose from with various levels of strength/endurance. I love that you can see how long the workout is and for many of the programs, you can see what exercises yoy will be doing ahead of time. Includes recipes too. Great value.

I really enjoy this app. I've been regularly exercising for 20 years but the last 3 I'm injured constantly, problem is I do the same thing too regularly and get in a rut ignoring need for balance and flexibility. The Centr programs really seem to get this mix right and introduce me to hiit and yoga that I've never done as part of the strength program. 6.8k down in 7w and feeling great. My only suggestion is would be good to put in allergies so it doesn't give me recipes I can't eat (seafood)

Compared to other subscription fitness plans I've tried this one gives the most bang for your buck. You'll get workouts, diet, meditation, and fitness tips. The diet is my favorite part. It's low carb, plenty of food, it's flavorful and has plenty of variety. The workouts vary, you won't see the same coach every day and that keeps it interesting. The workouts are based on functional fitness so full body movements are a favorite and most are body weight only. Definitely give this program a try!
Add log during workouts is really bad. Please change it to a text box entry. Get rid of the wheel input. Also have the data entered carry over to the next set. Love the app! I just need this feature.

Great app, would be made even better if you could download workouts to the app so you could follow them when having low signal. I worout at a basement so the videos don't load. Sort of like netflix with the downloaded episodes.

App is okay but be careful about signing up for the trial. I cancelled my subscription before my trial ended and still got charged. Reached out to the customer service team via email but still haven't received a response after multiple follow ups. Very terrible customer service. Stay away.- Updated as Centr customer service team was finally able to provide refund.

Absolutely incredible. So many different choices! Follow the programme set out based on your goals or make your own. Food is incredible and recipes are easy to follow. All the trainers are amazing. Cant praise this app enough! Ps I'm not getting paid to promote the app 🤣 just love it that much

-- Update -- The Centr Team did get back in touch with me and were able to help me out with the subscription. I appreciate their Customer Support team for being understanding and helpful. Updated my review from 1 star to 4. -- Original review -- I signed up for the trial, took a look around, but am unable to use most of the service due to current situations. I missed the date that the trial would convert to a subscription by 1 day (arguably the date was a little obscured) but reached out to the Center team explaining my situation and to ask for a refund since I cannot use the service for the moment. They responded with a very terse response and literally just copied and pasted screenshots of their billing terms. I expected a little more from their team. In the future when I am able to use this service I had planned on rejoining but their approach to this situation has left me reconsidering that. Hopefully their team will be more responsive and I can update this review in the future.

Good but too much repetition with exercises that are subbed out for at home options. Given we're 5 months into Covid youd think the options would be more diverse. Additionally the inability for the app to track your progress personally is a big void and what keeps people in Peleton engaged.
This app has it all. I was surprised by the amount of recipes included and the ability to filter by vegetarian or meat options. Also there are workout levels for beginners and more advanced.

2 months in and enjoying the Unleased series. App is good but some of the exercises need refining. Also cool downs are generic and don't stretch the areas activated in the workout. If you have 30 minutes a day, this will get you fitter so I recommend it.

I love how nothing is left to guessing. The workouts are very easy to follow. There is also days for stretching, I love how recepies are provided and the shopping list is a killer add-on. Easy to go grocery shopping right after the gym. Every single recepie is so delicious. Also I am very happy that there is meditation sessions at the end of every day. Overall a great app. Grateful to the developers and all the trainers and Chris. Thank you for helping me on my journey to self improvement

Canceled my free trial when it first came out in 2020 and they have been charging me for the last three years a yearly bill of 95 dollars even though I canceled the app and haven't logged in since 2020. Watch out people and check your bank statements. The app is created that you can't cancel through the Google play store but you can sign up through there, it is designed to get people to sign up for the free trial and forget about it while they are charging them.

It's awesome!. Workouts are always changing, I love the meals plan and the app makes it so easy to organize your shopping list and I absolutely love the meditation, specially on these times with the Pandemic it has taken me to places I only have dreamed of. Thank you. 💖

I was a little hesitant to get this app as there are so many free ones out there, but this one is truly comprehensive. The workouts, food, meditation, have such range that I have to say it is well worth the money. I have since replaced my gym membership and feel great without spending all that money.

These workouts are absolutely AWESOME, there are many times I can't get into my local gym sessions due to commitments and these workouts are fantastic to so at home or anywhere you have a spare hour. So easy to follow and always changes it up. The recipes are fab and easy to follow as well.

Great exercise programs, especially for stay at home workouts. I would like more options to customize the weekly planner (if doing a program not have other workouts suggested, etc). But overall a good app.

It's good but I wish they would have explained the subscription details properly....I expected to pay a monthly fee of just over £7 a month then found that 93.99 had come out of my account...not happy about this as it's a lot of money to come out all at once when barely employed.

Worth the cost. I have been using this app for two years and I have lost 100lbs. And I haven't even used all the features...needless to say,it works...IF you are disciplined AND consistent. Do the work and transform you mind and body!!! Good luck!

I would love to see an easy way to get to your saved workouts and recipes. Maybe a tab at the bottom just for your saved items? Also maybe integration between the recipe and shopping list? A button to add all the ingredients to your shopping list?

This is definitely for someone wealthy with a normal schedule. The first meal on the meal planner was red velvet pancakes. Changed the meal for leftovers as with the rest of the meals. Exercises don't start with stretches. I assume they made figured you'd know what to stretch beforehand without knowing the context. I ended up pulling a muscle the first day. Same exercise asked me to do high jumps which I wouldn't do because I have downstairs neighbors and I workout at night. Not worth it.
Overall, I love this app. From the diets to the classes, it's exactly what I need. However, it chews through data. If I could download the workouts in the app and use them, that would help out a lot.

Best fitness app I have. Easy to use, so many options. There are recipes, workout programs at beginner, intermediate and advanced, one off exercises depending on what you want to work/what equipment you have, yoga, pilates,, meditaion and you can add a recipe to your shopping list and it will tell you everything to buy. I can't recommend this enough.

Amazing app to be honest I'm in love with it 😍😁 great diversity in the exercises and focused with a purpose on mind, you can definitely feel that in the workouts 👌 doing the fusion program now and I'm so impressed 🤩 really recommend this app if you're searching for an outside the box app for training, mindfulness and delicious food inspiration 🥰

Love this app. Every day is different. Workouts are short but still super intense. Don't get the app if you expect to see Chris everyday. He's not one of the main trainers. I bought the year subscription because I've finally seen the scale go down!

I have been using the app for 2 years and cannot imagine my life without these workouts. They are short, intense and varied so I never get bored. On days when I feel less energetic I do pilates or one of the less bouncy workouts, on days when I want to challenge myself, there is plenty to choose from. I cannot recommend it enough as it gas helped me a lot.

Love the app! Only improvement I'd like is that the self guided workouts and meditations could be chrome cast - I love doing my morning workout on the TV and wish I could follow it with the meditation, or self guided workouts on other days without having to use my phone. Workouts are great, although Ashley doesnt seem as knowledgable as the other trainers (saying to tilt your pelvis in an anterior position in a plank is a bit of a worry 😬)

Lots of variety, suited for different levels and targets. The coaches are great and encouraging. Love it! With ideas for healthy eating, good workouts and meditations for healthy mind, what else could I ask for?

Hemsworth not got enough money as it is ey? Website ridiculous to use, couldn't access account settings to cancel, still been charged can't get a refund. This is the ONLY app that has ever done this to me, if I forget trial periods I get refunded. Platform is useless workouts are rubbish. App needs work.
Definitely seeing whole body results. Like the variation in workouts and the programs mix it up even more. Haven't been able to keep up with menu but have made some and they were good.

A really well designed app which makes your physical and mental well-being its number one priority. Centr keeps your routine, dietary requirements and wellness routine in one very organised place which makes it easy for you to stay on track even when your life gets busy and overwhelming.

It's good for home workouts, haven't taken it to the gym yet. Recipes are nice. Only issue I have there is when I check a recipe then go back to check another - the app scrolls me back to the top, so I have to scroll past everything I have already passed. But as far as a fitness app goes - highly recommended.

This app is totally personalizable and has a fantastic library of workouts, recipes, and meditations. It takes a couple of weeks getting to know the lay of the land, but once you do, this app is one that is for everyday use.

Amazing. Results are brilliant. The workouts are varied and keep everyday interesting. The diet guides and meal plans are fantastic and encourage even the most "basic" home chef to make tasty food. I'm glad I have this at my finger tips for at least a year!

I enjoy the various workouts the app provides, and the trainers do a fantastic job at guiding one through the workouts. The trainers also allow one to go out their own pace, which is nice. The recipes, especially the smoothies, taste very good! I really enjoy this app!

I can't log in. I created my account on chrome. Then when I tried to log in on the app several times it crashed or it "drop a dumbbell". So far pretty disappointing for such an expensive app. Probably I will be canceling my subscription few days on the trial.

One month in and I love this app. First time I have ever been consistent with a workout routine. I like how everyday is a new exercise and that there is a setting for beginners (like me). Longest workout is 40 minutes which is all I can handle for now. Looking forward to using this more and getting to that next level!
Suitable for everyone no matter what your fitness level. Great meals breakfast, lunch and dinner. mmmm and the snacks. Beginner, intermediate and advanced levels plus modifications given.

I really enjoy using this as a quick workout and the coaches keep you engaged. The coaches are descriptive in explaining how to do the exercises and you have ample rest time. I have noticed increased cardio thus far.
Originally purchased just for the workouts (which are incredible and new ones constantly being added), but absolutely love the meals and mediations too. It's cheap and is the whole package.

Great app and desktop version! Since Corona we have been using Centr to do varied, interesting and challenging workouts at home with little to no equipment. We love the variety of trainers, programs and meal plans. It makes working out fun as you feel like you get to know the trainers as well! We will continue to use Centr as it is incredibly reasonably priced, has a huge library and is always adding new content and my wife and I are (most importantly) seeing results in fitness and strength.

This is an excellent, comprehensive program. By far the best "lifestyle" or workout app I've used. I second the suggestion for having a place to log weights during the lifting workouts, though. This app is worth the money, even if you don't have much money to spare.

So so greatful for this experience! It's been more than three years I'm using the app, through rough times, injuries and depression, through good and happy times too! I'm fit with so many ever changing programs. Healthy and yummy meals are my lifestyle. And the richest collection of meditations for all life turns and preferences! Thank you! 🙏

Guys are fun and silly at times keeping it engaging. Workout for every level and challenging. I'm 5 straight weeks and not planing to stop. Heaps more functionality like recipes and meditation I haven't explored yet. Well developed wellness place

It is a pretty awesome app. I like that the meal plans can become a shopping list. I wish that you can add your calories per day when you can't go shopping for the food listed but its still a good app.

I actually wanted to buy the yearly subscription for this app, I am a fitness geek but i really signed up for the meal plans they had in store, but in my opinion, meal plans and diet can be more productive if there are videos, and also more communication in between the trainers and the clients. And all the food stuff applies only to people living in the USA as the ingredients are usually for richer people who can actually get it🤣 so thats a no for me

Great routines, new programs added often, and the trainers are relatable. Really enjoy the meditations and food program. App is reliable, works well with chromecast, and hasn't had any issues. Definitely recommend!

This app is everything I was looking for. After working/training with USMIL SOF/NSW and being spoon fed from the healthy food provided, I needed an app like this to help me pick up my health focused journey towards strength and well-being that Chris's team created. The diverse training, program goals/intensities, and dietary needs/restrictions are just a few of the unique options one can tailor to their needs. Daily meditations and meal shopping list are fav tools to fuel one's progress.

I really love the app. Lots of different varieties especially if you dont have equipment. My only wish was that there was a program for people who do have weights and equipment at home. Lots of individual work outs but would love something structured like the centre 6 program.

This app I find different from other workout apps because of the many options of food,exercises and they even have meditations which I find very important for people to have, I love that in exercises they have the classic exercises and something that I have never found in these apps which is martial arts exercises, I have a lot of interest in practicing martial arts so for people who love mma, boxing. I'd recommend this app to them without a thought If they were looking to try out an app.

What I was looking for. Variety! Numerous workouts to keep you interested. The planner is helpful if you don't know what you want to do. The food section is plentiful. Sleep visualizations are really helpful. Worth it!

Can't even explore the app without agreeing to pay after the free trial finishes. No idea what I'm agreeing to pay for. Would really like to be able to look at it and see what is on offer. Edit/ spelling. Cheers for the reply. Will have a solid look then! Rating changed

Most comprehensive health/fitness/exercise app I've ever used. Body, mind, and spirit (or whatever terminology you prefer to replace spirit) are well covered here. Love it. Thanks to everyone at Centr, you all do incredible work and it inspires me to do the work.

Amazing app with a wide variety of coached workouts, self guided workouts and programs that you can follow. I love this app. I am more motivated working out with someone and this motivates me everyday. Having what feels like hundreds of workouts to pick from from a variety of trainers is refreshing.

It's a smorgasbord of routines so I never get bored. All instructors have their own engaging style and adaptations for all levels. Enjoy the holistic approach with the routines, recipes and soulful meditations. Well done.

Best health and fitness app I've ever used. Only reason for 4 stars is the weird bug on Android that makes switching to landscape mode during a workout really hard (switches between portrait and landscape rapidly).

Love this app! Best online workout routines and couches I've found. I used to do athlean x and liked it but felt stuck. I prefer this for workout. The meal prep and setup is unreal. Best by far. Love the incorporation of mediation and articles on fitness too. I only wish it would incorporate rest days.
Amazing app. Tons of recipes and workout plans. Plenty of options while in on the road in a hotel room as well. And the app works perfect. Easy to navigate, no issues at all.
Super great! So far the only thing that has succeeded in putting me to exercise. Gym = too much effort, hate the onlookers. Competitive sports = too long to learn, need equipment. This is perfect!

Great potential After years of using programs like Beach Body for home workouts I am a little underwhelmed by the coach guided workouts. These seem like banks of workouts pieced together to create a routine... I feel like results could be better if the guided workouts were actually guided by someone doing them. During one workout it appears that the same clip was just spliced together over and over as you can see the same person walk through the background over and over..

The app asks you what equipment you have, purportedly to create customized work out plans. However, that is not the case as the app is scheduling workouts for equipment that I don't possess. Additionally, there is little guidance in actually establishing a sustainable workout regimen. I have a free 1 year membership but would certainly not pay the $120 per year for this level of content and support.

Awesome so far. Love the workouts, they really push and challenge me to work harder. Also like the pilates sessions and body functionality sessions. The sleep visualisations are useful too. Some great recipe ideas and lots of variety in them. 👍

I use this app multiple times a day for it's incredible workout, meal and meditation plans. My partner and I became vegan at start of 2020 (had to slip that in somehwere 😉) and would not have been able to keep up without the amazing vegan meal plan! Cannot reccomend the app enough.

The app itself wasn't the worst but the service and all customer representatives we're rude and unhelpful. I was charged for this app on day 6 of the 7 day trial so don't be tricked into believing you get a full free 7 day trial. And when I tried to contact them and speak with them they just kept repeating one line, not very interested in helping or making sure I was happy with my now $120 purchase. Will definitely not recommend to anyone.

hard to use the app , needs a lot of work , some videos won't load saying error with your internet connection (rly!!!) and some do.I can't customize the workouts as I want (like other apps do).I might give it a try later if the bugs are fixed.
So far, loving it. So many workouts and programs to choose from. For some you do require a lot of equipment but there are a lot of options. Recipes, food diary etc. Great app!

Centr is an amazing tool to help maintain and improve your physical and mental well-being. Centr has nutrition, meditation, and exercise programs that accommodate any experience or fitness level, and can be tailored to any regimen regardless of how much space or equipment you have. I love the dedicated trainers, customization options, and the new Centr 6 program provides short, intense workouts that will challenge and transform you. The Android app seamlessly integrates Chromecast support and works beautifully with all my devices. I have tried many gyms and workout programs, and to me, Centr tops them all. I cannot wait for what the future holds for Centr and highly recommend you give it a try.

This app is excellent, so many options and variety. The only change I would make would be to be able to bookmark or make a favourites list for workouts, meditations, sleep visualisations, recipes etc.
It's a good app. It would be better if I could download workouts as I work in a regional town with limited network capability and can't use 4G or wifi in certain spots. Otherwise great programs.

I signed up and did the Centr 6 program. I am so excited to progress to the new levels because that was easy to stick to and showed awesome results. I've been talking it up to everyone who is interested in an at-home workout program.

It is amazing and includes meals, many different workouts for different activity levels, meditation sessions, sleep aids and more. I use this app every single day and it has changed my life. I love this app.

Very troubled by their renewal process whereby they automatically charge another year's subscription without notifying you in advance that your membership is ending. They could at least send a little reminder to be fair and upfront but nope, totally scammed me on this with no recourse!

Love the motivation throughout the workouts and explaining how to do the set at a lower level if required. The food is awesome, love the recipies. It would be amazing if it had a progress tracker or linqed to something like myfitness app.

Signed up the 6 week trial but used it twice. No email too say the trial was coming to an end instead they charge the account. Understand this is more likely in their terms and conditions but looking at the other comments I am not the only one that is not happy with this. Offer a free trial to seem all sympathetic to the current situation but knowing people will forget to cancel, dont give warning and then take their money, more like taking advantage of this situation.

This is absolutely the best strength training and nutrition and recipes available right now. This is the RIGHT way to strength train and eat!! I have had great results, especially from the third piece that I never knew how much I needed... Meditation and mindfulness. This is so well rounded!

It's excellent in so many ways. 👍 I especially if, like me, you feel motivated to work out an excercise but never know what to do. Pick a programme an off you go. Plus all the other extras like diet, meditation & stretching. They should employ me I recommend them so much lol.

Buyers remorse. For the price of an actual gym membership, what you get are videos of guided workouts, and healthy recipes. All things that you can get for free on many other online platforms. I'll be canceling my subscription. Unfortunately they don't give refunds.

This is one of the only fitness apps you need. It came at a perfect time for me when all the gyms were closed. I'm someone who already worked out at a minimum 5 days a week. I do the Centr6 program, and I'm on week 5. Noticing great results. Diet is an important part, which the app also helps with. But the workouts are genuinely hard. I do them in my hot garage, making them even harder. Each workout is a killer. If you think it's easy - that's your own fault.

Hands down the best fitness subscription on the market. There is plenty of workouts for anyone at every level of fitness. The meal plan is one of the biggest highlights of the program. Paired with the wonderful Facebook community, there is no better subscription, which is absolutely worth every penny.

I have subscribed since the beginning, I was overweight and I can say that this app save me, motivate me to do more workouts, to give the best of myself and obove all to never give up. In this we have everything, workouts, meditation, yoga, pilates, receipts, etc....thank you to all the coaches 😃 and for making my life easier and better

I love to work out! During this pandemic I was not able to see the gym in 2 months and found some sort of method of working out with little results. When I ran across this app and tried the free trial I knew that this would be the game changer for me. You do you not need gym equipment to get results. I have a few dumbbells and a barbell to do what I need to do in the comfort of my backyard. Plus I'm saving money from my gym membership by signing up for the yearly plan.

The App is great and have lots of nice workouts, unfortunately the audios are prerecorded and you can hear all the same comments and jokes over and over in different routines, I do 2 programs per day and sometimes I get the same comments and jokes (in both programs) even though they are different programs and the same day, what makes it bit boring and repetitive for a high rate app, need to invest in individual audio for each program and not use the same in each exercise. Apart from, awsome app
Some good home sessions on here but many require equipment. Some sessions don't have sound, too often repeat warm up and cool downs. But on the whole it is better than many similar apps out there.

I love this app! The workouts are achievable but strong with lots of options for modifications and plenty of different programs depending on your fitness. The recipes are yummy and the meal planner super simple to follow and modify. I love it. I've tried many programs over the years and this is by far my favourite.

This app could be really good if someone actually put more effort into balanced programs & meal plans. I have completed 1 week of the unleashed beginners program. Warm up & stretching is the same every session (boring) & the upper body exercises overload the shoulders on a daily basis that it is likely to result in injury. You pretty much need a full home gym for the other programs which is also a big problem. The recipes also need special ingredients & majority are not family friendly.

Couldn't be happier with the variety of exercises and coaches, meals, plans, meditation, and overall wellness approach. My biggest criticism is that there aren't modifications for the least flexibility or fit, or for people who are recovering from injuries. However the community in the Facebook group are a huge source of info and inspiration. Videos need closed captions. This app is a daily part of my life!

I love this app!! I had been struggling trying to get into a workout routine the last few months. I have a gym in my basement but I get bored trying to come up with workouts. The daily schedule on the app takes the thought out of it, and I love the variety of the workouts. Would definitely recommend.

Puts all the tools within reach, literally, for living healthier and in shape. The suggested recipes, along with the built-in shopping list, not to mention the quick workouts you can fit into any schedule, eliminates all the excuses. It did for me anyway. If YOU want to feel 🎶better, stronger, faster, thinner,🎶 and never make it to the gym.. congrats the gym found you. 💪

!!!CANCEL YOUR SUBSCRIPTION!!! They won't refund if you forget to cancel and they don't warn you when they charge your account automatically. I contacted customer supporting a day after being charged another yearly fee and they refuse to refund any amount. This is an absolutely digusting practice and is completely not fair on consumers. Raising a complaint with the ACC. Edit: Deloper tells me to email in a response as per below. I had already emailed but emailed again. Still nothing.

This is the best lifestyle app I've ever purchased. The food is fantastic, the exercises are great, and the meditation is inspiring. I've never had an issue with the functionality; app is responsive and user friendly. I recommend this to anyone that will listen! You will not be disappointed!

My laptop died one morning when I was getting ready to do my morning centr workout. Luckily I remembered I can quickly download the app. In the middle of lockdown this app has saved my wellbeing. It has everything to the workout of your choice and a nice meditation to get you through the day. In the state of the world at the moment it is so nice to take control of your peace with this app!

Such a good work out app!!! I'm not the type to post reviews but I gotta give it to these guys they really put a lot of effort into this project (app) they have a huge variety of workouts, meals plans etc. I was looking for a good workout app for a long time and I finally found it. Absolutely recommend this one! 10/10

So far so good. I would like to see more sport specific training as I have just started BJJ and a strength and conditioning program would be beneficial but, I understand that to cater for everyone specifically would be asking too much. Still a 5 star training app!

Love this app! I've used it for over a year and it's the only program that has successfully helped me get in shape. Both the workouts and the recipes are great. Super yummy food, many vegetarian options, and you don't have to worry about feeling hungry if you follow the plan.

This has greatly improved from when I first started. The exercises and sets have helped me immensly in the last few months lse weight (30kg) and now that you can switch options I find it even easier to use. Masterfully done

Honestly, I love it. I've been an athlete my entire life, and even went out for some Personal Training certifications in my early 20s. So i've never really struggled to come up with stuff in the gym, i've always known what's going on and how to do it. What's really great about Centr is it's ecosystem of features all in one place. The workouts are great, usually pretty straight forward HIIT workouts that will get the job done. Each day, you get meal recipes that are delicious, healthy, and easy to makes. The app suggests a variety of meditations for you to work through. I honestly wouldn't describe Centr as a fitness app, I would call it a Lifestyle app. If you want to eat healthier, get in shape, stay calm, and feel more... Centr'd (sorry)... this is the app for you. Highly recommend.

Love this app! The workouts are awesome with breakdowns on form and reps. The meals are great and easy to use, prep and swap. I never thought of trying meditation but figured I'd give it a try and I'm glad I did. This is by far my favorite app and workout regimen. Shout out and huge thanks to Chris Hemsworth and his entire team! Thank you guys/ladies! It's been worth every penny!

I've been primarily using the open as a newbie to weightlifting and to get some good MMA Drills going. I've loved my experience and have no noticed an increase in my skill, strength, and stamina. Not to mention that I have gotten some good recipes out of it. It helps you sort by diet, what equipment you have, or what trainer you prefer. Highly recommend.

The results in my body over the course of 3 weeks have been better than me going to the gym. This app and its programs are well worth my money with the results I'm getting. I cant wait to see the results after 3 -6 months. I'm now looking forward to the pains to get the gains and also theres a great support group on Facebook that share their own progress and tips. I'm definitely a follower now. LETS GET IT LEGENDS!...

I've been using this app for a year now and find it amazing! The programs, workouts, articles and recipes feel real and when followed produce real results. I enjoy that there are no marketing or adds interrupting workouts, before or after.

Love this app, I find it easy to follow with plenty of options. Being a football player (soccer) I wondered if there could be something on this app that could help me get my cardio up. Iv tried the hiit class programme but just wanting something else that could help me get 90mins on a football pitch. You don't ask you don't find out right?

As an overweight individual, struggling to find a workout program that is easy to start was difficult. This program (teaches) how to workout while encouraging pace management while balancing growth in the uncomfortable. I have been using the program for almost three weeks and, I am still at it. I what to thank Chris and his team for creating a workout lifestyle training program that is helpful to ALL people and body types.

Been fantastic!!! I haven't worked out in years and this program has helped pick me up where I was and walked me every step, nothing was too hard to where I would hurt my self or too easy where I wouldn't get any results. AMAZING app, program and people. It is for everyone!!!

I didn't think that this was going to be for me but I was wrong. I'm more of a beginner than intermediate in fitness training. I did the 6 weeks free trial and have now signed up for an additional 3 months. I just wish that they had more yoga available and maybe a "plan" aimed more for the mornings as this is when I work out. The meal plans are good too!

First 4 weeks completed. So far so good. Very impressive holistic approach towards healthy living packed in one app! Liked the variety of the programs. Quality is a top notch in everything. Keep it up! Thank you team!

When I first got this app it was just to start 7 Day trial. I like to try different trials but not really commit to anything. What really stood out from other apps is that Centr didn't ask for my height or my weight. It started by asking what I was looking for whether it was weight loss, toning, or building muscle. The recipes on here are actually delicious and helpful. You can swap out and keep track of what you eat, the workouts you do, and meditations. And let me tell you, meditation works.

I've been using for 5 weeks and have been enjoying how easy it is to setup a workout routine with the different programs and how I can add a specific workout to my week to fill in any extra days. The meal program makes eating better really easy, even if you want to start small with only a couple meals for the week.

Amazing!!! I'm 10 months postpartum! I started this about a month ago. I found after having my daughter I felt run down, dropped things constantly, was clumsy, lacked energy, got angry a lot, and just generally felt like poo... I was worried I had PPD. I went to my doctor before, to ensure I was ok... Was given all this help and told to work out. I started doing these work outs and everything has improved. Thank you!!! So much. These are amazing. Easy to follow, fast, fun and rewarding!!!!

I'm a truck driver, I've lost about 10 lbs in a month while using this app, I try to do at least 2-3 workouts a week but it's kinda tough doing that on the road. Also not being able to cook the meal plan sucks but I changed my usual road food with oatmeal with bananas and raw walnut in the morning and salads and rice with tuna throughout the day. Thanks to Chris and his team for such a great app

Love love love this app! As a busy mum of 3 kids I don't have time to go to the gym, this allows me to workout at home and still get amazing results. Centr has totally simplified my life, I get my workout, meals and meditation in the one place. The shopping list makes it so easy and gives me the flexibility to change out meals to suit my family.

Love the workouts, but app could do with a little work to make it more user-friendly, such as: - option to plan out week of training so you can get a reminder on the day of your session - replace workout of the day with workout from your chosen program/personalised page for your program - option to edit logs to make notes or edit incorrect weights - option to choose substitution exercise and add weights for that - keep rest timer running if opening a different app - louder beeps at end of rest.

I earned a promo code to try it out, got hooked on the 1st week! Tailored workouts, meal plan, wellness suggestions all-in-one! Sadly for the promo code, there is no redemption anywhere in the App, so I contacted support and they told me the fix is through the Web App! Excellent service! Will definitely resubscribe

I love everything about this app! The meal planning is phenomenal and the workouts will kick your butt..but in a good way 😁 The plan is easy to follow and I love the relaxation stories. There are daily reading activities and pep talk articles as well. Best of all, while you are getting your workout on, you are making donations that impact a child's life in a very big way!! Kudos to the team!! You guys are the best!!❤️❤️

Very good app and variety of training programs. I've typically been a heavy lifter but I am in the middle of ignite intermediate to try something different and complete a phase with a focus on resistance but with a cardio emphasis.
Great app, all your fitness needs in one place -- workouts, meals, meditations, and articles. Everything is planned out for you so it's super easy to just follow the schedule.

Absolutely amazing app! I tried a few other fitness apps and programs and this one is by far the best. The trainers are amazing and so is the meal plan. Everything is laid out perfectly in a daily planner so it's very easy to follow. The online community is so supportive and motivating. It's like a second family. Centr also listens to any concerns and immediately addresses them. I highly recommend this app. It is truly life changing. Come join the Centr legend family, you won't forget it!

I started during covid 19, suffered nerve damage, autoimmune disease and over weight. I had 4 boys and started working out with them else where and then needed something more for me. So started Centr, I love it. I do it daily and feel the strength in my body. I have a while to go before I would consider myself strong but I'm doing things with my kids that I couldn't before. ❤️

I am desperately trying to lose weight. Trying to improve my health and knowledge of nutrition. This app has exceeded my expectations. Would recommend for any Fitness level as they have different versions of exercises for your level.

Fantastic!!! I love this app. The guided workouts and no guided workouts, yoga, mediation, meal and snack ideas. There is so much here. Not just for adults but kids too. They pack a ton of content into this app for a very reasonable price. I would recommend this app to anyone looking to get in shape or trying to stay active while maintaining social distance. This is a great product. Highly recommend. Thank you to everyone involved in creating this.

As someone with previous weight lifting experience and in decent shape I have to say I am more than impressed with these workouts! I absolutely live the HIIT, HILIT, and PLYO workouts! I have also enjoyed the meals and the detailed shopping list feature that you can easily adjust. I was a chef for 15 years and a certified nutritionist and everything is on point for thus program. The whole app is very well thought out and easy to use/ swap meals or workouts any day of the week! Thanks Centr!!!!!

It's the BEST! It has a TON of variety in workouts! So whatever you are in to as far as fitness goes, they've got you covered. And they have uncoached and coached workouts! It's like having a personal trainer in your pocket 24/7. They also have a comprehensive meal guide with recipes! AND you can customize your meal plan based on pretty much whatever common specialized diet you might be on! My only improvement would be to have a wider variety of commentary. The jokes get old after a while.

Not happy. They don't tell you how much the price is before you sign up and give them your email address. I used an address I only use for apps like this. Then it's very expensive £22 something a month but they don't tell you what you get for your money. Reminds me of those pushy gyms where they won't tell you the price until they've given you a tour, bribed you with coffee or smoothies and sit you in an office so you can't just walk out.

This app is just great. I am thinking of cancelling my gym membership because i think this is more worthwhile. Lots of different kinds of workouts to choose from including. Boxing,pilates ,yoga,MMA, aerobics. Take your pick . Loving the fact that i dont have to think what to cook anymore. This app is doing that job for me. I usually dont stick to meal plans but the recipes are so good i look forward to trying each one. Really enjoying this . Thanks centr.

I never review apps until now. I've cancelled my gym membership. This is the real deal. Great workouts which keep on changing and dont get boring, entertaining instructors and a whole bunch of other stuff. Was a bit pissed I didnt get my 6 weeks free as promised by Hemsworth himself, but was ok to pay to keep on using it. Defo worth the money in my opinion for anyone who wants to work out at home. Thanks guys.

Really great and easy way to keep track of my work outs and also buying the correct ingredients for healthy meals. Highly recommended for anyone looking to try and get there life back on track but in their own home. Works well, good effort team!.

Centr app provides all desired from a workout/fitness app plus more. I did not expect such a variety of meal choices that came with the app and even included meditations. The workouts programs have a wide range so you can choose what suits your desires. Overall, love this app.

Giving one star as there is no way to delete your account. Contacted support and they said they only erase all hold data for clients from UK. Beware of your sign up there is no way to get all your data deleted. The app never worked well on my android. Support response : "However, we are unable to permanently remove all your data from our system" Now support doesn't reply at all anymore!!!

I wanted to try this app and saw 30 days trial offer. I opted a trial but got charged for full year immediately. Next minute I contacted google play support. They said, they won't be able to issue a refund and guided to contact centr app developers. I contacted centr app developers and they refused to refund the amount. They charged me 122$ for the app which I am never going to use. I felt scammed since advertisement was for trial and they charged me for full year immediately.

For the first time in my life, I have intrinsic motivation to workout everyday. The workouts are full body, no two workouts are alike, and the couched sessions feel like you have a personal trainer. Furthermore, their daily meditations have carried me through this pandemic. While I haven't stuck with the meal planning they provide, I have tried a number of the recipes. They're delicous!

This app is AMAZING! You have everything at your fingertips (literally)! You have a planner with your workout, meal plan, a meditation, and tons of nutritional and fitness related articles in the blog. You also have a ton of delicious recipes for meals and snacks (even my 15yr old daughter loves them!). You also have access to an amazing community of totally awesome people going through the same process you are, who are highly motivating. Its like having a family that is totally behind you!

I have struggled to find an exercise routine that I could stick with for more than a month. I've been using centr for 2 months now and I'm loving the different trainers. Center 6 was a great program to get started with and now that I've finished it I'm loving the planner and how it picks great workouts for me. My only suggestion is to get more meditations by Taika Waititi.

The app is not great and very pricey. I would not recommend it as the content is not worth paying for. I learned about it because I did some training with a friend also using the free trial. I think there are other apps for training (Freeletics, Nike Training Club), Meditation (headSpace and calm) and yoga (DownDog) that are 10x better. They treat users poorly and try to steal money out of you. What makes this company and service so terrible is their immoral Customer Support.
