They ignore 50% of my emails, stop answering when they are not pleased, send the same template answer time after time. They make it so hard to cancel, and when you realised you had been charge, there is absolutely NO way to get reimbursed. After the end of my not-used free trial, I emailed them and was very frank. "You can look in my profile. I have NOT used your app a single time in the last month. I forget to cancel my free trial. I contacted you as soon as I have seen the charge on my credit card. This is a mistake on my side; I forgot to cancel it on time. Could you please reimburse me? I didn't use it, and I am not planning to use it anymore" and from there dozens of emails without any help. Their policy "it's written that we don't do reimbursement". I tried to argue on common sense "Look, I never used the app - don't plan to use it in the future. I am not happy with it, and if I paid, I would ask for reimbursement because I don't think it's worth paying. Now, what is the value for you to have an unhappy customer who is not happy about your product, not using and don't want to pay for it and is charged anyway". The app is about mental health and well-being but is only about squeezing money out of you, answering you poorly, and treating you like poo. It's hard for me to see a company that treats their customer with that much disdain to succeed in the future but let's see. From what you can read online in Google and the review, they have turned almost all of their users into detractors.

Great. Mid 30's. Worked out most of my life. Endurance running, boxing, weight lifting, swimming. Covid took that for a turn and after a while all workout experiences at home failed. (Cali so fires as well). Got cntr for around $11 per month. At first did it to guilt myself, but found it surprisingly effective in getting my heart rate going and doing a decent amount of muscle work without weights..while.keeping it interesting. Appreciate the tips on diet as well if you're not used to it

Second to none! I have been using Centr since its release date and I have to admit the changes that they've made to update the app and provide more value has truly been amazing. I initially loved the idea of having the coaches of A list celebrities in my back pocket and that is exactly what I got! Not only is this a fitness app but a complete solution to living a healthy active lifestyle. I really cannot recommend this app more and I hope that you get as much value out of it as I have!

Nice program and you definitely see results. But it's a little confusing at first, as they have programs and daily routines. So do you do both? Or just a program? And which program? Whats the pros and cons, and could some of the daily weight routines be blended with their separate 6 week programs? And they provide meal suggestions, but what should my target portion size and calorie intake be for my goals? It gives the same meals regardless of if you want to tone or build muscle. But still good

First day, it was a hard thought for me to buy a monthly subscription for this app.. Now I'm a bit thankful that I am paying them my money. My first day of work out was a rough start. 12 steps and 8 videos per session, and working out all of them for an hour. The fitness is worth it, the next day my arms hurt Hella bad cause I never pushed my muscles, now I'm starting to see a difference! They have diet system as well that you can follow. It's definitely worth every drop if you can afford it.

Phenomenal program. For someone who likes to workout but never plans workouts, either from poor organization or lack of knowledge. I am a military member who is slightly fit. I would say overall good but not great. I feel like this program is going to take me to the great level because it is all laid out. Also, if I feel like doing weights l I can swap over to a workout from their catalog. If I have little time, I press on with the Centr 6 program. I started with 6 weeks and now annual member

Not only does it tell me what to do and when to do it AND how to make it, but it also allows me to adjust the planner to fit my schedule. What more could you ask for! Delicious meal planning, workouts for all different goals and fitness levels, and the ability to adjust as needed. I guess I really didn't need Chris, just his team! Thank you Centr!!!!
Even the beginner level is no joke! It's working me to the core! All the programs, meditations, food plans.. etc, are great! Definitely would recommend. Worth the price.

I over all love this app! This app really works well with my schedule and has helped me with my horrible chronic pain. I love that I don't need to get in my car and drive to the gym. I also really appreciate the guided Work-outs. The only thing I would love to see is an option to add an extra work out a day in the planner. In the mornings I usually do a Yoga or Pilates session then at night I do the planned work-out. It would be great if I could plan them both in the daily planner.

Great! I used to train 5/7 days in the gym, but due to the quarenting, my routine got highly impacted. I started to do my own routines at home but I got out of focus, making difficult to keep a high intensity. CNTR help me to keep the focus and intensity of my workouts, and as well help me to learn new workouts and recepies that I will keep using in the future With commitment you will get some pretty good results for sure If you want to look like THOR you will need to work a little bit more😅
The last update keeps signing me off. I just can't use the app for almost a week now
Love the workouts. They make it super easy to follow along and get a good though workout in

I love the variety of workouts and trainers. I look forward to seeing what the workout of the day is. I also love having the option to find a workout that is more suited to my needs that day. With three young kids I'm sometimes (always) time poor and sleep poor. I like being able to choose a slower workout on days I haven't had good rest or shorter workouts on days I just can't fit a longer one in amongst the chaos. I am way more consistent with my workouts because of this.

Comprehensive Health App. This app is literally everything I need to stay fit at home. Recipes, meditations, various workouts both coached and self guided. Their Centr 6 week programs are fantastic. My ONLY complaint is that there is no leniency in pausing the membership. I broke my tailbone and was out for 4 months. I contacted the team who advised me that it wasn't possible to suspend the membership and I thought that was really unfair. I could have supplied a hospital certificate.

I really like this app! I started using it not long ago, but I think I'm going to stick to it for a few months. Perhaps it's just me, but I can't find a way to customise my planner. E.G. I subscribed on Sunday evening and I couldn't do the initial Sunday training. Then on Monday I had a new plan to follow. So I was looking for a way to switch the days/trainings around but couldn't find anything. Another thing I miss is a WearOS link. That'd be great!

This app is superb. You get real insight from Chris Hemsworth's actual trainers and friends in the fitness/wellness industry. The workouts are easy and the recipes are delicious. The shopping list feature is very handy. The only negative is that I would like some more recipes that can be made in under 30 min and/or use less ingredients.

Do not use this app or business. I have been unable to have my account deleted. They say to send my details but I have already done that at least six times. Definitely not putting them in this review. Deleting an account should be simple but that's not the case with Centr. Once they have your details, they have them forever unless you are in the UK. The recent offer of a temporary free membership was nothing more than a phishing expedition.

Good variety of classes showing adaptations for some movements, plus classes using bodyweight or freeweights. You can choose one of the programmes or simply follow the daily planner for exercises. Daily planner includes meal plan which you can scale per person. You can select whether you are vegan, vegetarian, pescatarian or omnivore and whether you want to lose weight, build muscle or toned and fit. My gripe with the meals recipes is that the ingredients are not always easy to find in the UK.

I've been using this for 20days and I'm already feeling more alive and healthy. Everything is great about this app and recipes are good too (tho the estimated time is always way less than actual time it takes me to prepare and cook the meal). Also it would be great if the app asked for my body states (like weight and height) and what is my goal. But overall I loved this app so much 😍
The only fitness app i've stuck with. Coached workouts make it 100 x better. Sculpted is 11/10 👌🏼

Zero notifications which is appalling. Had free subscription through cc provider and signed up on website, not the app. Logged in only once but never received any subscription emails so had no idea it was set to auto renewal until charge on my card. I explained the circumstances and they have been the first company I've ever dealt with who refused to refund and it's a whole year. Not a single email from Centr for a year so forgot I even signed up so how would I even know auto-renewal existed?

I've tried a number of workout apps throughout the years and always got bored very quickly, finding it hard to keep myself going. I struggle to workout to begin with, but I figured if I paid for Centr, I could somehow convince myself to try and look like Thor. I'm a long way from that, but the huge variety of trainers, programs, workouts, etc. really makes it easy to stay engaged. I'm a little over a month in now and don't feel at all like giving up, so I would recommend Centr to anyone like me.

Something that works. For once I am able to shift the weight and get stronger without sacrificing tasty meals, which the app provides recipes for. The recipes are great and straight forward, the workouts are great to follow and the community on Facebook is a great places to talk and share, including when the trainers from the app also post and talk to the people. Now if you excuse me, I have a session with Da Rulk 😅

Going good. One thing is slow down between transitioning from one exercise to another to let us fatty's keep up. Netherless, great variety of work outs ( just finished the centr 6) and don't think I'll ever get bored. Beats doing 10 burpees in between add breaks, five times a day to not chunk up and stay fit during hibernation. Once the government gives me more money, I'll be able to start the diet part. 😁😀🤘🤜👍

Easy to use, easy to find things or search up, if you need help it's there, great little app!! I love the workouts!! Feel great pumped, sexy and confident all day long, I see my body improving, foods are delicious and I want to keep going with these coached workouts. Thanks for a great app!!

Absolutely fantastic. I started with a 6 week trial and saw such great results and feel so much stronger, fitter and leaner that I've just signed up for a year's membership. It's such a motivational program, easy to follow exercises, has a meal plan, you can choose your goals and at so much less than a gym membership or personal trainer. This is the same team that gets Chris Hemsworth into shape and they're certainly getting me into shape too.

I downloaded the app on Saturday, have been following my daily programs since then. I must admit, I didnt like going to the gym because I didnt know what to do and it does scare off a lot of people. With the pre planned week ahead and dieting Centr offers, it is well worth the monthly/quarterly/yearly subscription. I wish i could write more but im limited to 500 words 😅. Chris and the team have done exceptionally well on this app! Thank you guys for creating this!!!

Lots of workouts, tons of easy meals with lots of flavor and the shopping tool is quick and simple. I like nightime winddown mediation too. Best part is the workouts are done by trainers who engage the whole time, they make it fun. Love the app!

Worth the price! With the combination of the workouts and the meal plan, I began to see results from the first week. I used to workout an hour or more and didn't see as much result. Plus, as a vegan, the recipes are delicious! (And that is not that easy...)

Terrible experience... Downloaded the app to try out the free 7 day trial. Didn't even use the app and after 7 days from the download they charged me for the year and won't give me a refund. Bad experience. Don't download unless you want to get gouged for $165.00. Don't even download this app unless you want to pay for it.

Great app. I tried out the 6 week free trial and used the app for about 2 weeks. Now I'm no longer using it and got charged for 120 USD and there is nothing I can do about it. At least a notification telling me the free trial was about to end and I was going to pay for a full year would be nice.

Comprehensive app. The work outs are great, I am seeing real results that other training programs have not provided. The meals are actually delicious and easy. Really impressed with the app and Centr experience!

This app is amazing! The work-outs are really good, and easy to do at home without the need of fancy equipment! Also the duration is brilliant, not too long, not too short so you always find the time to exercise!

Really easy to follow workouts. Simple to change out workouts and recipes. The shopping list is an excellent feature!! So great to have meal nutrition and workouts all in the same app and amazingly user friendly!

I find it is three serivces in one , Amazing work out plans , great meal ideas , and a meditation section that is one of the better ones I've used. The only piece that is missing is a work out rep/set tracker. Its is worth the money spent though.

The Centr App is fantastic, so easy to plan your week and exercise where ever you are. The Meal Planner is brillant with so many dietary options to work, with plus the ability to swap meals in and out of the planner which you can instantly add to the Shopping List. The Meditation and Sleep Visualizations means one app covers it all. Well done Centr Team for an App that is perfect to get you to your fit and healty self!

Be careful with this app. It consumes a lot of internet data. In 3 weeks using the app, it used almost 18GB of my internet data. When talking to the customer service team, I had a bizarre answer that the app streams the video, which is expected, but consuming all this data is bizarre. I watch videos on YouTube everyday day and it does not consume 15% of that internet data.

Absolutely amazing! Subscribed for 1 month, then cancelled and subscribed for a whole year. The workout variations are incredible and I have found myself in a great weekly routine and also stacked up some muscle!

Wonder full app the work outs are challenging with put being daunting, the meals are delicious, and the meditation zones me right out and gets ready for bed. The only thing i wish they had was a calorie tracker(irrelevant if you follow thier meal plan) and a water intake tracker. Maybe some merch too ;) definitely worth the price

This is getting me away from the same old workouts but mostly the same old routines of feeling tired, unhappy, and unfulfilled in this lockdown/quarantine. I'm quietly making my gains everyday and no one needs to see. Once I get back in the boxing gym sparring, and fighting again no one will understand how I maintained my stamina and health. Most of all my mental game is unstoppable and a forceful energy ready to breakdown the next thing that gets in my way. Powerful...

SAVE YOUR MONEY: Downloaded the app and wanted to have a browse. I was keen to take advantage of the 7 day free trial which was fine, but then was charged for the 1 month subscription on the same DAY I downloaded the app. There's no such thing as 7 day free trial on this app 👎

Um... App says 7 day free trial, but after creating an account, it insists on you signing up for a membership before getting to do anything or see if it's worth sending credit card information... The response given confirms this is the practice. Uninstalling. Best of luck. I'm not taking the risk. Thanks anyways.

Just joined this app and an trying to view some of the videos and they take ages to load and crash the app. Can't attach the screenshot of the app crash the 2nd time I tried to view a video. Very poor first impression.

Great options for exercise at home. Very interesting health articles covering all aspects of health and well-being. A huge catalogue of recipes so you can cook something new everyday and save your favourites for repeat performances. A solid program overall 👍

I'm always been a fan of home workouts and Centr is everything I always wanted. All in one place, yummy and healthy vegan recepies and a bunch or workouts for different levels. Love the blog as I'm always researching about health but information in the internet is overwhelming. In Centr you can find everything in one app and that is just perfect for me.

I subscribed to a 7 day trial, and was charged the full amount (for 3 months) after contacting them I was told that I had previously used a trial but was not told during the sign up process - now my money can't be refunded. Pretty unhappy and frustrated.

Just awesome. {The programs are 6 weeks in duration, and each workout is 32 minutes including warmup, exercise, and cool down.} A very reasonable app for the price of about $100 per year. It has professional trainers, background music, and every type of workout (HIIT, yoga, boxing, cardio, circuit, bodyweight) and also the narrative by Chris is pretty funny!! This is an all-encompassing app for the fitness enthusiast.

Excellent workouts. I've done a few other workout apps that I've really enjoyed but this one goes beyond. The meditations and variety of workouts and the meals, everything is 5 stars. Worth every penny!

The workouts are very interactive and gives you wide range of exercise programs that will suit your needs. Also, meal planning and able to add it to your shopping list is another exiting feature of this app.

A well laid out and designed app. The Centr6 programs are good and the detailed meal and snack recipes are thought provoking and easy to follow. There's a massive variety of coached and self guided routines from MMA to weights, cardio and HIIT. It has it all. Highly recommended.

Updated: I have been trying update my subscription and payment options for the app. It won't let me sign in to change that via the app or website. Google Play shows I have no current subscriptions so I can't fix it there.

Has helped me access methods of working out that I felt were previously unavailable to me or were too daunting to try and understand by myself. The instructors are fantastic, the workouts are killer... And the quality of life functions in the app (e.x Guided meditations, sleep visualizations, meal planning, goal planning) make this a truly next level workout companion. Best money I've spent in myself this year.

Signed up for a 7 day free trial, wasn't for me so I've gone to cancel through the app, which can't find my subscription. So I've gone to the subscription tab in the google store and my subscription isn't there either. Now I'm being charged $29.99 for an app I can't even unsubscribe from, thanks

Fantastic! Amazing guided workouts, great meal plans and recipes which even allow for allergies. The well-being and meditation is the best I have seen and really assists with my kids to relax into sleep and create positive mindset for us all especially during this lock down time. Plus I genuinely lose weight through workouts. Big thanks to the teal at Centr!

I loved every second of my experience while working out through this app. The workouts are very well explained with modification (if necessary). I would rate 10/10 for the workouts, also 10/10 for the trainers, last but not least 10/10 for the app.

I honestly never thought I would ever be able to say that an app has changed my life but this app truly has. I always struggled in the past with consistency in my workouts and being in the habit of doing it regularly. With Centr, the workouts are short and effective enough that it doesn't feel like it takes much time out of my day. I've been able to get into a routine of 3-5 workouts every week. I've never felt better! And I love having new delicious, healthy meals to try all the time! WORTH IT!

Down 30lbs and strength is up. A set of adjustable dumbbells and bench are the only equipment I have. Started w/ only body weight programs for two months to rebuild base strength and core and then added dumbbells for greater muscle growth. Programs are easy to follow and most show adjustments for lower impact or when you don't have gym-level equipment.

Would like to save my favorite meals. A stretching course would be helpful too, for those of us who haven't tried touching their toes in a while. Would be nice to stream all the workouts to my apple tv or smart tv. Love the meal planning option.

Amazing, Tried other workout apps never liked any of them. Centr really helps with teaching you how do to the workouts, not just telling what you need to do. Also the variety of things Centr offers such as Yoga, the entire nutritional side of the app, MMA/boxing, free weights to free weights. Plus the programs Centr6 and Centr Unleashed really helped me get motivated to actually workout. Best workout app hands down, no questions asked.
I love this application, love the recipes, food is tasty, I would not think of some meals by myself. Exercise is perfect, different every day, you can swap it with you fancy something else.
Awesome, effective workouts! The trainers are excellent, and the variety of work out options keep things interesting. Coaching and training for good form are better than any other program I've used.

Love the 6 week programs for progession and accountability, the mindful aspects and ability to dip in and out with the other aspects of program. Good production though music and exercises can get repetitive (but get there everywhere). Recommended!

Best fitness app out there. If you want to take your training to the next level this is the app for you. I always though weight training was the only way to build muscle but this app has shown me that I incorporating multiple facets of fitness along with wellness advice is the real path to a healthy living. Highly recommend

Great app and overall concept. I follow the program daily and have seen massive gains in muscle, fitness, diet and overall wellbeing. I'm enjoying the additional programs that continue to arrive (halfway through centr6 at present) and can't wait for more.

Great for beginners. Some workouts are super hard even though listed at 'beginner' but is something to work towards. The 6 week program is great as it shows you techniques thoroughly before starting actual workout. 10/10.
No bugs, great programs, awesome tasty recipes. I've used maybe 20 different exercise apps and this one is the only keeper. Advanced lever is not hard, but still enough if done consistently.

Takes the thinking out of diet and workout. The workouts are really challenging but has good tutorials on them. The build muscle option diet is challenging too if you're not much of an eater but can definitely feel and even see the results.

Best Fitness App After only three days of the free trial, I knew I'd be subscribing because the workouts, programs and menus are second to none! Easy to follow program, super motivating. The in-app Planner is well-designed and so practical. I highly recommend!

Best app ever! With all the best dietary choices, the ease of keeping on-top of nutritional intake with every meal you prepare, and the easy shopping list for the weekly planner, why would you go anywhere else. Centre has some of the best food I've cooked and eaten In years. My wife and I have been with centre for 2 years now and would never go back. The workout that Luke, Ashley and Daniel have atm with centre unleashed are fantastic, you'll sweat and you'll love it! Thank you centre ❤️

Re-write. Been using for over a year now and love it. I was never one to follow a program before and just did my own thing...it worked, but this is so much better and well balanced. I love the variety of workouts, styles and trainers ... I never get bored. Keep up the great work team

The app really just pushes you to your limits and the personal trainers encourage you every step of the way making it seem more doable. Once you get into the groove of things the workouts are a blast!

Best app for anyone looking to get fit. Meal plans laid out, automatic load over for grocery list of required ingredients. Exercise boot camps and programs are amazing. 11/10! Recommend it to anyone who mentions getting in shape, cooking recipes, and fitness programs for all skill levels.

STAY AWAY! THEY ONLY WANT YOUR MONEY! Apparently Im just the latest victim for this scam of a company. I just got a charge on my credit card for the subscription renewal (no email or in app notice whatsoever!) and canceled the subscription and asked for a refund as the charge was still pending. The response I got was cold and financially focused as I was told they absolutely do not issue refunds and quoted their T&C. The $95 fee means more to thier bottom line than my newborn's clothes / food.
Very good resource. I would like to see more structured programs like Centr Power Advanced. Also navigating through and selecting workouts is inefficient. Overall I would still recommend it

I only use the app as an addition to my group training sessions but I love the trainers and the workouts. The recipes are also a huge bonus and there are heaps of options. I do find them to be a bit carb heavy sometimes though.

Love this app. I like new exercises everyday. The trainers are great and the food choices are wonderful. The only complaint I have would be for Rulk. I find his motivation lacking, its always the same, and his exercise videos always seem to be the same. I skip his days. Other than that I use this app every day.

Great training programmes with loads of variety. The meals are excellent and the app has some really nicely thought out features. They seem to be actively listening to the community and adding good usable features.
Great programs- quick and to the point. Makes me sweat and different moves and methods. Meditations are really good, just wish they were longer. Most are 5-10 minutes. Recipes are also great.

Well made, very intuitive and well put together app. Content is great. Did the 6 week free trial (special offer due to Covid-19) and was in no doubt about keeping it going. The trainers that have been pulled together seem to be top of there game and have personality which goes a long way.

Absolutely amazing. Everytime I have used it it really makes me work and is always so fun and really makes you feel good about yourself completing each session. Ontop of that the meditation has really helped me during the Lockdown! Thank you guys for such amazing work!

Idk if it's something I'm doing or what but the app will not let me create an account. Tried Uninstalling and reinstalling it several times tried both on wifi and full 5g data, went through all the motions prolly 15 times with 2 different emails just to see the message "we cannot create your account at this time"

This app makes the the nutrition easy and the workouts challenging (in a good way). I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to get a program to do from home with minimal-no equipment or just a simple gym membership.

I was soooo excited to finally be able to have access to a gym and recommit to gym due to the sad fact that I now have a fupa. Download this app a few days back but never subscribed, it worked just fine asking for money. I will warn you, the moment I added my subscription I closed the app and drank some water to get myself into "Cardo mode". I attempted to open the app and it stated "Oops we dropped the dumbbell". This occured for an hour. Only way to unsubscribe is via email. Waste of time app

Didn't want to like it, I like weights and my cycling but I've been using this daily ontop of other fitness and it has kicked my ass. The yoga is a bit too quick for me so I'd maybe try a beginners app first but the rest of the app is top notch. That isn't to say the yoga isn't, in fact it looks amazing I'm just missing changes and would have to watch a few times first before starting it. I'm currently doing the unleashed programme and it is great during lockdow, I'll still use after👍

Amazing app, love the recipes, workouts and sleep visualisations. Completely changed my approach to fitness and have now been training regularly for 4 months with a noticeable difference in how I look and feel. I sleep so much better and generally feel like I've taken real control of my health and wellbeing. Well worth the price
Great set of workouts and varying levels of difficulty. Only suggestion for improvement would be if you are able to save workouts or allocate to specific days in the planner from the search function.

I did not install this App. I have no need for this App. I have a nearly new Samsung tablet computer - Some things get installed on it without my knowledge and consent - It is a PITA! -Sorry Chris, to give you a one star. It may or may not be your fault - Uninstalling. I will NEVER, EVER buy another Samdung product. Their hardware is great, their compulsory software "upgrades" mimic MALware! The bad parts are not easy to uninstall, but it is apparently possible using a tool known as ADB.
Overall, it's a great app! Some of the workouts use expensive equipment, but there's the option available to switch those out with workouts that use little to no equipment.

Love it! The best thing about the workouts is that when you're done, you've worked your tail off. Afterwards, though, you're not extremely sore and I found myself excited for the days workout instead of dreading it. I like several of the recipes, though I do wish it had more traditional meals.

The App Chris Hemsworth used to become Fat Thor. Summary: Provides coaching and diet content, but it can't tailor it to the user because it doesn't gather essential details like BMI or age. Providing diet and exercise plans without this information is ineffective at best, dangerous at worst. Got as a freebie but forced to pay for a year because of auto renewal. Expensive, and don't reccommed, you can find all the same content in a search engine for free. Insincere developer responses abound too

The workouts feel like they were actually designed for every day people and not just Olympic athletes! I've gotten stronger, more flexible, and more confident in my short 6 months with the program. The trainers are great and the fact that the daily workouts can be anywhere from 14-32 min warm up-cool down almost make you feel silly for skipping! Once I felt stronger and gained confidence I started the 6 week programs and I'm hooked! Diff difficulty levels available. Meal options are awesome too!

I thought this app was free for the first month. That's why I downloaded it in the first place. However after only having it 7 days I have been charged 29.99€. Like many people, I am stuck in quarantine and unable to go to work to earn money. I have 3 kids here and not even had a chance to use this app once before being charged so not happy at all.

I'm the most consistent with exercise I've ever been because of Centr. It gives you a workout to do everyday, with a rest day and a stretch day. The workouts can be done at home with low weight or no weights. It takes out the need to pick a workout from a library of 1000 videos. No guessing what you should be doing on any day.
Love this app. The recipes are all fantastic, the exercises are varied and challenging, and the meditations are great too. I've tried a lot of exercise programs but this one is the best yet

This program is helping me so much. Getting the right form, doing safe lifts, eating plan and the meditation and articles are all brilliant. This is the app I needed. Thanks to the whole team for putting this all together
App keeps breaking. Limited communication from the company. Paid for something that doesn't work.

Before the gs closed I loved working out to deal with stress. After I lost focus and stoped working out. I even started having trouble sleeping due to physical inactivity. This got me back on track, I feel good and this helps me get through my workouts. I love how they have modifications for everything too!!

I have tried many fitness apps and programs. Those apps left me feeling frustrated and discouraged. I'm so happy that Centr found me. I was feeling hopeless when it came to my physical health. Centr has sparked the hope inside of me. I love everything inside the app. The coaches, the different styles of workouts, the meal plans, Meditation podcast. I can go on and on. Thank you Chris and Centr Team for creating Centr and helping me develop a healthier body so I can enjoy life with my family. :)

** DO NOT DOWNLOAD** Doesn't let me cancel my subscription. They keep saying I could only cancel through my Google account but when I check there is no active subscription. I even contacted Google using the invoice number you guys gave me we still can't find an active subscription. I've been going back & forth for weeks now. This is so unacceptable. I should have never gotten this app.

I attempted to cancel the subscription; when I was notified of a charge to my account anyways, I immediatly notified them and they refused to void the still pending transaction. They will be sure to quote their cancellation policy which will apply even seconds after their new "subscription period begins." And even in a global pandemic, they do not care - seems to be a very robotic company.

This app is everything you need for wellness. Great workout programs and one-offs, amazing meals, and tons of helpful tips along the way. Would recommend this app to anyone trying to take control of their health at an affordable price.

Scam. I have been charged for 3 months despite cancelling my subscription. Customer support have been incredibly unhelpful and claim that my cancellation was not valid because I did it on the app (rather than the website) but the first time I was informed of this was seeing money taken out of my account. I have still not received a refund.

Pros: Plenty of workouts, mindfulness exercises and nutrition options. Shopping list functionality is dope. The fb community is very active and motivational. Cons: How can this advise you on workouts & nutrition to reach your goals if you don't even enter your weight in the app. The guidance appears to basically just select recipes and workouts at random with little to no "science" behind it. Why doesn't the daily planner use your current training programs instead random workouts?

When you cancel take a screenshot peeps! Absolutely disgusting customer service! I cancelled my subscription before the end of my trial due to the workouts not being appropriate for me and they have no evidence that I cancelled so I've now got a year subscription that I can't use! Customer service no help, they send me a pic of the emails they supposedly sent but I never got! Yet no evidence of my cancellation go figure!

Horrible!!! I canceled through Google as per instructed and it didn't work! They charged me still. I emailed to cancel and did it again this time on my computer through the website. They are refusing a refund even though i caught it the first day, didn't use it at all and emailed right away!! I'm emailing back to try again and if they fail to refund I'm gonna call my bank and report it as fraud since i canceled and it's their company that messed up.

HI, I downloaded this to try out in lockdown. I've got two torn ACLs so have to be specific about what exercises I do. I would also expect a reminder that the service is about to charge a subscription, nod now they won't return my money. This is theft as I do not want this service. I will be taking this further.

This app is absolutely hands down the best thing to happen to me in 2020. Works out soo much cheaper than the gym and you get a lot more for your money. The Facebook community group is also amazing as we all support each other around the world. From the workouts planner, meal plans, meditation and sleep visualisation, this app has changed my life for the better. Would 100% recommend to anyone. We are all legends and you deserve to feel good about yourself again! 🤗❤️👊💥💪🏻

Love this app so much. It takes the decision making and thinking about what workout to do out of the occasion which helps when you are busy and need to build up the habit of working out consistently again. The workouts challenge you more than you would challenge yourself. The instructors are encouraging and you feel like they're actually training you in person. I love it. I am not the type to leave reviews for anything so me writing this much after my killer workout tells you all you need 2 kno
Logging out automatically whenever I try to login. Tried multiple times to login

I signed up for the free trial and was still charged after the 7 days even though I cancelled on day 6. I emailed about it and just received a response about how their terms and conditions do not allow 'refunds or credits for unused subscription periods, accidental purchases, medical conditions, or any similar reason or event.' none of which of these were my situation as I am aware that every service has to provide an opportunity to cancel, this basic rule was not followed for me!

Seems like it could be a good app but I cant even login in. It won't let me login and when I try to reset the password, I never get an email. I have tried it with multiple different email addresses that have accounts.

LOVE. Meal prep, mental wellness, different workout routines, and a personal planner, plus more. I love the guided coaching on the fitness challenges, and self-guided coaching on my daily workouts. Joining the FB community months later made me wish I discovered it sooner. It's so wholesome! And the team is super responsive to needs. It's really awesome. How do I get a job here? Hahaha.

100% agree to all that all the exercises are very well crafted to each and every individual person. My only request is to adjust meal for me. As an Indian i cant get access to most of all this items.So if only that can be done. Totally recommended.👍👍👍
Love it. Workouts are time manageable, varied, easy to follow (by just listening...you don't necessarily need to have a constant eye on the screen).
I love it!! I was looking for something like this for years!! Best combination of training, fitness and menu options!! For all levels, for all tastes!! Amazing!! ❤❤💪🏋️‍♀️

It's exactly one month since I started using Centr and I feel absolutely fantastic! The exercises has great results and are so greatly explained I feel no discomfort in my knees and back where I have problems. The recipes are delicious and easy to prepare and gives me the chance to try different cuisines. The team is super sweet and supportive and it's pure pleasure to follow them. I'd say subscribing to Centr really made a huge positive impact on my lifestyle. Thank you!

Really loving the work outs, I'm coming direct from the couch and the beginner 6 week program is the perfect level. I'm sore but not so sure I'm giving up. The recipes are a bit difficult to follow as I only have access to the basics in a country town.

I love the recipes-they are easy to prepare, tasty and fresh and the whole family is enjoying them. The workouts are great too although I would say to start very gently if you are not someone who exercises usually-there is a lot of plyometrics which may be tough on the knees and calves.

I had no idea what I was doing at the gym so this app has been fantastic! Tutorials were great at the start, but the programs have been the best! Love the easy recipes even though I don't use them that often. Great all-round app!

Amazing fitness app by Chris H and the team, really enjoying the variations of exersizes, meal suggestions and the optional meditation segments which are nice for when i feel up for doing one. I hope the app continues to grow even further through time. 👌 - Luke

I enjoy this app because it's not just exercises but a range of recipes for all meals of the day. Helpful advice for fitness, eating habits, mental illness and much more. Definitely recommend this app and it is excellent value for money.
Absolutely love the app and how it functions. But mostly I love the trainers and the workouts. Very customizable, tailored to your weight and goals. Chris and his team are crushing the game!
So much varied and great content for physical and mental health. Really love the recipes too! Really easy to use and follow. Has been so great to keep fit and motivated during isolation.

I'm really enjoying this app. Like the structured programmes which are well led by great trainers. I feel motivated to progress through it and after a week I'm already seeing the benefits. Great job putting this together as it is superior to apps I have used before.
This is by far the best home work out app out there. If you are some one new to working out and have no experience or equipment it is fantastic, with workouts all the way to advanced.

Great app, let's you play music on your phone on top of the instructional videos. Great recipes and variation of exercise. In the middle of centr unleaded intermediate 6 week challenge and the results are worth it!

I really enjoy the 6 week workouts but dont always like the way the coaches workouts are done. E.g. for the warmup theres often no speaking or anything on it (a lot of them) so you just have to watch it the whole time to find out what they doing.

Great for working out at home. Workouts are short and intense when you push yourself hard through it. The diary helps you stay on track too which takes the thinking out of what to cook. Well rounded app.

Love it. This app can be life changing if you let it. Only gripe is the pace is a little quick I find myself working at a pretty good pace I think but I find myself a rep or two behind sometimes. Other than that this app is amazing!

Love the challenge Programs and the daily workouts (these change everyday but you can always access them in case you want to repeat one that you loved). The calming sleep meditations and visualisations are excellent and the recipes are delicious and easy to make.

The app is super user-friendly, I have never had any glitches or lags, and there is so much content to explore in terms of blog articles, workouts, recipes and meditations that I have yet to get bored.

Excellent fitness app! Food variety is great, workout variety is also great! The only thing it doesn't ask you for you weight, hight and measurements... so it is a little less personal that way and with that maybe we would get more personal macro nutrition. But maybe they will implement this in the future? Otherwise I'm loving this!

It's awesome! I love this app. All the programs on here are so cool and there's something for everyone. Love all the recipes, they are so easy and yummy. And the meditation and sleep visualizations are also great.
The app itself seems great, however my bluetooth earphones do not work with some of the training videos which is very annoying when it just turns on the phone's speakers. If that is fixed easy 5*

Really slick. Gives you the full package for daily workouts, meditation and meal plans with the ability to create a shopping list and adjust recipes depending on how many people will be eating it. Really great.

Excellent for home workouts with gyms unsafe or closed, or if you prefer at home. Has me sweating and aching, using muscles often missed with the mechanical movements of gym equipment. There is a variety of workouts with different structures and intensities. The meals are incredible as well. Highly recommend.

Love the app. I failed the first time doing the 6week free when covid hit but I went back at the end of the year and I have to say I found it easier the 2nd time around. Paid for the year as well now worth the money to keep you healthy.

Fantastic options for exercise, challenging but prevents you from going too hard too fast and going at a steady pace that builds overall body performance - great wellness approach with guides meditations too that have led to some of the best nights sleep I've ever had 👌

Unfortunately really disappointing. Nothing here that you can't get on so many free apps already. Just links to videos showing basic workouts and recipes for meals with unrealistic ingredients for the majority of people. Really not worth the price. Just do some online research and experiment with workouts and recipes that suit you.

Pretty good app. Food, workout and meditation in one place. Only downside is that the recepies often have a long ingredient list and prep time and that the subscription fee is on the more expensive side.

This is the best at home workout app I've ever used. Love the variety. I'm trying things I wouldn't normal try. I'm fairly beginner in my fitness and I'm finding the planner that's has been put together for me a good level of challenge.
It seems great! My only gripe so far is not being able to cast it to my TV. Trying to make sure your form is right while looking at a tiny screen isn't super easy.

Centr is a fantastic app and overall experience. The weekly planner for meals, workouts and more has really improved my diet, fitness and overall lifestyle. The app itself is user friendly, feature rich and makes it easy to keep fit or plan meals on the fly.

Centr is not just an app, it is a lifestyle. There is a planner that had the training sessions, food plan, meditations and more. It is easy to use with many different options. Once you try it you will not need any other fitness program. Thank you Centr!

So much fun and such variety of workouts with whatever equipment you have. They've got tons of options for whatever goal you have and whatever equipment you've got- tons for if you don't have any weights or equipment either. Super worth the purchase especially right now when gym spaces are limited!

If you're a complete beginner wanted to like exercising then yea try it. Though dont expect to become Chris with this app. Better get you ass of the couch and spend money to your local gym or buy some basic equipment. Circulating same excersises since let's be honest, with no equipment at all you cant do much! Cannot amend the food list, functions not working. Cannot amend your fitness plan either. Not sure what's the apps purpose or target group but Defo not for Intermediate or advanced

I absolutely love Centr! The workouts, the meals , the meditations, the articles, the snacks, the bonus workouts and the special programs! It was something I decided to do for myself as a founding member and I'm so glad I did. Thank you for all the work you all did to make thus happen!

Absolutely the most comprehensive mobile fitness app in the market today! It's got everything I need from body weight training, plyometrics, weight training, mindfulness and meditation, healthy recipes with a supplemental shopping list based off of the recipes. It's redonculous

Good layout of the app, great selection of trainers who are fantastic at delivering info at the right level, and a range of workout difficulties to challenge absolutely everyone from total beginner to high level athlete.
Great way of having varied workouts and so many meals to choose from to put in your shopping list. A little strange to navigate around the app at first but you soon get used to it!

Absolutely love this program!! My savior during this quarantine. I get bored easily and need to change routines daily and this was perfect for that matter. I also did the Unleashed Advanced 6 week program when it came out and loved it. My gym buddy and I have had a lot of fun!!

**UPDATE** So I cancelled the subscription, however renewal date came around and I was charged again, Centr said I didn't actually cancel and would not honor the cancellation. Now as I try to login and try and get some use out of the service they are trying to charge me again (even though the service is paid for for a whole year). So first the don't honor my cancelation and blame me for not canceling when I actually did, now they lock me out of the account after my account has been paid for.

Really great app. Workouts and healthy and tasty meals. They listened to our feedback and made an Android app and now have added the ability to choose your own workout music while still hearing the instructors

Awesome. For an at home workout, it's enjoyable enough to motivate you to want to do the next class tomorrow. I am doing begginner unleashed and it's not too exhausting to ruin your work day, but sufficient to make your muscles feel like they have been used. Especially when you are sitting at your work desk, it makes you realise that you had better exercise again tomorrow, because otherwise sitting will be the extent of your fitness.

I hate doing this cuz it's my boy Thor...but it is super un cool that the refund policy is trash ....Doing this at a real gym is illegal but because it's an app it's OK. I called the day of the auto renewal to cancel and they were unwilling to offer a refund and I see this happened to a lot of people in the reviews..Perhaps take this feedback into consideration.... Not cool in a pandemic. Especially on the day of the transaction which I now wear for a year just un cool.

Downloaded the app thinking awesome a detailed way to help me lose weight and get fit... went for the 7 day trail, then saw the price after the trail .... now undownloaded the app straight away.. so have no clue if any good as that is far to much and well more than I can afford .. honestly ridiculous price to charge

Amazing, didn't think there was an exercise for me as I have some restrictions from surgery and a frozen shoulder but following the trainer (Da Rulk) I am able to sweat and feel amazing as he has modified movements. I cancelled my membership before I found him and before I realized the food menu is amazing!!!! I now want to renew my membership but can't seem to find out how. Please help.

Great for works outs. But the UI for adding weights in the log book is terrible. You can't type in 150lbs you have to spin some scrolling wheel from 0 to 150. That's just asinine. Oh and this is great, how the heck do you edit a workout? Maybe ask before you automatically finish a workout. Come on people. What is this amature hour?
Its really great. Gives you great workouts, lots to choose from, meals and overall what to eat and do with your body to get in shape. I'd recommend this for sure. The recipes are great and easy too.

It really is a fantastic program. I love the way it blends nutrition, exercise, and mental health into one seamless app. There are so many varieties of work outs and exercise from Yoga to MMA. It has had a built in community which support each other. Could not recommend this higher, 6 out of 5 stars.

Going well now but took me a bit to get started. I don't typically have the ingredients for much of the recipes so that had me at a slow start. Also eating healthy seems to cost more too. I'm starting to use more and benefits the family too so we are all eating better foods.

Awesome! Great work outs, great tips. It has helped my strength and cardio to improve my marital arts ability. The app has taught me how to cook again. The dishes that are provided are fantastic especially when you put your on spin on them
Brilliant app with such a variety of exercises, there is so much to chose from. Food recipes are doable without spending a fortune on new things you don't have in your cupboard. Definitely recommend!

Great app, love the self guided and guided work outs. I don't follow the calendar as I can't customise it to my personal needs and some of the work out suggestions doesn't fit me. But overall great. Having troubles to run the app on my Ipad. Can I run the app from 1 account on 2 devices? Not at the same time but when I'm out I use phone and at my gym Ipad. Please let me know. 🤟🏻

There is nothing in the app you can't learn for cheaper elsewhere. Subscription trap. Have to go through 3 pages to unsubscribe, or you will be surprised with a bill a year later. If you want to look like CH, buy steroids, not this app. Centr team, I'll happily take down this review for a refund. Would love to see you guys prove me wrong and do the right thing but I'm not optimistic.

Awesome! Really am enjoying this app. Never thought about buying a subscription for a fitness app but now I hope to buy one for this app every time it runs out. Currently doing the ignite beginner and they really know how to keep your body working hard. Sadly, I had covid so I stopped for a week but I'm back and I am feeling better than ever. 10/10 would recommend.
App is easy to use, accessible workout programs for all levels, gym equipment not needed. I also like the inclusion of meal options, yoga and meditation. Very well done

I'm on week 3 of Centr Unleashed. The program is built that it takes you through the motions and makes you so much stronger. I don't feel burnt out like I have with other fitness apps. I'm sure the other programs are similar as well and there's lots of them! Having meditation, Challenge days, and meal plans is a great addition too.

it doesn't seem to filter correctly. When i try to filter workouts that only include dumbbells sand resistance bands, it gives me workouts that require a full gym. I was very hopeful, but am left disappointed.

Why are you trying to charge me when I canceled my subscription weeks ago? EDIT 2/22: I did cancel my subscription within the time constraints specified. Far before the time specified in fact. I really believe it's bad business to try to discredit a customer with an issue they reached out for help for on a public platform. I wouldn't be complaining here if I had received a timely response from your email team. What else do you want to justify or try to place blame for before you help me ?

So far I'm on wk 4 of using this app and I've managed to complete all four wks of the program and I'm still interested. Workouts are long enough, I have no problems casting which is why I left some other apps and doesn't feel too repetitive yet.
I did love this app, a lot of workouts for everyone. Currently broken. And un usable

Can't even use the app without going past a paywall, they should make it free to use for everyone with no ads so people can decide whether or not they find value in the app then opt for the premium version if they like it, not forcing people straight away to pay for a free trial and having to opt out as no one wants to be giving out credit card details to an app they just downloaded, a better option would be madbarz workout app.

I have used this app for 2 years. I can't live one day without this app. It has a lot of variety on workout and i think that's the main reason i can persist my workout routine for this long. The trainers are all fun and cool. I don't think i can find any app like this in the market. Great job centr!

Great app, I love the food, the trainers, the meditation & mindfulness and I love that I can use chrome cast my workouts. I have two minor comments I wish there were videos on how to get technique right i.e. how to actually do a press up correctly. And I wish the Cente6 workouts were more varied from week to week but I'm loving it, I feel strong and I can see myself getting stronger week on week. This app will change your life!

The Centr Team is wealth of health & wellness knowledge! They've compiled a plethora of well-thought-out regimens that support physical, mental and emotional health & well-being, for rookies AND experts! The recipe suggestions and swap-out feature is a game changer!!! As a natural health professional, athlete, and experienced trainer of 15+ years, I appreciate the option to use the suggested schedule as is, or tailor to my needs. We can always learn more! Keep up the good work, Centr Team!!

Great varried workout. Great trainers and meals are devine! Don't like a particular workout in your planner, then swap it out, same with the meal plan. Easy and simple to use. Yoga session are a bit quick for me personally, but I you can follow along as self-guided routine. Great way to get back into fitness and maintain your hard work 🥰
Nice platform. Easy to navigate, lots of content to explore. Well managed leveling, offering basic exercises as well as advanced. Instructors are excellent.

I have been using Centr, on and off, for almost a year. I credit it for keeping me in reasonable health over this period of time. The instructors are fabulous, the recipes are creative, the meditation and other components are wonderful. This is truly a lifestyle app worth the download and price.

Love the workouts, daily planner and 6 week programs. You can set your own goals such as losing weight, getting fit or building muscles, switch and do more trainings, and listen to the friendly banter. I cannot get the ingredients, but the meals look yummy while helping you with your goals, and for those with time, you can do the mindfulness too. It helped me plan my workouts during the long lockdown, and acts as a personal training to keep me disciplined to do my daily workout.

Bought this app to help me exercise from home. I am a beginner and struggled to know what to do with myself when I started incorporating fitness into my day to day - this app is extremely helpful, has kept me motivate and I've seen better results faster since using it compared to when I was on my own.

Centr has reignited my passion for fitness and health. The meal plans and recipes are wonderful, the workouts are engaging, and I even enjoy reading the daily blog posts. Whether you're new to fitness and looking to get healthy for the first time, out of shape ex high school jock, or complete gym rat, there's a workout for you. I honestly can't recommend this app enough. Thank you from the bottom of my heart
I do not know what is going on with the app, but it has been 3 days I cannot access ... I will change my rating when they solve the problem

Awesome! Has recipes, meditation and coached workouts - everything I've wanted all in one app with a calendar to keep me on track. The best fitness app I've ever used. Two weeks in and it's been lifestyle changing! Thank you x

Warning - don't get annual subscription as its very repeititive content - you don't get anything else out of it after 3 weeks. Have had multiple exchanges with customer service & they will not refund $120 for automatic renewal of my annual subscription that I cancelled months ago. Really disappointing experience actually & not what I signed up for. Turns out the only thing Centr are good at is marketing.

An at-home option that tailors to both the enthusiast and novice alike, the app is a huge credit to Chris and his team's expertise in terms of fitness, wellness and nutrition. I'd highly recommend to anyone starting out on their fitness journey, or even those looking to add variety or nuance to their existing routine.

I use this when I'm traveling for workouts, the trainers are great fun. I also started using the meal plans and there's some great options in there. LOVE that it makes a shopping list for me, and has all the macros listed too. Has a good all round focus eg sleep tips and stuff too. Thanks for making it!
I love absolutely everything about this app! It covers, mind and body with loads of tips to help along the way. The instructors are amazing and very motivational :)
Absolutely phenomenal, the ease of access, the daily workouts that are actually enjoyable and challenging. Excellent recipes and shopping lists, this is my most used app without question.

Great home gym workouts. All I have is a mat, adjustable dumbbells and an adjustable bench. So many of the workouts are weight free. I've made very minor adjustments to a few workouts to keep the flow going. Great job team!

Really good app, it's well designed.. people out here giving it 1 star without a proper review because they could not count 7 days properly. This app has everything from a simple work out to a an advance one, food and diet, stretch and coaching. Great app! Take advantage and use it properly
Great overall. Enjoy the various workouts. One slight problem is sometimes the video is either black or unable to load previews. Otherwise, I enjoy the app.
I really love this app. The workouts are challenging and I can swap something out if I don't like it. The recipes are delicious. And thr meditation exercises are just what I needed.

Love this app. Such a great range of different workouts and the meal plans are fantastic, takes all the thinking and planning out of getting fit. I really think there is something for everyone on this app. I signed up for the year and think it's great value for money.

Fantastic app, with variety to suit everyone and all levels no matter what ypur fitness goals. Have not found a meal on here I didnt like. Strongly recommend to anyone. Fantastic online community support as well and always evolving with new challenges for all levels.

4 Stars when I can add a bonus workout to any day. (Add from favorites or full list for example) 5 Stars when I can see everything that I've completed in the past Otherwise absolutely loving it. Would gladly pay double for yoga every day also
Took a bit to get oriented where everything was. I don't follow the structured plan they lay out, but there's so many exercises/recipes to mix and match it's well worth it

Just like Chris Hemsworth this app is legendary! I've been using this for about 5 months now and have seen amazing results. The programs are fun and very intense. There's ton to choose from and plenty of healthy recipes to keep you feeling energetic and ready for every day's workout!!

This app is very good. The coaches explain step by step everything to do. They teach you in 3 different ways. so it's good to know my level of each exercise. I will definitely invest again in this membership. Love it and believe me this works.
Chris and his team are amazing at what they do and having it in app form makes everything so much easier! I have learnt so much about training, health, nutrition and mindfulness from their program.

This app is garbage!!!! I tried to cancel my subscription and I couldn't find the way to do it! I'm not an idiot, I have many subscription services and this is by far the most hard and complicated of them!!! They literally steal your money. This sucks, my wife is a lawyer, we just started the papers to sue them, I know is a small amount of money but it's a fraud. Don't get this app.
Loving this so far (about 3 weeks in). The variety of coached and self guided workouts is perfect. Haven't tried the recipes but the ability to automatically add stuff to a shopping list is brilliant

Great app, great workouts. If you're just starting on beginner go though the trainer's and find one that best suits your level of fitness not all trainer's have the same workouts so take your time. Worth a try and stick with it!
Overall amazing experience so far three and a half months in! Love the variety of workouts and started adapting some of the things I've learned into some of my own daily routines.

Thsi app is amazing, i have been following the workouts and meal plan for months now and i really get a lot out of it! Though i have two sugestions 1. Would be to have a family subscription option. 2. I would like to see a specific program, like centr 6 and unleashed, that is based on chris's training program in preperation for thor and other smiliar movies Otherwise everything else is this app works great and i would stronlgy reccommened for people to give it a go !!

Been using for just under a year and it's taken our family by storm. Everyone gets involved even the kids which is great. It's more than just a celebrity name in the fact the workouts and plans are well structured. I do need to get my food sorted though but that's me not the app. Awesome can't recommend enough.

Awesome, great work outs, delicious and healthy recipes and no matter what your goals are there's something to fit your aims. I've only been doing it properly for a few weeks and can already feel the difference.one of the best moves I've made. Consider me converted.

The most engaging workouts! I used V Shred and it was nice but very un professional in comparison. The Centr crew adds motivation, the appropriate challenges and a little bit of humor. Thank you! I am very much enjoying my experience. Well worth the yearly subscription cost.

I've only had the app a couple weeks but I'm really enjoying it. The workouts are great, even for a beginner like me. The only thing I would like to see added is the ability to cast the workouts to a TV, especially during this C19 lockdown.

I signed up for this app because I couldn't go to the gym due to the Covid-19 shutdown. I've had more results with this app than anything I've tried before. In addition to the physical fitness, Centr's meditation and sleep visualization have been extremely helpful.
It is a great app that allows you to pick your meals and workouts. It also contains workouts with modifications so with little to no equipment you can still workout.

Its actually perfect, covers PT, diet and what to buy for the weekly shop all in one. The workouts are really tough and iv been going to the gym for 4-5 years (on and off) and there's so many excercises I've never seen or done before. Having to pay the $110 for the year pissed me off but now its pretty much working as a motivator to get the most out of the app and now its paying off. Awesome job Centr really appreciate it, made Melbourne lockdown a little easier.
Best workouts I've ever had! I absolutely love all the variety in programs, individual workouts, and coaching styles! Easily the best results I've ever experienced!

Bad, I tried millions of time to get my 6 weeks free trial I followed all instruction within the expiring time, but it kept saying error, and when I contacted customer service they refused to get me the free trial since I emailed them the day after the expiry fate of the promo. Really bad!!

Incredible app! The exercises and programs are amazing. Meal plans are included as well as meditation etc. The exercises fits really well into a busy schedule, or for travelling. Can really recommend!
This app works 1 out of 10 times. There are so many glitches it isn't worth your time.
It'd be great if this app actually worked. Keeps signing me out. Questioning what I'm paying for at this point
Logs out every time I log in. Getting worse day by day. It's day 2 now. I reinstalled yesterday Give me my money back
App is unusable. Log me out every. Single. Time. It's unbearable
Loved the app until it keeps logging me out over the past week. Please fix!
Like others happy to change to 5 star if they actually sort the issues with logging in.

I love this app! I love the recipes and nutrition plan. I love love love the instructors. I honestly how wholesome and 'complete' this app feels as a nutrition and health app. I've got my whole family on it
Update 11/8/2023: Cannot log into the app since yesterday and i see many other users in the Centr community have the same issue.
Excellent trainers, completely non-glitchy app, great recipes, great UI
Always awesome workout with Alexz! She can read in my mind and yell me not to dare when it s the right time lol
App hasn't been working for some time. Unable to access programs.
Thanks for fixing the authentication issue. The app works now!
Do not subscribe. The app is broken and users across the globe can't even login
Easy to use. Good UI. Easy to follow instructions.

I initially subscribed to this app for the workouts but I'm remaining subscribed for the meal planner. This app makes planning, shopping for, and cooking a healthy diet a breeze. The workouts are great and push you hard in all the right ways but this app is worth it for the meal planner alone.
Can't even login or create an account. Keeps crashing
Has been unusable for over a week with no resolution in sight and seemingly no urgency to fix the problem.
Application and website stopped working and still not back after 48 hours.

Very useful and mindful App! Trainings all balanced by difficulty and the style of the trainings you like. HIIT, Workout, Zumba, Pilates, Boxing, MMA. During the training they show you difficult variant and easy one, all at once, so you can start easy and day by day upgrade. You have easy daily schedule, you choose you variant of trainings - lose weight, gain muscles or else. You can choose trainings with equipment or without - train at home or in gym. All sequences timed, so you don't lose time
Keeps crashing!! Even the website.

I love this app! It has a wide variety of excerices that fit your mood and fitness goal/level and is the best exercise app I've ever used. It also has great meditations and meal ideas that helps keep you accountable!

Instructors are great, food options are varied and interesting enough to actually look forward to. Bringing in the mindfulness side as well, I honestly couldn't ask for or expect more from Centr. The team have done a cracking job!
Great diversity in styles of training! The only improvement I would like to see would be a function to track the weights you do in the app to better track your progress.
I love the app and how easy it is to use. I love the workouts ane the variety. However the app crashes at least once a day. Today it crashed 4 times.

Great. On stop shop for my fitness needs. Love that it includes meals and snacks based on my goals, then adds them to a shopping list. Plus a huge library of guided and self guided workouts from weights, yoga, Pilates and more so I have no excuses. I only wish with weights it could track how much I lift each week to track my progress.
Very helpful. Keep up the good work guy. Looking for more challenging exercises
Love the app. Makes it super easy to use and has a ton of content. Workouts recipes, blog posts. Really makes getting in shape easy. Love it and definitely would recommend!

Love this app! There's so much flexibility with the workouts and I love all the trainers and the food is amazing. Having scheduled meditations is really ensuring I spend that extra time for me. Love the concept and it works great #eattrainlive

Terrible customer service. Their website FAQ says they will reply within 24 hrs. Expect a week. I forgot to turn off auto renew because I was busy getting laid off from my job and trying to survive through a pandemic. When I implored them to help, they said too bad I should have read the terms and conditions. So, don't expect kindness from this company. Since I'm being forced to subscribe, I figured I should use it, but the app crashes randomly. Such garbage.
Has a bit of everything, exercises are easy to follow and have multiple difficulty levels to suit the individual user. Stay consistent and this is well worth it!
Love the app, but can't use since the last couple of days. Having issues logging in - was there a recent update? Keep getting 'we dropped a dumbell' and login session expired... 🤷
I love this app! It provides a plan for achieving a healthy lifestyle and makes it's easy to follow. Yummy recipes! Awesome workouts! Great mediations! Unbelievable support. Total game changer.

Very inexpensive personal trainer Pros: workouts are great, meal plans and smoothies are great(if nothing else I change some ingredients to my liking), I like how the workouts progress in difficulty(keeps me on track) Cons: I wish the previous weeks workout weights, reps, etc would carry over to the current week. Overall: I wasn't the healthiest and haven't worked out in years. I was 182, moved around, and now I'm 210 consistently and fit into my old size 34 pants. 👍

Loving the app so far. Have been using it for almost 3 weeks now and have been loving the features. The meditations are so helpful and the menus are really diverse with lots of options such as vegan or gf.

Love this app! The programs are kept fresh and new and always challenging. Trainers are great, you feel like they are there with you and the recipes are delicious, no complaints from the whole family!

Having the hardest time getting my refund, Centr customer service keeps saying Google play bad to process it when it is the developers responsibility to do so, all they have done is pass the ball and not take responsibility to process the refund. I love the app but since they were offering the 6 week free trial 2 days after I signed up I figured they would be good and let me cancel whilst all this crazy pandemic is going on. Now i had to create an appeal through Google play to try and get it.

Enjoy no longer having knees or a lower back if you're over 250lbs and older than 35. This did more harm than good. The warm up and cool down exercises are quite arbitrary and do little for preparing and cooling down the muscles worked. Incredibly leg heavy. The personal trainers are too chippy and come off as disingenuous. If you're already young and healthy, this will probably propel you further in your fitness goals. If your like me, start somewhere else like the aerobics room.

Great workouts, recipes and the like. I love the app. If the daily planner was able cater a bit more specifically to me that would be even better. Adding in more stretching and yoga would be great as well

The app was great at first but now the videos for the weight lifting that show you how to do it no longer load but the timer still counts and everything. My wifi is strong so its not that. Hope you can provide a fix
Great workouts, great instructors who help keep you motivated. Excellent selection of workouts and plenty of hard programs. I definitely feel the workouts and feel good after accomplishing them!

It is honestly the best workout and wellness app. Always lots of added recipes with plenty of variety and 6 week programs are added quite frequently. The centr team are always looking for ways to inspire and keep everyone motivated.

It has been solid so far. I'm just completing one of the programs now. I appreciate the self guided version that allows me to take it to the gym and do my workouts. It allowed me to build up to the exercises in the coming weeks, getting me stronger and ready while not burning me out. It allowed me to get better form and confidence on exercises I wasn't sure about or had hurt myself doing in the past. So far I'm happy with my purchase and what I have been able to accomplish with it.

So far I'm loving Centr and the community that comes along with Centr.. There is a lot of love poured into this app and it is well worth the price. The workouts range from beginner to advanced. It comes with a variety of excersizes.. from body/dumbbell excersizes to yoga and gym workouts.. It has it all.. The trainers are awesome.. the recipes look fabulous :)..The meditations are well thought out. It has so much to offer! I'm also seeing results in my mood/body which is great.
Amazing experience with the workouts, challenging even though the exercises look simple. The meal plans are detailed and the focus meditation is fun to use. Totally worth it.
Great exercises, recipes. Just love the whole thing. The planner is amazing, takes all the hard work out. Also the food is incredible, the kids and I love the spinach and ricotta gnocchi

Very good, especially the workouts without kit. Feels pricy but I haven't compared it to other apps. Hemsworth is more of a poster boy for the app but the trainers that are involved are very good indeed.

The short workouts everyday are awesome. You always have time to do them. I am following unleashed intermediate with no equipment and it's one of the best programs I have ever done. You can do it anywhere. Highly recommended

This app will not connect to the internet. I've been trying for 2 days. Restarted phone multiple times. Uninstalled and reinstalled the app. I've never even been able to set it up, and now I can't even log in. Every time I try it says " No Internet Connection. Please Try Again"

Excellent app where professionals do the thinking for you, you just follow their lead to a healthier you. Training, meal plans (don't follow myself, looks good) and meditation (should you need it). Not free, but definitely worth it

This is a fantastic app! It's a full package that I haven't come across before: workouts tailored to your goals and fitness level + meals tailored to your diet. I absolutely love the trainers and the sessions, but what sold me on Centr and not the competitors was the food. I've always struggled with pairing the workouts and diet. Centr makes is stupidly simple, at least for me. My only, and I do mean only grapple with Centr is the fact that it doesn't come with any progress trackers. While this is certainly not a deal killer, it would be nice to have a place to drop in your daily weight or waist size to see the progress. Again, there are other apps that do that so it's not big deal. Perhaps one day Centr will produce an update with such features?? In the meantime get this app now. I said NOW!!

Been a Centr member from day 1 (Feb 2019). Used many different workout apps/programs but this is by far the best. Excellent customer service, bunch of trainers and experts who always engage and interact with the community and of course, the community itself. Made some good friends all across the world where all of us the same goal. To better and be the best, healthy version of ourselves. 5*
Great setup. Would love it if there was a "done" marker when doing work-outs through 'Explore' - like in the guided programs. I can't tell/remember which ones I've completed before.

1000000 times better than a gym membership. I have just started the Centr 6 training program and have been following the vegan meal plan with a cheat meal once every 3 weeks. The weight has melted off me and I'm starting to see huge differences in my physical appearance in terms of body tone. Personally in terms of health and fitness I'm in the best shape I have ever been in. Absolutely zero regrets! Love this app

Love this app. The exercise program has changed my life and my home workouts. The meals and recipes are delicious . The meditations and the kids sleep meditation worked a treat for my 4 year old. The Centr Community is very supportive also. I started 6 weeks ago just as lockdown started in the UK and my gym closed. This has really helped me achieve some great results from home.
Really good app. 2 points for improvement. 1. Audio instructions like the Nike app and 2. Keep running in the background so I can switch between apps in my rests without the countdown stopping

Perfect if you have a gym next door or some material at home. It would be greate if we could have more workouts with no equipment (not only just cardio but some arms/chest workout wouldbe great !). For none English speakers it would also be cool if the recipies would be written in different languages.

7 days to start seeing results! Within the trial period alone I started seeing more definition in my upper body. The meal plan is what sets this one apart from many others like it. It really is true what they say " you can log in as many hours as like on a treadmill, but you'll never out run your fork."
