I'm starting on a wonderful journey, and I think this is the best to reach my goals before the of my subscription.

The app isn't working! It always says 'Network connection lost.' Please fix this issue right away! The programs are great but I need to be able to access it through the app on my phone. I don't want to use the browser.

You get it all in one app! Workouts, nutrition, meditation and best of all a great, supportive community online. The first fitness avenue that has had me enjoying and wanting to work out, even when I'm on my own at home. I've also found it so much cheaper than the monthly cost of a gym, which is an added bonus.

Amazing app! Been using it since more than a year and I have not been disappointed once. The coaches are great and there are many different workouts. Some require equipment and others don't. Thank you
The app is improving. It would be great to have the chance to use it offline as well, even when showing only the images it uses almost 1gb per session.

The recipes and meditations are great, but the yoga videos are a little hard to keep up with. If there was any way to make them easier to follow that'd be great. Maybe diagrams or more yin yoga tutorials, just for those who like to take it slow with yoga!

I've been enjoying this app for a few months now, and after the introduction of Centr Power am liking it even more! Great, easy to follow workouts, some delicious recipe ideas and I might never have gotten round to given meditation a try if it wasn't for this app, so for me it's been excellent.
Love this app! Really easy to use, great content. I love the wide range of workouts and the easy meal plan. Energy levels are amazing after a few weeks.

Really enjoying the app so far! I love the routine of exercising every day and the variety of the workouts. I've been using the app for 7 weeks now and was a bit concerned about injury, working out every day, but I'm feeling great. I'm also feeling much stronger.😊

Signed up for a 7day trial with no real intention on actually signing up coz 'how good can an exercise app possibly be' right?! How wrong was I!?! This is legit amazing! Uve converted me, Im signing up for a yr! The workouts are killer, the recipes are fantastic and the rest is just an added bonus! So much variety in EVERYTHING! ♥
Great selection of workout videos. I use this mainly for workouts, I haven't tried the recipes but I really enjoy the wide variety of workout options and varying levels of difficulty
Awesome app. Tons of variation, based on skill, equipment, effort and type of training. Include recipes for eating healthy as well. Well worth the money in comparison to a regular gym membership.

This app is nice but the auto-renew feature and refund policy are pretty poor. I don't have time to use the app this year and forgot to cancel before the auto renewal. The company refused to refund the cancelation even though the purchase was made the same day. Basically, I'm stuck paying $120.00 for an app I won't use.
The workouts are clear and easy to follow. I love Tabata style with the built-in timer on screen. The little preview of the upcoming exercise also is sooo nice. Great job guys!
Great app. Layout is good and easy to find the workouts you want. Good variety of options with filters as well. Has really helped me stay fit.

Just an amazing app, whether you are a pro or beginner,very flexible, you can adjust the level of workout.Also,a lot of workouts to choose from,of all kinds, from pilates and yoga to boxing, functional training, HIIT.

The best workout app I have used in a very long time. I've stayed committed and shown up regularly. There is a workout to suit whatever time frame you have available which is great for a busy mum of 2 under 3. Amazing!!

Great variety with the workouts and lots of fun which helps to keep the exercising interesting. Genuinely delicious recipes, meaningful meditations and a few bonuses from Chris himself. Best app I've ever downloaded. The only thing missing is Chris wishing his Legend members a happy birthday.
Love the workouts, but sometimes they only do one side so I pause and do other side. Meals, slowly getting head into it, like it that they are achievable groceries and cooking times.

The fitness apps so far...i never be consistent in workout until i found centr..it help me more fit and consistent doing workout. Meal plan is great and we can swap the menu also..best apps..it would be more better if can connect with fitness watch like fitbit to track calori. Keep good work teams !!
Really versatile app, there is so much choice you never get bored with the workout options. It also covers all fitness levels, so something for everyone.

Easily the best workout app I've ever tried! I grew really bored and unmotivated going to the gym and doing random routines found online. Centr allowed me to enjoy working out again. I also got great results within a few months. Thanks so much to the team, amazing job!

DO NOT TRUST! Even if you cancel they don't register it and keep charging. All positive reviews are days apart and same wording, clearly paid staff and others to push down all the negative reviews! They keep charging you after you cancel in the app, then try to say you're "changing your mind" (vs them scamming). Response below implies I didn't cancel, but the entiure issue is they don't register the cancellation...this scam made the news in Australia but they won't acknowledge this or action. Emailing as suggested below is ineffective and they'll just gaslight you.

I love it! Don't know if these exercises truly contribute to muscle gains, even when selecting the appropriate weights, but I freakin love the recipes, just wish the ingredients themselves were not so hard to find, stuff like dukkah and fennel bulb and specialty stuff like that, but overall fantastic!

THE BEST WORKOUT PROGRAM EVER // I've never kept up with a workout program ever! It's always hard to stay motivated, but with the Centr app, it's possible!! I show up every day and I FEEL the results! Just bought my year's worth of it and HERE WE GO!

Worse custumer service Dont doit is my advice , I pay for this app a year ago I use the app 4 time maybe 5 time. The app is no for me. I did everything on the website I clock the bottom of inactive this year I got charge 95.99 again. When I send email they say I don't read the contract.Yeah I deactivate a year ago and u still changing with out any email notification. Your company is a vampire and give 0 on rate I don't have that option.

Already after 8 weeks seeing noticeable gains. Great app all the way around! Love the attention to lifting, nutrition, personal wellness and "Rulking" Totally worth just having someone tell you you're a legend! The personal wellness is great for refocusing your attention on what's good in this life. And I would pay for the app just to hear Chris do his 2-3 minute meditations on life!! Totally worth it! Kevin

Love this app and have been using it since 2020, but last two days I can't cast to my Samsung tv with Google Chrome cast. My OS is good, anc my tv is a snart tv. The app allows me to cast but won't connect. All other streaming apps let me cast as usual.

The life coach of apps. When you wake up centr is there to guide you through a balanced day in most areas, fitness, diet, meditation, you name it. Very handy is the meal planner and creating a very easy shopping list. Only missing feature would be to share meals with your partner. 5 stars

I joined Centrfit on day 1 and have enjoyed the experience ever since. When the Centr team came out with the app for Android it made my experience even better. I have been able to take the program anywhere and utilize all the different features that adjust to my lifestyle. Centr has been a vital part of my life, creating balance with my mind, body, and spirit. I'm in way more shape than I have ever been and staying in shape has been more meaningful and fun, thanks to Centr. Thank you!

Amazing...!!! Joined during the 6 weeks free offer and ended up on a full year's membership. The variety of the exercises is great and made me not to think of going back to gym. Definitely recommend it. Thank you guys at centr...!!! UPDATE ALMOST 2 YEARS WITH THE APP. IT GETS GETTING BETTER AND BETTER. THE WORKOUTS, THE SUPPORT AND THE COMMUNITY ARE FANTASTIC. THANK YOU Chris & Elsa and the WHOLE GANG for creating such an AMAZING, NOT YOUR ORDINARY, FITNESS APP...!!! ❤️💪🙏

This app is great for anyone really. I started my plan in the first day of summer last year and now am looking a lot different. I was a normal skinny kid and is now looking like a total beast compared to before. I'm the strongest guy in my class as I am typing this. Most of the meals are great and healthy in my opinion, and I love how you can plan everything.
Coa he's I selected are fun and easy to follow. Enjoy coming to work out
Brilliant App for those who want a concise guide on nutrition and fitness. It's very easy to set and use and brilliant value for money. I certainly saw positive results in just a few weeks.

No REAL free trial. It says free trial, but takes you to the subscription page. That's not correct. I'm glad I didn't subscribe and uninstalled the app. Cause later read reviews of people being charged on day 1 itself. In the name of marketing and "policy" this is cheating. If the app is really good and is suppose to help people with their health goals then a REAL free trial and not bounded by subscription should decide itself. If the app is good ppl will stay.

This app has helped me for over 12 weeks feel healthier: body and mind. The recipes are delicious and unique, the workouts keep you on your toes, and the meditation/sleep visualizations just feel wonderful during this crazy year. It is worth it!
Really good (HARD) workout! I wish the instructors would add some new things from time to time because it gets repetitive, but it is definitely making me fit.

With this app you get a full wellness experience. You don't have to plan ahead for workouts. The recipes are really tasty. They even have mental wellness with meditations They post helpful blogs so you feel part of a community. This has been a staple app since the gym has been closed.
Great motivational fun workouts! Instructors are having a good time while kicking your butt. Nice food options with easy recipes for healthy meals. Great way to maintain your fitness goals.
Too many clicks to adjust workouts on the fly. It can interrupt the flow of my workout. Some of the features can be hard to find if I need to modify something.

Love the app, only suggestion would be to allow for downloadable workouts (even if available for 24-48hr periods after loading) for those on the go or traveling with limited access to wifi sometimes. Program is great otherwise.

Absolutely amazing. I love this app, the food, the workouts... Continuous development is in process as they just added more workouts in it. Amazing and affordable app for people that are actually serious about their fitness goals! Highly recommended

Really good app. Never been a gym person. Got this due to COVID-19. Great place to start for beginners, especially if you dont have equipment. I recommend cooking the meals to get the most out of the app. The food is proper delicious. Actually enjoy cooking now.

This app changed my life. I have gone from someone who forced herself to go to the gym 3 times a week yet not feeling like anything was done, to a girl who misses the gym on rest day and loves to go 5-6 times a week and every single time feeling stronger than yesterday. I have a saying, "sore today, strong tomorrow". This app will make you feel it and see it. From workouts to delicious food, this app has it all, and to top it all they have a wonderful FB community worth checking out!!!

Great workouts. One thing I'd change is the planned meals. The ingredients vary too much within the day or the week. It's really hard to keep up with. Yes you can swap meals but what's the point of the planner then?

Great option for do it yourself motivators. Great workouts that get your heart rate up and the coaches keep you going ***Updated*** still 5 stars because the workouts are great but I would like a way to adjust the workouts so that it starts my week on Saturday instead of Monday. I play soccer Wednesday and Friday evenings and use Thursday for my rest day but i can't set the weekly agenda to do that so I either have to swap the workouts out or just scroll through the days.

I got billed for the app even though I was in the trial period. I tried telling customer service that I would like to have a free trial, was refused saying I had installed the app earlier. Even asked them to check if I had used the app, I'm sure they have logs to check that. But won't. That said, the app is quite good. If only you could fix your onboarding flow.

When I started using this app it was a last resort for me, I was trying to put on muscle for over a year with no results, eating nothing but chicken rice and egg but started using this app and the meals are incredible I'm barely having cheat days anymore because there just isn't any point and I've gained 2 stone of lean mass so far, would definitely recommend

Best overall training app on the market, workouts are short but really challenging, have looked for a guided programme for a long time and this is the perfect all round system I've seen so far, thanks guys!!!

I downloaded this app based off some really good reviews and I have to say it's really good I'm only doing the workout section of this at the moment but I'm only on week 2 of. The centr 6 program and I am starting to see some significant muscle gains as well ass some major fat loss. I definitely recommend this app.

Was skeptical at first but love this app! A friend suggested the meal plan can be take it or leave it and I've not bothered but I love love love the trainers and the variety of workouts available. I expect I'll be using this for years to come!

Wouldn't stop charging me, I've been emailing their 'hello email address no one responds! I've given up on getting my money back. , I just want it to stop! Edit: I don't have any responses from you, thats why I've emailed multiple other times. Please email me again or respond to either my yesterday or today's email. Thank you. Edit 09/09 - You've charged me again.! I'd strongly advise against getting this app. Its impossible to get out of.

So I was taking Yoga classes before this app, but then I got word(with my #MilitaryWifeLife)it was time to move again,&I actually became afraid that I wouldn't be able to find another amazing yoga teacher again, like I had... I was truly at a loss&felt so depressed and down!😭 Then Chris totally quenched all those fears,&I met some AMAZING Yoga Trainers through this app. These ladies have been so sweet,such a major inspiration to me,&so helpful!!! ❤️This is so much more than a fitness app y'all.
Excellent! The variety of workouts and constant switching time intervals in all programs keep you on your toes. Just over a month of use and I am loving it.
Extreme well design from a web app perspective and through the customer experience. Truly capture everything you need to get in shape. Also, the food recipes are amazing

Love the workouts but honestly if you want food and workout this ap is super unhealthy I looked at one of my day full of eating and it totalled 1036 calories this isn't even the bare minimum a woman should be eating it's an eating disorder waiting to happen. This should be fixed massively as it's honestly very messed up!

This app is the best exercise app I've ever used! With price points at less than most gym memberships, you get guided workouts and a meal plan. The guided workouts also come with short video tutorials on how to do the workout and offers low impact alternatives. Furthermore, the app encourages you to go at your own pace and do what is comfortable. I've recommended this to friends who are turned off by gym membership and personal trainer prices who still desire a more structured workout regimen

Great workouts. Had been doing bootcamp for years but this is as good. Love the programs as it makes me commit to daily workouts and I tend to do beginners through to advance so sorts out months of exercise routine. when I run out I look at the individual exercises or I guess I and start again as been over a year since I started the first program of centre 6. Lots of options including weights etc to do and saves alot of travelling time when I can do it at home. Great value for a year!!

Excellent way to build good nutrition and fitness all levels. Two suggestions. It would be great to have a way of finding beginner workouts for Cardo Monday strength Wendesday and stretch Friday. Also more vegetables in meals would be great for those on low carb plans.

Cannot recommend this app enough! From providing endless recipes and workouts and having seamless operation it's perfect. Perfect for learning new things and keeping on top of your grind. Worth every penny!

This is a great app for coached workouts and it also has lots of recipe ideas for any dietary requirements. It is best used alongside a calorie tracking app like my fitness pal. This has been one of my top purchases of the year for health.

Fantastic app. Been sticking to the workouts for a month now and seeing progress. If I start using the diet plan as well I'm sure my results would be huge. But meditations are great and a quick way to get my mind right
Great plans. The GUI could be a little bit more accommodating to things such as full screen and timer count downs. Other than that, it's great!

I signed up for a free trial and it didn't really suit me so I canceled my subscription days before the trial ended but I still got charged for 3 months. $64 I could've used somewhere else for something I wanted.

I love this app. I've tried a couple and this is the best one by far. It gives you everything you need from a variety of workout styles to meal plans to meditation. This app is loaded with information and guides to help you on your fitness journey.

Second time writing this review, as it appears as though my initial review was removed. Upon downloading the Centr app, it stated that I would receive a 7 day free trial, but it also made you select a subscription that would apply after those 7 days. I was immediately charged the full year subscription price when I signed up for the trial, and Centr support refuses to refund me because someone with the same name has used the free trial before. Stay away if you have a common name.
Easy to use, customizable program with awesome world class trainers. There is plenty of variety in all of the features from workouts to podcasts to recipes. Decent value for a yearly membership.

Brilliant app! Really saw some fantastic results from it! I 110% recommend it for anyone of any age! And shame on everyone dragging Chris' name through the mud because they forgot to cancel after the free subscription. It's not an apps responsibility to remind you to unsubscribe. Take some responsibility!!
The programs are all around 30 minutes with minimum equipment. Perfect for building up fitness habit into a busy life style. Loving it so far!!

Very good app only wished during the workouts you could exit app and time wouldn't stop apart from that it's great, great meal plans some might not be to your taste but you can swap them out which is class.

Centr itself is great. If I were rating Centr this would be a 5 star review. However I'm rating the app. The app doesn't have screen casting functionality for the workout videos. The web browser version of Centr does. This is a fatal flaw. Uninstalling until this is rectified. Update: thank you for updating the app to support chromecast. Here's your 5 stars!

I've been doing this program for about 2 months now. I'm currently in some of the best shape of my life. The food, workouts, and experience is unbelievable. It makes you want to show up everyday. They let you choose from hundreds of meals and workouts. Take it from someone who's done Bodybuilding, calisthenics, powerlifting and the infamous Athletics X. This is the ultimate workout program for balance and longevity. Amazing work centr keep it up. This program is made for anywhere and anytime.
I've been using for about three months now and love it. The variation, the instructors, the workout themself. All around good program. I signed up for a year with no regrets still.
This app will make you obsessed with fitness. Makes you want to workout. Everyone on it is amazing and push you and encourage you. When you start seeing results it becomes fun not a workout!

Shouldn't even be described as a fitness app because it is just so much more! It is hands down the best one I have ever used and find it hard to imagine any other fitness app even coming close. This is NEXT LEVEL! Cannot recommend enough!

Had a free 12 month trial, during which I cancelled my subscription as I didn't think it was going to be worth the price to renew it when the time came. When that time came, Centr attempted to charge me for a 1 year membership anyway. Luckily, the card was no longer active and they couldn't.

So far this looks like a great app with yum food and strong workouts. You will need to have some basic equipment or find a substitute. It would get 5 stars if you could Chromecast it to your TV to make the workouts easier to follow/do. EDIT - See super fast reply from team. I will email you lovely team, because I can't figure out how to do it, soz newb on Google pixel/ laptop x
Absolutely incredible! So many options and the workouts are amazing! If you are a beginner, the instructions are super easy to follow! Love it!!!

Good workouts! I almost wasn't going to sign up because I don't care for all the meal prep and mindfulness stuff. All I want is a workout app... But it's easy to ignore all that and just focus on the exercises.

Finally an app with modifications that apply to the equipment I have at home. It's always with gym machines or no weights. I have some stuff at home but had trouble finding an app that would do a mix. Ive been at this for 2 weeks now and I'm loving every day.
Fantastic content, however the app needs a favourite button for workouts, and download option for off-line workouts. Don't let this deter you though, the workout/meals are the best.
The exercises are great for someone getting back into a fitness routine. The instructors provide modifications and motivation. The recipes are easy to make and delicious.

Joining up to the RAF I used to box when I was 18 so I'm constantly shooting myself down for how unfit I am now 7 years later, so I decided after doing the RAF fitness tests I need to do something about my fitness and this app has been an absolute godsend. I've been following the diet plan albeit only one of the days it gave me because it tastes incredible and I'm breaking into a sweat with each and every workout. Absolutely love this app not a bad word to say about it!

The app is alright but man do the terms suck. I downloaded it for the free trial to try it out, discovered it wasn't for me. Uninstalled the app and so clearly have not used it but realised I've been charged for almost 6 months with no chance at refund...

Hands down the best health and fitness app I have seen. Enter your info, Centr gives you a plan to meet your goals. Plan includes workouts, delicious meals/snacks & mental health plus bonus articles on health & wellness. Swap out workouts or meals anytime & still be on the plan. The app creates a grocery list as well. Subscription to their service is super reasonable. Join their Facebook group (also amazing) for accountability/support. Working out with Hollywood trainers is also a nice bonus!

For someone who lives in a isolated situation this app gives plenty and some. I am a farmer who has decided to take care of himself for a change. Just hit 40 and basically haven't done anything physical apart from farming for 13 years since retiring from rugby. To workout with a professional at my time and place is great. The meal planner, yoga, pilates, meditation are all a bonus. A suggestion though, is to link shopping list with Coles or Woolies, surely Chris knows Curtis? Make it happen.

Ive had the app for about 6 months and really dont have an issue with bugs. Great new programs have launched. I do wish that programs would show up on the daily Planner though. Good recipes to follow as well.

In October I began my fitness journey because I needed a lifestyle change for heal purposes. I'm a huge Marvel fan so I was drawn to Centr because of Chris Hemsworth's attachment to it. While Chris doesn't have much to do in the actual app the other trainers have kept me engaged in particular Luke, Ashley, and Rulk. I've tried other apps and program in the past and lost interest very quickly. Great techniques for beginners and awesome meal planning features. 1000% recommend Centr to everyone.

I'm loving it.!! Amazing workouts for anyone. Before being a workout it will tell you how long the workout will be and what equipment is needed or if any is needed. Awesome food, you can make a grocery list. Filled with a lot of features to help better your life physically and mentality.

DO NOT USE THIS APP YOU WILL BE SCAM OUT YOUR MONEY.. I haven't use the app in over a year and today I got charged for another yearly subscription. I don't even have access to the app anymore. And their policy is horrendous. They're just here to scam you out your money. Customer service was terrible if you're trying to get a refund they won't give you your money back at all cost and I think thats unfair because my hard earn was STOLEN from me. Says alot about a company who only want your money.

I have loved using this app! Each day you get a new workout and it provides a good variety (hiit, strength, mma, boxing, Pilates and yoga). The recipes are delicious and can even just provide you with inspiration for some new meals to cook. The app works great and there are no ads. 10/10

Um, app no longer let's you in 'AT ALL', until you pick one of the subscription options, classy. No thanks, as long as that stays, the app will be immediately closed. Update: Ah, reading comprehension fail by centr support, it seems.

I use Centr supplementally but the meal planning and making grocery lists for you makes it so easy if you want to be hands off for the week and want a regimen to follow. Overall, love how the app is focused on overall wellness, not just "Get swole like Thor" or somethin. Best overall fitness app I've used.

A great variety of trainers and programs to expose the user to new methods and modalities. User friendly, easy to follow, short and sharp (& effective) workouts & nutritious and delicious meal options. I also love the importance that's placed on mental wellbeing and a holistic approach to health (I.e. meditation & sleep hygiene). 10/10

App should allow downloading of the training beforehand . Sometimes, half the time is over by the time the video starts playing . Training also doesn't seem to customize for the person . An intermediate training by xx trainer can be super difficult vs another intermediate training by yy trainer . Not the best training but a good lifestyle app App should also allow a slow mo video pre exercise . Pardon my low intelligence, Some of the exercises are a little complex (eg hulk sequences)
Great app with some awesome training programmes and food/snack choices. Can't wait to see some results after a few months. (Remember what ever your goal is - adjust your calories) :)

It has does exactly what I hope it would have done. Challenge me and let enjoy everything it has to offer. Programs and training are great. The food recipes are amazing. The best bang for buck I have ever spent.

It may discourage you in using this app with the higher cost, but trust me, it is worth it! I went from not working out at all to working out 6 days a week in just 2 weeks, and I'm about a month in and have already felt a major strength difference. Trust me, this is way better than any gym membership or those workout YouTube videos.

I really really love this app. .very user friendly. There's so many training styles and trainers to choose from and the food/recipes are easy and delicious. I'm getting fitter and slowly losing this ISO weight!!!

A wonderful, well structured app with a myriad of resources for your physical and mental health. The app also has a functional and varied meal plan available to users, with new recipes being added regularly and Mondays reserved as as a vegetarian day. Worth the money in my opinion and I would recommend.

This app hasn't worked at all except for the first day I tried to use it I'm on the first free 6-week trial and I'm not getting anything for free it's just a big huge bug issue where it doesn't want to go on when I try to open it up it just loads and says please try again so here's the deal when 6 weeks is over if I haven't gotten the chance to use anything I'm getting ahold of my bank to dispute the charges otherwise you start this all over again for me and you make sure that the app works

I'm gonna be honest, I was totally wrong when I thought this was all hype. It's an incredible app and program and blows all the others I've tried out of the water. It works well, adapts to me, gives me what I want, when and how I want it, and the workouts are perfect for me. I say try three months like I did, then get the whole year like I'm about to.

I am doing the 6 week program, it's a good workout to do every day but throughout the 6 weeks the exercises don't change week to week. A bit more variety in the program would be good. The 6 days of workouts have just been an extra added into my PT sessions.

The app has been awesome for home body weight workouts. I've used it with weights every now and then too, it's great for shaking things up. I'm seeing/feeling results 2/6 weeks into one program, good stuff!
The recipe list is really nice. The workout log is sort of clunky. A variety of exercises and meditation concepts. A solid appt for the annual price. I recommend 👌

After installation you have to create an account. Ok fine, once account is created you have to pay before even going to the next screen. You don't have an option to see what's inside and if its something that you are looking for. Nope you have to pay before anything. There is no skip button. I'm uninstalling.

Amazing. Love the food and workouts. However it would be nice to have some more variety in the workouts. After having the app for 6 weeks it seems like I've gone through the majority of the workouts. Even though the workouts are amazing it would be nice to have a little more

Love the workouts. Wish there was a way to mute JUST the music and play my own... That's my only gripe. OH that and I wish there were more notifications like "it's time for your daily workout!" And being able to schedule my workout and put them on my calendar...
I've had it since it first was available for downloading. The recipes and shopping list help keep your nutrition goals simple and the daily workouts are easy to fit into a busy schedule.

Great app. I am really enjoying the variety, meditations and the trainers I would like to have the option of adding/swapping workouts from any trainer in any program eg: adding Torres' weights in with my Get Fit and Toned option not just in the Building Muscle option.

For all those people complaining about being charged for the subscription - maybe try canceling it before you actually get charged. Best workout app, helps me feel more confident. I don't really follow the meal plans, it the workouts are quality.
Love this app. Always has the right level of workout in the format I need.

Pretty much just use it for the workouts. I've used tons of workout apps and the self guided workouts here are the best in my experience. Great mix and great functionality during the workout. Highly recommend

Could use captions and perhaps a breakdown of how to do some of the yoga and Pilates poses like they do for some of the excercises. Otherwise fantastic! Keeping me ingaed which, with ADHD is quite impressive!

Nice app. Started using when gym shut down due to Covid. Took me a couple weeks to find my groove, but now thinking I'm not needing a fancy gym anymore. Hopefully in future updates they let you pick out and plan your own weekly workouts with the planner. It would be great to be able to plan a weeks worth of workouts knowing what else you have on during the week so you can plan ahead. Cheers Team

Tremendous app. I have never lifted weights before and started on the power program and after five weeks I gained muscle, I feel stronger, and I'm not sore. Hugely, in part, due to the recipes in the app. I was surprised at how beginner friendly it is.

Really enjoying so far. The exercises are good for my level while still being challenging and heaps of great recipes which substitute healthier ingredients into favorite meals without making it so different you hate it

First review I've ever posted but honestly this is a great app with a huge variety of features. Got it for a free trial during lockdown and am happily continuing my subscription. I hope it does well and continues to add new content
Love this. Has everything you need. A really good, holistic app that caters for just about every dietary requirement and fitness level. Body, mind, nutrition and great articles too.

Excellent App!! Hands done one of the best Apps out there. Everything in one app. The price is worth it. 2 suggestion: One is to add the meal plans with the coached program workouts. 2nd is to Have the ablility on the planner side to swap out workouts with the program workouts ex: unleashed , phase2 or Masterclass. Get the App!! A must Have!
A bit pricy for me, but seems to be the first program that's actually sticking for me! We'll see how long I can keep this in my budget for. A little widget for my home screen would be a nice add.

It's not just a workout app it's a lifestyle app. The workouts are easy to follow and self paced which works good for me as I have a home gym set up and my favorite is the weekly shopping list for the meals so you don't forget anything
Great workouts and the programs are really well designed. Intermediate is right at my level. I don't ever really get into the food or meditation. I totally should.
Lovely and diversified workout programs perfect for those who are looking to move away from "routines". On top of it the food recipes are brilliant to say the least 😁. Thank you for your dedication

I am no stranger to running until I feel like I'm going to pass out. Couple a knee injury and covid, I haven't been at it like I used to. I would lift some weights we bought and do physical therapy workouts for my knee but needed more. Tried this app and was impressed with how much it kicked my butt. I am now a paid subscriber. Highly recommend

I've enjoyed using Centr Fit. On week 3 of Centr 6 phase 1. I've struggled with recurring neck and back injuries over the last few years where the flare ups would occur so often it seemed like I wasn't going to be able to make any progress to feel healthy and fit again. A buddy brought this up to me and I jumped in. Any system works if you work it, and so far I feel the improvements and feel better. Btw, 2 weeks was my previous max of consistent training before an injury would occur.
Brilliant. Loving the workout programs. Having a timer automatically run for rest periods, with a count down to get ready for the next set, is a huge help.

Wanted to try the app when I heard it was free during the epidemic... Just got charged $135 for something I used once and decided wasn't for me. Update - I appreciate the developer reaching out and advising me to contact their e-mail. I did and received one back. Was told their small print covered their end so I’m out a years subscription fee for a simple mistake. They apologized and were truly sorry but can’t even make an attempt to meet me in the middle and help out someone during these tough economic times. I suggested just charging me a months fee and refunding me the rest but haven’t heard anything from them since. Feeling like I was taken advantage of by a service that promotes a good, healthy lifestyle. Beware of this organization. You’re just cash in the bank, they seem to not really care about people at all.

I'm enjoying the planner exercises. I don't have to figure it out on my own. Wish the exercises could be downloaded for offline use when my reception is bad. Some of the meditations are really on point lol.

Exactly what everyone needs. This app provides flexibility in all workouts for your skill level. The new release of workouts is benchmark. We have consistently got up every weekday morning to do these workouts before the kids get up and love starting our day with Centr. The trainers are engaging and they make it fun. And value for money... there is no comparison. Love it.
The app keeps logging me out during my workout. Its annoying

Fantastic app! And love it. I signed up for a year after my free trial. Simply life changing. Great workouts, great meal plan and fantastic meditation for mental health. Highly recommend this to everyone. The Centr Team are also incredibly helpful too. Thanks guys.

Their intermediate program is fantastic. It has me sweating and cursing by the end of it and I love it. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I wish it was just a flat one time fee rather then a recurring fee.

The app, workouts, and recipes are ok, but the customer service is terrible. I tried to cancel service and it didn't confirm. After being charged for another year of service, they would not issue any refund. They only want your money and don't care about the user. Many other people have had this issue.

Cancelled trial subscription after 24 hours but still they took money out. Contacted customer services who told me I must have not cancelled but I did. They then just accused play store instead. Judging by other comments its a common scam they are running and have no intentions of helping you resolve it or refund you. Very frustrating customer services.
Really easy to use, quick and effective exercises provided for all abilities and fitness levels. Really enjoying much more that the gym.
Really well designed and easy to follow. Got a lot more range and structure now in my health and fitness. Recipes are actually good and easy to follow if you plan your meals.

I love that I can lookup a trainer's sessions and see recipes in the app. The meals are clean and lower in carb for me and absolutely delicious. No joke! There are also mindfulness meditation and ones for good sleep called sleep visualizations,. I love how Centr sends me emails that are nourishment for my wellbeing, like how to get out of a toxic relationship. I can't recall the exact title. Some emails link to podcasts too. Centr membership is worth all the money!

Beginner to advanced exercise, nutrition and mindfulness. I started on beginner and ached for 3 days, kept going with the rest of the plan and building up my technique, stamina and strength. Do what you can, as they say... Enjoying it and making progress!
Love this program! Portable and varies in difficulty. Love the menu and the ease of getting to what you need. A lot of thought and care was put into this app and the program as a whole

Amazing app, found it helps me to keep motivated, inspiring meal ideas/food plans. Love the workouts, tonnes of options for no equipment/type of workout/level of difficulty etc. Can't praise it enough! Great value Vs gym membership if like me you find gyms expensive and sometimes judgemental! Best shape and feeling the best I've done in ages, thanks Centr team!

Started a 7 day free trial and they charged me straight away! Tried contacting them first to have the issue resolved but they didn't care at all and just said it was too bad and it was my fault. Stay away from this app! Just lost $125..
I am really enjoying this app and program. It's easy to figure out what you're supposed to do, a huge variety of meals, workouts (even for a super beginner like me), and meditations.
Good, easy to follow workouts for the beginner, and good schedules for a more advanced workout. Good for all experience levels.

Why bother with a personal trainer! Centr has it all and plenty of variety to keep you interested. After 4 weeks I have noticed a huge difference in strength and overall well-being. It's a shame it cant grow you a head of hair like Thor, but there is always room for improvement right?

This app is the reason why I started working on and is still doing so! It's Well-developed workout programs and easy yet healthy recipes keeps me on track in achieving my fitness goals! Eliminates hours of time needed in planning workouts and my meals! Highly recommended!

What an exciting experience overall I've built more muscle and toned out more in 3 weeks than any other at home workout and all with minimal to no equipment. My cardio has vastly improved which I can tell on my runs. Cannot express enough just how good this program is!

Really great mix of exercises, most rather short (30 min), but good combinable. Something in for everyone,from strength to Yoga. Also all kind of other wellness things like recipes, meditation and articles.
This is amazing app . Everybody must download this app and be fit

Installed it, first you notice that all information about payment (which I can easily find) only says that it's 7 days free. All real payments and plans are hidden somewhere you don't notice and register and get changed whatever big!!! I had seen so many scams like this to "whistle" when I see one. I am writing this for other costumers so they be aware, and to Google Play to take action if needed. THIS IS A BIG RED FLAG🚩 🚨Stay Away🚨 To Developers:Respect transparency for pay vs service
Great app. It's got everything encompassing physical and mental health as well as useful articles and food ideas. The planner is a great feature to guid your day to day activities.

Amazing app, keeps me active, makes me stronger, and works different muscles per workout session. It takes the preparation and thinking out of working out. Strongly recommend to anyone looking to start working out. Love this app and it's great value for it's money!
Really good app. Workouts are interesting and just real good. Only thing is that price is pretty high for one month, but for a year you get 66% off so thats good at least. But I say it's worth it.

I used to struggle with finding motivation to work out and would stop after a month. I'm now 2 months into this app and not looking back already built up from using 7kg dumbells to 14 kg and packed on a fair bit of muscle. Not yet going to challenge Chris hemsworth for his role in Thor but im getting there haha, watch this space Chris im coming for your spot haha. In all seriousness though it's a great app with a built in nutrition planner, I've not even scratched the surface on all the workouts

Love this app. Has workouts, nutrition and guided meditations combined for each day. Love that you can easily swap a workout or recipe, choose your nutrition plan based on your needs vegan/ vegetarian/ pescatarian etc. You can also track your weights now. And the accents 😁
Account logged me out and I cannot log back in. I am paying for a year of access only to get 11 months...
Amazing app. The exercise routine and suggested menu have increased my fitness in two weeks much better then anticipated. I have also started to include the kids to n the meditation at night.

Amazing!just finished the advance workouts with Luke now Ash feel great. now could you please do the same workout but with dumbbells/rings/balance ball maybe using different equipment? Upping the anti👊 You both have to do it because your voices are hypnotic lol and your beautiful.

Watch the terms and conditions . I did the 7 day free trial and it automatically subscribed me for 12 Months at the end of the trial. I have contested this however, apparently this talented Hollywood actor who endorses this needs more money! Unless you want to pay I advise you to steer well clear of this app.
Challenging, not boring, meal plan portion of the app is extremely helpful. Tons of meditations to practice and interesting articles to read relating to health, food and fitness! Love it!

Fantastic program! Includes tons of different types of workouts and excercises, easy to mix it up depending on your wants/needs. Includes weight training, boxing, MMA, pilates, yoga, HIIT, HIRT etc. Amazing recipes including lots of delicious foods, very healthy and very tasty. Great trainers keep it fun, AND meditation to round it out. Absolutely fantastic program (and amazing community too!)

I bought the year subscription but was not sure where I would be in a year financially so decided against doing the auto draft, but when the year was up they changed my card anyway I tried to contact them the same day to get a refund they replied saying they would not refund my money and I am absolutely sure that I put it on do not auto draft me.
Great usability - connects well to other features in the app, calculates serves live, translates that to shopping list. Clean interface. Keen to see what new features are in store.

If you guys make it so that when you're in the method part of the recipe section it says how much each of the ingredients your putting in, in brackets next to the ingredient ill make you guys 5 stars. As it stands at present I'm constantly scrolling up and down because I get all the ingredients out, read the method but then have to scroll back up to the ingredient list to see how much of what ingredient it is I need to be adding.
Bad experience. The day they charged my credit card I immediately requested cancelation and refund. They refused quoting a stipulation in the contract. I never used the app. Bad business.

The Centr app is a wonderful tool for anyone looking to improve their health, fitness or otherwise. The balanced approach between physical and mental health that the Centr team embodies acts as a wholesome and well-meaning guide to bettering one's overall well-being. Regardless of how fit you think you are (or aren't), I recommend that you give the Centr team a chance to help you take your next step towards a healthier future you.

This app lets me work out at my pace, which is important to me. I hate being nagged about working out. I love all of the 'extras' you get with it too, like the meal plans and the meditations. Thanks for making such a fantastic app!

It used to be my daily morning pal, but slowly deteriorated. Now, the app and the site doesn't work at all. Despite a considerable subscription i pay. And there's no support to write to. They "dropped a dumbbell".

So far so great! One thing that bugs me is that when my phone screen turns off while i am mid workout the timer stops so idk if i rested more than j was supposed to. Other than that the app is genuinely great

I honestly really love this application. Stinks that some of the foods aren't available where I live but I still make due with what I got. I've gotten the best results ever in the past month then I have working out for over a year now. Would recommend this to everyone trying to get into shape and build muscle.
I really enjoy the quick workouts and the large variety offered.
Love this app, lots of great features for all fitness levels.
3 weeks in and loving it, the right app at the right time for me Edit Year in and still love it stronger than I have ever been dispite not being able to avoid cider and wine
Love it!! Great workouts especially when your short on time
Keeps me motivate and I love the combination: workout, food and meditation 💪😌
Fantastic app, motivating, easy to use, great programs
Fantastic app. Came for the fitness, will stay for the lifestyle.
The ingredients for meals can be a challenge because of where I live but everything else is brilliant! Noticed some huge changes in such a short time.

This is exactly the kind of setting I needed in life, in terms of physical training. Well trained professionals. A variety of types of routines so I don't get bored of them. No need to drag myself to gymm. No need for public showers. I joined because of the lockdown but I kept going because I love it!

Hubby and I love the app. It really pushes us and we feel better for it. Love the different styles in work outs and love the recipes. Highly recommend this to anyone. Thanks guys for creating this awesome app. Even our young boys jump in!

It's the best thing to fitness I found. I don't get bored and it takes all the guess work how much to eat. I don't weigh my food or worry what workout to do. Centr take all the guess work from the workouts and they are always doing something new. A great community for support.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD! I downloaded this app a year ago and when I bought a subscription it charged me double, so I sent them an email and they said it wasn't their problem and nothing was done about that. After all that I cancelled my subscription. Now a year later they charged me AGAIN for a years subscition and AGAIN thei wont refund me.

Best workout and life coaching app ever. I was one of the first users (back when it was a website), and I'm still using it. I have recommended it to friends and they are all still using it. And as a UX designer myself, I also love the overall experience

A few weeks in and I'm loving it! Easy to add and swap workouts and recipes. Love the quick burner workouts too. They're easy to add in to a busy day at work without ending up drenched in sweat. Honestly I couldn't be happier with the whole experience so far.

Wow! Just wow. Honestly, so impressed by this app. It's what I've always needed and been looking for. A must have! Physical health is only as strong as your mental health. Which is what makes this great. Recipes and flexibility while being realistic.

I love this app. I never really stuck to a workout schedule before and fluctuated heavily in weight until I found this app. I've managed to convince myself to workout daily and feel much better with myself.

I didn't really care for the app so I cancelled my 7 day trial... 100% positive I cancelled and uninstalled the app. Non-stop notifications was the main reason, but just looked at my bank account and have been being charged $32 bucks per month for an app I don't even have.

3 weeks into the Power program and I'm loving it so far. I thought I'd have an issue with working out 6 days a week but the program is designed to have active rest days from lifting and, on these days, get a vigorous workout from doing bodyweight circuits. Centr is more than just workouts. There are meditations, articles, and recipes to help you get the calories you need. As a vegan, I was pleasantly surprised with the hundreds of recipes they make available. So far I cannot complain!

This program is amazing. If you are looking for structure, guidance and a full meal plans, this is for you! The meals are delicious- Clean eating with bursting flavors! Tons of variety in workouts with everything from Pilates and yoga to Hiit and Boxing then you can wind down with calming meditation. This app has a little bit of everything for everyone. Wish I started sooner!
Amazing, however it would be nice if the recipes were more student/budget friendly.. as we don't all have time or money to go grocery shopping multiple times a week.
Well organised app. Keep up the good work!

Centr is the only workout program I have stuck to and thanks to the team I have lost and kept off 25kg. The variety of the exercises and programs for me is key as well as the meditations. And I've done it all from my home gym. I cannot recommend centr enough. I seriously tell everyone about it

Really glad I checked the reviews before signing up for something that they apparently just copy pasted some basic workout routines from online & then make sure there's no way for you to get your money back if you forget to cancel after the free week. Really disappointed that Chris would attach his name to such a poorly thought out cashgrab. Seriously dude, you're so much better than this. Thanks so much for the copy pasted reply bot, you definitely convinced me you're not moneyhungry sleezebags

I L-O-V-E this app! There is so much selection for workouts but also recipes and guided meditation. I have almost completed Centre Unleashed for 6 weeks and I have never been this motivated to continuously work out. The online community is also amazing and so supportive. I plan on continuing Cente workouts for a long time!

used other fitness apps before and them seem to get boring after awhile.by not engaging with the viewer or making the workout worth it that maybe them feel like a choir.so far I'm loving this app on my 4th straight week with one day off.100s off workout to choose from depending of your goals.the trainers are engaging and makes you feel like it's just you and them,egging you on through out the way to push yourself harder and give it your all.eatting plans included with easy to follow recipes 💪💪
It would be very good to have favorites option and save videos and not to look for them through the app every time I want to come back to the specific workout.

The workouts are fire along the content. Very well thought out and designed. I'm giving a 3 star review because this eats your data. There should be a download option to use offline like many other workout apps.

The center workout program is phenomenal, and the Centr team Has been a blessing to my life! Many of the workout programs on it, the meditations and the articles, have been a tremendous benefit to my life, and I would recommend Centr to everyone who hears about it! Thank you Chris Hemsworth and teams! You're such an inspiration to my life and I'm glad to be part of this fitness journey with you.
Awesome app. Recipes are great, but smoothies were the highlight for me. Takes the guess work out of getting fit. Yet to try the sleep meditations but they're supposed to be amazing
Fits so well to your fitness level, leaving me in a sweat after every workout! Not only does it have amazing exercises, but meditation and nutrition too! Best app to keep me on track!

Work outs so far have been good. I'm doing the 6 week program. The warm up and downs have so far been all the same and don't really match what you do in the work out. Also would be good if they weren't just a copy and paste for each exercise in the work out.

I love the workouts! As someone who is heavily overweight and unfit I really like the programs and found them user friendly. I love that each coach is unique and their personality comes through the screen. In the first month my family watched me, now they're joining in with the centre 6. If possible I'd like to see a dance session workout. Also the yoga is a bit fast paced for beginners. Can the self guided workouts also be available to cast please?

Been with Centr since before the app, so glad the app has come out as it makes life so much easier. Following every single workout and actually making progress for once. Nutrition is a bit much for me as I'm dead fussy but I still use some of the recipes weekly, such as the Apple Pie Porridge 😍

I love this app, I love that a trainer coaches your through your workouts so I don't have to stop and look up what a certain exercise is and I love that there are different trainers and that we can swap our workouts out for a different oneif we're not feeling it that day. Its fun and easy to use with so much variety!

Transitioning from weight lifting centr has provided challenging workouts with far less pain. Additionally, by the end of each workout I feel like I've pushed myself to the limits with far less time than I normally spend at the gym. To add benefit, centr is extremely convenient and mobile. Making fitness simpler than it used to be.

Awesome app. Recipes, meditation, exercises ... everything you need for a healthy mind, body, and soul. Customizable. And now able to shortcut favorites and save recipes. Great job Centr Team! Thank you! 💙
Well-rounded app. Plenty of exercises and programs to suit anyone (plus modification always available). Awesome coaches and lovely menus to fuel your body for all that workout!
I really enjoy this workout app; out had a wide variety of exercises and programs to benefit just about anyone and their needs/reasons for working out. Plus they have a great, positive community.

Hard to navigate, cluttered app and they won't stop emailing me (unsubscribed several times before reporting as spam) Update: over a year later still getting spammed by Centr. They must be changing email addresses as I keep blocking them but they always show up again.

The six week bodyweight program is fantastic. The beginner option is challenging but never feels unachievable. Its varied excercises keep you from getting bored and the community helps keep you committed

7 day free trial requires credit card info no thanks. Tha act of requiring a credit card for a free trial is a only in the hopes that the person forgets to cancel. If it is truly a free trial why would you need the credit card you. give people 7days free and if they like the app they can ad their credit card infor and pay for it I am done with this mischievous way of developers doing business

Just another money grab, an annual subscription is nearltly £100...You could get an entire year's gym membership for that in a basic gym. YOU DO NOT need apps to get into shape! Utilise a consistent diet and workouts and you'll find that you have the power to do it all yourself.
Great app using it most mornings. Good variety of work outs. For an improvement I would suggest adding 2 things, being able to favourite work outs and meals and being able to build your own workout.

I don't want to pay the £22:99 a month and I cannot see where to cancel before the free trial ends . Please advise. I tried going to the Google store subscription to cancel but the app is not listed and on the app I cannot see where it says settings

Es genial. Diversos ejercicios y deportes, los entrenadores son divertidos, las recetas muy ricas y muchas de ellas fáciles. Siempre tienes algo para tí cada día. It's great. You always have different sports and rutines, the team is fantastic, the food is delicious and many of them easy to make. You always have something for you everyday.
I like the workouts and the meditations, but the meals are nearly impossible to find ingredients for in my rural area. I've been making a lot of substitutions.

Don't know how or when I was signed up for this but it had to of been months ago. Now all of a sudden I get a $119 charge for something I didn't even know I was signed up for lol. And they email customer service just says to bad so sad we don't do refunds. This is just s money grab for Chris Hemsworth's name. Sad that people take advantage of others like this.

Ok so I've just downloaded the app today and starting my 7 day free trial, from the looks of things it seems pretty basic from first impressions, the meal and nutrition thing I think could be updated with a barcode scanner so you can scan foods and drinks you have got from the shop I.e a sandwich and drink ect, all in all I will give this a go and will also be keeping things documented on my YouTube channel (Nays Plays) and I will also be reviewing my experience with the app on there
Many features as well as the watch are nice but syncing with this app and Fitbit intermittently fails, and constantly asks to reset the watch, which usually doesn't help and takes 20-30 minutes

I love this app alot, especially the amount of options and programs. I regularly do MMA HIIT and yoga which i hadnt done prior to using the app. One thibg i would suggest is since the latest update its a little difficult to navigate and there arent many vegan reciepes but all in all i think its fantastic.

This is truly the most holistic program out there. But that does not do it justice, it's not another health/fitness program, it's a Community, one that is rooting for you to succeed, supporting you when things are not great, cheering you on when you are tired but keep going, celebrating your smallest successes. The openess & availability of the team, trainers & community is astounding. No other package regularly uploads new recipes, workouts & challenges, fresh meditations & vital advice🤙💯🙇🏻

Excellent app offering a broad range of programs from novice to advanced. My family love training with this app and we are now into our 2nd year of subscription. It has been one of the best investments in our health and well-being. Great job Centr team keep the updates and new programs coming!
Absolutely the most comprehensive and thoughtful workout app I've ever seen and used. It's got everything you need for fitness success. I've never been unhappy with this app once.

The sleep meditation saves me almost every night. I wake up early in the morning and get a work out with Ashley, Luke, Michael, and Sylvia. She gave me a new respect for Pilates. Michael is one of my favorites, he has such a great character and then Ashely and Luke are amazing, fun and really get you pumped up for their work outs. I like that some of them aren't perfect, they goof up, they are humble, and uplifting. Makes its easier to work out at 430 in the morning before work.
Fantastic app - great value for so many different workouts, meal plans and help to keep you on track. I've used other fitness apps and this one is the best by a long way.
Great recipes, great content! Would be 5 stars if a clear set path was given. Too many choices, and ability to record results in app would be great to give a comparison on previous workouts

Love this app. Everything health and fitness in one place and reasonably priced for the content. Content also updated regularly, new workouts, new programmes and new recipes. Best I've ever used and recommend it frequently.
Fantastic app - exercises are varied so you never get bored and the meal suggestions are easy, healthy and delicious. App runs smoothly too, never had an issue.

Good variety of workouts and you can choose whether you want them coached (with the trainers coaching you through) or do the exercises on your own. The meals are really nice and easy to make & I love the extra bits like the meditations.

Impossible to cancel? Cancelled last year, received no confirmation. It renewed automatically this year with expired credit card info, still no confirmation of cancellation again this year... centr refuses to refund. ETA after review response - I have tried, your reps deny any aid and send same response over and over, why email more? Ridiculous. Dont sign up folks...

Have been using for a year now and always impressed -- huge fan of the variety of workouts and programmes, the meals have been tasty and the general advice is always helpful and informative. Would recommend giving it a try.

A variety of day to day workouts, different trainers with different approaches and equipment at 3 modification levels, a large variety of delicious meals for meal planning, dedicated professionals that focus on mindfulness, stretching, meditation and yoga. And the 6 week program was a great addition that I hope to see mature -- doing it a 2nd time. All in all this is a fantastically well executed training & wellness app.
Latest update: app doesn't work saying your session expired and you're logged out, so 1 star. Before that everything was great. Will update back to 5 stars when the issue is fixed
I am paying for this app and now everytime I log in and to do something it logs me out saying that my session has expired, this is frustrating . Does someone has an idea what I should do to fix it?
Lately, the app keeps logging me out. I've uninstalled it and re-installed, but it didn't help. Started after the update
I paid $100 for a subscription but the app logs me out instantly when I sign on. Useless. This needs to get fixed soon or I'll need my money back.
Easy to use, everything is so organized making it super easy to get started and keep going with it. Great workouts and recipes catered to whatever your goals are

It feels like Luke, Ashley, and Dan are in the room with you! This workout app is for sure in the list of top workout apps! ANYTHING you are looking to achieve and improve, Chris Hemsworth's team will help you with it, as long as you full send!

Love the app!!! Different varieties of programs up to you (coached or self-guided, I adore when the coach inspires you during the workout to keep moving till the end)... delicious menu, a lot of helpful posts. Let's keep smashing ♥️

Best workout app that I ever seen before. I highly recommend everyone to try this app. I saw the results within two weeks of workout program. Its worth to take subscription than spending on heavy prices for gyms and for trainers. The trainers in Centr gives the best workout plans for beginners to advanced. Thanks to Chris Hemsworth for providing this app. The diet plan is good though but It is difficult for Indian's to maintain the Australian diet plan.
Amazing!!! Love the variety of workouts and programs available BUT my favorite feature is definitely the food and planner (excellent fearure of automatic grocery list).

The workouts are really good, and are really effective for my short time constraints. However, I am extremely disappointed Chris Hemsworth isn't actually 'coaching ' the workouts. I have got to say I would probably push myself harder if Chris was the one telling me what to do!!

Absolutely amazing! Love every bit of it! Fitness made possible! The app wasn't available in my country months ago, not that i mind streaming it via the website. Thanks for expanding your services! You guys are awesome!

This has been a great way to work out at home, especially when going to the gym isn't a great idea. The 6 week programs are especially great for me. The trainers are a lot of fun. Best at home work out app I've tried.

I wish their was more options to customize. Ex: the recipes to be dairy free. Their is some dietary restriction options but not that one and I'm milk protein allergic. Another Ex: I have diastasis recti and piriformis syndrome. Both cause some restrictions on exercises and it'd be nice to have the option to have those harmful exercises removed automatically. I already see pt for the fixing exercises but it's a pain to take every plan to him only to have 3/4 of it crossed off...
No customization, really confusing. Opened app for the first time and no idea where to go or watching. Definitely not designed for people trying to figure out how to work out.
Great app, trainers are really good and provide different ability levels in each workout. Easy to navigate and all exercises are explained or demonstrated.

Good workout program. There's some rough spots for rank beginners, but this app has motivated me to do workouts at least five days a week. 3.5 weeks in and I'm definitely seeing results. A much better app than Fitbit Coach.

I did the 6 weeks free in iso and have now joined up for the 3 months. Great variety of workouts depending what you have and feel on the day. Encouraging trainers and food recipes are great. As a mum with no time I have now been working out 4-5 times a week. It's addictive!
I'm extremely impressed with this app. It's very well organized, the workouts definitely put me through my paces and I was amazed with how many recipes there were. Absolutely worth what I spent.

Really disappointed with the support team, I had an account made without my knowledge and a subscription wfee was taken tried getting help to be refunded as i never made the account but they say they cannot refund as a free trial was not cancelled. Be careful with this if you get stung by a payment they won't help you
I love the planner - daily meals planned (although can be swapped), daily exercise classes and meditation. Haven't tried the exercise programmes yet, but I hear great things.

Hard to navigate - difficult to find where to contact for help. I sent an email asking to cancel my subscription 2 mins after my 7 day trial ended asking to cancel as it is hard to figure out how to do so on the app and they refuse to refund me.Horiblr customer services

I've been using Centr for a couple months now and overall, a very solid workout app. Pros: - A multitude and variety of both individual workouts and programs - Meditation and sleep sessions are very relaxing. Plus, Chris Hemsworth is pretty hilarious. - Workout programs are much more cohesive and the videos are high quality. - The few meals I've made were tasty Cons: - Fairly expensive compared to other workout apps - The meals are hard to customize and require a LOT of prep/cook time
Great coaching, great exercise demo, I love the variety of exercise and how well rounded Centre is as a health program, I'd the best and most complete app I've seen. Great job Centre!!!!
Phenomenal app! Great trainers! Love it! Recommend for everyone!

I love what the app offers but am unwilling to pay such a large upfront fee, if it offered a weekly or even monthly subscription (not at the cost of a gym membership) I wouldn't even bother with the free trial.

I will be paying for the one year subscription when my trial is up. I've been to the gym and tried online workout stuff at home. So far nothing has compared. You get the same coaching at the gym as you do at home in half the time. Plus, as a mom, I don't have to run after my kids in the gym. I've already noticed a difference in my diastasis recti. It was already almost healed but two days of exercises have really tightened everything up! Thank you Chris and staff!!!

I love this app. It takes the guesswork out of whatever your fitness goals are, and makes you feel as if you can indeed reach your goals. I very much appreciate the hard work of all who are on the centr team. Great product, great spirit, and you can feel the care of the contributing individuals. The price is worth it, and helps you remember the value of your purchase (pretty much I feel like I have to work out because I paid for it. 😏) Many thanks!

Careful re autorenewal guys. If you don't close your account completely and just switch off auto renew, they convert you back onto subscription and don't refund even if you notify them straight away and haven't used the app.
The workouts are very managable, and the variety in meal options is very much appreciated. I would love a built in function where I can log my runs similar to other fitness apps.

Workouts are amazing! There is always an alternative workout for those exercises where it requires gym equipment. I haven't come across an exercise I couldn't do yet. The workouts kick my a$$. Why only four stars? The meals they tell you to eat have ingredients that only high end stores carry, it's expensive and time consuming as hell. Bring the meals down to reasonable real food and it will be a 5 star review
Excellent app. I'm not fit and I keep up with every exercises. Many different level options. Entertaining and fun coaches. I recommend it!

Everything you need to get fit all in one place. Great support community, great meal plans for what ever you're goal, and great workouts either coached or not. Have no equipment there's workouts for that have a little or alot there's workouts for that also. There is functional fitness, boxing, MMA, HIT, Pilates and more.

The programs really challenge me to be the best that I can be and target the muscles. A big thing for me has been nutrition and Centr have created a balanced and nutritious meal plan. Having both fitness and nutrition work hand in hand like Centr's does has helped me for the better.

Things that could be improved: 1) more education....why am I doing what I am doing? 2) form notes...especially with Torre Washington workouts 3) reps...ex. renegade rows..is that 8 reps total or both sides? 4) community. I joined the Facebook community but I found it lacking trainer support. It would be awesome to have someone able to answer questions.

Amazing. I hate exercise. I have finally committed to setting goals to get fit, stronger, toned and adopt new habits using Centr. After completing day 2 of the 7 day trial I was hooked. Great investment and affordable for me I chose 12 months. The program takes all the guess work out for me from workouts to meals. It also includes daily meditation and information to keep me motivated. Centr also has a private FB community you can join to keep you motivated, ask questions, share your progress.

Overall really good app. Different body parts worked out each day. You don't have to think about what exercise the app does it all for you. Only issue I have had is some days the app doesn't appear to work.
This app is literally amazing! I love the meal planner is super easy and the workouts are lockdown proof. I only wish I could afford it. But when I can it will be worth the investment.

Great short workouts. Enough to get you warmed up perfect for if you work out during lunch break. Lots of variety. However, I would love options for longer workouts for when I have time to get a more hard-core sweat in.

For a long time I have been using the same repetitive exercises and needed something new. Centr was not my first choice, but my best choice. Though, I recommend staying away from the reverse grip bench press if you have weak wrist.

This app - more importantly this lifestyle, has changed my life. I am eating better, mindfulness has improved, I'm getting fitter, and I have dropped 20 kilos! Not only that, the recipes are great for all the family, even for my fussy eater, and the Centr Community offers amazing support and guidance. I can't recommend Centr high enough, it has truly been life changing for myself. So what are you waiting for? Join today!
Really great fitness app. Love the workouts and meal plans set up for your desired goal. My only suggestion is adding videos on how to prepare and cook the meals. Otherwise, worth it.

This app got me back into working out at a time when I honestly needed it. I haven't stepped foot in the gym since starting the workouts and I'm seeing some awesome results. I still have a ways to go, and many more workouts to do. Love Centr!!!
Just all around spectacular app! Very easy to follow along and increasingly challenging. Highly recommend for anyone regardless of fitness level!!
Workouts are quick, minimal equipment required and trainers are fun and entertaining. Excellent meal options and great variety of training opportunities. Worth the membership fee!

STAY AWAY: This company will charge you even after you cancel and delete any saved payment methods. Then support will gladly tell you that no refunds are given under any circumstances. They have also blocked forgot password for my account so that it is not recoverable. STAY AWAY

So far so great. Workouts are easy to understand. Diet is fairly easy to follow. I do wish some programs were more filling such as the one I'm doing now doesn't have me doing abs or triceps right now. It's a building muscle program.

From an extremely lazy, unfit young adult. The Centr app has given me the necessary tools, ideas and advice change my life for the better. Vastly improving my state of mind and overall physical wellbeing. Definitely recommend it!

I absolutely love this app!! The planner tells you all you need to do for that day(workout, meditation and food) to keep your goals in check. The new Centr6 program is amazing and a majority of the users are doing this program at the same time. The one thing that differentiates this app/program from others is the community associated with it. All of the people in the community keep each other excited and motivated to keep doing the program.

How do i sign up for the free six week trial? I'm a college student and definitely watching my $$. --/-- edit for answer ... Ok, thank you! :) only recently saw the article with the ad but i didn't see a date. No prob, next step is to stop procrastinating and sign up for the free trial!

Great app, great program. The training is very well thought out and the recipes are economical, nutritious, and delicious. Just very hard to manage your account and customer service is kinda dodgy. I'm not trying to be mean, that was just my experience. I wish I could give it five stars.
Love the app and everything it stands for. The workouts are great. My only wish is that when I leave centre app the timer would keep going in the background.

Centr app has come like a boon to me and my family since the lockdown , that was when my son discovered it for us. It's a complete fitness solution. Realistic, a lot of variety and safe since we are under no pressure to keep up with the trainers pace.

Lots of info and workouts on there. But not for beginners. I would have liked more options to the kind of work out - I cannot do a lot of high impact and don't have equipment in the house. I think this is for more serious gymgoers.

Subscription seems unnecessary. I understand the same answer of removing the 7 day free trial but if that's the case then just apply a lock after the 7 days and you can still have people trying it out for free for 7 days. And if like you said it's connected to a Google account then you should be fine. I doubt anyone has the time to make 50 Google accounts just to get 50 free weeks of your app lol but overall the theme and layout looks cool. Uninstalled for lack of freedom.
Great app, great instructors. Could use an area for notes on the workouts. On the planner you can track weights used which is great, just need a spot for notes!

Started using this app with my wife earlier this year. Having a fantastic experience and it has keep us exercising consistently for longer than any other program that we have tried, especially with two kiddos under 5!
great results....just wish they would add more content to the Centr power in gym program. I've had this for a year but they still have the same beginner, Intermediate and advanced program

I think this app is good but it is lacking in Female gym workouts, there are male guided ones which are great, but as a female about to join a gym I went through the app looking for inspiration and instructions I could take with me so I feel more confident with a plan.
Really good app for people new to home workouts, meal planning is useful if you need inspiration. Would be useful if the shopping list stayed visible when you loose internet connection!

Terrible, they took £93 after I cancelled my free trial. They won't refund as they say I must read the T&C and it's my fault. I explained I ended the free trial before the money was taken. They say I purposely activated but I was making sure I ended the free trial. They responded with sending me screenshots of the T&C. Absolute con. Update refund received with thanks

I don't get to exercise everyday as I am a small business owner and my work is reasonably physical. However I do get to this app 3-4 times a week and can feel myself getting stronger each time so its happening. Will keep going as I'm only half way through week 2 of the beginner's coached workout. Enjoying this and being able to do it in my own time.

App is buggy & support from Centr is unreliable at best Still awaiting a response to an email I sent to them on 17 Oct & another query 4 days ago . Great marketing & cheap but when your 40 min workout stops 3 times & loses your spot, is it worth it, although the work outs & meals are great if its all working ok.
