Functionality & user friendliness has dropped in past year Edit 31/1/22 just read response from Centr below & LOL, I already emailed them 4 times! Did they even read the review!
Amazing app. So good with guided work out videos and meal planner. Food is really tasty and I especially love the way you can add serving number and it adjust ingredients amounts. Love it.

After working out for over half my life, have done the whole meal plan, workout, personal trainer thing, I found my love for fitness and working out in a lull. This app rekindled my.love for fitness and eating healthy, wholesome and delicious food! The variety in workouts is amazing, the HUGE range of recipes- also amazing (and super delish) and my son LOVES the kids meditation to help calm him down. Amazing app, amazing value!!
The perfect combination of workouts, mindfulness and nutrition. They include modifications should you need it, and offer multi week programs at no added cost. Worth a try.

Both the self coach and coached workouts are great. I just finished a HIIT with Zocchi, dude is a monster. Ive made some meals as well. App is very easy to get familiar with. Honestly theonly workout app i use now.
Great workouts which can be casted to a large screen, lots of healthy and appetizing food options and lots guided meditations. To me it is all round and well executed.

WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER! I cancelled the renewal of my 1 year subscription but I got charged and my subscription renew anyways. I Asked for a refund 2 days after It happened, but it was refused. I'm not recommending this service or app to anyone!!!
Such a comprehensive workout app complete with life coaching. An excellent motivator and a professional team to guide you throughout. It's a real game changer!

I am loving the app. With gyms being closed, I needed to find an app to keep my fitness up. This app is it. I'm enjoying it so much that I won't be going back to the gym and just using this. Also, all the recipes are so great. Easy to make and full of flavor. Thanks Centr Team!

great app! wishing list: 1. cast from android app to tv 2. more "quick sessions" (20 min and less) selection 3. more benchmark exercises 4. you started a 6 week free trial 2 weeks after i started 3 months program. is it possible to add some of these 6 weeks to my subscription? (i said - wishing list (;)
Best complete training app I have found. Takes a really wholistic approach to getting in shape and working out as a whole. Endless options. Quarantine life saver!!

Thia app is awesome, bc all gyms close so currently i'm in Centr Unleashed programs, I just finished intermediate level and now on week two of advanced level. Of course it's not easy, sometimes i feel like i'm gonna passed out but I did not give up, and the results keep me coming back, eventhough I'm tired as hell while doing it 😂😂

It's the best apps for training I ever try :) the food plan are delicious, the training really work, I saw fast result and I am really motivated! Good job guys for this wonderful application 😊 I strongly recommend it to everyone.

The diversity of exercise, nutrition, education, all you need in order to get from where you are to where you want to be. The Centr app leaves all others behind. Been using it for two months and it has exceeded all my expectations. Fantastic job to the team . I'm looking forward to continuing my growth with this amazing project.

Work outs are awesome. I love that I can find workouts that don't require any equipment and still leave me feeling like I went to the gym. I have tried a few of the meals and the whole family has enjoyed them. Meditation sessions are great but I find that I run out of time to get one in most days. The few I have done have been very relaxing.

I love how the app is so well rounded and covers all aspects of health from physical to nutritional to mental. Couldn't imagine life without it now!! The 6 weeks trial really helped me to decide on keeping it and joining for a year, 1 week i might not have decided to stay on..

I'm honestly very disappointed. Very repetitive workouts, if you did one workout with the same trainer you have almost done all workouts because they are very similar. I stopped using it after a month because I was doing almost the same every day. I wish I could get my money back

Like having an army of PTs with the convenience of wherever you feel like working out. Good variety of workouts. Well explained in exciting formats. New workout challenges updated quarterly. Can't get bored unless you're working out multiple times every single day!
Great app and awesome program! I just wish there was a basic meditation timer. The only options for meditating is guided. Otherwise brilliant. It would be 5 stars of it had a timer

Loving so far! I'm only on day 7 but I can already feel the changes. The recipes taste great and the workouts will definitely push you to your limits. I've been lifting for years and I can recommend this to anyone from a beginner to advance!
Signed up during the times gyms were closed. Couldn't use the trial period. Now the app is locked out. They even mentioned a 6 week trial I wasn't even able to get. Not good.
Excellent app. I just wish you could log your weights with each exercise to track what you used on that same exercise last time and to track/chart progress.

App is amazing, after years of trying other apps this rules over all. It's simple; organized, affective, and each program is built to help strengthen and increase size, my first two weeks I've been sore like none other, and still sore lol

Really fantastic workouts with a wide, emphasis on wide, range of workouts. From beginners to advanced, weighted to bodyweight, yoga to strength training to boxing etc. Etc. Really fantastic trainers who will help you kick it in to gear. Highly recommend.

Great app, getting to workout with top trainers and Chris Hemsworth what's not to love. This is not a diet app it's a mind and body app. It has great food from pizza (yes you can have pizza) to smoothies. Its the app you can't get enough of.
The plan is easy to follow and the self guided workouts are great. I am coming of an injury so its awesome to be able to modify and move at my own pace!

Hi there,  I'm trying to unsubscribe from this app but I don't know how and I want to unsubscribe before my 7 day trial ends so I dont have to ask for a refund. I also tried sending an email but it didn't go through because it detected I'm not a member. Thanks!

I've tried a few fitness apps and this is by far the best. So much content for health and wellbeing as well as fitness - meditation, meal planning, recipes, yoga, plates, it has everything, great value for money. I love it.
Really easy to navigate. Classes are great and so varied. Lovely meals that are quick and easy. Fab that i can take this programme anywhere including on holiday
Hey, so I have an android and the app keeps crashing. What's going on?

This program is faultless. The coached workouts are really effective and the trainers are so personable it doesn't even feel like you're working out at home. What started out as app to see me through a pandemic has become part of my daily routine!

I have tried many types of workout plans but this is the only one that was easy to stick with and gave good meals with the recipie where others just give generals of what to eat. All in all been using now for 6 months and it has worked wonders.

Can't down load the app, have to use it from the internet which is not convenient and will probably stop using it which is a shame as from what I've seen its very good, one point it would be handy to be able to record the weight your using! Did contact the help desk and they told me to contact the play store which was a real faff so gave up🙁.

Such a great app - excellent selection of workouts, an incredibly useful daily planner & recipe options (thankfully now including gluten-free recommendations as well)! The 6 week workout programs are a great addition too, highly recommend!

Thank you Centr team for the free trial! I only used it for the workouts but enjoyed them a lot. If I wasn't in a difficult situation financially I would continue the membership for sure. The trainers are exceptional!
Content is good and the app works well. That fifth star for me would be native android TV support, so I don't have to look at my phone while I work out for guidance on the movements.

The workouts and programmes are absolutely fantastic. It is fantastic for food recipe ideas, would be better if I had more money and had more cupboard space (HMO problems amirite) for following the actual recipes.
Love the variety of exercises and the meal ideas are great when you want a bit of inspiration. The sleep visualisations have also been really good for me.

Hi I downloaded the app from the Google store I'm in the UK I don't want to pay the £22:99 per month cannot afford it. I tried going to the Google store subscription part and the app is not listed and I cannot see the settings on your app please advise. Best wishes Patrick

I tried to cancel on day 7 of the free trial and they refused. Took the years subscription and refused to refund. Don't risk it. Is stupid really- I might have enjoyed the app but this kind of money grabbing behaviour leaves you too irritated to. Pissed I can't leave 0 stars!! 🤬 Later- Still angry... it's not a 7day free trial. It's a take your money on day 6 trial. Would warn everyone - read the fine print. I got caught. Now using it purely out of spite, to get my moneys worth. Petty 😡🤬
Great app. Love the workouts. Don't use the food aspect because I'm on a different diet but I'd assume it's good. I like the variety of workouts and that a lot of them don't need equipment.
I love this app. I love how it has the daily planner and that it plans out what the app recommends for each meal. And you can ✔ when each item is done. Its been a great experience so far.

Great so far. My biggest challenge is knowing where to begin. Having a personal trainer to guide you and motivate you throughout the workout is awesome. Your days are planned from meals, rest days, stretching and strengthening all in your schedule. Does not require a lot of your time if you are busy or if you are using work as an excuse to not workout.
Easy to follow, good motivation, difficulty level of your choice. This has helped me stay fit through the pandemic. Actually, I don't think my core has ever been this strong. 5 stars!

I'm someone who likes to I corporate different styles of exercise into my routine so I really enjoy the variety available on Centrfit. I also like HIIT workouts that don't take hours of the day away, it's quick, effective and an all rounder for working out at home and keeping consistent. Love it 💪
The workouts are amazing and the instructors make it entertaining. The recipes have changed how I eat. Honestly, they are delicious and I crave them.

For what you get, this app is a bargain. The meal planning is awesome and really well thought out. The workouts are HARD, especially Da Rulk's phwoar. It makes it really easy to stick to a routine and the meditations are awesome too. Highly recommended
Honestly, its amazing, the self guided and coached workouts are extremely helpful. The recipes are great and there are so many different food options.

Similar to others I was not notified that the auto renewal was coming up. Only received a notification of charge as I have my Google pay set up as such. Absolutely lacklustre and simply a means for this company to continue to receive subscription fees without notifying their "valued" customers.
Three coaches are excellent beginner intermediate and advanced levels to follow you don't have to stop but change the level of your exercise and keep going it's really good
Best workout program I have ever done. It really helped build lots of lean functional muscle. The meal program is also top tier. Makes meal planning and shopping a breeze. I have never eaten better.
It's been an amazing app so far. It runs smoothly and I have no problems getting my exercises or my recipes. I'm seeing a lot of progress with the program too. Well worth the money for sure.

Makes no sense!!! I read the article where says: - the app is completely FREE, It is NOT! You have to pay!!!! - you can do home training, you CANNOT - you HAVE to own gym equipment (absurd concept) Are out there apps that allow you to do CrossFit, Tabata, HIIT at home without weight.
Great guided work outs both with and without equipment. There's something to suit everyone, regardless of age, experience and fitness level. Fab recipes too!

5 Stars On workouts, 1 star for the fine detail they don't tell you verbally of, it doesn't matter when, if its end of a free trail,or one year renewal,you don't cancel before they take your money,it's stolen from ya,bc your not getting it back, called same day of 1 yr renewal charge.Told no refund,but enjoy a yr of workouts and recipes,next year will be cancelled.Even after I said I don't have time to use the program right now,it's about the money,not customer.To think,I was going to come back
I love this app. It's so much more then just a workout app. With nutritional meals that taste amazing, meditation and whole community of people, it's easy to use, work and stay motivated.

Best app I ever used. I've lost weight fast in the first 6 weeks. Now putting on muscle and getting ripped. Definitely reccomend it to anyone struggling. Just dont give up! Keep going I only got better after week 4.
Amazing, simply amazing! Love the loads of exercises and meal ideas! Provides plenty of mental health and care. This was the best decision I've made this past year!

Signed up to this under the 6 week 'lockdown' trial and it's kept me trim and energised despite only being able to workout in the kitchen or garden! Lots of variety of exercise and different timed sessions to fit into your schedule with good instructors. Sign up if you miss the gym!

This workout app has changed my mind and body! I've done beachbody and countless other at home workout programs and this one is big far my favorite. From the customizable recipe book/grocery list to the mental health daily routines Centr is the best
It surpasses most other training apps by not only offering a variety of training styles but also having a plethora of healthy lifestyle resources. Nutrition, meditation, etc... It's all there.

I love it. Starting workout after 9 years and each day looking forward to doing my workout with them. It has all i need . Warm up, cool down. Meal plans and meditation are all together. There is no need to search around and then no excuse to not do the workout 😊 thank you, guys.
Amazing app. Workouts and programs are great. Diet plan is also great and easy to follow. Added benefit would be the ability to track your personal progress I.e. weight and measurements
Good, but have experienced glitches with the app not saving workouts and where I'm up to in my program. Also experienced the app freezing during first 2 days of use.
Really enjoy the range of workout options available and the different ways they challenge me! Recipes and other content also great. Such a saving grace during covid-19! Thanks team 😊
Not very synchronized to the phone app
One of the best wellness apps ever!! Coaches workouts are super fun, the food is so so delicious, and I love the mindfulness. It's a well rounded concept!!

It is customized to your fitness goals with ability to swap workouts if needed with search functions. There are workouts for everyone in here; body building, yoga, HIIT, functional &more. It is like having the gym classes on your phone and if you pay yearly it is cheaper than the cheap gyms. There are meal plans for most everyone. Vegan, Vegetarian, pescetarian, omni, paleo.... if you are WFPB no oil or keto you will have to modify your meal plan. Plus meditations and health related articles.

was charged on the first day irrespective of the trial period. I sent multiple emails for refund of the amount & cancellation of my account but sometimes I would be told "we're working on it" & other times emails were ignored! 10 days & I'm still waiting for the refund!

Great Centr Unleash work routines with excellent instructions. I am into my third week at beginner level and already seen improvements. Do to it at your pace and intensity, just keep moving and you will get better. From start to end of video 40 mins.

I've been using centr for just over a year now and it's had such a great impact on my life. When I first signed up it was for the workouts, which are great, but now my favourite part is the recipes and how much I enjoy making the healthy meals!

Shame on this company. I signed up online for the 6-week trial and canceled through the app within my trial period, but was still charged for years subscription because I didn't cancel online. Read the fine print everyone! This company is sneaky!

No other apps connection, ex my fitness ap, Google git or various weight scale apps. No option to see or track weight, no option to even add it....meals come with 600++ calories per serving...is that a joke? Training and food recipes are good, but defeat the purpose of the app, maybe should be reclasified then.

Love Centr! Amazing trainers and workouts, good meals with lots of variety in the meal plan, and the meditations are just what I need at the end of the day. This is the best program I've ever done. Such a supportive community.
Loving this app and the program. Really easy to use, really well. Yolt workouts that push you to your limits. Great menu selection. I Havnt felt hungry once

I was never a huge fan of working out beforehand, but this app is great. I honestly wish that someone has made it clear earlier on in my life that only 30ish minutes of working out per day could achieve such great results.

Best way to get fit! Fun workouts you can do anywhere! I use the programs and throw in a bonus here and there with the guided workouts. It keeps me motivated to reach my goals and I look forward to doing it everyday!
1000s of dollars value for a small price. Meals are delicous and workouts are fun but challenging. Great team feel. Beginners to advanced it works for all levels.

I did the free week, and just love it. I've lost weight quickly and feel stronger and more functional. The trainers are chilled and can easily motivate you, I've not had one I don't relate to and feel positive about. I get pushed to be the best me that I can be, you need to too.

Signed up for the six week free trial they were advertising and ended up getting charged after 7 days. They refused to give me a refund. In the Instagram video posted by Chris Hemsworth he states that it is his app and never mentioned anything about the website. Very misleading.

Been with Centr for a year now, just renewed for another year. You guys keep impressing me, the new Centr Unleashed program is simply amazing! One feature I'm really missing though is to add to favourites workouts and meals, it always takes me a while to find that awesome protein brownie recipe ;)
Best fitness app on the market. It has all kinds of exercise, great recipes, meditation, and a planner that helps keep it all fresh.

Plenty of variety for those who work out everyday, or almost everyday! Lots of physical, mental, and nutritional information as well. I love using the daily planner and following along with the workouts.
The best futn sa app ever. Workouts and programs to fit in any level of practice. And the food and meditation recommended are a bonus!! A holistic approach that works and sticks

Cool app. Definitely helping me progress more and keeping me on track rather than trying to do everything myself. Although I would have liked to have seen workouts from Chris as well as all the team, as its him selling the thing. Hence 4 stars

No way to DELETE your account! Massive breach of privacy! Emailed them to ask to delete account - no response in more than a week. I work in IT, and no matter how good/bad/helpful the app is - if you can't sort out your data privacy/maintenance/retainability and deletion policy it is not worth it. Pretty poor on behalf of developer and bad oversight on behalf of Chris and his team. Takes one big data leak to bring all of this down.

Great app,allows me to take care of my body and mind. Also just a quick thought inspired by my Daughter. She is almost 4 and she asked me if she could have similar programm to exercise. I cannot find anything suitable for her age maybe Centr will help ?
Great workouts, awesome recipes and I love the ability to swap them to your needs. Enjoying all the no equipment workouts as well and modifications they show.

Best all around self improving and self care app. The app offers training (From MMA to yoga, muscle building and functional raw training), recipes (breakfast, snacks, shakes, gluten free to vegan you name it), meditations and sleep visualization (kids are hyper the app as a meditation for them) the app also offers blogs and quick tips starting everything with a weekly planner. Great customer service are always there. Join the community, you'll meet Centr legends from near and far! 💪💪
The workouts are good and scalable for different levels however sticking with one trainer because repetitive as a lot of the workouts are just splices of each other. Good I a pinch.

This has renewed my love for fitness. Love the workouts as you're doing something new every day. Completed the centr 6 program of 6 weeks and now doing unleashed intermediate. Keeps me focused and works different areas everyday. It's great that you have access to yoga, pilates and loads of strength and hiit workouts too.

Stay away from this app. Upon sign up the app asks you to select a paid membership and u will get a 7 day free trial but as soon as u select a plan it deducts money from ur account and even if soon after u cancel u wont be refunded. I want refund To the Centr team, if you need money u need to let people trial first then charge them if they like the app, by charging them in advance using a scam technique no one will want to use this app. Literally feels like scam, I thought Chris's app is legit
Best fitness app I ever used. The guided exercises are exactly what I needed to keep me going. The 6 weeks programs are also a blast and the meals are amazing.
There is a ton of great individual workouts as well as programs and even a recipe and grocery guide. Its definitely a great app if you want to workout without equipment or minimal equipment 👍🏼

So far so good. Investment worth the coaching. Don't have time for a gym so this has been a great substitute so far. Looking forward to more intense weight oriented workouts. Have not used the food portion yet but recipes look amazing

Same has other was not notified about renewal which is a bit strange to say the least, every other app ways notify before renewal. Very disappointed by the comments from Centr, not very helpful. I assume with the year we have all had this will have happened to so many people and due to having covid very severely , I have not even used the app since last year Poor customer service
There are a great range of workouts from beginner to advance, it's like having your own personal trainer. Also love the meditations and sleep visualization.

Great workouts for all levels. Perfect for at home without equipment or in a gym. All the trainers have great banter. Signed up for 1 years after my free trial because this app motivates me to keep training.

Centr has just had so much thought put in to it, from the different levels of activity to suit everyone, to the online community which keeps you motivated. The app runs smoothly without fail, and the results are amazing!
Great fast workouts that get results. Easy to do at home with options for minimal equipment and/or none. The meals are delicious also!

I have been using this app for more than 14 months and committed to the workouts except the meal plan:p. So far I can see results are good but I'm confident if I stick to meal plan results will be extra ordinary Fingers crossed !!
Good workouts and the app works now.

Was very unsure about the app as I used freeletics before hand then cam to this one but jus as easy to use, the training programmes easy to follow with video to go through it with you and the meals packs are ideal for quick midweek meals.

Ok, so hear me out, I got super stoned 1 night and bought the subscription as a joke, thinking it would magically turn me into Thor, didn't actually touch it for like 2 months, I'm NASM certified and was a competitive powerlifer for 4 years, when I sat down to draw up a nutrition plan and workout plan to get rid of my COVID weight my wife reminded me that I had got a year's subscription to actually use it, well I did and I may not go back OMG it's super easy to use and the workouts work 10 stars

Makes you rush through the exercises and doesn't slow down to instruct on proper form for beginners. Whooping my ass daily but want to be sure I'm not going to strain something by rushing through circuits.
Absolutely love it! Started on a 6week beginner struggling, but I completed the 6week intermediate and currently on 2nd week of advanced more toned and feeling great! Highly recommend its worth it!
I like the app. Good layout and great workouts with diverse crew. Recipes are fun. It can get a bit buggy sometimes.
Everytime I login it says my session expired, so I can't use the app. I prefer freeletics because it's easier to use.
Overall great fitness app Some glitches on the video which is annoying in the middle of a workout. Trainers are fantastic and motivating. Recipes and planner is 5 star!!
Overall this is a good work out app and have tasty food recipes. However, be careful with the free subscriptions. I have been charged full price for my free subscription.....

Amazing app! Mix of workouts and food options so it never gets boring.some ingredients are not available so I wish they'd have more options but other than a very impressive app even provides options for destressing!

Brilliant app just a little difficult to find the right ingredients for the recipes in NZ. Update: Not sure if the app changed or they suddenly starting stocking the right things I needed but definitely seeing it work better, worthy of a god rating of 5 stars.
Fantastic all in one wellness app. Huge range of workouts and recipes plus meditation. I mostly love that every day is organised for me, all I've got to do is show up!

I love it. The recipes are great and you can tailor it so its suits you (e.g. vegan for me- and there are loads of recipes- loads!). I love the meditation options too and the workouts are great. Currently doing the 6 week challenge and the half hour work outs easily fit into my day. Thanks!
Excellent workouts with a great team with such varied but engaging personalities. Food menu is great too. I have some new favourite recipes which make me look like a decent cook!
Downloaded for the Pilates workouts but impossible to follow along just from the audio and difficult to watch videos while doing it - ended up straining my next trying to watch which defeats purpose!

Great workouts and motivation, keeps you involved, glad to keep using it after the trial :) and ps it was very clear that after the trail you'd be charged the subscription fee YOU decided so those whinging on a current affair take some responsibility for your own actions and all complaining, well Done Chris, love what you're doing

a colleague recommended this app - he raves about it. i saw an add and entered my email address. i have received several marketing emails about their support for US children. i am not against that but, as an Australian, living in Australia, and as the app is promoted by an Austrlian that lives in Australia, i was dismayed that, should i join, i would be supporting the US and US children not Australian children
The right amount of motivation, variety, and customization I need! Plus learning new great tasting, easy to make, healthy recipes!

Scam - Stay Away Got the app to try out as a big fan of Chris's outcomes and routine. Being 6'3 is not easy to gain like that. As a truck driver I waa curious to see what I could incorporate. Beware: The people doing this app for Chris will not work with you at all. Greed is king! What Happened: I signed up for the 7 day Free Trial and was advertised that 2 days prior we send you a reminder. The reminder never came and 1 year charge went through. Canceled same day as charge. Refund: DENIED

This is by far the best workout and healthy living app I ever tried! It is really easy to use and tailors exercise and food to your skill level and goals. I can't wait for the new Power program to start!
Love love love the food portion. The recipes are simple and delicious. The shopping list feature makes my life so much easier. The workouts are short, but killer. This app is awesome!

Absolutely terrible! These people are scams, they give you a free trial and then make it super hard to cancel and then charge you $119 and say they can't refund me! DO NOT FALL INTO THE TRAP! The training isn't even good, it's all about money.

I've never been so disappointed in an app. While the app itself may be decent, the people behind it only care about a profit. During a pandemic, when people are struggling and thoughts are elsewhere, this company will take money swiftly and leave a "too bad so sad" response. Be warned, you don't get alerted on upcoming payments like I've seen many apps do and if you respond right away saying there was an error you'll get nothing but copy and paste. Thanks alot guys, glad your doing so well.....

I needed a way to combat dad bod without leaving my poof wife at home alone with the kids by herself, and this was it. The meal planning alone is worth the money. I have a degree in exercise phys and was a trainer for 3 years, and am really enjoying this app and its programs
Just got this tonight, committed to a year and most of the app is empty. No recipes, no snacks, no grocery list, no workout programs. Lots of errors.
Excellent app, great team of trainers, various styles of workout. This is the only app that motivates me and makes me want to come back for more.

First of all, the app looks good but The no equipment workouts are mostly mma and pilates, there is mostly no body weight workout with varietions, the meals are pretty expensive to make if u want sth simple. It's a bit exclusive for it's price and it doesn't offer much, don't recommend that
Fantastic app for fitness. Covers everything from workouts, nutrition plus meditation and visualisations. Been using the app for over 2 years now and love it 🥰🤩

These workouts are not medium to small house friendly. They feel great, the coached workouts are well designed and flow well, the meal plans are very detailed, so if you're like me with a tiny kitchen and little to no space then I wish you luck. Otherwise everything about the app is fantastic, just seems to assume you have a minimum 2500 Sq ft house with a kitchen made for Gordan Ramsay. I would still recommend to anyone that wants to try this program out. Disclaimer, I bought the year on sale.

I'm studying to become a personal trainer, and after having some practice clients, I felt I needed a trainer myself and damn this is crazy. I'm on the advanced 10-week program, this is absolutely insane but I love it

Have been using centr for a while now and YAY Android app! I'm super disappointed in the shopping list though, I can't add anything?? Please add the option to add things to the shopping list!! This is now added love it!

This app has an incredible support group of fellow legends around the world. The Facebook group and app have changed my experience of accountability and view on health completely. Thanks to not only the creators but those out there like me who have joined along.

Best health/fitness app I've seen/tried by a country mile. Variety means there's something for everyone - I'm 9 months in loving it with still loads more to try. Couldn't recommend more... good job Chris and co! 💪

I'm hooked! Centr is the only fitness app that has kept me engaged long-term. I started out as a beginner to HIIT and I'm still going strong 💪. The meal planner takes the headache out of eating well. Give it a go.
Amazing app! Full of great workouts and programs, meals, meditations and sleep visualizations. Barely ever errors or crashes.
Keeps me consistent, I have so many programs to choose from that suit my style, I never get bored. Very complete app with amazing professionals behind it
Best workout app I have ever used! I have tried quite few different app and programs and this is by far my favorite. The food is delicious the workouts are amazing!

Love the workouts! Ashley is the best! Unfortunately i injured my ankle multiple times (not centr exercise related) and the workouts are not all ankle friendly, so i have to pause. But i can't wait to get back into it!
Solid app but never works when I try to cast it to Google TV which is a huge bummer. Kind of makes you not want to pay $120 for it if you can't follow the workouts.
I really like the app, but taking away 1 star because after the recent update, I can't seem to cast the videos to my screen anymore. Only the centr logo appears and nothing more.
This app is incredible. Easy to follow the workouts as a gym newbie. Bonus is the great recipes and the meditations are pure gold!
This app has helped me lose weight, manage my mental health, and eat better! I can't thank Chris Hemsworth and his team enough. You saved my life, and I truly mean that! Thank you!
Good workouts, good pace, good stretching. Not much more to ask for but wait, awesome meals and meditation on top of that, boo yeah!
App not casting with a chromecast device any longer. Have un-installed app and restarted chromecast.... Nothing works.

This is way better than I thought it would be. I am ABSOLUTELY loving this app and everything it offers. The workouts are fabulous and I love the format of how they work! I actually look forward to going downstairs and doing my workout now!!
Fantastic app, very polished and easy to navigate through. Great variety of exercises and meal plans. Awesome work team.

If I could give this a minus score I would but 1 star is the lowest it goes. 12 month subscription started after 6 days of the 7 day trial. When contacted they refused refund and said it wasn't possible. Joke company, stay well clear of this app, its very poor as well as the awful customer care
Just the best app to achieve your fitness goals. Is not only exercises, has diets, meditations, relaxation and a general life balance. Just fantastic.

Cancelled my subscription on the last day of my trial and they still took the £93.99 from my account the following day and refused to refund the money and tried to say I went a day over my trail period when I started it on the Monday and cancelled it the following Monday which if I'm not mistaken is 7 days !!!!!Absolute Poor customer service would never recommend this app to anyone STAY CLEAR !!!!!!!!!
The only workout app I genuinely have no problems with. I thought it was just a celebs face slapped on an app to make some money but I love this the way a goth loves black eyeliner
Beginner level isn't for beginners. When the instructor is struggling to get through the session you can't call it beginner level.

Like others are saying the app is very buggy. I'm on day three of my 7-day trial and I still can't use the app. Had to create an account on my laptop after the app failed. With the account created I hoped I could log into the app on my S9+...but still no luck. Guess I'll stick with Nike Training Club.

This app has done wonders since the pandemic. I was able to utilize this when all the gyms shut down and now I learned that I don't need a gym membership to stay in shape. The trainers are fun, engaging, and genuine.
Great programs, excellent choice for work outs and coaches, as well as great meal plans and suggestions. Also quick and satisfying results if you work hard and stick to your goals.
Just wish it ran in the background while in a different app or when the screen is off. Having to stay in app for timer to work is annoying.
Excellent coached workouts for all levels of fitness. It would be good to have a few tweaks like integration to my fitness pal, recipe apps, samsung health etc.

It's so easy to use! Great meals to eat and cook for the family. See massive difference's across my whole body and I feel amazing. It took four weeks to start the new habit of exercising five days a week. Well worth it through! Great job guys!

Great value for money - it’s basically your own personal trainer in an app. Plus meals planned out for you based on your goal & meditations all in one for only $10 a month. The experts are awesome too, they are heaps of fun so workouts are actually kind of enjoyable!

Not a fan of this app tbh. Yes you will lose weight on a 1500 calories diet! But you will be miserable & I highly doubt it would work for myself. Didn't like the limited meals plans either, very repetitive & I do not class "leftovers" as a meal option. Will not be returning
Tried a bunch of different apps and find that it gets boring very quickly..I like that this has block programs, self paced, individual workouts and I'm not as easily bored, now been 4 weeks...

I used the app for a little while in early 2022. I cancelled the account last February and just noticed they decided to charge me another $120 for ANOTHER year subscription that was cancelled a year ago. No semblance of customer service. Go to some other Hollywood bod to get your gym fix.

Holistic approach to a healthy lifestyle. This app has changed my 15 year old sons life for the better. I initially purchased this for me, but he is using it everyday and we are seeing such positive benfits for him. I love the meditations, blogs and recipes. He loves Da Rulk! Best app ever. Well set out and structured.

Usually just use YouTube workouts and liked those as a gym replacement. Thought I was fairly fit but wasn't seeing a huge difference in body and was definitely gaining covid weight. After 2 weeks of using this app I've already noticed changes in strength and fat loss. Love the meditation too and put it on before bed. I also have the down dog app and prefer that for yoga but to be fair I've only tried one yoga video on here and just rather stick with what I already love.
Easy to use app with lots of great options for both food and workouts. Would love to see some weights mixed into the daily program.
I have used alot of apps to train and this is a great app if you want an all in one platform to train. The app iseasy to use and lots of options to train. The meals have been great as well.
Amazing app! Easy to understand and operate. Workouts range from mild to advanced depending on goals. they keep me entertained and sweating!
Absolutely can not fault this app. Got so many different programmes to cater for everyone's fitness level/goals and has food guides to go with it. 10/10
The best app for fitness ever! I love how easy it Is to navigate through the workouts and meal plans along with the meditations! Definitely a 5 out of 5 stars!!!!

Because of Centr I was able to get in shape in the middle of a pandemic! I was able to convince family and friends to join when everything else was closed. If you don't have time, they have 8, 7 min workouts that burn! This app has everything from workouts that can be done at home with no equipment, to ones with full gym support. It even go me doing yoga and pilates! They also offer a huge amount of receipts that can complement your workout and help you get in the shape you want.
Absolutely love this app. It definitely helps keep me accountable for my workouts and diet! Plus the workout are short so easy to fit into a busy schedule.

App is buggy some workouts don't seem to want to load, I keep getting error messages saying try again. For the money invested, I expected to not have to deal with this right at the beginning of usage. Is there an update I'm missing?

The routines and programs are all well thought out and if executed correctly(you have to push yourself and put in the hardwork) you will get a killer workout. The centr 6 program is fun, fast paced and one hell of a body burner. I love it so far. 2 weeks in on my first program and I can already see and feel a difference in my performance and physique. I still have a ways to go before I reach Thor level, but I'm happy over all.
This is outstanding. I love working out and I love Chris Hemsworth. I wish he was in all the workouts, but you can't have it all! Great app, and the recipes and meal planning section is really useful
Best workout app I have ever used. Variety of trainers so you can choose your favorite. Great meal suggestions and lots of mental health resources too! Worth the year subscription!

This is the best app ever in terms of changing life habits, getting motivated day-to-day to workout. The only thing that someone need to get involved into this app is a day with those challenges. Thank you because thus team is challenging my life.
Impressed I enjoy this app. It will plan your week out with workouts, food, and meditation. I just started a month ago and it has shown good results. I am learning to love heathy food again.
The content is great but something in the app has changed recently and workouts no longer complete when finished. The loading symbol cycles forever.

My wife purchased this app and instead of taking a monthly payment they took the whole years payment in one and when questioned about it she was told tuff there is nothing you can do about it, and they blocked her from leaving a review. Please please don't get ripped off like us.

I have Rheumatoid Arthritis so I have to changed some routines to adapt to my condition. But I love it. It keeps me moving. My husband is doing it too. We are both at beginner level. It is hard, but awesome.

This is by far the best program I have ever done! While I was pregnant with my last child I did MA30 and it was good. But this pregnancy I needed something more custom to me. Which this Centr program offers, from workouts, to meals custom to your diet and meditation and sleep exercises! I highly recommend!!!

I LOVE this app! It's intuitive, user friendly, and the content is beyond any other health and wellness app I've ever used and I have used a LOT of them in the past. I highly recommend this app to anyone who wants to have a balanced healthy lifestyle. All the tools are here.
Good but cool downs are the same and not actually cool downs more often than not, and workouts cannot be downloaded for offline use. Whilst I can record my screen and do it seems a simple fix
Great for getting in shape without going to the gym. The meditation and nutrition stuff isn't for me, but isn't too intrusive. Would love more no-equipment workouts.

What I love about Centr is I don't have to think. A lot of people always want to get in shape, get healthy and so on, but usually get sidetracked by their very real lives as they let those goals become a passing day fantasy. If you know how to train, eat and stay healthy, you probably don't need this app, BUT if you're someone whose always lost in how to get from A to B, this is probably going to change your life over the months, and you down the road is totally worthy of that transformation.

"As outlined in our Terms & Conditions, we are unable to issue refunds for unused subscription periods, accidental purchase, late cancelation or any other similar event." There's a difference between 'unable' and 'unwilling'. You should learn to distinguish between the two.

I enjoy the app and the workouts but don't quite understand / trust the nutrition facts for the recipes. They seem to be different based on male or female gender which doesn't make much sense to me personally.
Ugh. App stopped working, and I lost all progress after reinstall. Not sure I can trust a subscription with this app, if it's not stable :( I like the exercises though, so it's a shame
This app alone has helped me tremendously. I have a previous knowledge of the gym, but this really amplified my workouts, kept me motivated with fresh techniques, and honed in on my diet. Brilliant.

Absolutely love the trainers. They make you feel like you are in the same room as they are during the workout. I'm currently doing the second 6 week program this year. I love the fact that I can easily complete the workouts at home and can swap out the daily workout if I don't have the equipment.
Great fitness app, trialled it during the uk lockdown got way more out of this than other fitness apps. Workouts are hard and the coaches make you want to complete them!

Workouts are great and the recipes are delicious! The next day after one of these workouts, you'll feel the burn in spots you weren't even aware you were working. Lots of variety and options for no equipment as well as low impact modifications that don't make you feel less than.
If you are unsure how to navigate everything offered, just go through the beginner program for 6 weeks and it'll set you up. App is the best one out there
Great app. Would be good if you could record previous weights for each exercise and have some progress charts also over time.
This app is fantastic. The range of meditations, recipes, and exercises is great, with new things being added all the time. :)
Love Centr workouts. The app is easy to navigate. The recipes on here are so good and fairly quick to make. The workouts vary from yoga, HIIT, boxing, MMA, etc. Best workout app!

This app is boring & the voice overs make it super cheesy. There are so many fitness apps and streaming programs that are waaaayyy better than Centre. If I could give it 0 stars I would. Also, if you sign up and try to cancel they keep all of your $100+...Dont know what's worse, the app or the service. Seriously, don't bother. I'm absolutely convinced any positive reviews are as phony as this app is.
I love how I can do a solid, intense workout in 25mins. I feel stronger only after 1 week. Haven't really done too many meals but the smoothies, meditations and coached workouts are amazing!
Been using the app, for a little over a month now, finding the workouts, coaching, and meal planners very beneficial and challenging. Would definitely recommend

Brilliant workout. Totally pumped up. This gives you everything you need from diet plans to workouts to meditation. Highly recommended to everyone out there. Chris Hemsworth's team has nailed the perfect app.
Best fitness app I've used. Great daily meal recipes provided as well that actually taste good and make you excited to cook! Overall, very well rounded. Highly recommend.

Great workout routines with a mix of nutrition, meditation, overall wellness. Would be nice to track reps/weight in app as my only suggestion. Great bodyweight only routines in this time when most if not all gyms are closed!

Centr blew 2.5 Gb (half of my monthly plan) in half a week. This app urgently needs an offline mode because even with the videos turned off it devoured my data in less than two weeks. My gym doesn't provide wifi network so I literally cant use this app unless said offline mode is implemented.

"keep moving"... love this app, I chose the program with no equipment Unlimited which works perfectly for me as I feel the whole body working during the session.. just to keep myself tuned and fit♥️😍 Plus I hate thinking about what to cook so the Planner and Explore Meals section are real blessing for me. Moreover, quick meditations from Chris keep me positive during the day 🙌 such a great value for my money
Great app. What would make it even better is the ability to track what workouts you've completed and star your favorites. I keep forgetting which ones I've done!
Is the complete program to get into a better and healthier type of life, you have the trainings, the recepies, the motivation... everything!! I highly recommend it!
Loving this app! I need to delve more into the recipes, but the workout and meditation are great, with daily hints and tips. I Chromecast it to my tv to make it easier to follow
Nice content, but app keeps crashing
Great app, helps with training programmes, dieting. (bonus points as it creates and easy shopping list for the dieting and how to cook the meals) the meals also taste great.
Huge fan. Food is great, workouts are awesome and not too long. Love the options to switch up the meals & workouts when life needs something a little different.

I got centr on a free trial with amex. Overall I would be very disappointed if I paid for it. I tried centr unleashed for six weeks. I don't think the training they suggest will help grow strength or condition people. There is no repetition to a movement, for instance you'll get your heart rate elevated from running on the spot then move into a crab walk which decreases the heart rate. For upper body there is no repetition of pushups sets rather than get you to do 6 different types of push ups.
I love the options of workouts. They are tough and also offer a less intensive option for those of us not quite at that level
Amazing app. It has a variety of workouts from different trainers, lovely meal plans and fanatastic articles and meditations. Would thoroughly recommend.
Use it everyday... I love this app helps with diet and exercise
Amazing super friendly and supportive!
A great app for keeping track of training. It also motivates you and teaches you how to do each exercise properly. I give it a big thunb up! 👍
Won't let me log in goes round in endless cycle back to login page
App keeps logging out... Basically unusable Pixel 7 Pro
Great app with well thought out interface. Not glitches over more than 12mths use. The Centre program is excellent value for money.
Easy to follow and always new challenging workouts, if followed you can achieve great results - thank you Centr team!
Great program...when it works. They have had too many login issues since selling the company.
Really helping me with weight loss
I hate that u gotta pay like why would u have to pay

1 star and no less as I can't rate it worse.Extremelly poor customer service. Better you read every single line of the terms and conditions before signing up as if you want to cancel or have any issues they won't listen.
It's perfect!
Great instructors and really good app experience. I've been using Centr for over a year and loved all the classes and programs I've taken. Thanks to the Centr team for making my workouts easier. 💪🏽
Love this app, have been using the workouts everyday, they are all different styles. The food and meditation programs are a plus.
Great app. Has everything you could want to stay motivated and fit. Plus lots of different workouts available so it's impossible to get bored.

Centr kept me in shape and staying healthy throughout the covid lock down. Starting out with no weights at the beginning and gradually getting dumbbells to add to my sessions. I feel much strong after completing each program.
Advertised that they would provide a six week free trial. Instead of providing the advertised trial period, I get a charge for a full year subscription after only one week.
Alot of yum, healthy and easy to make recipes. Workouts are quite challenging but that's what you want. Definitely recommend!
Especially in an age of not having a gym to go to, I am so grateful to have this app to keep my workouts varied, challenging, and enjoyable.

Love it. It keeps getting better and making me push my body in different ways. Just about to hit 50 years old and I've not felt so strong and fit since my mid-twenties. Seem to be get less injury's as I try the different variations of workouts too.
This app is making it easy for me to get back into exercising. Loads of programs and recipes to follow. Guided workouts are easy to follow and workouts are fun.
With a few small things I'd like to adjust aside this is truly an amazing app. Highly recommend. Everything all in one place and personalized.

For someone who never does exercise I am 3 weeks into the beginner programme and I can feel myself getting fitter and stronger. I can do exercises now that I struggled with in week 1. I can stretch more and feel good for it. Thankyou 🙂
Amazing! Just wish it would have the option to download programmes for offline use as well.

Awesome app, worth the money. Spending way less than what you would on a pt and nutritionist for a whole year. Set out very easily and lots of information about form, diets etc. Love it guys thankyou!!
This is a great health app that has it all. The curated meals are always new and fresh and the ability to creat a shopping list from the app for those meals is priceless! Thank you!
Love the bodyweight workouts and all the food options that they cater to. My only negative is I wish they had better music while working out to get me pumped during my workouts.
Good mix or workout types and lengths and dietary info. I don't see a way to cast to a TV which makes it difficult though.

Who is this for? To get the most out of this app, you need access to a gym, but if I were already going to a gym, I'd rely on their trainers and resources or free material online over a paid app. It's not clear whether any of the no equipment workouts build muscle. They don't appear to if you compare the language with the gym ones. The gluten free, vegan, body building meal plans and shopping lists alone would be worth buying once (although "or X alternative" is a bit of a cop out).
Great variety of workouts and easy to modify. 9 weeks of using it, no issues. Really enjoying it.
Great app with a huge library of workouts, recipes and programs to suit all people and fitness levels. If you want to workout at home or the gym by yourself, this is the app for you.
I was sucked in by the 6 week free trial, and ended up signing up for a year. I love how balanced the program is, and the variety in workouts and food. I highly recommend.
Exceptional value with exercise plans, diets, and meditations all in one package. App can be clunky though and is an absolute data hog.
Great app, design of workouts are good and I like that there are short and long workouts available. Recipes are different and tasty as well.

A very enjoyable experience. As a member since centr was formed, it brings a better experience on mobile compared to just using the web page and having access to Centr6 on my Android is awesome and way convenient.
Love the workouts! However, the app ate through almost 9gb in background data in just a few days, causing me to use ALL data on my plan, which cost me $.
Great app for improving fitness 👍 One suggestion - can you add the option to download workouts as I enjoy doing them outside sometimes but don't want to use up all my data streaming
Great app where u dont even have to think, just choose a type of activity, choose one with a catchy name, then get to it!! Great meal ideas too. And great price! And you should get it!
Awesome experiance....you got to keep up with em....one thing I would want to say is, if the food diet that they provide could be more country specific....it would have been great...
This is a sensational app. Covers everything, so easy to use and very organized. Will be upgrading to the 12 month membership. No regrets here. Thanks Chris and amazing team. 🙂👍

Amazing program, it has everything you need. Cardio, weights, yoga, pilates, boxing, meditation and meal planning...their is something for everyone. Love this app, even got it for my daughter so she could use it during quarantine.

The 7 day free trial is a scam, as it requires you to subscribe before accessing any workout info or even seeing the app interface. Can not comment on the plans since I uninstalled after being required to subscribe literally 20sec after opening the app.
App is almost perfect, but desperately needs a way to keep track of the weight you are using! If they update it with that I would give it five stars for sure.
Love this app. Easy to follow, every bit as challenging as you want and then some if you choose, great instructors, great community.
They are very motivated and I like that they have alternative for different levels- and you can pick and choose what day you want to do! So many choices!

I could not heart this app any more. High quality videos and fun work outs with tons of variety. Meal recipes that don't cost the earth, are not full of obscure ingredients and don't take too long for busy parents to make. I've only been going a short while but I'm noticeably fitter and stronger. 10/10
Such a good app. The workouts are so varied so it keeps you interested and helps you learn new types of workouts. 100% recommend.

Poor customer service. Cancelled the subscription within 24 hours (of the cut off date) and couldn't get a refund. No reminder email was sent and interactions with customer service felt like dealing with a bot.
The fitness app and it has tons of perks and features from coached to self guided training sessions to meals and snacks and very dope meditation and sleep visualization..all in all great app.

Love this app. I love having a workout to do and meal ideas to help me be healthy. It's so nice to have a planned workout and follow along with progressions or modifications to meet my needs as I exercise.
The app tech is flawless, huge variety of workouts and recipes. Seriously impressive, and loving the mindfulness and personal development articles sprinkled in on top.
Fantastic all in one app for fitness, nutrition and well being. Love the variety of workout and styles. Easy to use and fantastic value for money
Finally, the app makes Centr so much more convenient. It would be great if the main menu rotated with the screen, but apart from that, it is great
Best health app I have ever used. Amazing variety of workouts, meditation, sleep help, recipes, complete and total health package. Amazing trainers and support
Hands down best health app. The workouts are next level, the food is amazing and love the daily meditation/ motivation articles. Highly recommend this app!
Really enjoying this app! Love the programs and the fact that I can find some that are VERY effective but short enough that I can fit it into my schedule with work and my kids!
Great programs and work outs. It's worth it just for that, but the mediation and meal plans are equally as good. I'm very impressed with this app, and will definitely continue to use it
Great workout routine to get into and feel like it doesn't get repetitive. The social support group of users is one of the best parts too!

Great app with a lot of exercise routines from HIIT to Pilates that are sure to help you achieve your fitness goals! It also come with a huge variety of meals to complement your gains and help you stay strong and healthy!
It's been a great home workout app. Most of the exercises have alternatives for equipment which allows you to do it at home.
I was immediate charged without free 7 days trial,, don't get that, luckily I had the one month option selected if it was the yearly subscription than that would had been a big problem for me
The most variety and functional workout app I've ever used. Meals are good and no counting anything. Just feed the body and work.
Amazing app for all kinds of workouts and staying healthy! Really good mix of different coaches and at the right level...love it!!

Seems like an amazing app but i wish there was some way to tell it that I have zero equiptment to use. Can't do much about not having a gym to go to anymore... Eddit: didn't know about the feature to change workouts. Silly me, the fool I look!
This is an awesome app, I feel the burn every day. The workouts are brilliant and the coaches, programs, nutrition and all the other stuff is amazing.
Love the variety! The recipes are really tasty, healthy and easy. The workouts are fun and the app is really user friendly

It needs more details on how to properly do the exercises otherwise there is no point in doing them if your doimg them wrong. Watching a video of someone doing it with no description simply does not suffice especially for a beginner like me
This really makes working out at home great. There are plans for many different types of work outs and every plan has a different experience level for you to work up to. It is excellent!!
Very simple and easy to use. I love the fact that we get meal suggestions along with workout, its a complete package.

This app literally cannot be used unless you start paying for a subscription. Even the free trial requires you to enter your credit card info, which will be charged after the time of the free trial is up.

Great food. Fun exercise. Got me through 100 days of Melbourne lockdown still smiling. Thanks. One thing. Please make it possible to send the shopping list to someone else...I don't always do the shopping

What a huge disappointment I'm left with - I got in touch with you on the last day of cancellation before you guys charged the money from my account, asking you guys to help me cancel my subscription all together, and not pull any money from me - no help received, and the money still got pulled. This leaves me feeling scammed - quite contrary to the initial 'generous' free-trial offer of you guys wanting to 'help' people out during this COVID-19 lockdown period. Very shocking and disappointing.
Great range of workouts. Also variety of recipes to suit most diet types. I haven't tried the meditations but caters for mental health too. Real all round fitness app👍
Been using the app for 6 weeks now and I'm loving it. The Facebook community is great, and the workouts are fabulous. Food looks great, but haven't tried the recipes yet 😅
Love the app. So much to choose from - depending on what you feel like doing. I was surprised by how much I have enjoyed Pilates. An absolute lifesaver during the lockdowns in Victoria!
Works you hard, sweating starts right from the get go and strength building you can feel right away. They also give modifications. Very happy!💪🦵
Just getting back into fitness, love the app, love the range of new interesting exercises that I haven't tried before. Huge selection of recipes too. Well worth the money.
Enjoy the variation of coach led and self led. Wide range of activities, just cant fit it all in! Loads of meal options too.
Really upset that there is currently no casting option for Google Chromecast. I'm reading through reviews and there looks to be something in the works, but we'll see.
Definitely worth it. The workouts are great.
Absolute love it. The programmes, diet plans and trainers are all awesome and really enjoying the experience, training and support
I was a complete beginner and hated exercise. I now love the workouts and have a specific goal to work towards. As a mum with a young family I would love some more tailored eating programs.
The instructors guides, suggestions, and mods are great. Exactly what I've been looking for and hoping for in a wellness/fitness app.
Coaches are motivating as well as light humor. Workout programs are customizable for all levels. Wife and I workout on the beginner program together. We love it. I'm down 9 lbs in the last 30 days.
Fantastic app, great variety in workouts and recipes, this is an app for long term lasting results and not just another quick fix program that wont stick

For someone like me who works shifts, Centr is a great app which organises my workouts, meals and meditation for me. The community on Centr are all so friendly and encouraging too!. Organised, Inspiring, Affordable. Would highly reccomend to anyone wanting a meal and workout app. Best one out there! Bonus: Training alongside Thor makes you feel like a superhero too 🦸‍♂️🦸‍♀️
I downloaded the app for the exercises, staying for the meal planning assist and the meditations. Surprisingly good.😜. The humor also helps.
Exercises are really good, sometimes to light and the menu could be a little more centered on what you have at home but other than that is REALLY GOOD

Be very careful with the subscription fee. I had forgotten I was on an annual subscription, they charged me $120 without confirming whether i wanted to continue the subscription and refused to refund me "per their terms and conditions".
The 7 day free trial is only after you give them your credit card. Can't use any part of the app until you do. Sorry, but no. Uninstalled without using.
The best wellness app. It has it all. Meals, shopping lists, workouts (amazing variety), meditations, atricles...its got it all!!!

The app itself is REALLY good and it will make a big change on your body. The only reason I give it a 4 is because of the payment, i wish it would be free in the future so that alot of ppl would get access to it and get it for free.
Perfect one-stop-shop for your workout, diet and meditation needs. Been using it for a little over a month now and really feel the difference to my overall health.
Fantastic app. Nutrition, fitness and meditation all in one place, and all of the options for all three are varied and interesting!
We've really enjoyed it. Workouts can be as hard as you make them and we love the extra content, particularly the meditations. Really great app.👍
Error cant use, keep on logging out user...

I havent tried it yet and would like to but I just wish it was free a little like the beginner one at least. It's nice to know that you can do a free trial but I wish it was like maybe a month free trial but it's ok though. I have a hard time trying to lose the weight I have now and if i do the free trial and like it I just wish I wouldn't have to pay for it. But the app seems pretty cool and exciting so maybe in the future when I want to pay for it, I'll stick with it.

I've tried many apps and subscriptions to get fit and healthy. This is the first one that motivates me and has me up early to do the workouts. I feel so much better and happier now. Absolutely love it 👍

Definitely was very dubious when I downloaded the app but it has exceeded all my expectations. There's no way I will delete this app, it really gives all that you pay for and more. Five stars! 10/10. 👌
Workout are challenging but able to be completed as a beginner. Modification and low impact options. Love it
This app is amazing! Well planned for you to get your ideal body. Motivative, easy, fast. This app also provide recipes for you. All you need to do is prepare the materials. Love it!

I have gained so much knowledge on a variety of workout methods and stretches from this app, not to mentioned gained some of my new favorite recupes from it. This app has been key for my muscle toning process.

Careful. they show you "pricing" by month and by year...but no where it says clearly that you will actually get charged for entire year at once while singing up..unless you read all the terms and conditions.
I love this app, it gives you everything u need, food, exercise, advice and at a great price and the sense of belonging with the online community is fantastic. Best exercise program/app i have used.
The coaches and the trainings are great. You don't need to follow the calendar as you can switch trainings. I also enjoy the recipes.

The customer service of this app sucks... I have reinstalled the application and jt is not linking to my subsceiption. I am sent almost 10 emails including receipt of the purchase as well as subscriotion info and still i received the response stating you do not acrive subscription for mentioned email...These guys dont even have customer care number...Dont but annual plan or you will loose ur money....

Got charged for a "free trial". This was advertised with no fine print. I cancelled my account within the free trial period. Interesting to see a few 1 star reviews coming on this page then some "fake" reviews pushing the low ones out
Just awesome. Can see physical changes to my body within a week of following the exercises closely and consistently. Great for newbies too.
Excellent! Really great value for money, great workouts for all levels. Also has meal plans that are easy to follow and super tasty.
This is a great fitness app. I love the variety of the workouts and the fact that they don't require equipment. I have also really been enjoying the recipes. Healthy and flavorful.
Great app, awesome programs. One thing that could be added is a calendar with an option to take notes.
Great app. Lots of workout choices, menu plans and other activities which address both physical and mental wellbeing.
Best app to stay in shape and get on track. A ton of information and programs, nutritional advice, meal plans. Love you guys keep it up, this is what was missing ! :)
Such an easy app to use. If you're busy, it's so fluid to just complete a workout with no equipment, from warm up to cool down. No fuss!
I love this app. I have been doing the programs and trying the recipes. I feel great and stronger. The app is super easy to use. One of my favorite features is it creates a shopping list.
I used for workout programs more so than nutritional plans. As I already have a nutrion app, the workouts were great and easy to follow with a good mix of excercises
Terrific mix of work out inspiration and meal planning suggestions. You can use it for some bits and get terrific results or go for the whole program.
Enjoying it at lot, I look forward to each workout. The modifications are very handy when needed can't go to the gym etc. Definitely recommend.
Fantastic app, well rounded workouts, meditation and deliciously healthy meal plans. Lots of variety. Been using it for 5 months with great results

Absolutely love this program, mostly use it on the computer for actual workouts (bigger screen) but the app is handy to check recipe ingredients at the shops or have a quick look to see what workout I'm doing tomorrow etc.

Great food plan, I love that you set how many portions for each meal you want to buy for and it creates your exact shopping list which avoids waste. 3 levels of workout demonstrated together so husband and I can train together at different abilities
Great workouts, keeps you going. Could do with a little variation in warm up and down but the sessions themselves are nice and varied
Great app. But needs a family plan or ability to do add a family member. My wife and I don't want to pay for two separate accounts for her to have it on her phone too and mine.
Absolutely brilliant programme 👏 it's adapted to various levels, time, capacity. It's fun and just so easy to make it a daily routine!

Love this app. It has so much to offer tailored to your needs while also allowing you to choose workouts and meals. I dont think there is anything else on the market that takes the hardwork out of working out!
Great workout app that's helped me lose weight during covid and become fitter than I was before it. Love that the work outs vary each week, so it stops me from getting bored.
It's awesome. The workouts and the recipes are perfect, and that's coming from someone who has always struggled to workout and cook. :)

Love this app, first app I've seen with a planner around a guide of everything you need to focus on for the day, incl motivation and sleep. So simple to use and, expert HiiT workouts which are fast with great trainers', highly recommend

I'm no means a newbie or a pro but I take care of myself and this is the best app I've ever seen. It's well laid out and gives you a ton of choices for food that doesn't have you eating the same protein bar day after day. Thank you!
Loving it. So much better than just pull ups and push ups etc. The variety of movement is proving really testing.
Your pricing is too high and shouldn't require a credit card for the free trial. The app is linked to your username. Give us a free week, then require payment to continue.
Did the free 6 week trial, and have now subscribed for 1 year. Seems good value and the workouts are great, and varied. Mainly do the body weight only ones.
Great app, but the videos are too large and use a lot of data. Even on broadband it often stops for buffering the download.
I love this app. Great coached workouts. If I want to review the work out to see if I have the technique right. I can. Has great food and recipe ideas great app.
I'm a relatively fit person, I play hockey and I'm used to HIIT workouts, but these workouts make me sweat to a new extreme. Love the workouts, love the recipes, and over all love the app.
It makes you feel like a douche, but it gets you working and provides a good range of workouts. Recipes a great bonus. $10 a month feels like a steal.
Easy to use, lots of instruction from the trainers if needed, has everything you need from workouts to diet to meditation and relaxation. It has made my life better.
The best (I've tried many) workout apps. Tailored towards both gym members and folks who workout at home. Never boring, always something unique to keep you interested.
Great app! Love that it offers you different workouts depending what level you are at, and the meditations are very helpful.

No way to cancel subscription prior to trial being done. Does not show in Play Store as a subscription. Does not accept my password to sign in and the forgot password email never showed up not even in spam folder. No customer service email found or phone number or live chat.
This app does a great job motivating you through the coached workouts. It has a lot of good 8nfo and tips to help you along and I am happy with the purchase.
Easy to use, includes everything from workouts to meal plans, from beginner to advanced, and has all different types of workouts. Very affordable.
Great workouts, tasty meal options, and pretty good meditations. Been seeing improvements (slow but steady) since downloading. Very happy so far!
I really wanted to use the app. but it doesnt let me creat account. Seems it doesnt work in my country. so please do not say "every where you are" in your advertisement! sadly I have to uninstall it.
I started this app. During a 6 week free trial. I've continued with it because I love it! Loads of variety of exercises that can easily be done at home
Great, easy to follow excersises! Not overwhelming for begginers. Great, easy and tasty recipe suggestions as well. I'm enjoying the app, keeps me motivated!
Very easy to follow program which makes it enjoyable. I also love the duration of work outs - perfect for when you have children!
I've decided to cancel my gym membership because of this app. Going to the gym had become easy but this app truly challenges me to get out of my comfort zone. Can't recommend this app strongly enough
The app is easy to use and so comprehensive. It's a fantastic complement to my gym membership allowing me to have tailored workouts both at the gym and at home!

What a superb engineered fitness app with a great team and fitness trainers. The variety and meal plans are impressive, support is great and even has a community forum to keep engauged with fello participants. The format is excently displayed in the app and I can see a good amount of money has been spent developing this
The Centr app is really intuitive and easy to navigate. I've really enjoyed the workouts and recipes - lots of variety!
This is an awesome app! Even on the beginner setting it kicks your butt. Already have noticed a change in my physical appearance and feel healthy and happy.
Fantastic app. I love the workouts and the food options are absolutely top notch. I eat a plant based diet and it has some of the most delicious recipes I've ever tasted . Thank you so much.
Just awesome to have access to a team like this. Great workout, great consideration put into structuring your journey, great food. It's a knockout guys.

Absolutely fantastic app! Used by the whole family to try and start getting into fitness full time. Two weeks down in the Centr 6 Unleashed, and I couldn't reccomend it more! If you should soend money on anything it is your health.
I would like to get in very good shape and gain abs, which I'm sure this app would help me do. But I'm a kid and can't pay for the subscription. Your stuff looks very cool and top notch though.
Love the recipes and how it makes a shopping list for you. Workouts are good, and I like that the mindfulness is there too :)
I'd like to be able to make a favourites list of the workouts I've done and want to come back to, to see improvement. Then it would get 5 stars :)
Great workouts that are easy to follow. Plenty for when you are short on time. The meals are good and adaptable for the family.
Great app! The trainers are fabulous and the meal plan is good. Motivation gets hard but there is always a blog or a meditation to help build it back up 💜💚

Don't get it for more than a month. Meals and workouts get repetitive and are sometimes too complicated. Those workouts won't get you to look like Chris Hemsworth trust me. And their price is more expensive than my gym membership...
Brilliant for when needing a full body workout regardless of whether your advanced, intermediate or like me, the once fit very fit but now very soft and spongy, so starting from scratch again
Paid for a subscription and the app won't even open. Keeps saying "sorry I dropped a dumbbell." Have been trying to open this app all day to start a program but I can't even start. Waste of money.

One of the best at home streaming apps. Love the workout concepts and the meal plan has really delish easy recipes. Been working out for most of my life and at home for past 15 years. This app, instructors, help center top notch.
It would be great to have off-line access to saved workouts, also a Way to track your weight progress and individual workouts completed.

As a mum to three young kids, the Centr app has been a lifesaver as I can be flexible with my workout times and don't feel confident enough to do group classes. I'm two weeks into the six week program and have lost 2kg & 7.5cm off my waist, feeling stronger, fitter and fabulous with more energy. The recipes are delicious and it's amazing to be able to select a vegetarian option and not worry about ingredients. The guided meditations are excellent & the jokes and laughs make it super fun!

After years of not working out this is a great way to ease into it and to get better and better it's nice to start at a beginner and then move on once your body adjust there's so much variety that it's hard not to find a good fit for yourself kudos to the team for putting together a great way to get everyone into it

Amazing app, there's almost everything you need related to fitness and health from meditation, recipes, bodyweight and varied level of equipment workouts, yoga, pilates, caliesthetics, workout planner and programs! Amazing, thought I'd just have this through Coronavirus isolation but it'll be my new workout guide in and out of the gym

Excellent app.... Fantastic classes.... Incredible choice and range.... Great value... Very high standard.... Really friendly and tough also... Have recommended it to everyone. Well worth the investment
I love this app, is really fun, with different work outs every day, with different coaches. I love feeling like I'm actually working out for a change. Is far the best work out app that I have tried.
The best in everyway. Current, healthy. Energetic. Balance exercises stretches, not jus cardio & strength. Great, easy recipes.
Great app, easy to use (Samsung galaxy) and caters for a large variety of fitness levels and training types. Love it.
Great sessions, lots of variety, pick a plan or try out different options finding what works for you. Would love some 7 day meal plans that worked with the grocery list (which is a great feature)
