Great app. I use it almost every day. The workouts are great and easy to follow. I love the meditations. They even have kids meditations. I would recommend.

As an exercise avoider even I enjoy these workouts. Ashley Joi is my favourite and I feel really good after her workouts, also felt great after the 6 week beginner program. Nothing will force you to exercise but if you want something to fit in a busy lifestyle, this is it.
Great workouts professionally set up and good trainers that really motivate you. Also good meditation and food recipe resources as well. Good one stop wellness app. Highly recommend it.

Love that it has a great food plan as well as good varied work outs. I am eating better and working out more than I ever have. At 57 years old it was a little intimidating but it is really accessable.
Sucks off line, good programmes but the way it tracks progress needs a lot of work, if you skip a workout then it gets messy to have a proper follow up

I'm truly enjoying this app. There is a little something for everybody, you can go at your own pace while also receiving positive, empowering encouragement to push further, it really is like having a personal trainer right there on your own space.

I am a founding Member since February 2019. Absolute love the variety this app offers and its constantly adding and editing things to make it more efficient and more exciting! Love love love could not rate high enough.

Brilliant! Workouts, meal plans, shopping lists, meditations... Everything I want in one app You can follow the daily planner or pick a program for yourself. There are coached and self-guided workouts. The best healthy lifestyle app period
Hands down the the best team you can have at your side for working out. It is not boring and you have different instructors for each exercise.
Expensive but worth it. Very easy to use and clean app. Great programs built for beginner up to advanced.
I love the workouts in this app!! I've never really been one to be motivated much to workout at home, but this app makes it really easy, theres something for everyone!

Love love love!!!! With the planner it makes weight loss and muscle-building so easy to follow. Its the whole package. Simple and easy to follow meal plan. Works outs kick your butt!!! 100% recommend.

This app is absolutely amazing, workout, meditation and meal plan all in one. Different trainers to train with every day. There is even meditation for kids which I play to my kids to help fell asleep. Amazing

Excited for Centr to finally come to Android! I have been using the service for a couple of months via the mobile website and have really enjoyed mixing up my workouts and trying new recipes. Looking forward to having a dedicated app for this now.
Absolutely loving Centr. The food is delicious and the workouts are easy to follow even for beginners. Would definitely recommend to everyone!
App contains great instructional workout programs. Great for at home or gym. There is also a Facebook online group that is incredibly helpful and supportive.

It doesn't matter your skill level, the instructors are not intimidating, and they do not expect you to already be a superhero. I like the variety and the results I see everyday. Thank you, Centr Team!
I love this app. It's really helping me on my fitness journey, it's got an amazing meal selection, great workouts, yoga and guided meditations.

Horrible, I only wanted to trial this. I was affected by covid and forgot I had this and was charged for a year. I asked for a refund because I won't be using the services especially in these tough times and they said no.
In the app says you get a 7 day free trail with the charge only applying after the free trail. When actually you have to pay first. Really wanted to try the app out.

Normally a weights guy, very little cardio/circuit training. With Covid I needed something i could do from home and they've built some great plans with no equipment. I'll be keeping this up once the gyms reopen. Brilliant app and plans
Easy to use & lots of options with new programs released regularly. Especially like the meditations. Well rounded app.
Great app. Love the work outs and all the meal suggestions and others. Con: cant save some workouts for later especially when out of network coverage
Great content, easy search function. Loving it. Would be great to have chromecast on coached workout videos!
Just the best thing to have discovered during lockdown. Variety of movements to mindfulness and recipes to community. All great and well worth the money
3 weeks in. So far so good. Instructors are great. Music coukd use a little change, but everything else is good! Would reccomend.
Great mix of options both workout and food wise. Can easily adapt it to you. Love the shopping list feature.

Best fitness/wellbeing app I have ever used. I actually cancelled my gym membership and I'm sticking with this gem. Also big fan of nutrition/ meals part as it saves me loads of time. Delicious and quick recipes every day. Thank you Centr team!

Giving this three stars and here's why. Chris is buff. And I understand there was at least one person behind him guiding him. And those people and Chris certainly deserve every bit of money they have made, but there are lots of free apps out there that will help you count calories and track your workouts etc. $200 for 12 months of an app that you're going to treat like a cheap gym membership is outrageous. Spending money won't motivate you, and Chris and his crew aren't gonna back you up

Absolutely love this app! The workouts and food are really enjoyable. I hate working out on my own but centr trainers makes me feel like I'm not alone! My fave quote from Ashley Joi "Suck it in now, so you don't have to suck it in later!" 😂 Love it!

Centr has been a tremendous blessing in many ways. I don't have to think about what exercises to do or what healthy meal to prepare - the app does it all. The variety of exercises and coaches is impressive. The meditation portions are actually quite serene that even my young kids love to spend time with me listening to Chris or Taika's voice. At first I wanted to see more of Chris, but now I'm quite satisfied with seeing Luke, Michael, Da Rulk and Torre daily for my fitness fix.

Really enjoying the variety workouts and advanced options. I'm usually at the gym 5-6 days so 2xHIIT and pilates/yoga each day is keeping me sane! Would be great to have a 'favourites' tab for workouts and meals instead of scrolling and trying to find ones you want :)
Hey team, It's a great app with awesome workouts and tasty meal plans but keep getting access issues and can't login. Can you please fix this bug so I can access this awesome app.

Much more than just a fitness app! If you want to improve your wellness this is the app for you - from HIIT, HIRT, MMA and Pilates there'll be a work out for everyone. Add on meal plans amazing snacks and meditations and sleep visualizations it's a bargain! Not only do I love it, my husbands joined me in my get fit mission and the kids have started joining in. In Feb a 6 week programme was released and another one is planned for may! Cant wait! Best programme I've signed up for ever!

Amazing app has changed the whole familys life, with amazing diet options and a huge variety of workouts guided and self-guided in the first week of training I've lost 2.5 kilograms and I'm well on my way to where I want to be. Thank you guys

Loving it. Great workout. Meals taste good! I started cutting weight 6 months ago (25 lbs down just before starting centr). This has been the kick in the butt I've needed to kick my health into high gear! Can't stop won't stop.

Great workouts, excellent meal ideas and great calming meditations! I lost 14 kg since I started using it (8 montgs ago) and it has been the easiest weight loss and heath gain i have ever experienced! I just LOVE this program! THANK YOU!

Great nutrition and workout app, loads of different meal options to aid your work out regardless of what you're training for, variety of workouts for all levels and good programs for consistent daily routines.

Just started last week, on beginner, and already I'm starting to feel stronger with each session! The meals (I go with vegan) are amazing. Well done to the entire team for also making this program affordable 👏

Awesome! Two weeks now since I signed up. I took advantage of the ciber week offer. Lots of different workouts and training. And everything done at home! You do not need many tools, with just your body, some dumbells and chairs, yes chairs... You will sweat. 100% confirmed. Also you have access to recipes if you like cooking. Love it.
Amazing. Was skeptical at first but you can definitely see steady progress especially with the unleashed program. Don't feel like working out? Just get up and press play and start

Centr: Like the fighter's saying goes, "Anyone, anywhere, any time." Great addition to my training and massive resource for nutrition and whole body/mind health. Seeing results in rehab, strength, fitness, and stamina.
Absolutely love this app!!! I thought this app was just a workout app but it has so much more to offer. Depending on ur goal, it even provides daily meal plans. 10/10.
Never opened the app. Somehow got signed up for a year for $126 and called the day it hit my account and I realized there was a mistake. Zero understanding and wouldn't refund. Poor customer service.

This is great for people who don't work out often. For athletes and people who work out a lot, these workouts aren't enough. They're barely a warm up for me. If you're getting into fitness, go ahead and give it a try. If you've been doing this for a while, don't waste your time, you'll finish your first workout thinking, wait, that was it? and then have to figure out what you're going to do now that you're sufficiently warmed up.

This is the best application I have ever used. Workouts, trainers, food plan and meditation post are amazing! Plus the community of people that all help each other is incredible. Been on centr since the beginning!
Absolutely loving training with this app. Especially useful in lockdown when you can't get to the gym. Really high quality trainers and fun, dynamic workouts. Really reccomend this. 5/5
Great app, love the exercises, love the meditation. Food is also great. It is exactly what I needed to keep a healthy and busy lifestyle.
I love the workouts! They kick my ass every time. And the recipes for the meals are delicious. I'm very happy with this app, it's the best fitness app I've used.
Great app for anyone ranging from beginner to advanced. Plenty of recipes and workouts so you never get bored! Would recommend to everyone
Amazing app that doesn't just provide a variety of workouts but also great recipes and meditation. Yearly plan is well worth the money!
Great programs for any fitness goal, easy to follow along to either at home or in the gym and the app is very user friendly too
I love this app & programme. I got it during covid19 and have never felt so good. Awesome simple recipes and huge variety of exercises, trainers and programmes. Thankyou centr.
Fantastic system that's more of a lifestyle than a diet exercise plan. Not for complete beginners. I would advise a getting back to mobility program first.
Love it but want to change to monthly subscription when my year comes to an end but there isn't an option to do that. Have recommended it to everyone who will listen!

Great app the meals always leave me satisfied and full of energy the only thing that could improve the app is demonstration videos for the cooking especially since I'm not that experienced with it yet
Great app for an all inclusive workout package. Workouts are challenging, meals are delicious and easy! Love it!
I was supposed to have a free trial, and was billed within the trial period for a year in advance. Not sure if conditions were misleading, misunderstood but I require a refund
Great way to change up my workout routine. My only improvement would be if it had a place to record what weight I am using for the various exercises. Also love the diversity of workouts.

The workouts are great. I work 8am-4pm and can always fit in my sessions with Torre! And the food is incredible! The vegan Cauliflower Mac and cheese is irresistible! Fantastic wellbeing app to get you in a positive mindset. I highly recommend!
Great app, good variety of workouts and good recipes. It's nice to have your workout, food and meditation all on one app.
Overall it is fine but I would like it to remove the wheel when updating the weights and make a spot for notes in the log book.
This app is exactly what I've been looking for. Amazing workouts, amazing recipes, and amazing meditations. No better triple threat like this one out there.

This is a great app, self paced with heaps of options for exercise. There is yoga, pilates, boxing, mma, hiit and so much more. Then you can check out the food as well. Brilliant, well deserved 5 star!
Content is good. I wish there were some videos around prep work, how to get in starting position. Also need apps for fire tv, google chromecast or roku

I downloaded the app because I think I saw that Hemsworth said it was free for a few weeks during the coronavirus quarantine. Wife and I work out with it almost every day for the last 3 weeks. I will definitely keep going after the trial is over.

Great app to follow if you don't have a routine. Plenty of options for prep meals to get some gains or maintain a fit profile. Highly recommend this app if you are ready to be committed and make a healthy life style .
Centr is a great app. It has it all. I mainly use it for guided workouts, I love having my own gym / yoga instructor lead the classes. It also offers meal plans, meditations etc.

If the only reason why anyone would pay way too much because it's Chris Hemsworth you must be hella gullible and love getting robbed. There are other free apps or pay fitness apps that cost 100x's less than this and does the exact same thing. For the daily diet there's thousands of diet plans on google that are free. It's not About how much you pay but how much time and effort you put into your routine, Don't get sucked into an app because of Thor save your money.
This app is amazing, it has it all: workouts in different disciplines, meal plan according to your goal, age and weight, and an amazing community that is with you all the time!! I love it!!!

Horrible App! It's only contains Premium Packages! It means you have to pay to get access to this app! And I don't think so I will waste so much money on this! Nothing is free Accept this App on Playstore! And they give u 7 Days free trial? I don't think it will change Anyone's mind! Atleast Provide free lectures not for a time period!
Great all-in-one fitness app with workouts and programs for all fitness levels and equipment (or lack thereof), meal guide with shopping list feature, and meditation. Well worth the $100/year!!!
I love the variations. Everyday I get to do different things, different challenges, working different muscle groups. I feel great. The whole team is awesome.

Totally misleading. Chris Hemsworth is not part of the videos like it appears before you get the app. And worse, when I wrote to ask for a refund because my 11 and 16 year old kids didn't want to do it because he was not part of the program. They said "NO". I signed up my children thinking that he would inspire them. Honestly things are not easy right now and for an actor who makes millions to say "NO REFUNDS", it's upsetting.

I've always loved taking fitness classes at the gym, but I don't have the time to actually go to the gym. This app brings the fitness classes to my home and there's a wide variety of exercises based on your personal goals. I love this app!
Best workout and meal planning app i have ever tried. Support team is also great. Very quick replies and always helpful. Would recommend to everyone
The workout programs/layouts aren't bad, but the information and usefulness of the app itself are pretty bad... Not worth the price. Would rather just use the bodybuilding app.
Great food with a variety of workouts to keep you interested. The mindfulness aspect just tops it off. Great app 👌
Amazing! Everything you need in one place. You get a variety of exercise dimensions and great food choices.
They need to have more details when it comes to the exercises, staying 25% or alternate X doesn't explain it well, if they could.do that this would be a 5 🌟
Currently not saving/logging any of the workouts, which is frustrated. Otherwise I really like the app.

This is exactly what I've needed. Intense coached workouts plus a quality meal program - was a bit sceptical when I downloaded it for a 7-day trial but within 3 days I was hooked and ready to sign up for a year.
It's a great workout session with ease and comfort. Just finished my week 1 advanced workout. I'm loving it.

Very solid workout app. Have been following the Centr 6 programme for two weeks during Covid-19 lockdown as it requires little to no equipment and already seeing results. Can't wait till the gyms open back up again so I can start doing other programmes without restrictions! 💯

Love this app and community! Great programs to follow every day if you want or go on your own for so many workouts! Meals for your goals planned and easy to make, plus delicious! I'm excited about working out at home!
Excellent app. I'm really enjoying the variety of workouts and meals. Love that it also has meditations!

I'm a founding member and this app is everything. Workouts, recipes, meditation, blogs with health news and everything you need to be healthy. Oh and I'm vegan and recipes are yummy and nutritional:))
Fantastic App. Easy to use and so many great options to stay motivated. Has me hooked and feeling great! Thank you!!
Great exercises that really do get you fit, I just wish there was more real time coaching rather than repeated sets with voiceovers.
Have been using this app for 7 months and absolutely love it! Great recipes that are so delicious and amazing workouts! Worth the subscription!
Overall good fitness app. Will definitely break into a sweat. But some workouts cannot be wirelessly cast .
Founding member...slow but steady progress. Love the focus on mental/emotional health, and LOVE the meals/recipes! Fabulous app!
Really easy to follow home workouts at a good level of difficulty, great low impact options where needed as well!

Excellent fitness app. Idk of many things that are worth ~$100 that last a year but I know this is worth it! If you hate the monotony of mainstream weight lifting or cardio workouts this will solve your problems.

I joined Centr when it was offered for a free months trial because of Covid , I'm so glad I did , I use it every day , the recipes are really tasty and easy to do , and it's everything you already have in your cupboards. The workouts are great , I really enjoy the coached ones, although there is an option to do uncoached if you prefer , the instructors are great I'm enjoying the hiit ones with Ashley Joi , but my favourites are the pilates with Sylvia Robert's and the Yoga with Tahl Rinsky .
Really great app. Would like if the app let you change your weight, and adjust the food menus depending on your physique

Centr gives me workouts, recipes, and wellness. I get everything I need to be a well rounded, active person. I love the different trainers and their different approaches to fitness. Well worth the money for me.

This app is junk. I try to sign up with my personal email and I get to payment it always wants my credentials for my school email account. I've tried PayPal and direct credit card. Terrible initial setup.

Not much to say other than this the most indepth fitness app I've ever seen...it is literally planning your everyday life around health, fitness and exercise. Ive been doing this for just 2 weeks and already know this is it for my future. Also the shopping list option is a little stroke of genius...thanks Chris Hemsworth for bringing this into my life 💪🤘🤘
This is the first time I have managed to get into fitness and the app has done this. I love the clean interface and the meal options available.

Lots of different programs from multiple instructors. I'd highly recommend this to anyone that's looking to keep their fitness standard high and to those who want to pursue their fitness goals! Da Rulk is the man!
I have been doing the workouts for almost 2 weeks and I love the variety, intensity, and the fact that I can do them from home with little to no equipment! The recipes are easy to make and delicious!
Very wholesome. Exercise makes me sweaty and energetic, the food are pretty and tasty. I would say centr is my favorite at home workout app no doubt.
I would have gave it 5, but there's no ipad app!! It would be nice to have ipad or tablet access. Great app, and great workout with mods for home users.
Great exercises, trainers are good (and funny!) I am able to easily use as a beginner and its kept me interested and motivated
Great app with great work outs for all levels. Would be even better if you could download workouts to go offline.
Love the app. The workouts are challenging, the recipes are phenomenal, and the instructors are inspirational.
Love this app...great workouts, lots of variety and really flexible. Menus and meditations are excellent!
I like the workout schedule, and I appreciate the meal suggestions too. The meditation audio clips are a bonus!
Great recipes, challenging but not impossible workouts that are easy to follow, really enjoy the meditations and different articles/podcasts
Great variety of exercises, great coaching. Definitely recommend centre unleashed. Right amount of exercise and great results!
I love this app. It's affordable, the workouts are highly effective and quick, the food is delicious, Pilates, yoga, meditations and even meditations for kids! Love it.
Excellent variety of workouts. Well designed app. Meditation and diet included. All around get experience!!!
Totally worth it. The coding is done beautifully. The content is on point as it say on the ad. Very happy with the results. Omg🧡🧡

I give the app 5 stars, I am loving the workouts! App is now working again, definitely the best fitness app I have had, I look forward to doing the workouts and I can't wait to try some of the recipes 😊
Best fitness app I have ever used. Easy and simple user interface with advanced training and fitness content for all personal types

I'm impressed with the variety of fitness expertise. From the meal plans to workout plans, Meditation to Sleep help. This app is so diverse and well thought out. I love how it really works around your dietary restrictions too. 👌🏼
Best health and fitness app! Well thought through and easy to use and stick to delivering great results. Great community.
Love this app but the log book needs work. Should be able to see date, set, reps and weight for each exercise to compare progressive overload.
You will sweat!!! This app is awesome, the coaches keep you pushing harder and harder. They are nkt actually there with you, but they make you feel like they are! Definitely a 5 stars!!

A massive variety of workouts and instructors, with and (most) without need for equipment, plus meal plans, nutrition information, meditation and other wellness programs: a truly comprehensive app for getting in shape.

Centr is worth it just for the food suggestions, I make amazing meals at home thanks to Centr. It's run by a good team who take feedback and are constantly developing new features, recipes and workouts. 11/10 app!
Nice variation of different exercises and programs to choose from. You can also adjust to the level you are at.
Just starting on my journey with this app. My experience so far is the tutorial doesn't show what I should be doing, it's a blank page which is very disappointing.
Got it on sale at the end of last year. Would pay full price again. Only work out app I've ever used consistently. So much variety. Amazing!!!
Not good enough, don't have option to do all the workout without Internet, is really overpriced premium and don't have that option to download the exercises

Fantastic program and planner. Honestly it's layed out so well. Meal planner and recipes are so good. App people also took the time to respond to my review to answer a question. If I could add another star I would!
Better than any workout app I've ever seen. Very detailed with meal planning, workout variations, and so much more. I sound like an infomercial hahaha! Keep grinding guys!

Would prefer to make or swap programs due to mobility issues... i can jump or step hard due to a knee injury and alot of legs have lunges and steps, ice skates etc and i can do them so swapping whole programs or at least certain items would be beneficial

Chris Hemsworth with no facial hair is...an interesting sight. Anyway, I installed this but then realized I forgot to check out the 1 star reviews which I normally do because that's where the good, informative stuff is (the tea!) Let me tell you, I am glad that I did! Uninstalling. You won't be scamming me out of MY money. And their customer service responses to the reviews all seem very cold, robotic and apathetic. I'm good, luv, enjoy.

Centr has helped me change my entire life style. The way I eat, work out, find peace in the middle of the busy work day. I have 4 kids and work and I can fit Centr in every day. The work outs are quick and challenging for all body types. I started at a size 12 ,180 pounds, 5'2 in August 2020. Today I am at 138, size 26- 27 (4-5). I had high blood pressure before and it's back to normal ranges now and no more bp meds! I have so much more confidence now. Thank you Centr!

I've never managed to stick to a fitness routine as well as I have with Centr. Pack your gym bag the night before, and there's no resistance as you have everything planned for you. Great to have an app that allows you to incorporate proper gym equipment and free weights too.
Has everything you need. One of more motivating apps and provides a wide variation of workouts and different ways to get in shape that can be tailored to your individual needs
It's so comprehensive and so customizable. I'm a big fan of the holistic approach, with sleep stories, meditation, yoga, vegan food ideas, and HIIT and plyo; I could go on. Highly recommend.
Love this app. I used to think fitness apps were overrated but this is fantastic. I love the workouts and the food is excellent and it's so much cheaper than my old gym membership!
After initial trouble in the first week, the app has been excellent. I've enjoyed the meal planning and structure of the workouts. The app has become part of my routine and my wife and i love it.

Excellent array of exercise sessions, nutrition and well-being advice. Did the COVID-19 6 week trial and followed Centr6 program and I'm now hooked. The difficulty level selections are a particularly nice touch. Would recommend to anyone.
As a beginner this app has been a great reintroduction to regular workouts. And having Chromecast functionality is a awesome!
It is a pity that the workouts and meals are so good, but the app keeps crashing and cannot be used at all even after the update. Please fix this asap and let us get back to Centr6!

I just love the variety of classes you offer. The meal plans. Shopping list. Meditation is so helping me relax. I could never turn my mind off before. Also im doing pilates. Who would of thought haha.
Love this app so happy when it finally came to Android! Been with Centr from the begining and it never gets old. The variety in exercises and food is great. I recommended it to anyone.

It was great until this Monday, where in I am enforced to subscribe everytime I login. Quite frustrating that IT team has not been able to resolve the issue. Will wait for my refund and cancel the subscription.

Absolutely love this! Feeling stronger everyday. Its great to have everything you need in one place, workouts, food, yoga, pilates and meditation. If you're thinking about getting fitter and healthier then join now!!

Class app, can't fault it. It's a PT in my pocket that keeps me accountable and pushes me to reach my goals. Delighted with my progress after 12 weeks of the Power weight lifting programme and the recipes are delicious!

This is a really worthwhile fitness app, specially centr 6 program (you can do the exercises at home just with dumbells) , it is best for someone like me that don't have much time for going to the gym and .....

With its 'light and bright and sparkling' motivations, its 'positive denouement', its'professionalism' Centre is the, Chris Hemsworth and his Elsa Pataky's most perennially popular, dazzling app of all. It convinces their success but push you to the pinnacle of success.
These workouts are great and long enough to feel like you worked out but short enough to squeeze in before work. The meals are easy, delicious and healthy.
So complete, good for everything that involve taking care of yourself with help from motivating coach. Loved it, and recommend it to anyone that need a change!
Excellent workouts, meal plans, mental health meditations. Very responsive on email with advice and the Facebook community group is kind and supportive. A great product. I'm very glad I joined.
The app kept timing out and it would forget hwere I was in the workout. It got quite frustrating and interrupted my workout quite severely. I'm not gonna pay for that

Loving it. Great trainers great variety. First workout app I have ever purchased (after the amazing 6 week covid 19 trial period) Very motivating. Only constructive criticism.... a monthly calander to see my workouts/progress for the month.

A great variety of workouts too choose from, for all intensities. Love the meals and snacks. Centr proved to me that I am disciplined enough to workout at home and gain results! I am a Ledgend! 😁🏋️‍♀️💪
Very good exercises. As someone who has done allot of different workouts this comes with some amazing things I'd never do on my own. Well done.
Fantastic, love the workouts, feel great afterwards. Especially like the meditation and sleep for kids, great for getting my son to sleep, works every time.
Really clear instruction easy to follow for the most uncoordinated. Already seeing result in one week fitter more toned and flexible. Highly recommended
I love the guided sessions. Especially when casting to big screen. Feels like I've got my own personal trainers at home with solid instruction wherever I have a spare 30 to 60 mins.
Not able to review the app, because it requires to fill-in a way of being charged in order to enter the trial period. I do not like giving such sensitive data if I am not to use the app for certain.
Brilliant app contents is perfect for my life style. The app running could do with a work out as it's not a smooth operation.

Would love more personalization through fit tests or some other form of specific training paths. More lifestyle goals as well. Best app on the market for guided exercise and nutrition/meal planning. Love you guys.
Love the app! The food choices are dynamic and delicious and the workouts are super fun (and occasionally hella brutal).
Great workouts for all levels and goals. Good food guide too. All it's missing is an ultimate Thor workout! Get us all the way, Chris!
Great range! Loving the choice of workouts and using the mediation and sleep apps more than i expected! You def work up a sweat!

Couldn't even give it a chance. I want to check it out on the 7 day free trial but it wouldn't let me sign up without entering my credit card info. I'm not comfortable handing out credit card info for an app that I might not even use after 7 days.
This app is loaded with options to choose from. Great for beginners all the way to advanced workouts!
Really impressed, lot of work gone into this & it shows. It's exceeded my expectations, I'm now using this app instead of PT sessions which has saved me a lot of money.
Great way to keep fit at home with a good choice of exercises and plans. Limited equipment needed.

This app has changed my outlook on working out. Being an introvert and not too partial on all the mirrors in regular gyms, I have the luxury of working out at home, at my own pace, at my own convenience

Honestly great for morning body weight only cardio workouts as well as a few weighted workouts hear and there. So depending on what your workout life consists of this is a pretty complete package. In addition to the exercises there's also meal plans with directions on how to make so unique foods.
Fantastic. Very comprehensive. Great workouts and well-being exercises. Nice user experience. Love it!

Signed up for a subscription after seeing an article about a six week trial period during this covid 19 quarantine. After 7 days my card was charged the 29.99 because I signed up through the app and not on their website.
Best workout app/ program I've ever found. Incredible instructors, great exercise programs, and the price point can't be beat
This has been awesome so far. I'm following the body weight only intermediate program and am loving the way I feel after each workout. The meals are awesome and the shakes are phenomenal!
Great app. Very motivational. Trainers are great. So much variety and a lot of options on app.

Love, love, love this app! I joined when Thor ahem... Chris Hemsworth offered the Centr6 for free and I was hooked! I am now a paid member :) If you don't like Gyms and love variety in exercises try it out. It also has meal plans for different needs, meditations, and as I said lots of options in types of exercises.
The customer service is very rude. Just had a nice celebrity face on it. Auto renewed my subscription for the year without sending any notice and refuses to give any refund. SCAM
Great app with lots of variety. May I suggest some sort of mindfulness during a commute to listen too as a future option
Keeps me motivated with a wide variety of exercises. Videos are Fantastic to help with form and technique!
One of the best workout apps I have used! I like the variety and how all the different elements of health are included.
Excellent app! Very user friendly for every stage of fitness with workouts, phenomenal recipes and meal planning, meditation and encouragement! Well worth it.

I'm not a gym person at all, I usually get bored in a week after trying a routine with weights. But when I turned 30 I decide to make a change in my personal life and Voila!!! I have been in this program since December 2019, I'm not the same person as before, I'm more productive and energetic than ever. My arms are not longer weak and my core is just getting better every day!!!
Great app for food and excellent exercise. Trainers are amazing. Ive subscribed well over a year now and will continue to do so!
Real enjoy using the app. The meal plan really helps to manage my diet and control portion sizes. The work outs are easy to do and switch search for ones with specific equipment and trainers
100% would recommend really fun doing it with others and the meals are awesome but I've had some difficulties with the interface
The best workout program I have ever been apart of. Great trainers, awesome meal recipes, and an amazing overall vibe that gets you in the mood to train and be healthy and become the best you 🙂

This app is really good. But I don't recommend it for beginners. The 6 workout or whatever it's called has a beginner way to do it. However It shows you how to do the moves as you're doing them. So if you don't know how to do them. You might hurt yourself.
Good for all fitness levels. Shows modifications for the exercises. I love the recipes.
Its awesome I've been using it since October of 2019 and have really enjoyed the workouts. There fun and easy to do and the food is awesome.
Really bad video quality over the past month where cant event get videos work on computer and mobile. Not a network issues as I dont this issue with others apps.
Plenty of options for your skill level. Good even work outs and a good support group. Also adaptibol to your needs.
I love it! It has everything I want in one spot! Fitness, healthy meals, meditation, and variety!
Good workouts, programs and recipes. More programs would be good. One added function could be a TDEE calculator which feeds into serving sizes.
Brilliant all round planner for meals, exercise and meditation. 100% would recommend for anyone who wants to change their lifestyle to a healthier one.

Great!! Would rate five stars IF.... My only complaint is that the self-guided workouts can't be cast to my TV. All of the guided workouts can without issue, so why not make the self guided ones the same way..?
I love the app, I always have a hard time coming up with a workout routine but centr makes it easy for me I love the intensity and variety of the exercises I never get bored with them

This is kinda scam you don't get any notification regarding the deduction after the trial period and they take the money without your consent. I opted for 6 week trial period I didn't get any notification regarding its ending period and when i saw there was a deduction of an year payment... really bad experience didn't expect this to be like this when ambassador is a big start like Chris Hemsworth
Great recipes, challenging workouts... Love it! Definitely recommend doing the Centr 6 program, really helps you stick to it and see the benefits each week
Recently I've noticed they have added more low impact workouts and modifications for those of us with knee issues. This has made working out so much more enjoyable!

Great instructors. Balance of encouragement vs drive good. Low impact options great. Works well for me as an intermittently exercising 58yo with bad knees. Haven't missed a session. .first time in my life
Absolutely LOVE the workouts they are intense and dont take too long! I feel amazing after I do them and there is a variety so you dont get bored!
A really good app. It gives great workouts, healthy meal plan, mental meditation and great mental exercises.
Awesome app, awesome workouts. The centr programs are well defined and diverse. Try it out, start with centr for beginners.
Recipes are amazing. Would be good to have a budget friendly zone. Centr6 is great though sometimes a little fast for me. Sleep visualisations are good to relax to

At first glance my biggest concern is not having the ability to cast the workouts to my tv. Really hoping I have missed something as it seems silly to have to workout from my phone. Will keep searching
I like this app. Helps me a lot in this pandemic era to keep fit and stay healthy. But in centr power, the video has no audio. Please fix it...
Amazing, motivational and easy to follow no matter your experience, of all the fitness apps I've signed up to none compare to this, I love it and feel stringer and healthier after 1 week

Would not let me log in half of the time even tho I used the right password, forgot about it and was tricked into paying $100 for an app that pretends to be charitable by giving you 6 weeks free. Awful.

The food and the gym are great but it would be perfect to have a tone up gym routine but their is just a build muscle routine for gym Would love it if the put a tone up version as currently using the build big muscle which isn't really my goal but no other options

Amazing! It's challenging and requires strong commitment, but there's support and the programs are incredible!
As a 25 year old in the Midwest working a full time desk job... It's hard to find time to go grocery shopping for the food... But the workouts really get ya going!
My favorite health and fitness app! Great workouts, delicious recipes, and relaxing meditations to top it all off.
Great variety and everything is super high quality. I've seen results quickly. Love these workouts.
Great app, clean design, love casting it to tv. To get five stars would love to see a feature that tells me which workouts ive already completed.

Absolute scamming b@stards. Sign up for a 3 month free trial and then a year later suddenly get whacked with a renewal for a year subscription? How the hell does that work? I wonder how small the small print must be on this one?
Awesome! Love the variety and integration with healthy eating. The programs are excellent too!

I came across a promotion for a free 6 week trial but after installing the app it declares a 7 day trial and guides me to register and then requests a choice for membership payment preference...? Is it the same app or is it a different program for the 6 week free trial?
Great workouts for all disciplines. Programes included diets and much more, always make me look forward to my next (however painful due to my horrible physical shape) workout.

This app is amazing, Food tastes sooo good, workouts get ready to have paper towels and a bucket cause youll be sweating buckets!!! Great app would recommend to many people either working out at home or in a gym.
Excellent workouts, recipes and zen coach all in 1. Quick enough so that you don't have any excuses and lots of variety to change up your workouts.
Amazing workouts and meal plans! they keep on adding programs with diff skill levels for everyone to exercise! And you can cast all coached workouts to your TV, Love it!
The team have done a good job on this one Easy app to work good exercises. Only thing I would like to see more programs than one.
Clean interface with a nice variety and library of workouts. Trainers are fun and inspiring.
Good app, however should allow you to select a trainer and type of exercise instead to have to look for the trainer and exercise you want all the time.

CENTR IS FANTASTIC!!! I am working out with my kids and we are having so much fun! We are getting in shape and I am losing weight! This is helping me to get in great shape and feel better which I haven't been in, in a long time. Thank you for this amazing app!
Nothing but great workouts with well done videos and walk throughs. The meals taste amazing even tryed a vegan dish and flavors were amazing.
Workouts are awesome. However, sometimes the app will not open or takes forever to open up. Please fix!
Great app, takes any thinking out of having to plan workouts. A great mix of strength, cardio and stretching (and more).
It's easy to follow and it challenges you with in the gym workouts and at home workouts. The meals are delicious!
There's an experienced trainer and style for everyone. I'm now on Advanced Functional Training and MY BOD!!!! .. I saw results so quickly too. Really top notch app.
Awesome! Thanks for keeping me motivated ! Great instructions, work outs , tips and recipes. Very satisfied, absolutely worth it!
Don't sign up for the free trial ! They charge a $25 despite cancelling. No luck in good customer service when raised a complaint. Highly disappointed

30 dollars a month??? Doesn't even have in intermittent fasting options, can't input that you're allergic to seafood. Chris, you're an extremely, extremely wealthy individual. Stop being greedy. For 10/month it would be worth it

Don't fall for this money grab. A good looking Hollywood guy is all he is. No doubt he works hard but so does everyone. This guy is training and eating on a multimillion dollar budget. Is he that greedy to prey on people who want to get in shape? I would never endorse something like this if I were him. Everything you need to get fit is free online with a little research. Being healthy is not something you pay a monthly fee to Chris Hemsworth for.
Brilliant! Started seeing huge results in the first few months. Stick to what they say and you will get results. Would recommend it to anyone!

Amazing app!! You will find here everything you need to get you back in shape or improve. From HIIT, weights, boxing to yoga n mindfulness. Great easy n super tasty recipes! Best money I have ever spend 👌
Week and half in and already noticing a huge difference better than anything I've done before for weight loss. Would highly recommend if you're committed/motivated to lose weight.
This app has changed my whole workout routine. So many options and it's nothing super complicated! Keep up the amazing work Centr team!!
I decided to try this to regulate my workout routine and not only has it been regulated but I immediately started seeing results! I feel healthier and stronger than I ever have!

Everything you need to self train... meals are what I like the best. Gives you a good man plan to follow. FB community is great and you can contact Centr through it and the respond wire quick considering how many members they have.
Amazing, thought out workouts. The coaches are great, very inspirational. There's yoga, hiit and hiirt, boxing and meal plans and recipes. What more could you want!!!!
Pleasantly surprised at the quality of the content. Plenty of variety for all fitness levels. In addition, the meal plans are fantastic.
What a great routine, easily tailored to your goals! Hits social, psychological, spiritual, physical needs with great recipes to fuel your day! Thanks so much!!
Really enjoying Centr power. I didn't realize how many different workouts there are on the rest of the app and the nutritional suggestions are amazing. Highly recommend giving it a try.
Seriously great. This apps really helped me transform my lifestyle in a healthy and sustainable way. It's a really holistic way to help guide people on healthy living.
Amazing ! Just need will power from our side and the rest the app just perfectly guides. From food to excercise.
My 3rd week working out with this app. Feel great and I think it's worth the money. Definitely keeps you motivated and going through out the workout and week!
I love this workout program and all the other features. The only thing I would change about this app is being able to download the workouts.
Great collection of workout videos and recipes. Easily worth $10 a month if you need an at-home workout replacement with no equipment.

I have been seeing all over the internet how this app is supposed to be free for 6 weeks but there isn't anything on the app itself except the 7 day free trial? And when I go through the site itself I says I have to pay 120 up front before I can use it.

Love this app, from diet, meditation to exercise and everything in between Centr has your fitness and wellbeing covered. I'm finally hitting my goals after years of wasting my money in overpriced gyms. It's definitely for me. Love, love, love it.
Great app with daily workouts, meals and more to keep you on track with your goals. You definitely should give it a try!
Great workouts that are convenient and dynamic. With some great tips for diet and over all wellbeing.
Really enjoying it, been 6 weeks and only missed one day of exercise. The meals are great too!
This app is incredible, they have a ton of options from workouts, diet and nutrition, meditation, and yoga. Can't say enough good things about centr and the team.

I was a founders member from day 1 with a guarantee of a yearly 25% for life, after the first year they charged me normal yearly fee no discount, I questioned Centr & apple &/ both palmed off with red tape, I did benefit physically from the workouts but to be honest a lot of the workouts were repeated week in week out month in month out, I found certain workouts a bit glitchy, after the second subscription at full yearly fee I cancelled & now I choose Nike Training which is free & much better

Awesome HIRT programs and food plans on here. Would recommend to anyone. No matter what fitness level you are at, there are variations for the same exercise what are suited for you. Feel like all the instructors are your best friends and really push you.

I LOVE THIS APP AND THE PROGRAMS! I just completed Centr 6 and Centr Unleashed: Intermediate and loved them both. These are the first exercise programs I have EVER finished ON TIME and COMPLETELY. I've already started Centr Fusion and am also doing the planner workouts. I used to HATE working out from home, now I have canceled my gym membership!
I'm finding app great. huge range of excercises to choose from no matter your fitness. Also instructors keep you motivated
Exceptional programs and so convenient for someone who is busy in every aspect of their life. Easy to follow and we'll rounded! Thanks Centr team!

Okay I subscribed for the free 6 weeks. Now Im pissed, locked out of my account, cant sign in unless I use older account info and then its asking me to sign up again. What is going on? I still have 3 weeks left if not more. This is not cool at all.
Love the app. All the things are taken in consideration that is the best part. Customisation work accurately. Will be using long term.
The App is very easy to use. From the programs they offer to the recipes and meditation sessions, im absolutely loving Centr!
This app is awesome! It's extremely affordable and you really get a quality workout. I have really enjoyed this program and the motivation is community gives me.
Really good app, very easy to use and so many options to workout. Also it has like a million different meals!
Couldn't be more happy with the app. Allows me to work from home at my own pace. I feel motivated all throughout and can honestly feel the difference on my body.

Week 3 and loving it! Have only been doing the Centr 6 program so far which is a good level of tough regardless of your fitness. Looking forward to checking out the other hundreds of workouts , mindfulness and yoga as well.
Great range of programs for all levels. Really nice workout videos. Love the range of meal and meditation options as well
It is a very great application lose weight, build muscle, train for strength and train for power. New food menu everyday

My wife and I use Centr almost daily. We like the variety that Centr offers - beginner, intermediate, advanced - combined with all of the various workouts. We weren't "out-of-shape" but we can definitely see and feel a difference after using Centr.
This app is the best. Has changed my fitness routine for the better. Great variety of workouts for all fitness levels.

I'm into my third week and can feel myself getting fitter and stronger. I signed up for the trial and ended up paying for a year (which worked out to be the equivalent of a one month gym membership at the time). Love it.
Some of the programs are a little repetitive, but overall if you are looking to take the guess work out of workouts it's awesome.

You absolutely need this App in your life! Centr packs all the punches! From bicpes to brain cells, gut health to glutes, Centr covers all the bases when it comes to changing your life for the better. All you have to do is follow your planner! Centr also has a fantastic and super supportive community where legends help other legends achieve their goals. So make it happen for you right now and GET THIS APP!
By Odin's beard, this is a great workout app. It kept me going through the pandemic. Instructors are great, programs are fantastic and I love the meal plan
I've been using Centr for a month now and I just love it. If you use this app seriously, it can be life changing. Thank you for sharing this Chris, your training team is amazing. Cheers!
Great fitness app, something for everyone. I haven't done the same workout twice yet, lots to choose from.
Great app. Love the exercises and the meal recipes are very delicious. Its helping me to get in better shape.

Best workout app I have ever used. Great food recommendations and so much more. I've lost fat and gained muscle. I'm in the best shape I have ever been in and feeling better than ever! HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO ANYONE

Great variety of exercises with and without additional equipment required. On top of that they have pretty easy to follow meal plans and variety of different articles related to health and sleep management.
Love this app, worth the cost. I no longer use a gym, and lots of bodyweight work outs. Would be good if there were more upper body, no equipment focussed work outs too.
Love the programs, meals are great. Have used a lot of the meditations especially for sleep they are great!
By far the greatest fitness app ever to come into existence. Hands down 110% amazing. Informative, Routine, and Motivating!
Love this app. Love the mix of workouts. The meal plans. The meditations.. Nothing I don't love about this app! It has it all in one place.
Love it for the coached workouts, trying new things, the 6 week program, the recipes and snacks! Definitely worth it!
Absolutely enjoy everything about this app and all the available options to work out, meal plan, and meditate. It offers something for everyone in the family.
This is a scam. They are happy to charge you for service you don't want and refuse to refund you based on their fine print. Not a fitness app. Just a money making scheme.
So far, each session I have done has left me sweating with jelly like limbs...it's great!! I love the concentrated workouts, they fit so easily into my daily routine.
I didn't know how out of shape I was before this! great work outs, awesome meals, and incredible meditations! definitely worth the investment!
Great workout routines! I love that it includes a food program that adapts to your food preferences.

Used this app since it launched and its only gotten better. You don't need a gym membership for it, plenty of programmes to keep you busy and the meals are incredible
Great guided workouts, and the meal plans are awesome with the grocery list option, haven't used the meditation yet but it seems really cool too

I have been following the 6 week programme which consist of weights and cardio at all levels, so easy to hard all at the same time with 3 trainers , so if something is too hard or easy you have another option straight away 👍
This app has everything, workouts diets and mindfulness meditations for adults and children, of all ages and levels of fitness. Highly recommend.
Fantastic! I'm not someone that can workout without guidance, and was bummed out when my gym closed due to COVID. Centr has given back the consistency and intensity I need :)
Nice, customizable workout. I'm middle-aged and never worked out, and it's super easy to follow along and get the most out of it.
Good meal plans, but the workout program is a bit unrealistic and appears to have random workouts assigned to you making it harder to progress.

This app is amazing, um im just doing the newbie program but its really fun, and surprisingly the meditation stuff is gud too...i should be using the food suggestions but i just like food from my culture too much...baby steps😂 ( soundtrack is fire too)
Really great variety of workouts with level options, love doing it alone or with the kids.
This app is amazing! I'm on week 7 of my journey, I feel amazing and I'm beginning to see huge changes though out my entire body.
Good app, would like to be able to exit the app while doing a workout and have the clock keep running but otherwise good workouts!
Absolutely love the variety of workouts, the focus on holistic health and the recipes are so easy and yummy.
It is great for starting out. The chrome casting is getting better but not all the workouts cast to a tv.
The recipes were great and the workouts were easy to follow for the most part. It's a great app and worth the money.
I can always find a workout with just the right challenge for wherever I may be at. Good physical/mental support.

I love the app so far, my only complaint would be that while I'm younger after so many years of competitive sports my knees can't do somethings (like burpees and half burpees) I wish they could take that into consideration.
Love it! The workouts always kick my butt. I've yet to dive into the recipes and meditation aspects, but the one meditation I did was very soothing. Thanks Centr!
Love the app and classes! Would be good to see more types of classes, like Zumba! Also, if I cancel my membership and pick it back up does it remember my favourites or no?
Awesome trainers! Love the variance in the workouts that keeps me fresh and coming back. And the meal plan and recipes are exceptional! 4 months in and im not going anywhere else.
It's a good app. The bad reviews are just from people who didn't read how the trials work. It's a good app with OR without weights if you play around with the app
Very easy to use with a lot of option. Reallt good for all level of fitness .
Great experience. Easy to scale to your level and varied enough to keep life interesting.
I love this mix of workouts and the ability to switch them up to what I fancy that day. The recipes are yummy, too! 😋
I really enjoy this app. So useful. And user friendly. Well organized. Great variety of training styles and options.
Its easy and good to push yourself, just wish it could help make meal plans to rather than just recipes.
Exercises and routines are fairly run of the mill , not worth the premium cost. Extra stars deducted due to misleading trial advertising, which meant I paid an additional month more than expected.
This app has it all, the trainers, the variety, meal plans and mindfulmess. I've used quite a few online programs prior to this and Centr is my favourite by a long way. Thanks Centr
This has been a lifesaver during lockdown, and I'm going to use it when the gyms open again. Varied workouts, meditation, recipes . . . What more could I ask for?
Joined for 12 months after doing the free trial offered. Seamless app, so easy to use and so sleek. Wished the guided meditations went for longer though!
I just did the bonus training with Chris. It was pretty fun and light-hearthed. This app keeps me motivated to train at home during the lockdown.

If you had your own gym this app would be unreal. You could play the app on a big TV and use your exercise equipment. If you do not own a boxing bag, bench, cable machine, sandbags, dumb bells and bench DO NOT BUY THIS APP. Instead, buy a home workout app that does not involve equipment or gives you a planner to use in the gym.
An ok app to give some structure to your workouts. Can't mirror to my Roku TV, so I have to watch/follow on my phone. Canned routines.

This app has everything you need in one place! The prices for membership are affordable and you get so much for it. I will use this app as long as I'm around to use it! Massive thanks to chris and his team!
So great. Lots of training sequences. Easily done at home. They have recipes, yoga, meditation. I love it.
Best workout app I've had so far, so many options and I love how there are modifications for beginners. LOVE IT!

Big fan of this app and the trainers. Doing the Centr Unleashed bodyweight workout - they have done a great job putting this program together and building on the intensity. I am really enjoying these workouts!
Has good variety of workouts and whether i need a bodyweight or dumbbells. They are perfect for the morning to kick off my day!.. I haven't had any leading or technical issues
Very cool. For the price it can't be beat. Mind and body healthy. Plus after quarantine I'll still use it in the gym for clanging and banging.
Easy to use, lots of great exercises with great teachers. I'm always excited to see what exercises are in store for today
Looking for an app like this for a long time. Visible results (if you stick to the plan). Big thanks to Luke, Chris, Bobby and the whole team!
Great app. Would like a few more workouts that don't require equipment, but overall there's some real good stuff in here.
Great programs, adaptable to every fitness level. Really enjoying using it.
I've been using the Centr Unleashed program and I finally feel like I found a program I can stick to. I highly recommend it especially right now when going out to a gym is not an option.
I'm sweating twice a day (planner workout and program workout). My cardio, flexibility, self discipline and strength are improving. Mental health and mood are also benefiting tremendously.
Lots of workout programs of different levels and specialty. Other wellness programs and sleepaides, recipes. Really has it all
Love it! From work out to recepies fantastic. The only other cool feature would be individual ingredient or custom meal tracking
Loving the fact that the workouts are so accessible, easy to follow, user-friendly, short, and that I can swop them out. Thanks, Centr.
Had this app for a couple of years. Love the variety of workouts and meals. Power program is my favorite so far!!
Can you guys add something for moms to make meal preps easy and reminders too would make a huge impact. Just a suggestion. Love the app overall.
It's great so far! Only disappoint part is that all videos don't have subtitle/closed caption for deaf.
Good app, been following the intermediate power 10 week program and drinking the after workout concoction. On week 3 and I'm seeing visual results already.
Amazing app. Easy to use, love the variety of workouts. Fantastic trainers who keep you motivated!
Best fitness app out there! Such good value. Workouts are great and the challenge programs good. Aboslutly love it.

It's just amazing Centr is with you from A-Z, from excercises to meals to information, even to a huge supportive community on FB. I actually never thought that I could one day start workingout and enjoy the diet meals, the recipes are just delicious. Who said that you gotta suffer with a diet?? The bottom line is that I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!!
Only been using the app a couple of weeks but love the workouts, the recipes and the flexibility to tailor both to what you enjoy
I love the yoga with Tahl!! She always reminds you to modify moves to fit your needs. It helps me to still complete the workouts while strengthening problem poses day by day.
Love it! Some of the coached workouts that repeat 10 times get a bit boring so I much prefer the variety led workouts 😍

Awful. Terrible. SUPPORT SOMEONE THAT CARES (NOT CENTR) Let me say first, that I don't write things like this often. People that are out there violently reacting usually don't have very balanced perspectives. But my experience in this case was not just bad, it was unjust, unfair, and dishonest. I signed up for the free trial of Centr. It's a good app, but I decided the price wasn't worth it for me. So I cancelled it on the day I needed to (August 31 for reference). My card was still charged for $127. No matter how hard I try I can not get a refund. I don't care how good the app is, these guys are obviously out to make a dollar. They don't care that they are cheating me out of money. But it's not just me. By ignoring me, they prove that they care less about humanity and more about padding their own pockets. Until I receive proof that Centr actually cares about the people they claim to serve 1 star is the best I can do. Zero stars would be more appropriate. Support someone that cares, not these guys.
